ppepe

National Football League (Fiji) 2009:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 33rd National Football League (NSL), jiske Newworld sponsor karis rahaa, me 10 team hae. Sab team duusra nau team se ek dafe khelis rahaa. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila. 
Fixtures.
Ii competition 27 February 2009 ke Ba ke Govind Park me Ba aur Tavua ke biich ke game se suruu bahis rahaa. Puura fixtures hae:
Pahila round ke baad ke points.
League ke pahila round jiite ke baad, Lautoka OFC khatir qualify hoe gais.
Premier division play-off.
A WIN over Rakiraki tomorrow will guarantee Vatukoula a spot in the senior division finals and a crack at playing in the promotion relegation series. Vatukou-la has a maximum six points from two rou-nds, Rakiraki has three while Nala-wa is winless. In the Southern Zone qualifiers, Jovilisi Rara's Tailevu Naitasiri needs a draw against Tailevu North after winning the first game 2-0 at Vodafone Ratu Cakobau Park. Western Zone results: Rakiraki 4 Nalawa 0, Vatukoula 3 Rakiraki 0, Vatu-koula 2 Nalawa 0 
Rakiraki is on the verge of crashing out of the Western Division play-offs after being held 1-1 by Vatukoula yesterday.
Lincoln Refrigeration Tailevu Naitasiri qualified from the Southern Zone yesterday after beating Tailevu North 3-1 at Ratu Cakobau Park.
Earlier, Tailevu Naitasiri edged Tailevu North 2-0 in round one.
FIJI Football Association yesterday clarified that Tavua will play in the promotion/relegation after finishing last in the NewWorld National Football League. Tavua lost 0-2 to Navua in its last match and was tied on 14 points with Nasinu. However, the gold miners were bottom by virtue of having a negative points differential. There was confusion after the points table released by Fiji FA last week had Tavua on three wins and six draws, which resulted in the side having a total of 15 points. Fiji FA National League Board secretary Hari Raj Naicker said it was an administrative error and Tavua will feature in the relegation series. "Tavua should be on five draws because the side had lost a protest against Lautoka, the match they had initially drawn."
VATUKOULA will play Tailevu Naitasiri in the Viti Levu Premier Division play-off to determine the team which will play the north winner to decide the team which will play Tavua in the promotion/relegation series. Vatukoula beat Nalawa 3-0 on Sunday to qualify. The side will now start preparations for the IDC.

Peru:
Peru, South America ke ek des hae. Iske capital city, Lima hae. Machu Picchu ke ruins, Andes pahaarr, aur Amazon Naddi ke source hian pe mile hae. Peru ke khaas bhasa Spanish hae.
Peru ke north me Ecuador aur Colombia, east me Brazil, aur south me Chile aur Bolivia hae.
Peru ke Inca 1531 talak rule karat rahin jab ki Spanish log iske lae liin. Peru 1821 me Spain se ajaad bhaes. 

National Football League (Fiji) 2005:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 29th National Football League ke Super Premier Division me 10 team rahin. Ii sab team ke dui pool me baat dewa gais rahaa. Ek pool ke sab team pool ke daur chaar team se dui game khelis. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila.
Super Premier Division.
Pool 1.
Ii pool ke pahila tiin team Nasinu, Lautoka aur Tavua championship playoff khatir qualify hoe gais aur aakhri dui team, Nadi aur Labasa ke relegation group me khele ke parraa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool ke pahila tiin team Ba, Navua aur Rewa championship playoff khatir qualify hoe gais aur aakhri dui team, Suva aur Nadroga ke relegation group me khele ke parraa.
Championship group.
Duuno pool me se tiin sab se achchaa team ke championship group me karaa gais rahaa jisme har ek team duusra team se dui dafe khelis.
Ii rakam se Ba, League champion banaa
Relegation Group.
Duuno pool me se dui sab se khraab team ke championship group me karaa gais rahaa jisme har ek team duusra team se dui dafe khelis.
Ii rakam se Suva ke promotion/relegation khele ke parraa.
Premier Division.
Premier division ke final Taveuni aur Tailevu Naitasiri ke biich me bhais. Pahila game 11 November ke Post Fiji Stadium, Suva me khela gais, jisme Tailevu-Naitasiri, Taveuni ke 3-0 se harais. Duusra game 13 November ke Ratu Cakobau Park, Nausori me khela gais, jisme Tailevu-Naitasiri, Taveuni ke 3-0 se harais. Ii rakam se Tailevu-Naitasiri promotion/relegation khatir qualify hoe gais.
Promotion/Relegation Playoff.
Promotion/Relegation Playoff, Super Premier Division ke sab se kharaab team, Suva aur Premier Division ke jiite waala team, Tailevu-Naitasiri ke biich me bhais. Pahila game 17 November ke Ratu Cakobau Park, Nausori me bhais, jon ki 0-0 se draw rahaa. Duusra game 20 November ke Post Fiji Stadium, Suva me khela ais, aur ii bhi 0-0 se draw rahaa. Iske kaaran ek aur game, 27 November ke Lawaqa Park, Sigatoka me khela gais, jisme extra time ke baad, Suva, Tailevu-Naitasiri ke 2-0 se harae ke Super Premier Division me rahe gais.

National Football League (Fiji) 2004:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 28th National Football League, jiske Newworld sponsor karis rahaa, me 10 team rahaa. Sab team duusra aath team se ek dafe khelis rahaa. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila. 
Pahila level.
Regular stage.
Ii rakam se Ba, NFL ke jiit liis aur Labasa ke Promotion.Relegation series ke khele ke parraa.
Premier Division.
Premier Division ke final ke pahila game 18 September ke Savusavu ke Ganilau Park me khela gais jisme Savusavu aur Tailevu-Naitasiri, 1-1 goal se baraabar rahin. Duusra final ke game 25 September ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa, aur ii bhi 0-0 se draw hoe gais.Aakhri game 3 October ke Nadi me khela gais, aur ii game ke Tailevu- Naitasiri ke de dewa gais rahaa kahe ki Savusavu ek ineligible player ke khelais rahaa.
Promotion/Relegation.
Pahila game 30 October ke bhais jisme Labasa, Tailevu/Naitasiri ke 1-0 se harais. Duusra game 6 November ke Ratu Cakobau Park me bhais jisme Labasa, Tailevu/Naitasiri ke 2-0 se harais. Ii rakam se Tailevu/Naitasiri 2nd division me rahe gais

Sarah Bernhardt:
Sarah Bernhardt, jon ki 22 October 1844 ke Paris, France me paida bhais aur 26 March 1923 me maris, France ke ek stage ke aur iske dunia ke sab se jaada famous actress jaana jaawat rahaa. Bernhardt, Europe ke stage me 1870s me acting suruu karis, aur kuchh din baad me Europe aur United States me kaam kare lagi. Uske ek gambhir actress jaana jaawat rahaa aur uske kuchh log "The Divine Sarah" bhi bolat rahin.
Jawani ke din.
Bernhardt ke janam Paris me "Sara-Marie-Henriette Rosine Bernardt" ke naam ke niche bhais rahaa. Uu Julie Bernardt (1821, Amsterdam - 1876, Paris) ke, bina baap waala larrki rahi. Julie, Jewish descent ke rahii aur uske jaada kar ke uske suateli maiya, Sara Abraham Kinsbergen, jon ki uske pitaji se 1829 me saadi karis rahaa, paalis rahaa. Julie, Paris me jaae ke rahat rahii.
Stage ke kaam.
Bernhardt ke stage ke kaam 1862 me suruu bhais jab uu Comédie-Française, Franceke sab se jaana maana theater, me ek student rahii. Uu France chhorr ke Belgium gais, jahann pe uu Henri, Prince de Ligne, ke mistress banis aur 1864 me ek larrka, Maurice, ke janam diis. Maurice ke janam ke baad, Prince Henri usse saadi kare maaangat rahis, lekin uske plawar iske inkaar kar diis aur Bernhardt ke uske saathe ke ralationship band kare ke majboor karis. Uu baad me ek kafan me sutat rahii. 
Aapan jindagi.
Bernhardt ke ek Belgian nobleman, Charles-Joseph Eugène Henri Georges Lamoral de Ligne (1837–1914), Eugène, 8th Prince of Ligne ke larrka, ke sathe ek affair rahaa, jisse uske ek larrka, Maurice Bernhardt, 1864 me paida bhais. 
Silent film me kaam.
Bernhardt, silent movie me kaam kare wala actresses me se ek pahila jan rahii. Uu pahila kaam Hamlet me karis rahaa..

Charlie Chaplin:
Charlie Chaplin ( 16 April, 1889 – 25 December, 1977) ek jaana maana England ke abhineta aur filam ke banae waala rahaa. Uu suunsaan filam khatir jaana jaawat rahaa, jisme uu kaam karat rahaa, direct karat rahaa, script ikhat rahaa, aur banawat karis.
Charlie Chaplin 70 saal talak kaam karis, paanch saal ke umar se lae ke 80 sal ke umar talak. Charlie Chaplin jaada kar ke "the Tramp" ke character act karis. 

Marlene Dietrich:
Marlene Dietrich (27 December, 1901 – 6 May, 1992), Germany ke ek abhinetri (actress), gawaiya, aur entertainer rahii rahii. Ii pahila German actress rahii jon ki Hollywood me safal bhaes rahaa.
Uske ek kaafi din talak kaam kais rahaa, jon ki ek cabaret me gawe waali, chorus girl aur abhinetri se Berlin me 1920s me suruu bhaes rahaa. 1930s me uu ek Hollywood filam star banis, World War II me larrai waala jahga pe entertainer rahii aur aakhri me 1950s aur 60s me ek international stage show abhinetri banis. 

Marilyn Monroe:
Marilyn Monroe, jiske paidaais ke naam Norma Jean Baker rahaa, 1 June 1926 ke paida bhaes rahaa. Uu ek jaana maana America ke abhinetri, gawaiya aur model rahii. Uu 29 films me act karis rahaa. Uske dher award milaa, jisme tiin golden globes aur ek best actress oscar uske "Some Like it Hot" ke role khatir milaa. 1950s me uu pachchhim dunia me ek sex symbol rahii. Uske tiin dafe saadi bhaes rahaa.
1999 me uske American film insitute sab time ke sixth greatest film star declare karaa gais.

Athens:
Athens, Greece ke capital city hae. Ii dunia ke ek sab se jaada jaana maana city hae. Ii city ke naam Athena se aais hae, jon ki Greek mythology me goddess of war aur wisdom hae. Athens ke abaadi tiin million log se jaada hae.
Athens ke itihaas.
Greece ke attica jagah me bahut pahile se basti hae lekin ii nai jaana jaawe hae ki kab usme se ek apne ke Athens bole lagaa. Plato ke writing me Greece ke naam ke 9600 BC se batawa jaawe hae. 
Jagha.
Athens, Attica ke central plains me hae, jiske west me Mount Aegaleo, north me Mount Parnitha, northeast me Mount Penteli aur east me Mount Hymettus hae. 
Athens kuchh pahaarr pe banaa hae. is built around a number of hills. Lycabettus is one of the tallest hills of the city proper and provides a view of the entire Attica Basin. The geomorphology of Athens is deemed to be one of the most complex in the world due to its mountains and causes a temperature inversion phenomenon which, along with the failure of the Greek Government to control industrial pollution, is responsible for the air pollution problems the city has recently faced. This issue is not characteristic of Athens alone; for intsance, Los Angeles and Mexico City also suffer from similar geomorphology inversion problems.
Mausam.
Athens ke mausam ke khaas feature iihae ki hian pe chaahe lambaa, jhuura summer nai ti saadharan, bhija winter rahe hae. Hian pe saal bhar ke barsaat ke biich waala aankrraa (average) hae, jon ki jaada kar ke October aur april ke mahina ke biich me gire hae. July aur August sab se jhuura mahina hae, jab ke baadal, mahina me khaali ek nai to dui time garrje hae. Winters, kuchh thanda rahe hae aur paani barse hae, aur January ke average hae; Nea Filadelfeia me aur Hellinikonme. Hian pe barf bahut kamtii gire hae, lekin jab ii gire hae tab logan ke rahan sahan me bahut baadha pahunche hae. .
Mount Parnitha, AThens ke uppar ek rainshadow bichhae he, jiske kaaran hian pe paani, des ke dusra jagha se kamtii rahe hae. July me sab se jaada average garmi Nea Filadelfeia weather station me naapa gais hae, lekin city ke aur duusra jagha aur jaada garam rahe hae, jaada kar ke city ke western hissa jahaan pe dher industry hae. Athens ke temperatures city's ke heatwaves ke time se jaada rahe hae. 
Athens city me urban heat island ke bhi asar rahe hae jiske kaaran insaan ke kartutu hae, altering its temperatures compared to the surrounding rural areas, that has detrimental effects on energy usage, expenditure for cooling, and health. The urban heat island of the city has been found partially responsible also for alterations of the climatological temperature time-series of specific Athens meteorological stations due to its impact on the temperatures and the temperatures trends recorded by some meteorological stations. On the other hand specific meteorological stations such as the National Garden station and Thiseio meteorological station are less affected or do not experience the urban heat island
Athens holds the World Meteorological Organisation record for the highest temperature ever being recorded in Europe of which was recorded in Elefsina and Tatoi suburbs of Athens on 10 July 1977.
Below are the meteorological data for the northern suburb of Nea Filadelfeia

Baghdad:
Baghdad (Arbii: بغداد‎ translit: Baghdād), Iraq ke capital aur sab se barraa city hai. Ii Tehran ke baad Southwest Asia me duusra sab se barraa city aur Arab world me Cairo ke baad bhi duusra sab se barraa city hai. Iske population 2003 me 5,772,000 rahaa. Ii city Tigris Naddii pe 33°20′N 44°26′E me hai aur ek dafe Muslim world ke centre raha.
Jagha aur mausam.
Ii city ek samthar jagha, jon ki River Naddi bisect kare hae pe banaa hae. Tigris, Baghdad ke dui hissa me baate hae, aadha east ke hissa ke Risafa aur west ke hissa ke Karkh bola jaawe hae. 
Baghdad me duno arid aur subtropical mausam hae. Agar jo garmi dekha jaae tab ii dunia ke sab se jaada garam jagha me se ek hae. Summer me, June se August talak, hian ke average temperature rahe hae aur iske saathe karraa khaam bhi rahe hae , lekin paani kuchh nai barse hae. 
Winter ke time, December se February talak, Baghdad ke aximum temperatures average kare hae, aur kabhi kabhi temperatur talak chal de hae. Kamti se kamti temperature January me me chal de hae. 
Hian pe paani, November se March, talak barrse hae jab average me paani kire hae, lekin ii jaada se jaada h talak chal de hae aur kamti se kamti .

Bangkok:
Bangkok (Thai: กรุงเทพมหานคร), Asia ke ek des, Thailand ke ke sab se baraa aur capital city hae. 2010 me iske population 8,280,925 rahaa. 
Ii pahile ek chhota trading post rahaa, Chao Phraya Naddi ke west bank me, jab Ayutthaya Kingdom rahaa. 1768 me ii capital banaa jab ki Burma des ke incade kar ke Ayutthaya (city) ke barbaad kar dis. Abhi ke Rattanakosin Kingdom 1782 me suruu bhais aur Rama I, aapan capital ke naddi ke east bank me banais. Ii city ke pahile "Phra Nakhon" bola jaawat rahaa, lekin iske boudary pahile ke biundary se bahut jaada bar gais hae aur puura urban area ke Krungthep Mahanakorn bola jaae hae, lekin bidesi log pura city ke Bangkok bole hae. 

Beijing:
Beijing (Chinese: 北京 /Běijīng/), People's Republic of China ke capital city hai. Iske pahile naam Peking rahaa. Ii China ke north eastern part me hai. Iske population lag bhag 21 million hai. 2008 me hian pe Olympic Games bhais rahaa.
Jin dynasty ke time se ii ek capital city rahaa. Ii city ke dher historic site hai jaise ki Summer Palace, the Temple of Heaven, aur Great Wall of China.
Beijing ke naam ke matlab Chinese bhasa me "the northern capital" hai. Iske counterpart Nanjing rahaa, "the southern capital", Ming Dynasty ke time. 
Beijing ke 14 urban aur suburban districts aur dui rural counties me baata gais hae. Beijing ek khaas transportation hub hae, aur dher railway, rasta aur motorway city me se pass hoe hae. Dher international flights bhi hian pe teminate hoe hae. Beijing, china ke political, educational aur |cultural center hae. while Hong Kong and Shanghai predominate in economic fields. The city hosted the 2008 Olympic Games.
Itihaas.
Purana itihaas.
Beijing me insaan ke sab se pahile rahe ke sabuut Dragon Bone Hill ke gufa, jon ki Zhoukoudian gaon, Fangshan District ke lage hae, jahan pe Peking Man rahat rahaa. Ii gufaa ke "Homo erectus" fossils 230,000 se 250,000 saal purana hae. Paleolithic "homo sapiens" 27,000 saal pahile talak jinda rahin. 1st millennium BC talak Beijing ke lage her siti rahaa, aur Ji (薊/蓟), jon ki Yan ke capital rahaa, Warring States Period (473–221 BC), ek taagatwar des rahaa.
Yan dynasty ke khalaas hoe ke baad, Qin, Han, aur Jin dynasties ii jagha pe rahaa. Han dynasty ke gire ke time, ispe warlord Gongsun Zan raj karat raha. Tang Dynasty ke time, ii Fanyang jiedushi ke heaquarters rahaa, jon ki northern Hebei ilaka ke military governor rahaa. An Shi Rebellion AD 755 me suruu bhais rahaa.

Berlin:
Berlin, Germany ke capital aur sab se barraa city hae. Iske abaadi 3,711,930 hae (2017) lekin pahile iske abaadi aur jaada rahaa. 
Ii city Germany ke eastern part me hae. Ii Poland se 70 km west me hae. Berlin ke area 891 square kilometers hae. Iske biich me se Spree Naddii flow hoe hae.
Berlin me dher jaana maana buildings hae, jaise ki Siegessäule, Brandenburger, Reichstag, boulevard Unter den Linden, Humboldt University, State Opera of Berlin. 
World War II ke baad Berlin ke West Berlin aur East Berlin me baat dewa gais rahaa. 1961 me Berlin Wall ke banae se bahut kamti log east aur west ke biich me jae sakat rahin lekin iske 1989 me ukkhaarr dewa gais.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2008:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 17th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series, jiske Pillay Garments sponsor karis rahaa, Ba aur Lautoka ke biich me khela gais rahaa. Duuno khel Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa. Waise ii champioship ke home and away ke system se khela jaawe hae lekin ii saal, Lautoka ke Churchill Park ready nai rahe ke kaaran duuno khel ke Govind Park me khela gais.
Pahila khel, jon ki Sanichar, 21 February 2009 ke khela gais, me Ba, Lautoka ke 1-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahaa Ba ke captain, Osea Vakatalesau.
Duusra khel bhi Govind Park me khela gais, Sanichar, 7 March 2009 ke. Ii khel me Lautoka ke championship jiite khatir dui goal se jiite ke rahaa, lekin Ba 4-2 se jiit ke fir se champion banaa. Duuno team rahaa:
Goal banae waala rahin, Ba ke taraf se Josaia Bukalidi (3 min aur 44 min), Peni Finau (13 min), Tuimasi Manuca (81 min). Lautoka ke taraf se Marika Madigi (53 min), aur Jone Vono (58 min). Ba ke Shameel Rao man of the match rahaa. 5000 se jaada log ii khel ke dekhin jiske Leone Rakoroi refree karis rahaa.
Championship jiite ke khatir Ba ke $3000 aur Lautoka ke $1000 prize me paisa milaa. Ii Ba khatir 15th CVC me jiit rahaa.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2007:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 16th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Labasa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 15 March 2008 ke Labasa ke Subrail Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Labasa ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. Goal banae waala rahaa Pita Bolaitoga (10 min)
Duusra khel, 6 April 2008 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme bhi Labasa ke ke jiit 2-1 se bhais rahaa. Goal banae waala rahin Maciu Dunadamu (42 min), Dinesh Mudaliar (63 min) aur Maviliko Nakama (90 min).
Ii rakam se Labasa duusra dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2005:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 14th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Lautoka ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 18 February 2006 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. Goal banae waala rahaa Malakai Tiwa.
Duusra khel, 1 March 2006 ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jisme duuno team 1-1 se baraabar rahin. Goal banae waala rahin Jone Vono Junior (92 min me penalty kick se) aur Josaia Bukalidi (41 min).
Ii rakam se Ba 13th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2004:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 13th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Rewa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 20 February 2005 ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 2-1 se bhais. Goal banae waala rahaa Jovilisi Rara (9 min) Keni Doidoi (25 min), Josaia Bukalidi (90 min).
Duusra khel, 27 February 2005 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme duuno team 1-1 se baraabar rahin. 
Ii rakam se Ba 12th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2003:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 11th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Rewa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 1 February 2004 ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jon ki 2-2 se baraabar rahaa.
Duusra khel, 7 February 2004 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 2-0 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 10th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2006:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 15th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Suva ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 3 February 2007 ke Suva ke National Sports Stadium me khela gais rahaa jisme duuno team 1-1 se baraabar rahin. Goal banae waala rahin Alvin Prakash (35 min) aur Malakai Kenahewe (5 min).
Duusra khel 15 April 2007]] ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Suva ke 6-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahin Rupeni Tabua (3 min own goal), Ronald Lawrence (11 min), Keni Doidoi (18 min), Josaia Bukalidi Jr. (51 min), Leone Vurukania (76 min), Osea Vakatalesau (81 min - penalty), Joseph Namariau (51 min penalty) aur Soroman Seule (90 min)
Ii rakam se Ba 14th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champions versus Champions (Fiji):
Champions versus Champions (CVC), Fijike ek football tournament hae jiske Fiji Football Association organise kare hae. Ii tournament jaada kar ke saal ke suruu me khela jaawe hae pichle saal ke National Football League ke winner aur Inter-district Championship ke winner. Agar ii duuno ek hi team hae tab Battle of the Giants ke winner khele hae. Agar fir bhi duuno winner ek hi team hae tab Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke winnerkhele hae. Agar fir bhi duuno winner ek hi team hae tab Inter-district Championship ke runners-up khele hae.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2002:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 11th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Nadi ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 26 January 2003 ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Nadi ke 3-0 se harais.
Duusra khel, 1 February 2003 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 4-1 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 10th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2001:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 10th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Rewa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 27 January 2002 ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba aur Rewa ke 0-0 se baraabar rahin.
Duusra khel, 2 February 2002 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 4-1 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 9th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2000:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 9th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Nadi ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel, 20 January 2001 ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Nadi ke 3-0 se harais.
Duusra khel, 27 January 2001 ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Nadi ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 8th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1999:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 8th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Nadi ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Nadi ke 2-1 se harais.
Duusra khel Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Nadi ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. 
Protest ke baad Ba 7th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1998:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 7th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Nadi ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Nadi ke 3-0 se harais.
Duusra khel ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Nadi ke jiit 1-2 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 6th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1997:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 6th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Suva ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Suva ke 5-0 se harais.
Duusra khel ke Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 2-1 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 5th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1996:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 5th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Suva ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Suva ke 3-1 se harais.
Duusra khel ke Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 2-0 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba 4th dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1995:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 4th Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Tavua ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Tavua ke ke 4-1 se harais.
Duusra khel ke Suva ke Garvey Park me khela gais rahaa jisme duuno team 0-0 se baraabar rahin.
Ii rakam se Ba 3rd dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1994:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 3rd Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Labasa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Labasa ke Subrail Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba aur Labasa 1-1 se baraabar rahin.
Duusra khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba duusra dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1993:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 2nd Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Nadroga ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Nadroga ke Lawaqa Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Nadroga ke jiit 1-0 se bhais rahaa
Duusra khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Ba ke jiit 2-0 se bhais. 
Ii rakam se Ba pahila dafe ii championship ke jiitis.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 1992:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke pahila Champion versus Champion (CVC) series Ba aur Labasa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. 
Pahila khel ke Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jon ki 1-1 se baraabar rahaa.
Duusra khel ke Labasa ke Subrail Park me khela gais rahaa jisme Labasa ke jiit 1-0 se bhais. 
Is rakam se Labasa is mukabla ka pahila vijayeta banaa.

Bogotá:
Bogota, Colombia ke capital city hae. Iske abaadi 7 million hae aur ii samunsar se uppar ek 2,600 meters ke plateau pe hae. Hian ke mausam jaada kar ke achchhaa rahe hae aur raat me thanda rahe hae. Ii city me dher bike path hae aur hian pe dher park hae.
Bogota ke 1860 me ek Spanish conqueror, Gonzalo Jimenes de Quezada, suruu karis rahaa.

Brussels:
Brussels, Belgium aur European Union ke capital city hae. 2007 me iske abaadi, 145,917 rahaa. lekin iske ass paas me 1,031,215 log rahe hae.
Brussels me Dutch) aur French me jaada kar ke baat karaa jawe hae lekin iske European Union ke capital hoe ke kaaran hian pe aur bhasa me bhi baat karaa jaawe hae.
Ii city ke location 50° 50' North aur 04° 21' East hae.

Buenos Aires:
Buenos Aires, South America ke des Argentina Argentina ke capital city hae.
Buenos Aires ke abaadi 2,776,234 hae. Iske khaas bhasa Spanish hae lekin English aur Italian bhi kaam me lawa jaawe hae.

Cairo:
Cairo, Egypt ke sab se barraa city aur capital city hae. Iske abaadi 7.7 million hae lekin iske urban area me kul jorr 15.2 million log rahe hae, jiske kaaran ii Arab World aur Africa ke sab se barraa city hae. 
Ii city Nile Naddii pe hae. City ke bahaar pyramids of Giza hae. 

Cape Town:
Cape Town, South Africa ke legislative capital city hae.
Ii South Africa ke southern coast me hae.
1486 me Portuguese explorer, Bartolomew Diaz iske naam "Cape of Storms" rakkhis , lekin Portugal ke raja iske naam badal ke "Cape of Good Hope" rakh diis.
Ii city ke khaas landmark, Table Mountain hae.

Damascus:
Damascus, Syria ke capital city hai. Ii Syria ke sab se barraa city hai aur iske population 4.5 million hai. Damascus, dunia ke sab se purana city me se ek hai aur hian pe log 8000 BC - 10000BC se rahe hai.

New Delhi:
Delhi (Hindi:दिल्ली) India des ke capital city hai. Ii India ke north part me hai. Iske population lag bhag 18 million hai. 2010 me hian pe Commonwealth Games bhais rahaa. New Delhi world ka bahut bada shahar hai. Yaha par duniya ki second sabse badi eco friendly metro rail service hai.

Dhaka:
Dhaka, Bangladesh ke sab se barraa city aur capital city hai. 1982 talak iske naam Dacca rahaa. Iske population 2005 me 12,560,000 rahaa.
15 August 1947 me partition ke badd ii East Pakistan ke ek bhaag banaa. 1971 me nawaa des Bangladesh banaa aur Dhaka iske capital banaa.

Istanbul:
Istanbul, Turkey ke sab se barraa city hae jon ki 1923 talak Ottoman Empire ke capital rahaa. Ii city purana time me Byzantium aur Constantinople ke naam se jaanajaawat rahaa. Ii ek seaport hae aur Turkey ke khaas trade kare waala centre hae.
Istanbul ke aage Golden Horn aurBosporus strait hae. Bosphorus, Black Sea aure Sea of Marmara ke jorre hae aur, Europe aur Asia ke separate kare hae. Ii city duuno Europe aur Asia me hae. Iske abaadi 11 aur 15 million ke biich me hae.
Iske pahila naam Greek me Byzantion aur Latin me Byzantium rahaa. Byzantium ke pahila dafe 667BC me Greek log aae ke base rahin. 196 AD me , Byzantium ke Romans log barbaad kar diin rahaa lekin baad me iske Roman Emperor Septimius Severus fir se banais. Constantine the Great sochis ki ii city ek achchhaa jagah pe hae aur 330 AD me Rome ke capital ke hian pe move kar diis rahaa, jiske suruu me New Roma bola jaawat rahaa lekin baad me iske naam badal ke Constantinople (Constantinopolis Greek bhasa me), rakh newa gais. 
Jab Roman Empire ke dui bhaag me baat dewa gais tab ii city East Roman Empire, jiske Byzantine Empire ke naam se bhi jaana jaawat rhaa, ke capital banaa. Iske kuch din talak Crusaders log occupy kar liin rahaa lekin ii bahut din talak Europe ke ek political, cultural, religious aur economical center rahaa jab talak ii 1453 me Ottoman Turks ke niche nai aais. 

Jakarta:
Jakarta, Indonesia ke sab se barraa aur capital city hai. Ii Java island ke northwest coast me hai. Iske area 661.52 km² aur population of 8,792,000 hai. Jakarta ke 490 saal pahile banawa gais rahaa aur abhi dunia ke ninth sab se densly populated city hai.
1619 me Dutch log iske naam ke badal ke Batavia kar diin rahaa lekin World War 2 me Japanese log iske naam fir se Jakarta rakh diin.

Jerusalem:
]]
Jerusalem, Israel ke capital city hai. Ii city ek pahaarr pe hai jiske kinare dher valley hai. Ii tiin khaas dharam khatir important hai. Ii abhi Israel aur West Bank me baatal hai.
Itihaas.
Jerusalem ek bahut purana city hai. Ii Judaism, Christianity aur Islam khatir important jagah hai. Bible batawe hai ki King David, Israel ke duusra raja, ii city ke pagan log se lae ke appan mahal huan pe banais. King Solomon, David ke larkaa aur aglaa raja, Temple in Jerusalem ke banais. Baad me jab ii Judah ke capital rahaa tab Jerusalem ke Babylon ke raja barbaad kar diis rahaa. King David ke mahal aur and the Solomon ke MAndir ke jarae dwa gais rahaa. 
Baad me ii jagah ke Romans log capture kar linn rahaa. King Herod the Great, jon ki Roman Emperor ke khatir raaj karat rahaa, Mandir ke barraa karis aur Jews log ke aapan side laae ke kosis karis. Jesus Christ, AD 33 me Jeruslem me maraa rahaa. AD 70 me the Jews log rebel kar diin lekin Roman log city aur Temple ke barbaad kar diin. Jewish people who lived in Jerusalem were caught and became slaves. The Romans renamed Jerusalem with a Latin name. Since then, the Temple hasn't been rebuilt, and only a part of its wall remains until today.
After the Roman Empire was split into two, the Byzantine Empire ruled Jerusalem. Later, Muslims took over the city from them. The Muslims believed Muhammad went to heaven from Jerusalem.
Later, the Pope in Rome sent the Crusaders from Western Europe to try and take it back. They succeeded for a while, but eventually the city fell again to the Saracens. Until the 20th century, Jerusalem was a part of the Ottoman Empire. There were some Jews in Jerusalem all along, even though they were ruled by other people.
The "New City" of Jerusalem is the part outside the old stone walls. People started building the new city in the 1800s. Mishkenot Sha'annanim, Mea Shearim, and the Bukharan Quarter are some of the first neighborhoods in the new city.
After World War II, the United Nations let Jewish people from Europe, many of whom lived through the Holocaust, make a country in Israel alongside the Palestinian Arabs. 
Jerusalem is pronounced "Yerushalayim" in Hebrew. 
All buildings in Jerusalem have special Jerusalem stone on them.

Kinshasa:
Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo ke capital city hae. Ii Africa ke tiisr asab se barraa city hae. Hian pe saat aur aadha million log rahe hae. Kinshasa city, Democratic Republic of the Congo ke Kinshasa Province me hae.
Henry Morton Stanley, 1881 me ii town ke suruu karis rahaa aur iske naam Léopoldville (King Léopold II of Belgium ke naam ke baad) rakkhaa gais rahaa. 1966 me iske naam badal ke Kinshasa rakkhaa gais.
Kinshasa, Congo Naddii ke ek taraf hae.

Kolkata:
Kolkata (Bengali: কলকাতা), jiske 1 January 2001 se pahile Calcutta naam rahaa, India ke West Bengal state ke capital ciy hae. Iske abaadi (2001 census) 4,580,544 rahaa. Ii India ke duusra sab se barraa city (Mumbai ke baad) hae. 
Ii Hooghly Naddi ke East bank pe hae. Kolkata, British Raj ke niche India ke capital 1911 talak rahaa. 

Lagos:
Lagos, Africa ke west me Nigeria ke sab se barraa city hae. Iske abaadi 10 million se jaada hae 
Lagos 1992 talak Nigeria ke capital rahaa.

Praveen Bala:
Praveen Kumar Bala, 1996 se 2009 talak, Fiji ke Ba town ke mayor rahaa. 
1995 ke Ba Town Council ke election me Bala ke National Federation Party (NFP) 15 seat me se 14 seat jiitis rahaa aur uske unanimously Mayor chuna gais rahaa. Bala aapan jiit ke kaaran party ke policy aur NFP ke membersip batais rahaa, aur ki NFP sab jaat ke candidate ke field karis rahaa.
2001 ke House of Representatives ke election me, Bala NFP khatir candidate rahaa aur Ba East Indain Communal COnstituency me uske khali 28 percent vote mila, lekin ii vote 1999 ke election me NFP ke vote se jaada rahaa.
2005 me Bala uu 3-member "Negotiating Committee" ke member rahaa jiske 2006 ke election khatir electoral pact negotiate kare ke rahaa.
1 February 2009 ke interim government, sab municipal councilke saathe, Ba Town Council ke bhi dissolve kar diis aur Bala ke dismiss kar dew gais.

Punjab (Pakistan):
Punjab Pakistan ka ek suba aur Province hai. Pakistan kee sabse jaida population iss jaga mein reithi hai aur south mein yeh Sindh keh saath lagta hai, east mein Balochistan ke saath aur north mein North-West Frontier Province ke saath. Yahaan ke logh Punjabi aur Urdu bhasa boltay hain. Punjab kee Rajdhani Lahore hai, jo ek Pakistan kee sabse biggest city mein shamaar hota hai.

Balochistan (Pakistan):
Balochistan, Pakistan ke ek Province hae. Ii province ke ilaka sabse jaada barra hai Pakistan mein, area ke point of view seh. Yahaan ke logh jaida Baloch hein laikin Punjabi, Pashtun aur Hazara bhi mill saktey hain. Iss province ka Rajdhani Quetta hai. Ii Province, Pakistan ke West me Iran aur Afghanistan ke border pe hae.

Sindh:
Sindh (; ; ) ka dosra Abadi wala suba jab ka tesra bera subha h. Sindh Subha Somal me , Mashreq me , Magreb me , jb k Jonub me se mita h.
ActionAid|accessdate=26 November 2015}}</ref><ref>

National Football League (Fiji) 2003:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 27th National Football League me 11 team rahaa. Sab team duusra nau team se dui dafe khelis rahaa. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila. 

Los Angeles, California:
Los Angeles (jiske L.A. bhi bola jaae hae), United States of America ke California state ke south me ek city hae. Ii city ke abaadi 3,847,400 hae lekin 18 million log L.A. region me rahe hae. L.A., USA ke, New York ke baad, duusra sab se barraa city, Carlifornia ke sab se barraa city hae. 
Itihaas.
Los Angeles ke naam Spanish bhasa se aais hae aur iske matlab "the Angels" hae. Iske original naam "El Pueblo de Nuestra Señora la Reina de los Ángeles de Porciuncula" (English me, "town of our lady the Queen of Angels of the little Portion") rahaa. Los Angeles ke 1781 me suruu karaa gais rahaa jab ki California, Spain ke niche rahaa. 4 April 1850 ke California, USA ke state banaa. Los Angeles me 1932 aur 1984 me Olympic Games bhaes rahaa. 
Geography.
Los Angeles ke puura milae ke area 498.3 square miles hae, jisme se 469.1 square miles jamiin aur 29.2 square miles paani hae. Ii city 44 mile lambaa aur 29 mile churraa hae. City ke perimeter 342 mile hae. Ii United States ke aisan city jiske biich me se ek pahaarr jaawe hae me se sab se barraa hae.
Los Angesles ke sab se uunch jagha Sister Elsie Peak hae. Ii San Fernando Valley ke north east me hae, aur ismke sab se uuncha jagha 5080 feet hae. Los Angeles duuna samthar aur pahaarri hae. Los Angeles ke pahaar waala jagha Santa Monica hills jon ki city centre ke north me hae, uu jagha jon ki Silver Lake ke laage hae,L.A. ke puura eastern hissa, Crenshaw area, San Pedro area, aur San Fernando Valley. Ii city ke khaas naddi Los Angeles River hae, jon ki Canoga Park se suruu hoe hae. Ii naddi ke duuno karar me cimit lagaa hae aur ii bahe ke bagal ke Vernonse hoe ke Pacific Ocean me jaae ke nikle hae.

London:
London, England aur United Kingdom ke sab se barraa aur capital city hae. Ii England ke South-East me Thames Naddi pe hae. Ii Europe ke bhi sab se barraa city hae. Ii city ke Romans log pahila dafe banain rahaa. 
London me 1908 aur 1948 ke Summer Olympic Games khela gais rahaa aur 2012 me fir se Olympics host karii.
Population change.
The historical population for the current area of Greater London, divided into the statistical areas of Inner and Outer London is as follows:

Madrid:
Madrid, Spain ke capital aur sab se barraa city hae. Ii 1560 se Spain ke capital hae. Iske abaadi 3.1 million hae. 
Spain ke Royal Palace Madrid me hae. Hian pe dher art museum hae jaise ki Prado Museum, Queen Sofia Museum, aur Thyssen-Bornemisza museum. 

Makka:
Mecca (officially: Makkah al-Mukarramah; Arabic: مكة المكرمة‎), Saudi Arabia me ek city hai. Iske population 1,294,167 (2004 census) hai. Ii city Jeddah se 73 kilometres bhittar hai, Valley of Abraham me jon ki samundar se 277 metres uppar hai. Ii Red Sea se 81 kilometres duur hai. 
Makkah, Islam ke sab se jaada holy city hai. Har saal million ke log hian pe hajj karne jaate hai.

Mexico City:
Mexico City, Mexico ke capital aur sab se barraa city hae. Ii dunia ke sab se barraa city me se ek hae. Aztec log hian pe Spanish log ke aae se paile hian pe rhat rahin. Iske 1521 me Hernán Cortés suruu karis rahaa. Abhi iske abaadi 8.5 million hae aur 18 million log Greater Mexico City urban area me rahe hae. 1928 ke baad Mexico City nai rahaa aur iske jagah ek Federal District banawa gais. 
Mexico City ke abaadi, Tokyo ke baad dunia me sab se jaada hae aur ii Mumbai se thora barraa hae.

Moscow:
Moscow (Russian bhasa: Москва, Moskva), Russia ke capital city hae. Iske abaadi 12.5 million hae jiske kaaran ii Europe ke sab se barraa city hae. Moscow ke Prince Yuri Dolgoruki, 1147 me suruu karis rahaa. 1480 se 1703 talak, Moscow, Russia ke capital rahaa. 1918 me ii fir se capiatal banaa.
Ii city ke biichme ek purana walled city, jiske naam Kremlin hae, hae. 

Mumbai:
Mumbai, jisko 1994 tak Bombay ke naam se jaana jata rahaa hai, India ke west coast pe ek natural harbour aur Maharashtra state ki capital city hai. ii India ke sab se barraa city, aur dunia ke sab se jaada abaadi waala city hae. Iske India ke commercial capital bolaa jaawe hae. Hian pe Bombay ke Stock Exchange hae.

Ahmed Bhamji:
Ahmed Bhamji ek Fiji ke Hindustani businessman aur National Federation Party politician rahaa, jiske Ba ke mayor chuna gais rahaa jab uu khaali 37 saal ke rahaa aur Fiji ke sab se jawaan mayor banaa. Uu 1982, 1983 aur 1986 me Ba ke mayor rahaa.
1987 ke general election me uu North Eastern National Constituency khatir National Federation Party - Fiji Labour Party coalition ke taraf se kharraa hoe ke Alliance Party ke candidate ke 12,786 votes to 9,946 votes se harae diis.
Iske baad uu Bavadra ke sarkar me Minister for Communications, Transport and Works banaa.
14 May 1987 me uu Bavadra sarkar ke 28 memeber me se ek rahaa jiske Rabuka hostage le liis rahaa.
Abhi uu New Zealand me rahe hae.

Nairobi:
Nairobi, Kenya ke sab se barraa aur city hai . Iske population lag bhag tiin million hai. Ii city ke 1899 me suruu karaa gais rahaa jab ki ii Uganda se Mombasa talak ke railway link ke ek depot rahaa. II Africa ke 4th sab se barraa city hai.

New York City:
New York City, United States ke sab se barraa city hae. Ii New York State, jon ki des ke northeast me hae, me hae.
Itihaas.
Ii city ke sab se purana bhaag ke naam Manhattan hae, jiske Native American naam Lenape hae. 1500s me pahila Europeans explorers logan hian pe aain, jisme Italy ke Giovanni da Verrazano, jon ki 1524 me New York Harbour ke entrance paais rahaa aur English explorer Henry Hudson jon ki 1609 me Hudson River ke piscover karis rahaa.
New York City me rahe waal pahila goraa logan Netherlands ke rahin, jon ki 1624 me aae ki hian pe basin rahaa. 1664 me jab English logan ii colony ke lae liin tab iske naam badal ke New York rakhin.

Paris:
Paris, France ke sab se baraa aur capital city hae. Iske area 105 square km hae aur hian pe 2.15 million log rahe hae. Agar jo suburbs ke bhi gina jaae ab abaadi 12 million hae.
Seine Naddi ii city ke biich me se flow hoe hae aur city ke ke dui bhaag, Left Bank aur Right Bank me divide kare hae. Iske paas me dher jangle hae.
Paris ke kuchh famous building hae Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, aur The Louvre.

Rio de Janeiro:
Rio de Janeiro, Brazil ke duusra sab se barrraa city hae. 21 April 1960 talak ii Brazil ke capital city rahaa. Iske abaadi 5,473,909 aur area 1,000 sq.km. hae.

Rome:
Rome (Italian "Roma"), Italy ke sab se barraa city aur capital city hai. Ii Tiber Naddi pe hai aur iske population 2.8 million inhabitants log hai. Vatican City ii city ke north-west bhaag me hai. 
According to legend, Rome was founded on April 21, 753 BC, by Romulus. He killed his twin brother named Remus, with whom he had been raised by a wolf, and became the first king of Rome. 
Rome was built on the Sun hill, later named "Palatine". It grew and is now built on seven hills: 
Rome was the center of the Roman kingdom, later of the Roman Republic, then of the Roman Empire.
References.
ref

Saint Petersburg:
Saint Petersburg northwestern Russia ke Baltic Sea ke Gulf of Finland pe ek city hai. Ii Russia ke duusra sab se barraa city hai aur iske population 4.7 million hai. Ii Russia ke dunia ke aur des se Baltic Sea shipping lane provide kare hai.
Saint Petersburg ke 1703 me Peter the Great, Russian Empire ke capital khatir banais rahaa. Ii 1918 talak capital rahaa. 
Saint Petersburg ke naam dher dafe badla gais hai. 1914 me iske naam ke Tsar Nicholas badal ke Petrograd kar diis. Lenin ke maut ke tiin din baad iske naam badal ke Leningrad kar dewa gais. 1991 me communism ke khalaas hoe ke baad iske naam badal ke fir se St. Petersburg kar dewa gais.

Mauritania:
Mauritania northwest Africa ke ek des hai. Iske west me Atlantic Ocean, southwest me Senegal, east aur southeast me Mali, northeast me Algeria aur northwest me Morocco-controlled Western Sahara hai. Iske naam ancient Berber kingdom of Mauretania se aais hai. Iske sab se barraa aur capital city, Nouakchott hai. Ii des Atlantic coast pe hai.
Iske area 1,030,700 km² (397,929 mi²) hai., Mauritania dunia ke 29th sab se barraa des hai.

Senegal:
Senegal (French Sénégal), official naam: Republic of Senegal, Africa ke west me Sénégal Naddi ke south me ek ds hae. Senegal ke west me Atlantic Ocean, north me Mauritania, east me Mali aur south me Guinea aur Guinea-Bissau hae. Iske size 197,000 km² hae aur population lag bhag 11,700,000 hae. Dakar, jon ki Senegal ke capital city hae, Atlantic saahil me hae.

Andorra:
Andorra, Europe ke Spain aur France ke biich me ek chhotan des hae. Ii des me lag bhag 77,000 log rahe hae. Iske capital city Andorra la Vella hae. Ispe ek Spanish Bishop aur France ke President raaj kare hae. Andorra ke sarkar parliamentary democracy hae.

Angola:
Angola, Africa ke south me ek des hae. Iske south me Namibia, north me Democratic Republic of the Congo, east me Zambia aur west me Atlantic Ocean hae Iske capital city Luanda hae.

Antigua and Barbuda:
Antigua and Barbuda eastern Caribbean Sea ke ek island des hae. Ii Atlantic Ocean ke boundary me hae. Antigua aur Barbuda, Lesser Antilles archipelago ke ek hissa hae.

Armenia:
Armenia, Europe ke Caucasus ilaka ke ek des hae. Iske capital city, Yerevan hae. Armenia, Soviet Union se 1991 me ajaad bhaes.
Armenia ke parrosi des hae Turkey, Georgia, Azerbaijan, aur Iran.
Iske 90% abaadi ethnic Armenians hae lekin hian pe Greek, Russian, aur bhi jaat ke log rahe hae. Iske jaada log Armenian Apostolic Church ke hae lekin ii des me Christians, Muslims aur atheists bhi rahe hae.
1920 se 1991 talak Armenia ek Communist des rahaa.
Armenia ek land-locked des hae, jiske border Turkey aur Azerbaijan se hae.

Azerbaijan:
Azerbaijan, jiske puura naam Republic of Azerbaijan hae, Eurasia ke Caucasus ilaka ke ek des hae. Iske border north me Russia, west me Georgia aur Armenia se, south me Iran aur east me Caspian Sea se hae. Azerbaijan me Nakhchivan Autonomous Republic bhi hae, jon ki ek exclave hae jiske borders north aur east me Armenia, south aur west Iran se aur northwest me Turkey se hae.
Geographically, Azerbaijan ke jaada territory Western Asia me hae, lekin iske Europe ke nangich hoe ke kaaran Europe ke ek hissa maana jaawe hae.

The Bahamas:
Commonwealth of The Bahamas, West Indies ke ek island ke jhund hae. Iske capital, Nassau hae, jon ki New Providence Island me hae.
Ii islands ke jaada log slaves ke descendent hae aur English me baat kare hae.

Bahrain:
Kingdom of Bahrain, Persian Gulf ke ek island des hae. Iske west me Saudi Arabia hai, jon ki Bahrain se King Fahd Causeway se jurraa hai, aur south me Qatar hae. 

Barbados:
Barbados, Caribbean Sea ke ek island des hai. Ii island ke area 430 km² hai. Iske capital Bridgetown hai. Iske official bhasa English hai. Barbados ek popular tourist destination hai. Iske population 276 607 log hai.

Belarus:
Belarus, eastern Europe ke ek des hae. Hian pe nine million log rahe hae. Iske capital city Minsk hae. 1991 talak ii Soviet Union ke hissa rahaa. Iske official bhasa are Belarusian aur Russian hae. Iske border Russia, Ukraine, Poland, Lithuania aur Latvia se hae. 

Belize:
Belize, Central America ke ek des hae. Belize ke log English nai to Creole me baat kare hae, jab ki parros ke sab des me Spanish me baakare hae. Iske pahile ke naam rahaa British Honduras.
Belize me two hundred and sixty thousand se jaada log rahe hae. Iske capital Belmopan, jon ki des ke biich me ai,hsi.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji):
Battle of the Giants Fiji ke ek football competition jiske har saal khela jaawe hae Fiji Football Association ke niche aur isme Fiji ke top district teams hissa lewe hae.
Ii competition, 1978 me suruu karaa gais aur iske idea J.D. Maharaj se aais rahaa, jon ki ii competition ke Fiji Footbal Association khatir paisa banae ke ek tarika sochis rahaa. Ii pahila dafe rahaa jab ki Fiji me football ke competition ke business sponsor laris rahaa. Ii competition ke 1987 ke chhorr ke har saal khel agais hae. 1987 me etwaar ke roj game khele ke manai ke kaaran ii competition nai hoe sakaa.
Nature of tournament.
Fiji ke top 10 district football teams ii tournament me hissa lewe hae. Abhi ii team hae Ba, Labasa, Lautoka, Nadi, Nadroga, Nasinu, Navua, Rewa, Suva aur Tavua. ii teamke dui pool me baata jaawe hae aur sab team aapan pool ke aur team se ek dafe khele hae. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir dui point aur haar khatir 0 point mile hae. Duuno team ke top dui team semi-final khatir qualify hoe hae jisme ek team ke winner duusra team ke runner-up se khele hae. Semi-finals aur final ekke roj khela jaawe hae.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1978:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke pahila Battle of the Giants tournament Suva me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadi, Ba ke 2-1 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1979:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke duusra Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Rewa ke, penalty kicks ke baad 4-2 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1980:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke tiisra Battle of the Giants tournament Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadi, Ba ke 3-0 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1981:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 4th Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba Lautoka ke 2-0 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1982:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 5th Battle of the Giants tournament Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Suva, Ba ke harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1983:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 6th Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadi, Lautoka ke 1-0 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1984:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 7th Battle of the Giants tournament Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Suva ke 1-0 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1985:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 8th Battle of the Giants tournament Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Lautoka, Rewa ke 3-0 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1986:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 9th Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadi, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1987:
Ii saal Fiji me coup ke kaaran aur etwaar ke khele pe manaa ke kaaran ii tournament nai khela gais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1988:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 10th Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Suva, Ba ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 4-3 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1989:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 11th Battle of the Giants tournament Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me nadroga, nasinu ke 1-0 se harais.
Semifinals me Nadroga, Suva ke penalty kicks ke baad harais aur Nasinu, Ba ke 2-0 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1990:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 12th Battle of the Giants tournament Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Suva ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 5-4 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1991:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 13th Battle of the Giants tournament Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadroga, Nasinu ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 4-3 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1992:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 14th Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Lautoka ke 1-0 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1993:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 15th Battle of the Giants tournament Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1994:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 16th Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Rewa, Ba ke harais.
Final ke game 0-0 se baraabar rahaa aur Fiji Football Association Nausori me replay kare ke batais. Ba iske boycott karis kahe ki ii game Rewa ke home ground me hotaa jab ki Battle of the Giants, Nadi me jon ki ek neutral ground hae, me khela gais rahaa. FFA ii game ke Rewa ke de diis aur ii 1972 ke baad pahila dafe rahaa jab ki Rewa ek tournament jiitis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1995:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 17th Battle of the Giants tournament Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Suva, Navua ke 2-1 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1996:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 18th Battle of the Giants tournament Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadi, Tavua ke 3-1 se harais rahaa.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1997:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 19th Battle of the Giants tournament, jiske Burns Philip sponsor karis rahaa, Labasa ke Subrail Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Labasa, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais.
Semifinals me Labasa, Lautoka ke 2-0 se harais aur Nadi, Suva ke 1-0 se harais. 

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1998:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 20th Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais.
Semifinals me Ba, Suva ke , penalty kicks ke baad, 4-3 se harais aur Nadi, Lautoka ke 1-0 se harais.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 1999:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 21st Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Tavua ke 1-0 se harais.
Super League Section.
Semifinals.
Semifinals me, penalty kicks ke baad, Tavua, Lautoka ke 5-4 se haais aur Ba, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais 
Final.
Final me Ba, Tavua ke 1-0 se harais.
Premier League Section.
Semifinals.
Semi-finals 28 July ke khelaa gais rahaa jisme Vatukoula, Savusavu ke 4-1 se harais aur Rewa, Nadroga ke 4-3 se harais
Final.
Final me Rewa, Vatukoula ke 3-2 se harais

Hong Kong:
The Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China (Chinese: 中華人民共和國香港特別行政區, Pinyin: Zhonghua Renmin Gongheguo Xianggang Tebie Xingzhengqu ,Hong Kong) People's Republic of China ke dui me se ek Special Administrative Regions (SARs) hai (Macau duusra hai). 
Hong Kong ke tiin bhaag me baata gais hai:
1997 talak, Hong Kong, United Kingdom ke niche rahaa.

Karachi:
Karachi, Pakistan ke sab se barraa city, "National City" aur Sindh province ke capital hai. Karachi ke log ke Karachiite bolaa jaawe hai. Ii city The city Pakistan ke financial aur commercial centre hai. Hian pe dui khaas sea ports hai. Ii city Arabian Sea ke coast pe hai aur Indus River delta ke west me hai. Iske population 12 million hai.

São Paulo:
São Paulo (Portuguese: Saint Paul), Brazil ke São Paulo ke capital city hae. Ii Southern Hemisphere ke sab se barraa city hae. 
Iske area 1,523 km² aur abaadi 10.9 million log hae
Duusra websites.
[http://pt.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Sao_Paulo_(cidade)&redirect=no](Sao Paulo city wikipedia(in Portuguese);many images!)

Seoul:
Seoul (Korean bhasa me, 서울), Republic of Korea (South Korea) ke sab se barraa city aur capital city hae. 1945 se pahile , ii puura Korea ke capital rahaa. Iske abaadi 10,276,968 hae aur area 610 km² hae. Ii dunia ke 6th sab se barraa city hae.
Seoul, Korean Peninsula ke biich me, samundar ke kinare Han River pe hae.

Benin:
Benin, Africa ke ek des hae. Iske pahile Dahomey bolaa jaawat rahaa aur ii France ke colony rahaa. Hian ke Fon log Haiti le log se related hae.

Bhutan:
Kingdom of Bhutan, South Asia ke Himalaya mountains ke ek chhota des hae. Iske Raja Jigme Singye Wangchuck hae, jon ki 1972 se Raja hae. Bhutan ke 1644 me Shabdrung Ngawang Namgyel suruu karis rahaa. Bhutanese ke log ke ii baat pe ghamand hae ki uu logan sab time se ajaad des rahin. Bhutan ke capital city Thimphu hae. Iske official bhasa Dzongkha hae. Bhutan ke sarkar aur log Tibetan Buddhism ke dharam ar sanskriti ke maane hae aur hian ke 97% log Budhist hae.
800,000 log Bhutan me rahe hae. 1989 se pahile 100,000 Nepali log Bhutan me rahat rahin lekin ii logan ke des se nikal dewa gais hae. 
1974 se pahile, Bhutan, dunia ke khatir band rahaa, lekin abhi tourist logan chhota chhota groups me aawe sake hae. Iske khaali ek airport Paro district me hae. Bhutan ke parrosi des south me India aur north me Tibet hae, jon ki abhi China ke ek bhaag hae. Bhutan ke khaas export hydroelectricity hae jiske India ke bheja jaawe hae. Iske currency, Ngultrum hae.

Bolivia:
Bolivia, South America ke ek des hae. Ii ek landlocked des hae jiske parrosi des hae Brazil, Paraguay, Argentina, Peru aur Chile. Bolivia ke abaadi 9,182,000 hae. 
Bolivia ke naam Simón Bolívar se aais hae. Hian ke khaas bhasa Spanish aur Quechua hae. Bolivia pahile Spain ke ek colony rahaa. Bolivia ke silver mines Spain ke khatir jaada paisa banais rahaa. Spain, Bolivia ke log ke gulam banae ke silver mines me kaam karwais. Bahut din ke larrai ke baad, Simón Bolívar des ke ajaad karais.
Bolivia ke area 424,135 mi² (1,098,580 km²[https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/rankorder/2147rank.html]) hae. Bolivia dunia ke 28th sab se barraa des hae.

Bosnia and Herzegovina:
Bosnia and Herzegovina or Bosnia-Herzegovina (locally: "Bosna i Hercegovina/Босна и Херцеговина", jaada kar ke abbreviated as "BiH/БиХ") Europe ke ek des hae, jiske area 51,000 km2 aur abaadi 4,500,000 hae. Iske parrosi des hae Croatia, Serbia and Montenegro. Bosnia ke capital city, Sarajevo hae. 
Bosnia and Herzegovina des Middle Ages me suruu bhais rahaa. Ottoman Empire ke time ii ek khaas province rahaa aur iske capital, Sarajevo, ke abaadi 100,000 rahaa. 1878 me ii Austria-Hungary ke niche aais. 1914 me Archduke Franz Ferdinand aur uske aurat ke Sarajevo me maara gais rahaa jisse World War I suruu bhais. 1918 se 1992 talak ii Yugoslavia ke ek hissa rahaa. 

Botswana:
Botswana, southern Africa ke ek des hae. Iske puura naam The Republic of Botswana hae aur iske capital city Gaborone hae.
Geography.
Botswana ke parrosi des Zimbabwe, South Africa aur Namibia hae. 
Botswana ek landlocked des hae. Botswana ke khaas geographical feature]] hae Okavango delta aur Kalahari desert.
Culture.
Botswana ke log ke Batswana nai to Botswanans bolaa jaawe hae. Botswana ke abaadi lag bhag 1.6 million hae.
Hian ke jaada log English aur local bhasa, "Setswana" (also called "Tswana") me baat kare hae.

Shanghai:
Shanghae, China ke sab se barraa city hae.
Ii Yangtze (Chang Jiang River) Naddii ke bank pe hae. 
Shanghae 1800s me western countries se trade kare khatir ek khaas port banaa rahaa. ii abhi dunia ke sab se barraa wharf hae.

Singapore:
Republic of Singapore nai to Singapore, Asia continent ke Malay peninsula ke ek des hae. Singapore equator ke north me hae. Iske parrosi des Malaysia aur Indonesia hae. 4.48 million log Singapore me rahe hae jisme se 76% Chinese hae. Sanskrit me, "Singapore" ke matlab "Lion city" hae. Iske national bhasa Malay hae lekin aur official bhasa hae English, Mandarin aur Tamil.
Etymology.
English bhasa waala naam, Singapore, Malay sabd "Singapura", "Lion-city" se aais hae, lekin ii hoe sake hae ki ii naam ke suruwaat isse bahut pahile ke hae. "Pura", Tamil "Puram" (புரம்) se aais hae jiske matlab city nai to metropolis hae.
"Singa-", Tamil "Singam" (சிங்கம்)se aae hae , jiske matlab ser hae. Aajkal ii city-state ke Lion City ke naam se jaana jaawe hae. Ii baat sach hae ki Singapore me kabhi ser nai rahin. Asiatic lion bhi kabhi hian pe nai rahin jiske Sang Nila Utama batais ki uu huan pe dekhis rahaa. Ii hoe sake hae ki uu hian pe tiger ke dekhis rahaa. .
"Singapore" naam duuno city aur des ke dewa jaawe hae, jon ki ekke chij hae. 

Sydney:
Sydney, Australia ke east coast me ek city hae. Sydney, New South Wales ke capital city hae. Iske abaadi lag bhag 4 million hae aur ii Australia ke sab se barraa city hae. Iske 1788 me England se chorr loan ke basae khatir banawa gais rahaa.

Tehran:
Tehran (nai to Teheran) (تهران Farsii), Iran ke capital city hae. Ii Tehran Province ke bhi capital hae. Tehran, Tochal mountain range ke kinare hae aur hian pe dher highway hae jon ki Asia ke aur des se bahut achchhaa hae. Ii city The city, Alborz slopes pe resorts, barraa museums, art centers, aur palace complexes khatir jaana jaawe hae.
Tehran, Middle East ke sab se barraa city hae aur dunia ke 16th sab se jaada abaadi waala city hae. Iske abaadi 8,429,807 hae. Tehran, Iran ke urban center me se sab se barraa hae. Iran ke jaada industry ke headquartes Tehran me hae, jisme manufacturing of automobiles, electrical equipment, military weaponry, textiles, sugar, cement, aur chemical products hae. Tehran ek khaas jagha hae jahan pe carpets aur furniture beja jaawe hae. City ke south me ek oil refinery bhi hae.
20th century, me Iran ke sab jagha se log aae ke Tehran me rahe lagin. Abi ii city me cher religious minorities hae, aur hian pe dher itihasik mosque, churches, synagogues aur Zoroastrian fire temples dekha jaae sake hae. Abhi ke Tehran ek modern city hae jisme tall structures, jaise ki Azadi Tower aur Milad Tower Tehran ke ek chinh hae. Agar jo dunia bhar ke city ke ddelha jaae tab dunia ke sab se sasta capital city hae aur duursa sab se sata city (Karachi ke baad) hae. Population se ii dunia ke 14th sab se barraa city hae, 56th agar jo GDP dekha jaae aur 29th agar jo metropolitan area ke abaadi dekha jaae tab.. 

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2000:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 22nd Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me, 20 August se 27 August talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Labasa ke 2-0 se harais.
Super League Section.
Pool matches 20, 24, 25 aur 26 August me khela gais rahaa
Pool A.
Achchhaa goal difference ke kaaran Ba aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Lautoka aur Nadi semi-fianl ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 27 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Ba, Nadi ke 2-1 se, aur Labasa, Lautoka ke 4-0 se harais.
Final.
Final, jiske 27 August ke khela gais rahaa, me Ba, Labasa ke 2-0 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke 9th dafe jiit liis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2001:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 23rd Battle of the Giants tournament Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 20 July se 23 July talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Lautoka ke 2-0 se harais.
Super League Section.
Pool matches 20, 21 aur 22 August ke khela gais rahaa
Pool A.
Ii pool se Nadi aur Lautoka semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Nadroga aur Ba semi-fianl ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 23 July ke khela gais rahaa, jiske pahila game me Ba, Nadi ke 3-0 se harais. Duusra semi-final me Nadroga aur Lautoka full time talak baraabar rahin aur penalty kicks ke baad, Lautoka, Nadroga ke 9-8 se harais. 
Final.
Final 23 July ke khela gais rahaa, jime Ba, Lautoka ke 2-0 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke 10th dafe jiit liis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2002:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 24th Battle of the Giants tournament Labasa ke Subrail Park me, 8 August se 11 August talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Nadroga, Labasa ke 2-1 se harais.
Super Premier Division.
Pool matches 8, 9 aur 10 August ke khela gais rahaa.
Pool A.
Ii pool se Nadroga aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Rewa aur Ba semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 11 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Nadroga, Rewa ke 2-1 se, aur Labasa, Ba ke 4-3 se harais.
Final.
Final 11 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Nadroga, Labasa ke 2-1 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke 3rd dafe jiit liis.

Brunei:
Sultanate of Brunei, South-East Asia ke ek des hai. Iske parrosi des Malaysia aur Indonesia hai. Brunei ke capital Bandar Seri Begawan hai. Ii ek chota des hai.
Brunei ke leader Sultan hai, jon ki dunia ke ek sab se dhanii admii hai. Iske kaaran hian pe tel se hai.
Brunei ke khaas dharam Islam hai lekin kuchh log Buddhism aur Animism ke bhi follow kare hai.

Bulgaria:
Republic of Bulgaria, South-Eastern Europe ke ek des hae, jon ki 632 me suruu bhaes rahaa.
Bulgaria ke capital aur sab se barraa city Sofia hae. Hian ke currency Bulgarian leva hae. Bulgaria European Union aur NATO ke member hae. Abhi ke president Georgi Parvanov hae. Iske abaadi 7.8 million hae.
Bulgaria ke official bhasa Bulgarian hae, jon ki ek Slavic bhasa hae. 1878 me Bulgaria, Ottoman Empire se ajaad bhaes. Bulgaria ke border pe Black Sea, Turkey, Romania, Serbia aur Greece hae.
Itihaas.
500 saal talak, Bulgaria pe Ottoman Empire raaj karat rahaa. 

Burkina Faso:
Burkina Faso, West Africa ke ek des hae. Iske pahile Upper Volta ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. Iske capital Ouagadougou hae. Ii des pe pahile France raaj karat rahaa aur ii 5 August 1960 me ajaad bhaes. 
2005 e iske abaadi 13,228,000 rahaa. Iske north me Mali, east me Niger, south east me Benin, south me Togo aur Ghana aur south west me Côte d'Ivoire hae. Burkina Faso ke log ke Burkinabé (pronounced burr-KEE-na-bay) bolaa jaawe hae.
Itihaas.
Bahut din pahile Dogon log Burkina Faso me rahat rahin. Nineteenth century me France iske aapan colony banae liis. World War I ke baad ii des ke Upper Volta bolaa jaawat rahaa. 1960 me Upper Volta, France se ajaad hoe gais. 1984 me ii aapan naam badal ke Burkina Faso karis.

Tokyo:
Tokyo (東京), Japan ke capital city hae. Japan ke das percent (10%) log Tokyo me rahe hae, aur biis percent (20%) log tokyo ke lage rahe hae. 2007 me Tokyo ke abaadi 12,790,000 rahaa. Tokyo, Japan ke business, trade, aur industry ke center hae. 
Tokyo, Japan ke Kanto plain me hae aur Tokyo bay ke face kare hae. Dui naddi Tokyo me se jaawe hae. Ii hae Sumida Naddi, jon ki north se south Tokyo Bay me flow hoe hae. Duusra hae Tama Naddi, jon ki west se east flow hoe hae. Tama Naddi Tokyo aur Kawasaki ke border hae. 
Tokyo ke matlab, Japanese me, "the Eastern capital" hae. Tokyo, Japan ke capital It became the capital 19th century ke biich me banaa, jab iske naam badal ke "Edo" se "Tokyo" karaa gais. Isse pahile Kyoto, Japan ke capital rahaa. 
1923 me Tokyo aagi lage ke kaaran barbaad hoe gais rahaa. World War II ke time ii Allied bomb ke kaaran Tokyo fir se barbaad hoe gais. 
1964 me Tokyo me Olympic Games khelaa gais rahaa. 
Etymology.
Tokyo ke pahile Edo ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, jiske matlab khaarri hae. Iske naam ke badal ke Tokyo ("Tōkyō": "tō" (east) + "kyō" (capital)) uu time pe karaa gais jab ki ii 1868 me imperial capital banaa. Meiji period ke suruu waala time me ii city ke "Tōkei," ke naam se bhi jaana jaawat rahaa kaahe ki iske likhe me wahii Chinese characters kaam me lawa jaawe hae jissee ki "Tokyo" likha jaawe hae. Kuch purana English bhasa waala documents "Tokei" naam use kare hae Lekin abhi ii pronunciation nai kaam me lawa jaawe hae.

Vienna:
Vienna (IPA-en|viˈɛ:na; in IPA-all viːn; see also other names) Republic of Austria ke capital aur Austria ke nau me se ek state hai. Vienna Austria ke khaas city hai aur iske population 1.8 million hai
Vienna, Austria ke ekdam east me aur Czech Republic, Slovakia aur Hungary ke border ke nangich hai. 2001 me ii city ke UNESCO, World Heritage Site banais aur 2005 me ek Economist Intelligence Unit, jon ki 127 world cities ke rank karis iske dunia ke sab se achchha rahe waala city batais.
Naam.
English naam "Vienna", official German naam "Wien", aur ii city ke naam aur dher bhasa me, Celtic sabd "windu" se aais hae, jiske matlab bright nai to fair hae. Kuchh log ii soche hae ki ii naam "Vedunia" se aae hae, jiske matlab "forest stream," hae jon ki baad me Venia, Wienne aur Wien banaa. Others claim that the name comes from the Roman settlement "Vindobona", probably meaning "white base/bottom," which became Vindovina, Vídeň (Czech) and Wien.
The name of the city in Hungarian ("Bécs"), Bosnian, Croatian and Serbian ("Beč") and Ottoman Turkish ("Beç") appears to have a different, Slavonic origin, and originally referred to an Avar fort in the area. In Slovene, the city is called "Dunaj", which in other Slavic languages means the Danube River, on which it is located.

Washington, D.C.:
Washington, D.C., United States ke capital city hae. Washington ke nam United States ke pahila President, George Washington se aais hae. "D.C." ke matlab "District of Columbia" hae, kahe ki ii koi state me nai hae.

Myanmar:
Union of Myanmar, (pahile ke naam: Union of Burma), South East Asia ke sab se barraa des hae (jon ki island nai hae.) Iske border pe north me China, east me Laos, southeast me Thaeland, west me Bangladesh aur northwest me Republic of India aur Andaman Sea south aur Bay of Bengal southwest me hae. Iske 2,000 kilometers (1,243 mile) ke coast line hae. Ii des ke ek military junta, jiske leader General Ne Win 1962 se 1988 talak aur General Than Shwe 1992, se control kare hae.
Naam ke itihaas.
1989, military junta officially iske naam badal ke "Burma" se "Myanmar" kar dis. Yahi time pe iske capital city ke naam ke "Rangoon" se badal ke Yangon kar dewa gais. 
Itihaas.
Myanmar purana jamana me ek tagatwar kingdom rahaa lekin 1800s me Britain iske aapan colony banae liis. Myanmar, 1948 me ajaad bhaes. 1962 ke coup me military power me aae gais. 
November 2005 me the military sarkar capital ke Yangon se hatae ke Naypyidaw kar diis.

Burundi:
Burundi (pronounced:buˈɾundi), jiske official naam Republic of Burundi hae, Eastern Africa ke Great Lakes ilaka ke ek des hae. Iske north me Rwanda south aur east me Tanzania aur west me Democratic Republic of the Congo hae. Iske southwestern border pe Lake Tanganyika hae. Iske capital city Bujumbura hae

Cambodia:
Cambodia nai to Kampuchea, Southeast Asia ke ek des hae. Iske parrosi des Vietnam, Laos aur Thailand hae. Lagbhag 13 million log Cambodia me rahe hae. Cambodia ke log ke "Cambodians" nai to "Kampucheans" bolaa jaawe hae. Khmer hian ke official bhasa hae. Cambodia ke capital city, Phnom Penh hae.

Colombia:
Colombia, South America ke ek des hae. Ii South America ke North-West me hae aur iske area 1,141,748 km² (440,839 sq mi) hae. Ii khaali ek South American des hae jiske coast duuno Pacific Ocean aur Atlantic Ocean pe hae. Iske puura naam Spanish me "República de Colombia" hae (English: ""Republic of Colombia""). 
Colombia ke east me Venezuela, south-east me Brazil, south me Peru, south-west me Ecuador aur west me Panama hae. 

Denmark:
Denmark northern Europe ke ek des hae. 5,400,000 log hian pe rahe hae. Denmark me dher island hae lekin ekko pahaarr nai hae. Denmark, North Sea ke bagal me hae. 
Denmark ke head of ststw ek Raja hae aue iske capital city, Copenhagen hae. Hian ke log ke "Dane" bolaa jaawe hae.
Denmark sab se chhota Scandinavian des hae. Iske parrosi des south me Germany, east me Sweden, north me Norway aur west me United Kingdom hae. 

Finland:
Finland ("Suomi" Finnish me), Northern Europe ke ek des hae. Ii European Union ke member hae. Finland ek Nordic des hae. Finland ke west me Sweden, north me Norway, east me Russia, south me Estonia aur Gulf of Finland hae. 
Finland ke capital city Helsinki hae.

Devanesh Sharma:
Devanesh Sharma ek Fiji ke Hindustani wakiil hae. Uu Fiji Law Society ke president ek saal talak rahaa jab ki uu Frank Bainimarama ke interim sarkar se khule aam disagree karis.
Bachpan ke din.
Sharma ke janam Toorak, Suva me bhais rahaa. Uu Toorak ke Marist Brothers Primary School aur Marist Brothers High School me parrhis. School me uu soccer khelis aur school ke quiz aur oratory teams ke member rahaa. Uske baad uu New Zealand ke New Plymouth Boys High School me parrhis. Iske baad uu Victoria University, Wellington me wakiili parrhis. Uske 1988 me New Sealand ke court me kaam kare ke mauka mila lekin uu 1992 me Fiji laut aais, jahaan pe uske 1993 me wakiili kare ke mauka mila. Uu R. Patel & Co. ke ek partner rahaa.
2006 coup.
9 September 2006 ke Sharma ke Fiji Law Society ke President chuna gais. [http://www.fijilive.com/news/show/news/2006/09/10/10fijilive01.html] 
Uu jordaar se 2006 Fijian coup ke condemn karis jisme Prime Minister Laisenia Qarase ke sarkar ke Bainimarama 5 December 2006 ke palat diis. Sharma, uu wakiiil logan ke bhi condemn karis jon ki coup ke support karat rahin. He dismissed as unconstitutional the swearing-in of Commodore Frank Bainimarama as Interim Prime Minister on 5 January 2007, [http://www.fijitimes.com/story.aspx?id=54704 but accepted the interim Cabinet sworn in on 8-9 January. [http://www.fijilive.com/news/show/news/2007/01/10/10fijilive17.html]
28 September 2007 ke Fiji Law Society ke Annual General Meeting me Sharma President khatir fir se nai kharraa bhais.

Krishna Chand Sharma:
Krishna Chand Sharma, ek Fiji ke Hindustani politician rahaa.
1992 ke election me uu Ra Central Indian Constituency se Fiji Labour Party ke ticket se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu aapan seat se haar gais.
1999 ke election me Viti Levu East Maritime Indian Communal Constituency se House of Representatives me Fiji Labour Party ke ticket se chuna gais rahaa.
19 May 2000 me Sharma, uu Mahendra Chaudhry ke People's Coalition Government ke 43 members me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske saathi logan hostage lae liin rahaa. Uske 21 May 2000 ke release karaa gais rahaa.
8 October 2001 ke uske ek bimari ke kaaran maut hoe gais. 

Sanatan Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2009:
Easter weekend me 2009 ke Sanatan Inter-District Championship Suva me khela gais rahaa. 20 teams ii 50th aur Power Electric se sponsered tournament me bhaag liin rahaa. 18 team Fiji se ahin aur 2 overseas ke team rahin. Tournament Suva ke TFL National Stadium, Buckhurst aur Bidesi grounds me khela gais rahaa. Pichhle saal ii tournament ke Navua jitis rahaa. Organise kare waala hai Sanatan youth and sports ke president, Yogeshwar Singh.
Pools.
Teams ke paanch pool me baata gais rahaa:
Fixtures.

1-15pm Navua vs Tavua (Buckhurst Park); Manukau vs Drasa (Bidesi); Lautoka vs Sabeto (Maritime), 2-30pm Seaqaqa vs Cuvu (Buckhurst); Nasinu vs. Tavua (Bidesi); Varavu vs Brahmin (Maritime). 3-45pm Ba vs Labasa (Buckhurst) 
Sunday 11/4

Sangam Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2009:
Easter weekend me 2009 ke Sangam Inter-District Championship Ba ke Govind Park me khela gais rahaa. Last year ke winner Ba rahaa, jon ki Lautoka ke final me penality kicks ke baad harais rahaa. Tournament Coordinator hai David Goundar.

16 team, Fiji Muslim League ke 2009 National Sports Championship me Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me Easter weekend me kheli. Teams ke chaar pool me baata gais hai.
Last year ke winner Labasa rahaa. Tournament coordinator Mohammed Sareem rahaa. Tournament ke April 9-13 ke khela gais rahaa. Winner ke $1000 aur trophy aur runner-up ke $500 aur trophy mila.
