Easter weekend me 2009 ke 54th Gujarati Inter-District Championship Ba ke A. D. Patel Ground me khela gais rahaa. Defending champion, Nadi rahaa.

Sikh Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2009:
Easter weekend me 2009 ke Sikh Inter-District Championship Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa. USA, defending champion rahaa.
Results rahaa:

Sanatan Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2006:
Easter weekend (13 - 16 April) me Prince Charles PArk, Nadi me 47the Sanatan Inter-District Championship khela gais rahaa. 
Semi finals.
Semi final me Auckland Sanatan, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais, aur Navua, Lautoka ke penalty kicks ke baad 5-4 se harais.
Final.
16 April ke final me Auckland, Navua ke 2-1 se harais. Pahila goal Navua ke Rajneel Chand pahila minute me banais. Iske baad Auckland ke ( pahile ke Rewa rep) Shekar Prakash aur (pahile ke Suva rep) Mukesh Chand goal bnae ke Auclkand ke jitae diin. Ii Auckland ke khatir 3rd jiit rahaa. Auckland 2002 aur 2004 me bhi Sanatan IDc ke jiitis rahaa. 

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament:
Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament (Fiji FACT), Fiji ke Fiji Football Association ke organise karaa gais ek tournament hae. Ii tournament ke suruu kare waala, uu time ke Secretary, J. D. Maharaj, rahaa, jon ki ii tournament ke pahile ii kaaran se organise karis rahaa jisse ki Association khatir kuchh paisa banawa jaawe sake. Ii tournament ke 1991 se har saal khela jaawe hae.

J. D. Maharaj:
Jitendra Durga Maharaj, Fiji ke ek jaane maane sports administrator rahaa.
Uu jaada kar ke Fiji Football Association se taaluk rakkhat rahaa, jisme uu Secretary aur Executive Director rahaa. Uske 1978 me Battle of the Giants soccer tournament ke suruu kare me khaas hanth rahaa. 1991 me uske Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament (Fiji FACT) ke suruu kare me bhi haanth rahaa.
Duusra position jispe uu rahaa:
Uske maut 24 December 2006 ke bhais rahaa. 
2009 me uske FASANOC posthumously, FIJI OLYMPIC ORDER confer karis rahaa. 

Suriname:
Hindi:सूरिनाम, nai to Suriname, nai to Surinam, Dutch Guiana, Dutch Guyana nai to Sranang, South America ke ek des hae. Iske official naam Republiek Suriname (Dutch aur translate hoe hae "Republic of Suriname") hae. Iske pahile "Nederlands Guyana", "Netherlands Guiana" nai to "Dutch Guiana" ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. Ii Guyana aur French Guiana ke biich me hae. Iske capital city Paramaribo hae. Ii des me lagbhag aadha million log rahe hae. Suriname, Netherlands se 1975 me ajaad bhais.
Ii des me dher jaat ke log rahe hae, jaise ki Africans, Europeans, Arbii, Indians, aur Chinese. Des ke sab se barraa dharam Christianity, Hinduism, aur Islam hae. 
Suriname ke French Guiana aur Guyana se uske south ke border khatir dispute hae.

Andhra Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2009:
10 team, Lautoka ke Rifle Range ke Lautoka Andhra Sangam School grounds me tiin-din ke IDC competition me bhag liin rahaa. Tournament coordinator rahaa Umendra Reddy.

Amazon Naddi:
Amazon naddi (jiske Spanish aur Portuguese bhasa me "Rio Amazonas" bolaa jaawe hae, ek naddi hae jon ki South America ke tropical jangle me se flow howe hae. Ii jaada kar ke Brazil me hae aur samundar me jaae ke Atlantic Ocean me nikle hae. II Nile Naddi ke baad me dunia ke duusra sab se lamba nadi hae. Agar jo dekha jaae ki isme se ketna paani flow hoe hae tab ii dunia ke sab se barraa naddi hae. Ii etna lamba hae aur isme etna jor se paani flow hoe hae ki iske uppar se koi pul nai banawa jaae saka hae.
Iske kinare dher city ha, jisme se sab se barraa Manaus hae. Iske samundar se 1500 kilometers bhittar rake par bhi hian talak barraa barraa jahaaj jaawe sake hae. 3000 tons talak ke chhota jahaaj jiske draft 7.9 m (26 feet) talak rahe hae Peru ke Iquitos city talak bhi jaawe sake hae jon ki samundar se 3,700 km (2,300 miles) bhittar hae. Aur chhota boat 780 km (486 mi) aur bhittar talak bhi jaawe sake hae. 

Aral Sea:
The Aral Sea (Kazakh: "Арал Теңізі" (Aral Tengizi), Uzbek "Orol dengizi", Russian "Аральскοе мοре"), Central Asia ke ek landlocked samundar hae. Iske north me Kazakhstan aur south me Uzbekistan hae. 1960 se Aral Sea chhota hoe hae. Iske kaaran hae ki jon naddi se hian pe paani aawat rahaa ke Soviet Union irrigation khatir divert kar diis. Aral Sea baht kharaab se polluted hae.

Baltic Sea:
Baltic Sea northern Europe ke Scandinavia, Finland, Russia, Baltic countries, Poland, aur Germany ke biich me ek samundar hai.
Bagal ke des me se dher naddi aae ke Baltic Sea me nikle hai. Baltic Sea, Atlantic Ocean se Danish straits se jurre hai. Ii samundar me nimak bahut kamti hai aur ii kaaran se winter me iske northern part jam jaawe hai aur ii ice ke uppar se motar Sweden aur Finland ke biich me jaawe sake hai.

Black Sea:
Black Sea ek samundar hae jiske sab bagal jamin hae. Ii Europe aur Asia ke biich me hae aur ii Mediterranean sea se patraa Bosphorus se jurra hae.

Caribbean Sea:
Caribbean Sea (Dutch: "Cariben" nai to "Caraiben", French: "Caraïbe" nai to jaada kar ke "Antilles"; Spanish: "Caribe") the Americas me ek jagah hae. Isme 7,000 se jaada islands hae. Ii South America ke north, Central America ke east aur South America ke north me hae. Iske east me Atlantic Ocean hae.
Caribbean naam "Carib" se aawe hae, jon ki Native American log ke naam rahaa jon ki Lesser Antilles aur north South America me rahat rahin, goraa logan ke aae se pahile.
Iske kuch khaas island hae Cuba, Jamaica, Puerto Rico aur Hispaniola. Kuch des jaise ki Dominican Republic aur Haiti Hispaniola me hae.
18th century me dher des ii island ke colony banais rahaa aur ii kaaran se hian ke rahan sahan Africa, India aur Europe se aais hae.

Caspian Sea:
Caspian Sea, duuno area aur volume se dunia ke sab se barraa lake hae. Iske surface area 371,000 square kilometres (143,244 mi²) aur volume 78,200 cubic kilometres (18,761 mi³) hae. Iske chaaro taraf jamiin hae aur ii Russia aur Iran ke biich me hae. Iske east me Kazakhstan aur Turkmenistan, aur west me Azerbaijan hae. Iske sab se jaada gahiraai 1025 meters (3,363 ft) hae. Iske salinity approximately 1.2% hae, jon ki normal samundar ke paani ke one-third hae.

Dead Sea:
Dead Sea ek lake hae jon ki Israel aur Jordan ke biich me hae. Ii 418 Metre (1,371 ft) sea level se niche hae aur ii dunia ke surface me sab se nicha jagah hae. Ii samundar se nau dafe jaada khaara hae.
Jaada nimak ke kaaran hian pe koi chij jinda nai rahe sake hae. Yahi kaaran se iske naam Dead Sea hae. Iske ek natija ii hae ki koi jane isme easily float hoe sake hae.

Mediterranean Sea:
Mediterranean Sea ek samundar hae jon ki Europe, Africa aur Asia ke biich me hae.
The Mediterranean Sea, Atlantic Ocean ke ek bhaag hae aur iske area 2.5 million km² (965 000 mi²) hae.

North Sea:
North Sea shimaalii Europe ke ek samundar hae. Ii Atlantic ocean ke ek bhaag hae. North Sea, sharq me Norway aur Denmark ke biich me, gharb me Scotland aur England ke biich me aur januub me Germany, Netherlands, Belgium aur France ke biich me hae. 
Skagerrak North Sea ke Baltic Sea se connect kare hae. Januub me North Sea, English Channel ban jaawe hae. Jon ki England aur France ke biich ke samundar hae. 
North Sea ke gahiraai average me 94 metres hae. 
Kuch khaas naddi jon ki North Sea me aae ke nikle hae ke naam hae: Tay (Dundee mw), the Forth (Edinburgh me), the Tyne (Tynemouth, South Shields), the Wear (Sunderland me), Elbe (Cuxhaven me), Weser (Bremerhaven me), the Rhine aur Meuse or Maas (Rotterdam me), Scheldt (Flushing or Vlissingen me), Thames, aur Humber ( Hull me).

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2003:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 25th Battle of the Giants tournament Lautoka ke Churchill Park me, 7 August se 10 August talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Rewa, Ba ke 1-0 se harais.
Super Premier Division.
Pool matches 7, 8 aur 9 August ke khela gais rahaa.
Pool A.
Ii pool se Nadroga aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Rewa aur Ba semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 10 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Rewa, Lautka ke aur Ba Suva ke harais. 
Final.
Final 10 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Rewa, Ba ke 1-0 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke duusra dafe jiit liis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2004:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 26th Battle of the Giants tournament Ba ke Govind Park me, 30 July, 31 July, 1 August aur 8 August ke khela gais rahaa, jiske final me Rewa, Nadi ke 2-0 se harais.
Super Premier Division.
Pool matches 30 July, 31 July aur 1 August ke khela gais rahaa.
Pool A.
Ii pool se Rewa aur Nadi semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Suva aur Navua semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 8 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Rewa, Navua ke 2-0 se aur Nadi, Suva ke 1-0 se harais. 
Final.
Final 8 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Rewa, Nadi ke 2-0 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke tiisra dafe jiit liis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2005:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 27th Battle of the Giants tournament Suva ke National Stadium me, 9 July, 10 July, 15 July, 16 July aur 17 July ke khela gais rahaa, jiske final me Navua, Rewa ke 1-0 se harais. Ii tournament ke pahila chaar game 90 minute ke rahaa aur baaki game 60 minute ke rahaa.
Super Premier Division.
Pool matches 9 July, 10 July 15 July aur 16 July ke khela gais rahaa.
Pool A.
Ii pool se Navua aur Rewa semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Nasinu aur Lautoka semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semifinals.
Semifinals 16 July ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Navua, Lautoka ke 2-0 se aur Rewa, Nasinu ke, penalty shoot-out ke baad, 4-2 se harais. 
Final.
Final 17 July ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Navua, ewa ke 1-0 se harae ke Battle of the Giants ke pahila dafe jiit liis.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2006:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 28th Battle of the Giants tournament ke pahila chaar game ,29 aur 30 July ke, Labsa, Suva aur Rewa me aur baaki sab game Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 3, 4, 5, 6 August ke khela gais rahaa, jiske final me Ba, Suva ke 2-1 se harais.

Pool matches 29 aur 30 July aur 3, 4, 5 August ke khela gais rahaa.
Pool A.
Ii pool se Nadi aur Rewa semi-final khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool B.
Ii rakam se Ba aur Suva semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.

Semifinals 6 August ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Suva, Nadi ke 3-0 se aur Ba, ewa ke 4-0 se harais. 
Final.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 1992:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke duusra Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament Labasa ke Subrail Park me 16 se 20 April talak khela gais rahaa jiske final me Labasa, Nadroga ke 1-0 se harais.
Pool ke game.
Pool 1.
Ii rakam se Labasa aur Nadi smi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Pool 1.
Ii rakam se Nadroga aur Nasinu semi-final ke khatir qualify hoe gais.
Semi Final.
Pahila semi-final me Nadroga, Nadi ke 3-1 se harais. Duusra semi-final me Labasa, Nasinu ke 1-0 se harais. 42 minute me Solomone Catarogo goal banais rahaa. 
Labasa ke team.
Peter Namoce, Henry Francis, Nete Francis, Solomone Seravatu, Taniele Tailevuka, Jope Lomu, Raymond Dott, Epeli Levaci, Bali Coma, Tavite Tukania, Solomon Catarogo (Waisele Rasoli 70);
Nadroga ke team.
Jack Work, Abraham Watkins, Emosi Watkins, Haminiel Tallawok, Waisea Tale, Animath Singh, Kino Tabi, Vinod Kamar, Radike Nawalu, Petala Naitasiwai (Charles Work 52), Sevaloni Tasere
Final.
Final me Labasa, Nadroga ke 20 April ke 12,000 spectators ke saamne 1-0 se harais.

Congo Naddi:
The Congo Naddi (jiskeZaire Naddi ke naam se bhi jaana jaawe hae) Western Central Africa ke sab se barraa naddi hae. Iske puura lambai 4,700 kilometre (2,922 miles) hae aur ii Nile ke baad me Africa ke duusra sab se barraa naddi hae. Ii naddi me jetna paani hae uu Amazon ke baad duusra sab se jaada hae. 

Ganga:
Ganges nai to Ganga, India ke north me ek naddi hae. Ii naddi Himalayas ke Gangotri Glacier se suruu hoe hae aur north India me west se east bahe ke Bay of Bengal me nikle hae. Iske lambai 2,510 kilometer hae aur iske watershed 907,000 km² hae. Iske tributries hae Brahmaputra, Gomti, Kosi naadi, Gandak, Ghaghra river, Yamuna river aur Son.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2000:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 10th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 20 - 24 July talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Lautoka, Nadroga ke 2-0 se harais.
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Post Prince Charles park me 21 July se 23 July talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Lautoka aur Nadi semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Nadroga aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 24 July ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Lautoka, Labasa ke 1-0 se aur Nadroga, Nadi ke bhi 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 24 July ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Lautoka, Nadroga ke 2-0 se harais.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2001:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 11th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Sigatoka ke Lawaqa Park me, 24 - 28 May talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Lautoka, Labasa ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 7-6 se harais.
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 24 May se 27 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Lautoka aur Nadi semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Nadroga aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 28 May ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Nadroga, Lautoka ke 1-0 se aur Labasa, Nadi ke bhi 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 28 May ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Labasa aur Nadroga full time talak 1-1 se barabar rahin, lekin penalty kicks ke baad Nadroga, Labasa ke 7-6 se harais.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2002:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 12th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Sigatoka ke Lawaqa Park me, 24 - 27 May talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Lautoka, Nasinu ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 3-2 se harais. Ii tournament suruu me 2 May 2 se 5 May talak, Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khele ke rahaa lekin iske hatae ke Sigatoka kar dewa gais rahaa.
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 24 May se 26 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Nasinu aur Rewa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Nadroga aur Lautoka semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 27 May ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Lautoka, Nadi ke 2-1 se aur Nasinu, Nadroga ke bhi 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 27 May ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Lautoka aur Nasinu full time talak 1-1 se barabar rahin, lekin penalty kicks ke baad Lautoka, Nasinu ke 3-2 se harais.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2003:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 13th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me, 28 May se 2 June talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Navua, Rewa ke, extra time me, 1-0 se harais.

Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 20 May se 1 June talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Lautoka aur Navua semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Ba aur Rewa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 2 June ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Rewa, Lautoka ke 1-0 se aur Navua, Ba ke bhi 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 2 June ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Navua, Rewa ke, extra time me 1-0 se harais.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2004:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 14th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 11 June se 14 June talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Suva ke, extra time me, 2-0 se harais. 
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 11 June se 14 June talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Ba aur Rewa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Suva aur Nadi semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 14 June ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Nadi ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 5-3 se aur Suva Rewa ke 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 14 June ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Ba, Suva ke, extra time me 2-0 se harais. Duuno goal banae waala rahaa Manoa Masi.

Danube Naddi:
Danube, Europe ke duusra sab se barraa naddi hae. (Volga sab se lamba hae). Ii European Union ke sab se lamba naddi hae. Danube 2,860 km (1,777 mile) lamba hae. Danube 10 des me se bahe hae: Germany, Austria, Slovakia, Hungary, Croatia, Serbia, Romania, Bulgaria, Moldova aur Ukraine. Ii naddi Black Sea me jaae ke nikle hae. 
Kuchh city jon ki iske kiare hae: Ulm aur Regensburg, Germany me ; Linz aur Vienna, Austria me; Bratislava, Slovakia me, Budapest Hungary me; Novi Sad aur Belgrade Serbia me. 

Lake Baikal:
Lake Baikal, Siberia, Russia me ek barraa lake hae. Lake Baikal, dunia ke sab se barraa fresh water reservoir hae. Ii lake Irkutsk ke nangich hae. Ii 636 km lamba, 20 km se 80 km chaurraa, aur sab se gahuraa jagah 1.6 km hae.
Wildlife.
Lake Baikal hosts 1085 species of plants and 1550 species and varieties of animals. Over 60% of animals are ; e.g., of 52 species of fish 27 are endemic.

Lake Tanganyika:
Lake Tanganyika, central Africa me ek barraa lake hae. Ii lake chaar des me hae – Burundi, Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), Tanzania aur Zambia.

Lake Victoria:
Lake Victoria nai to Victoria Nyanza (jiske Ukerewe aur Nalubaale ke naam se bhi jaana jaawe hae) Africa ke ek lake hae. Iske kinare me Tanzania, Uganda aur Kenya hae. 
Lake Victoria 68,800 square kilometres (26,560 mi²) barraa hae. Ii Africa ke sab se barraa lake aur dunia ke duusra sab se barraa lake hae.

Mississippi River:
Mississippi Naddi, United States ke sab se lamba naddi hae aur ii dunia ke bhi sab se barraa naddi hae. 
"Mississippi" naam ke matlab Native American me "big river" hae.
Mississippi ke sotii Minnesota state me hae jon ki Canada ke border me hae. Mississippi, United States ke biich me se bahe hae aur Wisconsin, Iowa, Illinois, Missouri, Kentucky, Tennessee, Arkansas, aur Mississippi state me se jaawe hae.
Mississippi ke muh Louisiana state ke New Orleans city me hae jahan se ii Gulf of Mexico me jaawe hae.

Niger Naddi:
Niger River, western Africa ke khaaas naddi hae. ii naddi 4180 km (2500 miles) lamba hae. Iske crescent shape hae aur ii Guinea, Mali, Niger, Benin aur Nigeria me se bahe hae . 
Chapa.
Pictures of the Niger River in Mali

Nile:
The Nile (Arabic: النيل "an-nīl"), Africa ke ek naddi hae. Ii dunia ke sab se lamba naddi hae (lag bhag 6,650 km nai to 4,132 miles) aur ii Alexandria ke lage Mediterranean Sea se jaae ke mile hae. Iske naam Greek ke sabd "Nelios" se aais hae.
White Nile, Uganda me Lake Victoria se suruu hoe ke Sudan me Khartoum me se bahe hae, jahan pe ii Blue Nile se mil ke Nile ban ke Egypt me se bahe hae. 

Panama Canal:
Panama Canal, Panama (Central America) ke ek waterway hae jon ki Atlantic Ocean aur Pacific Ocean ke jorree hae. Panama Canal tiin "locks" ke kaam me laae ke paani ke level ke control kare hae. Har saal 14,000 jahaj ii canal se jaawe hae. The France 1880 ke iske banae ke kosi skaris lekin nai khalaas kare paais aur 1914 me United States, das saal ke construction ke baad, banae ke khalaas karis. ii canal 77 km (48 miles) lamba hae. 

Great Barrier Reef:
Great Barrier Reef dunia ke duusra sabse barraa coral reef hae. Ii Queensland, Australia me hae aur 2,300 kilometre lamba hae. Ii 3000 coral reefs 600 se jaada island se banaa hae.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2005:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 15th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 5 May se lae ke 8 May talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais. 
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 5 May se 7 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Navua aur Ba semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Nadroga aur Nadi semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 8 May ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Nadi, Navua ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 3-1 se aur Ba, Nadroga ke 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 8 May ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Ba, Nadi ke 1-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahaa Josaia Bukalidi.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2006:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 16th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Suva ke National Stadium me, 25 May se lae ke 29 May talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Labasa ke 3-0 se harais. 
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 25 May se 28 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Rewa aur Lautoka semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Ba aur Labasa semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 29 May ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Labasa, Rewa ke, penalty kicks ke baad, 4-2 se aur Ba, Lautoka ke 1-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 29 May ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Ba, labasa ke 3-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahin Rakesh Kumar (og), Lasenia Tuba (pen), Tuimasi Manuca.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2007:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 17th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Ba ke Govind Park me, 3 May se lae ke 6 May talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Ba, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais. 
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 3 May se 5 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Ba aur Lautoka semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Labasa aur Suva semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 6 May ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Ba, Suva ke 1-0 se aur Labasa, Lautoka ke 2-1 se harais.
Final.
Final 6 May ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Ba, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahaa Malakai Tiwa.

8 May:
8 May saal ke 128th din hai (129th leap saal me). Saal ke khalaas hoe me 237 din bachaa hai.

9 May:
9 May saal ke 129th din hai (130th leap saal me). Saal ke khalaas hoe me 236 din bachaa hai.

Great Lakes:
Great Lakes, eastern North America ke paanch barraa lake hai. Asliyat me ii duna ke sab se barraa mittha paani waala lake hai.
Paanch lake hai:
Paanch me se chaar Great Lakes Canada aur United States of America ke biich me hai. Paanchwa lake, Lake Michigan, puura United States ke bhittar hai.
Paani Lake Superior aur Lake Michigan me se Lake Huron me bahe hai; fir ii Detroit River ke jarie Lake Erie me bahe hai; fir Niagara Falls se ii Lake Ontario me jaawe hai; aur aakhri me ii Saint Lawrence Naddi se Atlantic Ocean me jaae ke nikle hai.

Indus Naddi:
Indus Naddi, Hindu log khatir ek sacred naddi hai. Ii naddi China (Tibet) se Jammu and Kashmir aur fir Pakistan me se bahe ke Arabian Sea me aae ke nikle hai. Ii purna India ke ek khaas naddi rahaa. India ke naam ii naddi se aais hai. Ii naddi ke Sanskrit me Sindhu bolaa gais hai. Greeks logan iske Sinthus, Romans Sindhus, Chinese Sintow aur Persians iske Abisindh bole hai.

Suez Canal:
Suez Canal (Arbii: قناة السويس, "Qanā al-Suways", French: "Le Canal de Suez"), Egypt me ek canal hae. Ii Sinai Peninsula ke west me hae. Ii canal 163 km lamba (101 miles) aur ii aapan sab se patra jagah pe, 300 m Chaurraa (984 ft) hae. Ii Port Said ("Būr Sa'īd") , Mediterranean Sea pe se Suez ("al-Suways"), Red Sea pe jaawe hae. Iske ek French company banais rahaa jon ki iske 1859 me banae ke suruu kar ke 1869 me khalaas karis rahaa.

Volga Naddi:
Volga, Europe ke sab se lamba naddi hae. Russian me iske Волга bolaa jaawe hae , aur Tatar bhasa me İdel. Bahut log iske Russia ke national naddi maane hae. Ii Russia ke west me se bahe hae. Iske lambai ,690 km (2,293 miles) hae. 

Yangtze Naddi:
Yangtze Naddi, nai to Yangzi, nai to Chang Jiang, China me ek naddi hae. Ii Asia ke sab se barraa naddi aur dunia ke tiisra sab se lamba naddi hae(Amazon aurNile ke baad me).
Ii naddi 6,300 kilometers (almost 4,000 miles) lamba hae aur China ke west me (Qinghae Province) se East China Sea, jon ki Pacific Ocean ke ek bhaag hae, me jaae ke nikle hae. 

Rhine Naddi:
Rhine Naddi (German "Rhein", French "Rhin", Dutch "Rijn") ke lambai 1,230 km, 883 km hai aur iske jahaaj bhi kaam me laae sake hai. Ii ke sab se lamba nadddi me se ek hai. Iske naam sabd ""renos"" se aais hai. Rhine naddi Switzerland, Germany aur Netherlands me se bahe hai

Rhine:
Ii ek disambiguation panna hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki Rhine naam ke ek se jada chij hae.

Jaamun:
-______
Dharmik Significance.
Hindu tradition me Ram jangal ke fal khaae ke 15 saal talak jinda rahaa, jab uske Ayodhya se banwas bhej dewa gais rahaa. Ii kaaran se Hindu logan jaamun ke 'bhawan ke fal' maane hai, jaada kar ke Gujaratme, jahaan pe iske jamboon ke naam se jaana jaawe hai.
Trivia.
Jamun ke India se idnetify karaa jaawe hai kahe ki ii India bharme pawa jaae hai aur India ke purana naam "Jambu-Dvipa" rahaa.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2008:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 18th Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament ke Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me, 29 May se lae ke 1 June talak, khela gais rahaa jiske final me Navua, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais. 
Pool ke game.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Lawaqa Park me 29 May se 31 May talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Pool 1.
Ii pool me se Lautoka aur Suva semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Pool 2.
Ii pool me se Labasa aur Navua semi-final khatir qualify bhais rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final, 1 June ke sabere khela gais rahaa jisme Navua, Lautoka ke, extra timeke baad, 2-0 se aur Labasa, Suva ke 3-0 se harais.
Final.
Final 1 June ke sanjha ke khela gais rahaa, jisme Navua, Labasa ke 1-0 se harais. Goal banae waala rahaa Epeli Saukuru.

Cameroon:
Cameroon, Africa ke ek des hae. Cameroon ke president Paul Biya, aur Prime Minister, Philemon Yang hae.
Bhasa.
Cameroon ke official bhasa French aur English hae. 
Location.
Iske capital city, Yaoundé hae lekin sab se barraa city Douala hae. 

Cape Verde:
Cape Verde, Africa ke ek des hae. Ii ek island ke jhund hae. Iske officila bhasa Portuguese hae. 
"Verde", Portuguese bhasa me green hae.

Central African Republic:
Central African Republic nai to C.A.R, central Africa ke ek des hae. Ii jaada kar ke ek pahaarr waala des hae jon ki samundar se 900 metres uuncha hae. Iske area 625,000 square kilometres hae.
Iske south me jangal hae jisme gorilla aur Pygmies ke pawa jaawe hae. 
Iske capital city Bangui hae, aur duusra town hae Bouar, Zinga, aur Ouadda. Iske south me Ubangi Naddi hae. Ii des me 4.6 million log rahe hae (2016), jon ki Banda aur Baya tribe ke hae. Hian ke khaas bhasa Frenchhae lekin kuchh log national bhasa, Sango me baat kare hae.
Hian pe diamond aur uranium mine bhi hae aur cotton, coffee aur timber ke bhi kheti karaa jaawe hae.
Iske currency CFA Franc hae. (1 US Dollar = 424.05 CFA Francs)
Ii des pe France raaj karat rahaa jisse CAR 1960 me ajaad bhaes rahaa.

Hanau:
Hanau eek city Germany me hai. Ii city Germany ke middle part me hai. Iske population 88,000 hai. Hanau ka Mayor Claus Kaminsky hai.

Navaneeda K Gounder:
Navaneeda Krishna Gounder, Nadi aur Fiji soccer ke ek khilarri rahaa. Uu 1977 me Nadi khatir, Mani Naicker ke capitancy ke niche, khele ke suruu karis rahaa. Gounder ke uske taagatwar kick khatir jaana jaawe hai, aur ek dafe uske kick se Rewa ke goalie ke haanth tuut gais rahaa.
Uske jaada safalta tab mila jab ki 1995 me uu Nadi Soccer ke President rahaa aur uske team Fiji Fact, Battle of the Giants aur Girmit Tourney ke saathe National League aur Inter-District Tournament ke bhi jiitis.

John Icha Lal:
John Icha Lal (janam: Suva, Fiji 24 February, 1933), Fiji ke Suva Soccer team ke ek khilarri rahaa. Uu Fiji ke national side ke captain aur coach bhi rahaa. 
Khilaarri.
1948 me, Lal, Suva soccer e club ke game me, Flagstaff team me khele ke suruu karis. Uu 1951 me, 17 saal ke umar me, Soccer Association|Suva Soccer Team me pahila dafe khelis rahaa. Wahii saal me uske Fiji National Soccer Team me bhi chuna gais rahaa au uu Zealand XI ke viro me khelis rahaa. 1959 me uu suva ke senior division ke team,St Columba's Football Club (Saints) me khele lagaa.
1960 me uu Suva team ke captian banaa, jon saal me Suva Interdisrict jiitis rahaa. Uu 1961 ke Fiji ke team ke vice-captain rahaa, jon ki New South wales me 16 game khelis rahaa. Australia me uu Griffin ke Yoogli Club, jon ki Riverrina League ke ek team rahaa, me bhi dui saal talak semi-professional khilaarri rahaa. Uu Fiji laut ke 1966 talak Suva team me khelis rahaa.
Coach.
1970s ke suruu me uu Naitasiri ke coach banaa, jahan pe uske ek strict coach maana jaawat rahaa. Iske baad uu Suva ke bhi coach karis. 
Uu Fiji National team ke bhi coach rahaa, aur uske niche Fiji World Cup qulifying match me Taiwan se 2-2 se draw karis aur Australia ke 1-0 se harais. Agle saal Fiji ke team New Caledonia aur Vanuatu ke bhi harais.
1978 me uu Griffin, Australia ke ek club ke oach kare ke khatir, Austalia chal diis.
Abhi uu Sydney, Australia me aapan aurat, Alisi, ke saathe rahe hae.

Poonah:
Ii ek disambiguation panna hai

Legislative Council (Fiji):
Fiji ke Legislative Council ke 1874 me Fiji ke Great Britain ke cede kare ke baad banawa gais rahaa aur ii 1970 me independence talak rahaa, jab House of Representatives banawa gais rahaa.
Pahila Legislative Council.
Pahila Legislative Council ek "Royal Charter" se 2 January 1875 me banawa gais rahaa, jiske niche Council ke member Governor aur kamti se kamti dui aur public officers aur log rahaa jiske Rani nominate karat rahis.
Iske niche 1904 talak Council me 6 Official (jon ki sarkar me kaam kare waala log rahin) aur 4 unofficial members rahin.
Chuna gais Gora aur nominated Kaiviti member.
21 March 1904 ke "Letters Patent", Legislative ke membership ke badal ke:
31 October 1910 ke "Letters Patent" Gora member ke election khatir Fiji ke 5 Electoral Division me baatis, jisme se ek Suva (2 memeber) aur ek Levuka (1 member) rahaa.
31 January 1914 ke "Letters Patent" se Council ke Officail member ke barrhae ke 11, aur chuna gais gora ke barrhae ke 7 kar dewa gais. Fiji ke 6 electoral division me baata gais, jisme se Suva ke 2 member rahaa. (Levuka ke alag member ab nai rahaa.)
Pahila Hindustani nominated member.
20 July 1916 ke "Letters Patent", Legislative Council ke membeship ke badlis jise ki ek Hindustani ke nominate karaa jaawe sake. Nominated member ke barhae ke 12 kar dewa gais jisme se 11 public officers rahin aur ek public oficer nai rahaa, aur 1917 se 1929 talak ii seat ek Hindustani khatir rakkhaa gais rahaa. 1917 ke elections ke baad, 29 January 1917 ke Badri Maharaj Fiji ke pahila Hindustani member, aapan seat Legislative Council me liis.
Chuna gais Hindustani member.
9 February 1929 ke "Letters Patent", Legislative ke membership ke badal ke:
Pahila tiin, Hindustani member Vishnu Deo, Parmanand Singh aur James Ramchandar Rao 25 October 1929 ke aapan seat Council me liin.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2009:
2009 ke Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament, Suva ke TFL National Stadium me 11 June se lae ke 15 June talak khela gais rahaa, jiske final me Navua, Lautoka ke 2-1 se harais.
Pool A ke team rahin: Suva, Nadi, Tavua, Nadroga aur Rewa, aur Pool B ke team rahin: Navua, Ba, Lautoka, Labasa aur Nasinu. Navua defending champion rahaa.
Semi final.
Semi final ke game 15 June ke khela gais rahaa. Pahila semi-final me Lautoka, Rewa ke, penalty kick ke baad, 4-3 se harais. Duusra semi-final me Navua, Suva ke 2-1 se harais. Goal banae waala rahin: Suva - Joseph Mishra (2 min), Navua - Joe Lui (5 min), James Naka (52 min)
Final.
Final me Navua, Lautoka ke 2-1 se hare ke Fiji Football Association Cup ke retain kar liis. Goal bane waala rahin: Navua - James Naka 

Pune:
Pune, India ke Maharashtra state me ek city hai. Ii city Maratha Raja Shivaji khatir famous hai. Badminton ke khel hian pe 19th century me suruu bhais rahaa. Hian pe Meher Baba paida bhais rahaa. Ii city me se Mula Naddi aur Mutha Naddi bahe hai. Iske kuch log "Oxford of the East" ke naam se bhi jaane hai. Ii ek khaas Information Technology center hai.

Syria (des):
Syria, Asia ke west bhaag ke Middle East ilaka ke ek des hai. Iske border Lebanon, Israel, Jordan, Iraq, aur Turkey se hai. Iske western bhaag Mediterranean Sea pe hai. Iske eastern aur northern bhaag me dher pahaarr hai. 
Iske president abhi Bashar al-Assad hai, jon ki head of state bhi hai. Syria national ke capital city Damascus hai.
Syria me 14 provinces hai:

Ronil Kumar:
Ronil Kumar (janam: 29 November 1984) Fiji ke ek football player hai jon ki defender ke position me New Zealand Waitakere United club me khele hai.
International career.
Kumar Fiji ke national team ke khatir 2007 ke South Pacific Games me khele ke suruu karis. Iske baad ii 2010 World Cup Qualifier me bhi khelis hai.

Salesh Kumar:
Salesh Kumar (janam: 28 July 1981), Fiji ke ek football defender hai jon ki abhi New-Zealand football club Auckland City khatir khele hai.
International career.
Kumar, Fiji national football team ke khatir pahila dafe South Pacific Games 2003 me khlis rahaa aur 2010 FIFA World Cup qualification tournament me bhi khelis hai. 

Roy Krishna:
Roy Krishna (janam: 20 August 1987 Fiji me Siberia jon ki Labasa ke nangiche hai) ek Fiji ke football player hai jon ki New Zealand ke Waitakere United football club khatir khele hai aur abhi Wellington Phoenix khatir trial pe hai.
International career.
Krishna Fiji ke national team khatir South Pacific Games 2007 me khele ke suruu karis aur 2010 FIFA World Cup qualification tournament khatir khelis hai.
Club career.
Krishna New Zealand ke Waitakere United me Fiji ke Labasa Soccer Team se January 2008 me join karis.
May 2008 me ii talented youngster dui hatta talak Wellington Phoenix ke saathe train karis. 
March 2009 me Krishna ke PSV Eindhoven aapan taraf se khelae mangat rahaa. Lekin uu Wellington Phoenix me khele maange hai kaahe ki uu soche hai ki abhi uu Europe khatir taiyar nai hai.

Muslim Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2008:
2008 ke Muslim Inter-District Championship ke Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me 28 August se 31 August talak khela gais rahaa. Iske Rewa host karis rahaa.

Sangam Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2007:
2007 ke Sangam Inter-district Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa.
Final, jon ki 11 April ke khela gais rahaa, me Lautoka, Hamilton ke 2-1 se harais.

Djibouti:
Djibouti, Africa ke ek des hae. Djibouti ke France se ajaadi 27 June 1977 me milaa. Ii des French Somaliland se banaa hae (baad me iske French Territory of the Afars and Issas bolaa jaawat rahaa). Djibouti ke itihaas bahut purana hae jab ki ii Sabean Empire (Ethiopia) ke ek bhaag rahaa. Uu time Djibouti ke log ancient Egypt, India aur China se hides, skins, perfumes aur spices me trad karat rahin. 1000 saal talak Arabian peninsula se contact ke baad Somali aur Afar tribes Islam ke acept karin. Djibouti ek Muslim des hae aur ii regularly Islamic aur Arab meetings me bhaag lewe hae.

Dominica:
Commonwealth of Dominica, Caribbean Sea ke ek island nation hae, jon ki French walla des Guadeloupe aur Martinique ke biich me hae. ii island ke area 751 km² (290 mi²) hae. Iske capital Roseau hae. Iske abaadi lagbhag 70,000 hae. 
Iske currency East Caribbean Dollar hae.
Ii island ke naam Latin for Sunday, "Dies Dominica" se aais hae. Ii Spanish waala Dominican Republic se duusra des hae.
Iske President, Nicholas Liverpool aur prime minister, Roosevelt Skerrit hae.
Dominica ke Christopher Columbus 1493 me paais rahaa. 1763 me ii United Kingdom ke colony banaa aur 3 November 1978 me iske ajaadi milaa.

Dominican Republic:
Dominican Republic (Spanish: "República Dominicana", Caribbean island ke Hispaniola island ke ek des hae Iske capital city, aur sab se barraa city, Santo Domingo hae. Hian pe Spanish me baat karaa jaawe hae.
History.
Hispaniola ke Christopher Columbus 5 December 1492 ke dekhis rahaa.
National holidays.
"Notes":

East Timor:
Democratic Republic of East Timor nai to Timor Leste, Southeast Asia ke ek des hae. Ii Timor Island ke eastern bhaag me hae aur ii des me chhota chhota island Atauro aur Jaco, aur ek chhota jagah Oecussi-Ambeno, jon ke West Timor ke bhittar hae, hae. Timoe Island ke duusra des Indonesia hae.
Timor ke capital aur sab se barraa city, Dili hae, jiskeabaadi one hundred and fifty thousand log hae.
Duusra sab se barraa city Baucau hae.
East Timor ke naam Malay ke sadbd "east", "timur" hae.
Bahut din talak ii des me Portugal raj karat rahaa lekin 1975 me uu logan des ke chhorr ke chal diin aur thora din ke baad Indonesia iske lae liss.
20 May 2002, ke iske Indonesia se ajaadi milaa.it became the first country to become independent in the twenty-first century (since the year 2000). 

Ecuador:
Ecuador, South America ke ek chhotaa des hae. Ecuador me jangle aur pahaarr, jaise ki Andes hae. Iske coast Pacific Ocean me hae. Iske capital city, Quito hae. Quito, uunch pahaarr pe hae. Ecudor ke abaadi 13,810,000 hae.
Galapagos Islands, Ecuador me hae.

El Salvador:
El Salvador, Central America ke ek des hae. Iske naam Its name comes from the Spanish for "The Savior", the person who saves, referring to Jesus Christ.
Ii des me 6.7 million log rahe hae.
El Salvador me, per square kilometer ke aadhar pe, Americas ke koi des me se, sab se jaada log rahe hae, islands ke chhorr ke.
The country also has more industry than any other country in Central America.
In El Salvador there are only two seasons. The dry season starts in mid-October and it lasts until mid May. During the dry season, it hardly ever rains. The wet season starts in mid-May and ends in mid-October. In this season it rains every day. The dry season is called "summer" and the rainy season is called "winter."
Most of the abaadi is mestizo, a mixture of European and American people.
The land is divided into 14 political units called "departments." This list tells the name of each department and the name of the capital city of each department: 

Alps:
Alps (German: "Alpen"; French: "Alpes"; Italian: "Alpi"; Slovenian: "Alpe"), Europe ke ek barraa paharr ke range hae.
Geography.
Alps, Austria aur Slovenia ke east me se lae ke, Italy, Switzerland, Liechtenstein aur Germany se France talak ke west jaawe hae.
Alps ke sab se uuncha pahaarr Mont Blanc hae (4,808 m), jon ki French-Italian border me hae.

Andes:
Andes, South America ke west coast me ek paharr ke range hae. Ii 7,000 km (4,400 miles) south me Argentina aur Chile se north me Colombia talak hae. Andes, dunia ke sab se lamba paharr ke range hae aur ii Himalaya ke baad duusra sab se uuncha hae.

Himalaya:
Himalaya, Asia ke ek pahaarr ke range hae. Ii Pakistan aur Jammu and Kashmir ke north me, Republic of India ke Himachal Pradesh aur Uttaranchal states, Nepal, Sikkim, aur Bhutan ke north; aur Tibet ke south me hae. Dunia ke 15 sab se uunch pahaarr Himalayas me hae jisme se khaas hae Mount Everest, K2, Annapurna, aur Nanga Parbat. Mount Everest, jon ki 8,848 meters uuncha hae, dunia ke sab se uuncha pahaarr hae. 
== Chapa ke gallery =ASHSDIBATT HAI

Mount Kilimanjaro:
Kilimanjaro, nai to Kilima Njaro, (jiske matlab Swahili me "shining mountain" hae), aur jiske pahile Kaiser-Wilhelm-Spitze ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, northeastern Tanzania me ek pahaarr hae. Kilimanjaro, dunia ke sab se uuncha free-standing pahaarr hae, jon ki 4600 meters (15,000 ft) uuncha hae.

Mount Everest:
Mount Everest, dunia ke sab se uuncha pahaarr hae. Mount Everest, Himalaya pahaarr me hae. Ii 8848 m uuncha hae.
Iske choti Nepal me hae. Ii etna uuncha hae ki hian pe charrhe ke khatir aapan oxygen lae jaae ke parre hae.

Rocky Mountains:
Rocky Mountains, ke British Columbia United States ke New Mexic 

Sahara:
Sahara Desert, jon ki north Africa me hae, dunia ke duusra sab se barraa desert hae. Iske area 9,065,000 square kilometres hae. in size. 
"Sahara" naam Arbii bhasa waala sabd صحر se aais hae.Wahan ke log chuttad hote hai.
Reference.
sahara desert yaha vishv ka sabse bada desert he

Howrah (city):
Howrah nai to Haora (Bengali হাওড়া "Haoṛa"), West Bengal, India ke ek industrial city hai. Ii Hoogli Naddi ke west bank me hai aur West Bengal state ke dusra sab se barraa city hai.

Ganges:

1643:
1643 ke saal bif ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Manmohan Singh:
Manmohan Singh (janam: 1932) 2004 se le kar 2014 tak India des ke Pradhan Mantri raha hai.

1774:
1774 ke saal ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki sanichar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1788:
1788 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1790:
1790 ke saal suk ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Gabon:
The Gabonese Republic nai to Gabon, Africa ke ek des hae. Iske capital Libreville hae.
Iske France se ajaadi 17 August 1960 me mila.

Gambia:
The Gambia, west Africa ke ek des hae . Iske capital city Banjul hae.
Gambia ek patra aur lamba des hae jisske tiin bagal Senegal hae aur Gambia Naddi iske biich me se bahe ke Atlantic Ocean me jaae ke nikle hae.
Gambia ke abaadi 1.85 million hae (2013). Gambia ke log ke Gambians bola jaawe hae. Hian pe dher tribe ke log rahe hae jisme se kuchh hae: "Mandinka", "Fula", aur "Wolof". 
English ii des ke official bhasa hae, lekin hian ke log aur bhasa me bhi baat kare hae.
jaada Gambians log Islam dharam ke maane hae.

Georgia:
Georgia, Caucasus me Black Sea ke bagal me ek chhota des hae. 1991-1995 iske puura naam Republic of Georgiarahaa lekin 1995 se iske naam Georgia hae. Ii pahile Soviet Union ke member rahaa.
Georgia, Russia, Turkey, Armenia aur Azerbaijan ke bagal me hae. Iske coast Black Sea se hae. Ii Europe aur Asia ke biich me hae.
Georgia me dher paaarr hae aur jon pahaarr des ke biich me se jawe hae ke naam Caucasus Mountains hae.
Georgia ke capital Tbilisi hae.
Georgia ke abaadi 4.5 million hae, jisme se 1.3 million Tbilisi me rahe hae. Georgia ke log ke Georgians bola jaawe hae. Jaada log Georgian me baat kare hae, lekin kuchh log Armenian, Russian aur duusra hasa me baat kare hae. Josef Stalin, Georgia ke rahaa.
jaada Georgians Christian hae lekin kuchh Muslim aur Jew bhi hae.
Georgia ke currency "lari" hae.

Ghana:
The Republic of Ghana (jiske pahile Gold Coast ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa) West Africa ke ek des hae. Iske abaadi 27 million hae (2017), aur capital Accra hae. Ii Western Africa me , Gulf of Guinea ke lage, Cote d'Ivoire aur Togo ke biichmehae. Kofi Annan, United Nations ke pahile ke Secretary General, ii des ke rahaa.
Ghana ke mausamgaram aur tropical hae. Iske eastern coastal belt garam aur jhuura hae. South west corner garam aur humid hae. North garam aur jhuura hae. Lake Volta (dunia ke sab se barraa admii ke banawa gais lake) eastern Ghana me hae.

Grenada:
Grenada, Caribbean Sea me ek island des hae jisske 1974 me United Kingdom se ajaadi mila. Iske capital St. George's hae.
Grenada ke Spice Islandbola jaawe hae kaahe ki hian pe dher nutmeg hoe hae.

Guatemala:
Guatemala, Central America ke ek des hae. 
Ii Central America ke sab se jaada abaadi waala des hae, aur iske abaadi 14 million hae. Iske parrosi des Belize, Mexico, El Salvador aur Honduras hae. 

Guinea:
Guinea western Africa ke ek des hae.

Guinea-Bissau:
Guinea-Bissau, Africa ke ek des hae. Iske official bhasa Portuguese hae, aur capital city Bissau hae. 2006 me iske abaadi 1,442,000 rahaa.

Guyana:
Co-operative Republic of Guyana, South America ke ek des hae. Iske abaadi 700,000 aur area 200,000 km² hae. Iske capital Georgetown hae. 
Guyana ke abhi ke president Bharrat Jagdeo hae. Guyana, United Kingdom se 26 May 1966 ke ajaadi paais. Isse pahile iske naam British Guiana rahaa.
Guyana commonwealth me ek republichae.

Haiti:
Haiti (French: "Haïti"; Haitian Creole: "Ayiti"), officially naam Republic of Haiti (French: "République d'Haïti"; Haitian Creole: "Repiblik d Ayiti") Caribbean ke Hispaniola island ke ek des hae; ii island ke duusra des Dominican Republic hae. Iske dui official bhasa: French aur Haitian Creole, nai to ""Kreyol"" hae. Iske capital city, Port-au-Prince hae.
Iske tropical climate hae aur French me ""La Perle des Antilles"" (The pearl of the Antilles) bolaa jaawe hae. Ii des me dher pahaarr hae aur Western Hemisphere ke sab se garib des hae.
Haiti ke 10 "departements" me baata gais hae. Iske khaas dharam Roman Catholic hae lekin Voodoo bhi hian pe practice karaa jaawe hae.

Honduras:
Honduras, Central America ke ek des hae.
Iske capital Tegucigalpa hae. Honduras ke jaada log Spanish me baat kare hae. 7,483,763 log Honduras me rahe hae aur iske size 112,492 square kilometers hae. Ii El Salvador ke bagal me hae. Iske ek side me Caribbean Sea aur duusra side me Pacific Ocean hae.

Hungary:
Hungary, Central Europe ke ek des hae. Iske capital city Budapest hae. Hungary aapan parrosi des, Austria se khaali thora barraa hae aur iske abaadi 10 million hae. Au des jon ke iske border kare hae me hae: Slovakia, Ukraine, Romania, Serbia, Croatia aur Slovenia. Hungary ke official bhasa Hungarian hae. Ii 2004 me European Union ke member banaa.

Iceland:
Iceland (Icelandic: "Ísland"), Europe ke ek island des hae. Ii Atlantic Ocean ke north me hae. Iceland, Greenland ke 300 kilometer east aur Norway ke 1000 kilometers west me hae. Iske abaadi 320,000 aur area 103,000 km² hae.

Jordan:
Jordan, Middle East ke ek des hae. Iske official naam "The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan" hae.
Jordan ke border Saudi Arabia, Israel, Syria aur Iraq se hae. Iske ek chhota coast, Red Sea, aur ek lambaa coast Dead Sea se hae.
Jordan ke jaada bhaag desert hae aur ii ek bahur jhuura des hae. 
Iske capital city Amman hae.
Jordan ke log ke Jordanians bola jaawe hae. Jaada log Arbii me baat kare hae. Jordan ke abaadi 10.2 million log hae (2018).
Jordon ke currency Jordanian dinar hae.

Kuwait:
Kuwait, Middle East ke ek chhota des hae. Iske area lagbhag 17,819 square kilometers hae.
Ii ek dhani des hae jiske lage 96 billion barrels ke of crude oil reserves hae, jon ki dunia ke oil reserves ke 10% hae. 
Kuwait ke mausam kheti khatir achchhaa nai hae aur kheti ke jagah hian pe log machchhri jaada khaawe hae.
Kuwait ke official dharam Islam hae, lekin 15% log chaahe Christian nai to Hindu hae. Arbii bhasa hian ke khaas bhasa hae, lekin log English me bhi baat kare sake hae.

Kyrgyzstan:
Kyrgyzstan (Kyrgyz: Кыргызстан), official naam Kyrgyz Republic, aur kabhi kabhi Kirghizia bhi bola jaawe hae, Central Asia ke ek des hae. Ii des ke parrosi des China, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, aur Uzbekistan hae. Iske capital city Bishkek hae. Ii Russia se 1991 me ajaad bhaes.

Laos:
Lao People's Democratic Republic, nai to Laos southeast Asia ek chhota des hae. Iske capital Vientiane hae.
Laos ke parrosi des, west me Myanmar northwest me (China, east me Vietnam, south me Cambodia aur west me Thaeland hae. Mekong naddi Thaeland se jaada border hae. 
Laos, ek lambaa itihass ke baad France ke colony banaa. 1949 me ii ajaad bhaes aur 1975 me civil war ke baad ii ek communist des banaa.

Latvia:
Latvia, northern Europe ke ek des hae. Iake capital Riga hae. Ii ek Baltic States hae, Estonia north me aur Lithuania south me, ke saathe. Latvia ke east me Russia aur Belarus hae. 
Latvia ke log ke Latvians bola jaawe hae, jon ki Latvian bhasa me baat kare hae.
Latvia, 1940 se 1991 talak Soviet Union ke bhaag rahaa.
Latvia, European Union ke member 1 May 2004 ke banaaa aur ii 29 March, 2004 se NATO ke member hae.

Pablo Picasso:
Pablo Ruiz Picasso (janam: 25 October 1881, Málaga, Spain me – 8 April , 1973) ek Spain ke painter aur sculptor rahaa. Iske 20th century sab se achchhaa painter maana jaawe hae. Uske puura naam Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Clito Ruiz y Picasso rahaa aur uske cubism khatir jaana jaawe hae. Ii anumaan lagawa jaawe hae ki Picasso 13,500 paintings, 100,000 prints aur engravings, 34,000 book illustrations aur 300 sculptures aur ceramics ke banais rahaa.
Bachpan ke din.
Picasso ke"Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Crispiniano de la Santísima Trinidad" baptise karaa gais rahaa, jon ki kuchha saints aur palwaar ke naam hae. Isme Ruiz aur Picasso bhi jorraa gais rahaa, uske maiya aur pitaji ke khatir, jais ki Span ke kanuun maange hae. Uske janam Málaga city, jon ki Spain ke Andalusian region me hae, bhais rahaa. Uu Don José Ruiz y Blasco (1838–1913) aur María Picasso y López ke pahila larrka rahaa. Picasso ke palwaar middle-class ke rahaa; uske pitaji ek painter rahaa, jon ki "naturalistic depictions of birds and other game" me specialise karat rahaa. Aapan jindagi ke jaada din, Ruiz, School of Crafts ke professor aur ek local museum ke curator rahaa. Ruiz ke purwaj aristocrats rahin.
Chhote umar pe Picasso drawing me passion aur skill dekhais aur uske maiya ke anusaar, uske ke pahila sabd “piz, piz”, jon ki "lápiz" ke ek chhota form hae, Spanish bhasa me ‘pencil’ rahaa. Saat saal ke umar se, Picasso ke uske pitaji se formal artistic training mila, figure drawing aur oil painting me. Ruiz ek traditional, academic artist aur instructor rahaa jon ki ii biswas karat rahaa ki "proper training required disciplined copying of the masters, and drawing the human body from plaster casts and live models". Uske larrka art me jaada dhyan diis aur school ke kaam me kamti. 
1891 me uske palwaar A Coruña me rahe lagin, jahan pe uske pitaji School of Fine Arts me professor banaa. Hian pe uu logan chaar saal talak rahin. Ek dafe uske pitaji uske unfinished sketch of a pigeon ke uppar se paint karte pakkris. Ii dekh ke uu ii decide karis ki uske larka usse jaada achhaa painting kare hae aur aapan painting chhorre ke decide karis.
1895 me Picasso ke saat saal ke bahini, Conchita, diphtheria se mar gais — jisse uske jindagi ke bahut bhaari dhakka lagaa. Larrki ke maut ke baad, palwaar Barcelona chal diin, jahan pe Ruiz, School of Fine Arts me parhae lagaa. Picasso ii city me achchhaa karis, aur iske aapan aslii ghar manis. Ruiz, academy ke official ske persuade kar ke aapan larka ke advanced class ke khati entrance exam baithe ke allow karis. Ii kaam jaada kar ke ek mahina lagat rahaa, lekin Picasso el hafta me khalaas kar ke jury ke impress kar dis. Uske pitaji uske khatir ek room rent karis ki larkaa akele kaam kae sake. Uu uske kaam ke ek din me dher dafe check karat rahaa aur duuno ek dusre se bahut argue karat rahin. 
Picasso ke pitaji aur uncle ii nirnay karin ki uske Madrid ke Royal Academy of San Fernando, des ke sanb se achchhaa art school, bheja jaae. 1897 me, Picasso, 16 saal ke umar me, set off for the first time on his own, kahe ki uu formal education nai like karat rahaa. 

Raphael:
Raffaello Sanzio, jiske jaada kar ke Raphael ke naam se jaana jaawe hae (6 April 1483 - 6 April 1520) ek Renaissance painter aur architect rahaa. Leonardo da Vinci aur Michelangelo ke saate, uu High Renaissance ke ek bahut achchhaa painter rahaa.
Raphaelke janam ek chhota Central Italian city, Urbino jon ki Marche region me hae, me bhaes rahaa, jahan pe uske pitaji, Giovanni Santi ek court painter rahaa. 
Uske Madonna aur Christ Child aur Vatican in Rome, Italy ke painting khatir jaana jaawe hae. 

Rembrandt:
Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (15 July 1606 – 4 October 1669) Netherlands ke ek jaana maana painter aur artist rahaa. Uske janam Leiden me bhaes rahaa.
Uske Europe ke aur jaada kar ke Netherlands ke itihaas me ab se jaada important painter jaana jaawe hae. Ii uu time ke rahaa jiske the Dutch Golden Age bola jaawa rahaa.
Jab ki uu aapan jawani me ek portrait painter ke rup me safalta paais, uske baad e din personal tragedy aur financial hardship se bharaa rahaa. Fir bhi uske etchings aur paintings uske jindagi bhar famous rahaa aur uske artist ke reputation achchha rahaa., aur biis saal talak uu sab khaas Dutch painter ke sikhais. Rembrandt ke sab se barraa creative triumphs ke example hae uske portrait aapan contemporaries ke, self-portraits aur Bible ke kuchh scene ke chapa. Uske self-portraits ek unique aur intimate biography de hae, jisme artist ke binaa vanity ke survey karaa jaawe hae puura sachhai se.
Duuno painting aur printmaking me uu classical iconography ke gyan dekhais hae, jiske mold kar ke appan requiements ke fit karis hae; jaise ki uske Bible me ke scene ke chhapa uske Bble ke baare ke jaankari dekhae hae. 

Lebanon:
Lebanon Middle East ke ek des hae. Lebanon Mediterranean Sea ke east me hae. Iske borde, north aur east me Syria se, aur south me Israel se hae.

Lesotho:
Lesotho southern Africa me ek chhota des hae. Iske abaadi lagbhag 1,800,000 hae. Iske ke naam Maseru hae.
Lesotho ke chaaro bagal South Africa hae.

Liberia:
Republic of Liberia, West Africa ke ek des hae. Ii des ke naam Latinme "Land of the Free" hae, kahe ki iske 19th century me free American slaves ke khatir banawa gais rahaa. Ii 26 July 1847 me ajaad bhaes.
Iske abaadi 500,000 se jaada hae aur iske capital Monrovia hae.

Liechtenstein:
Liechtenstein, Europe ke ek chhota des hae . ii dunia ke 6th sab se chhota des hae. Liechtenstein, Austria aur Switzerland ke biich me hae. 
Iske official bhasa German hae.
Liechtenstein ke capital Vaduz hae jiske abaadi 5000 log hae. 

Lithuania:
Lithuania, northern Europe ke ek des hae. on the eastern shore of the Baltic Sea. Lithuania European Union aur NATO ke member hae.
Abaadi 2,827,947 (2017).
Vilnius iske capital aur sab se barraa city hae. 

Luxembourg:
Luxembourg, Europe ke ek chhota des hae. Ii European Union ke pahila des me se ek hae. Iske abaadi 442,972 hae.

1760:
1760 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1808:
1808 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki suk ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1829:
1829 ke saal bif ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1825:
1825 ke saal kon roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1832:
1832 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki etwaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1837:
1837 ke saal etwaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1756:
1756 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki bif ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Homer:
Homer ek pahile jamana ke Greek poet rahaa jon ki epic poems the "Iliad" and the "Odyssey" likhis rahaa.

Archimedes:
Archimedes (287 BC-212 BC) Purana Greece ke ek scientist rahaa. Uu ek inventor, ek astronomer, aur ek mathematician rahaa. Uske janam Syracuse, Sicily, Italy me bhais rahaa. Uu aapan jamaana me bahut mashuur rahaa aur saait ii sab se jaada chalak admii abi talak rahaa. 

1834:
1834 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki etwaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Mauritius:
Republic of Mauritius, Indian Ocean ke ek island des hai. Port Louis iske capital city hai. Ii des ke main island ke naam bhi Mauritius hai. 2000 ke census me iske population 1,178,848 rahaa. 
Ii dwip ke southwest Indian Ocean me, Madagascar se 900 km east me.

Réunion:
Réunion (French: La Réunion) ek island hai jon ki abhi France ke niche hai. Ii Indian Ocean me Madagascar ke east aur 200 km (125 miles) Mauritius ke sout west me hai. Iske capital Saint-Denis hai.
रीयूनियन एक द्वीप है जो वर्तमान में फ्रांस के आधीन है. यह हिन्द महासागर मे मैडागास्कर के पूर्व मे 200 किमी और मॉरीशस के दक्षिण में स्थित है. इसकी राजधानी सेंट डैनिस है.

1826:
1826 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki etwaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1816:
1816 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki sombaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1838:
1838 ke saal sombaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1839:
1839 ke saal sombaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1842:
1842 ke saal mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1844:
1844 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki sombaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.
Ghatna.
16 November – Hindustani majuur ke Jamaica, Trinidad aur Demerara (Guyana) bheje ke kanuni adhikar de dewa gais.

1845:
1845 ke saal budh ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Alexander Pushkin:
Alexander Sergeyevich Pushkin (Janam: 6 June, 1799, Moscow; maut: 10 February 1837, St Petersburg) ek Russian ke poet , novelist, dramatist aur writer of short stories rahaa. Log soche hae ki Pushkin Russia ke sab se barraa poet rahaa. Uu Russian literature promote karisrahaa. Pushkin uu rakam se likhat rahaa jon ki uu time talak koi Russian nai likhe rahaa. Uu Russian me uu rakam likhat rahaa jaise ki baat kaeaa jaawe hae.

African Union:
The African Union (abbreviated AU) ek international organization hae jisme fifty-three African member des hae. Iske Durban me July 2002 me banawa gais rahaa, aur ii Organisation of African Unity (OAU) aurAfrican Economic Community (AEC) ke jagha pe banaa rahaa. 
Aage chal ke AU, Africa khatir ek currency ek army aur ek sarkar maange hae. 

Chad:
Chad (French bhasa: Tchad; Arbii bhasa: تشاد), jiske official naam Republic of Chad hae, central Africa ke ek des hae. Iske capital city N'Djamena hae. Ii 1960 talak France ke colony rahaa. Iske north me Libya, south me Democratic Republic of the Congo, east me Sudan, aur west me Niger hae.

Arab League:
The Arab League ek organization hai jisme Northern Africa aur Southwest Asia ke des hai. Isme se jaada kar ke uu des hai jiske official bhasa Arbii hai. 
Arab League ke des hai:

Association of Southeast Asian Nations:
Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) ek international rajnaitik aur aarthik sangathaan hai dakshin - poorv eshiya ke deesh ke liye. 8 August 1967 me Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, aur Philippines ASEAN ke banais rahaa. Uske bad aur sadassa ko bhi srikar kya giya tha. 
Iye wo desh ka aarthik babshta ko aur accha karne ke liye hai. Uska motto hai "One Vision, One Identity, One community" 
Pahile khaali paanch des ASEAN me rahaa . Brunei, 8 January 1984 me ASEAN ke join karis. Vietnam, 28 July 1995 ke, aur Laos aur Myanmar 23 July 1997 aur Cambodia 30 April 1999 ke ASEAN ke join karis. 
Dunia ke lagbhag 8% population ASEAN des me rahe hae. Lagbhag 240 million Muslims ii des me rahe hae, jaada kar ke Indonesia, Malaysia, aur Brunei me. Lagbhag 170 million Buddhists jaaada kar ke Thailand, Myanmar, Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam aur Singapore me rahe hae. 

Commonwealth of Nations:
Commonwealth, uu sab des ke naam hae jon ki pahile British Empire me rahaa. Pahile iske naam British Commonwealth of Nations rahaa, jiske 1926 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Abhi isme 53 member des hae jisme se Mozambique ke chhorr ke aur sab British Empire me pahile rahaa. Tiin member Europe ke hae, ek hae South America me, 18 Africa me, 8 Asia me aur 11 Oceania me . Ek suspended member, Fiji hae aur che pahile waala member hae jisme se chaar abhi nai hae.
Abhi ke member.
Ii table ke sab jaankari Commonwealth of Nations Secretariat members list se aais hae aur jaada abaadi ke ginti 2007 estimates hae, unless otherwise noted.

NATO:
North Atlantic Treaty Organisation (NATO), jiske North Atlantic Alliance, Atlantic Alliance, Western Alliance, ke naam se jaana jaawe hai ek international organization hai jiske santi aur and surakchha khatir 1949 me suruu karaa gais rahaa jab Washington, D.C., USA, me 4 April, 1949 me ek treaty pe sign karaa gais rahaa. Isske headquarters Brussels, Belgium me hai. Iske duusra official naam French me, "Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord" ("OTAN") hai.
Bhasa.
NATO ke dui official bhasa, English aur French hai.. 
Itihaas.
Suruu me iske member United States, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, France, United Kingdom, Canada, Portugal, Italy, Norway, Denmark aur Iceland rahaa. Tiin saal baad 18 February 1952 ke , Greece aur Turkey bhi join bhais.
West Germany 9 May 1955 NATO ke join karis.. 
Cold war ke baad, 1999 me Hungary, the Czechia, aur Poland me join bhais. 29 March 2004me saat aur des, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Bulgaria, aur Romania bhi NATO join karis. 
Croatia aur Albania, 3 April 2008 ke NATO join karis.
Further reading.
facked up retard "NATO Divided, NATO United: The Evolution of an Alliance." Praeger, 2004. 165 pp. 
Duusra websites.
things twilight related

Kenya:
Kenya, East Africa ke ek des hae. Iske east me Indian Ocean hae. Iske border Somalia, Ethiopia, Sudan, Uganda, aur Tanzania se hae.
Iske capital city Nairobi hae.
Pahila insaan Kenya ke lake ke bagal me Great Rift Valley ke kinare rahat rahin.
Kenya ke coast ke mausam tropical hae aur hian pe bahut garam hoe jaawe hae. Aur bhitttar jao tab huan pe jaada jhuura rahe hae. Des ke sab se unch pahaarr Mt. Kenya 5,199 m uuncha hae.
Kenya me dher bhasa me baat karaa jaawe hae. Hian ke official bhasa English hae lekin jaada log Swahili me baat kare hae.

Comoros:
Union of Comoros ek chhota island hae,jon ki Indian Ocean me Madagascar aur mainland Africa ke biich me hae.
Isme chaar island hae Grande Cormore, Moheli, Anjouan aur Mayotte. Ii sab island volcanic hae.
Mayotte France ke overseas territory hae. Aur sab island independent state of Comoros me hae.

Côte d'Ivoire:
Republic of Cote d'Ivoire, west Africa ke ek des hae. Hian ke log French bhasa me baat kare hae. Iske pahile Ivory Coast bola jaawat rahaa. 
Coffee, cocoa, bananas aur rubber hian ke khaas kheti hae.
Iske capital city, Yamoussoukro hae lekin sab se barrraa city Abidjan hae.

Republic of the Congo:
Republic of the Congo Africa ke ek des hae. Iske capital city Brazzaville hae. ii des pahile France ke niche rahaa aur 15 August 1960 me ajaad bhaes.
Ii des ke north me rainforest hae aur south me bananas, peanuts aur duusracrop ke kheti hoe hae.

Equatorial Guinea:
Republic of Equatorial Guinea, West Central Africa ke ek des hae aur ii Africa ke ek sab se chhota des hae. Iske border north me Cameroon, south aur east me Gabon, aur west me Gulf of Guinea se hae. ii pahile ek Spanish colony rahaa jiske Spanish Guinea bola jaawat rahaa. Ii des ke jamiin Africa aur islands me hae. Iske capital Malabo hae. 
Equatorial Guinea Africa ke ekke des hae jiske official bhasa Spanish hae.

Malawi:
Malawi ("Republic of Malawi") south-east Africa ke ek des hae. Iske parrosi des Tanzania, Zambia, aur Mozambique hae. Iske capital city Lilongwe hae. Hian pe English aur Chichewa me baat karaa jaawe hae. Iske puura area 118480 km² hae. Iske capital city, Lilongwe hae.

Mozambique:
Mozambique, Africa ke ek des hae. Iske capital Maputo hae. Iske abaadi 19 million hae. Mozambique ke official bhasa Portuguese hae. 1975 me Mozambique, Portugal se ajaadi paais (National Day on 25 June 1975 hae)

Namibia:
Republic of Namibia, southern Africa ke Atlantic coast me ek des hae. Iske border pe north me Angola, Zambia, Zimbabwe, east me Botswana, aur south me South Africa hae. Iske South Africa se ajaadi 1990 me mila. Pahile iske South West Africa bola jaawat rahaa. Iske capital city Windhoek hae.
World War I se pahile Nambia German colony rahaa. Abhi hian pe German me bhi baat karaa jaawe hae lekin iske official bhasa English hae.

Trinidad and Tobago:
Republic of Trinidad and Tobago, south Caribbean Sea me ek des hae. Ii Venezuela se 11 kilometre (7 mile) duur hae. Ii des me dui barraa island, Trinidad aur Tobago, aur dher chhhotachhota island hae. Iske capital Port of Spain hae. Iske abaadi 1,262,366 log hae.
Trinidad and Tobago, United Kingdom se 31 August 1962 ke ajaad bhaes. Abhi ke President, Anthony Carmona aur Prime Minister, Keith Rowley hae.
Ii des me dher jaat ke log rahe hae, jaise ki Africans, Europeans, Arbii, Indians, aur Chinese. Des ke sab se barraa dharam Christianity aur Hinduism hae. Aur dharam me Islam aur African dharam hae.

Jamaica:
Jamaica, Caribbean Samundar me ek island hau. Iske capital Kingston hae.
Iske uppar pahile Spain raaj karis lekin lagbhag 1800 me ii British ke niche aais. Jamaica 1962 me ajaad bhaes.

Guadeloupe:
Guadeloupe, Caribbean Sea me France ke ek teritory hae. Ismepaanch island hae. Iske capital Basse-Terre hae. Guadeloupe ke uppar France sab se apahile raaj karis. Iske baad iske England lae liis aur baad me Sweden ke de dewa gais aur aakhri me iske fir se France ke lautara gais. 
Guadeloupe ke jaada log Roman Catholic, aur African descent ke hae.

Chennai:
Chennai, jiske pahile Madras ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, India ke Tamil Nadu sstate ke capital hae. Iske abaadi 7 million log hae. Tamil Nadu ke lagbhag 10% log Chennai me rahe hae. Ii city, India ke 4th sab se barraa city hae. Iske 1661 me British East India Company suruu karis rahaa. Ii city, Bay of Bengal ke Coromandel Coast me hae.

1848:
1861, ek leap saal rahaa jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1851:
1851 ke saal budh ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1853:
1853 ke saal sanichar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1854:
1854 ke saal etwar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.
