Itihaas ke parrhe waala log Gupta dynasty ke Han Dynasty, Tang Dynasty aur Roman Empire ke baraa bar ke batae hae. Gupt log jat caste ke dharan subclan se the
Kuchh Gupta Raja rahin:
Duusra websites.
+Golden Coins
THe Guptas were the first to introduce a coinage across their empire.This showed both their wealth-as some coins were trying to unify the empire by using the same coins over the empire.

Abbasid Samrajya:
Abbasid Samrajya dui barraa Muslim caliphateof the Arab Empire me se ek rahaa. Ii Umayyad caliph ke, Al-Andalus chhorr ke aur sab jagha se hatae diis. Iske Muhammad ke sab se chhotaa uncle, Abbas ibn Abd al-Muttalib ke descendent logan banae rahin. Iske Harran me 750 me Christian era ke time me suruu karaa gais rahaa aur 762 AD me capital ke Baghdad me kar dewa gais. Ii 200 saal talak chalaa. Abbasidke raj 1258 me khalaas bhais, jab Hulagu Khan, Mongol conqueror, Baghdad ke destroy har diis. Lekin iske baad bhi uu logan Egypt se khaas kar ke dhram ke uppar aapan influence rakkhe rahin. 

Tang Dynasty:
Tang Dynasty (Chinese: 唐朝; Pinyin: Táng Cháo) (18 June 618–4 June 907) China ke ek imperial dynasty rahaa jon ki Sui Dynasty ke baad me rahaa aur iske baad Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms Period rahaa. Iske Li (李) palwaar suruu karis rahaa, jon ki Sui Empire ke khalaas hoe ke baad power me aae rahin. Ii dynasty ke kuchh din talak Zhou Dynasty (周) (16 October 690–3 March 705) bagal kar diis rahaa jab Empress Wu Zetian raj karis. 

Lobamba:
Lobamba, Swaziland ke legislative capital hae. Ii des ke west me Hhohho district me hae.Iske population lagbhag 10,000 jan hae .

Mbabane:
Mbabane, Africa ke des Swaziland ke capital city hae. Ii Mbabane River aur Polinjane River Mdimba Mountains me hae. Ii city Hhohho district me hae. Mbabane, Hhohho ke bhi capital hae. Ii city ke population lagbhag 70,000 jan hae.

Bucharest:
Bucharest, Romania ke capital city hae. Ii city ke population 2.3 million log hae

Muslim Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2010:
19 teams Fiji Muslim League ke 2010 ke Fiji Muslim Sports Association Inter District Championship me Ba me Easter weekend (2 April - 5 April) me khelis. Teams ke chaar pool me baata gais.
Tournament ke organiser Mohammed Rafiq rahaa aur competition ke Fiji ke Attorney General Aiyaz Sayed Khaiyum officially open karis rahaa. Tournament ke technical director, Mohamed Sattar rahaa. 
Jiite waala team America me FANCA World Cup me kheli.
Last year ke winner Nasinu rahaa. 

Sanatan Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2010:
2010 Sanatan IDC, Lautoka ke Churchill Park me Easter Weekend (2 PAril - 5 April) me khela gais rahaa jisme 21 team hissa liis rahaa. Isme se ek team Auckland aur duusra team Brisbane ke rahaa.
Defending champion, New Zealand ke Manukau hae. Co-hosts hae Lautoka aur Drasa. 
Fiji Sanatan Youth and Sports ke secretary Deepak Sharma hae
Pools.
Teams ke chaar pool me baata gais rahaa:

Sangam Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2010:
2010 TIV Sangam IDC Suva ke TFL National Stadium me Easter Weekend (2 April - 5 April) me khela gais rahaa. 55 team ii chaar din ke competition me bhaag le hae, jisme se paanch veteran team 17 Super Premier, 16 Premier aur 17 senior division ke saathe ii chaar din ke tounament me, jon ki Sangam Conventionke saathe suruu hoe, me bhaag lii.
Sab football matches saat grounds (Stadium, Bidesi, Buckhurst, USP G1, USP G2, Suva Grammar G1, and Suva Grammar G2) me khela jaaii. 
Super Premier ke defending champion Lautoka hae.

Gujarati Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2010:
2010 Gujarati Iter-District Championship Easter weekend (2 - 4 April) me Nadi ke Pronce Charles Park me khela gais rahaa. Isme chhe team hissa liin rahaa. Pool ke game me sab team ek duusre se ek dafe khelin. Chaar top team semi-final ke khatir qualify bhais. Defending champion, Nadi ii championship ke fir se jiit ke New India Assurance trophy ke ek aur saal talak rakh liin.
Results.
Final.
Ii rakam se Nadi Gujarati Inter District Championship title ke tiin saal ek row me jiitis. Nadi ke coach Ronald Mar rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 2007:
2007 South Pacific Games Football ke Apia, Samoa ke Toleafoa J.S. Blatter Complex me 25 August 2007 se lae ke 7 September 2007 talak khela gais rahaa.
Men's tournament Oceania Football Confederation's (OFC) qualification tournament for the 2010 FIFA World Cup and the qualification tournament for the 2008 OFC Nations Cup, ke pahila stage rahaa ja ki Women's tournament OFC's qualification tournament for the 2008 Olympic Games ke pahila stage rahaa.
Results.
Gold medal match.
Tiino medallists, New Caledonia, Fiji, aur Vanuatu, 2008 OFC Nations Cup me New Zealand) ke saathe me part leinye.
Goalscorers.
24 games me 110 goals banawa gais , jon ki ek game ke average 4.58 goals rahaa.
Players in bold advanced to the next round.

American Samoa:
American Samoa, South Pacific Ocean ke Samoan Islands me United States ke territory hae. 
1899 ke ek treaty ke baad US aur Germany Samoan archipelago ke apne me baat liin. 
Iske capital Pago Pago hae lekin iske seat of government Fagatogo me hae.

Tahiti:
Tahiti, southern Pacific Ocean ke ek island hae. Ii French Polynesia ke ek hissa hae. Iske sab se barraa city, Papeete hae. 169 674 jan hian pe rahe hae (2002). Hian pe French aur Tahitian me baat karaa jaawe hae aur duuno official bhasa hae.

South Pacific Games Football - 2003:
2003 South Pacific Games Football ke Fiji me , 30 June se lae ke 30 July 2003 talak khela gais rahaa. , , , , , , , football khatir register nai bhais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1995:
1995 South Pacific Games, 10th game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa. Ii Tahiti me 16 - 26 August 1995 talak bhais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1991:
1991 South Pacific Games, 9th game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa. Ii game Papua New Guinea me September 1991 me bhais rahaa.

Guam:
Guam, Pacific Ocean ke Micronesia group ke ek island hae jon ki United States ke ek territory hae. Ii island ke pahila log ke "Chamorros" bol jaawe hae. Guam ke capital, Hagåtña hae lekin sab se barraa city Dededo hae. Guam me kuchh khaas United States Air Force aaur Navy ke base hae.

Lae:
Lae, Papua New Guinea ke duusra sab se barraa city aur Morobe Province ke capital hae. Ii Highlands Highway pe hae. Lae me me des ke sab se barraa cargo port hae aur hian pe bhi University of Technology nai to 'Unitech' hae.

Siwan:
Siwan India ke Bihar state me ek district ka naam hae jaha Bhojpuri bhasa bola jata hae.

South Pacific Games Football - 1987:
1987 South Pacific Games 8th game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa aur iske New Caledonia me December 1987 me khela gais rahaa. Fiji me coup ke kaaran ii game me Fiji ke football team nai gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1983:
1983 South Pacific Games, seventh game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa. Iske Western Samoa me September 1983 me khela gais rahaa.

Northern Mariana Islands:
Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Pacific Ocean ke ek group of islands hae jon ki United States ke ek territory hae. Iske capital city Saipan hae.

Niue:
Niue, Pacific ke ek island des hae. Iske jaada kar ke "Rock of Polynesia" ke naam se jaana jaawe hae. Iske aapan sarkar hae, lekin ii New Zealand ke ek associated state hae. 
Ii territory New Zealand se 2,400 kilometres north-east me hae. 

Nowy Dwór Królewski:
Nowy Dwór Królewski, Dakcchin-Purab Poland me ek gaon hei. Yeh gaon Chelmno aur Torun. Kurów gmina shahar ke rajdhani hei aur is gaon men 190.

South Pacific Games Football - 1979:
1979 South Pacific Games, edition game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa aur iske Fiji me, September 1979 me khela gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1975:
1975 South Pacific Games, fifth game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa aur iske Guam me August 1975 me khela gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1971:
1971 South Pacific Games 4th game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa aur iske Tahiti me September 1971 me khela gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1969:
1969 South Pacific Games, tiisra game rahaa jisme football khela gais rahaa aur iske Papua New Guinea me August 1969 me khela gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football - 1966:
The 1966 South Pacific Games was the second games where football was introduced and was held in New Caledonia during December 1966.

South Pacific Games Football - 1963:
1963 South Pacific Games , pahila South Pacific game rahaa aur iske Fiji me December 1963 me khela gais rahaa.

South Pacific Games Football:
South Pacific Games, suruu me har ttin saal, 1971 me khaali ek saal baad, lekin iske baad se har chaar saal hoe hae. football (soccer) ke ii game Games me, 1999 ke chhorr ke sab game me khel agais rahaa. 1987 me coup ke kaaran, Fiji South Pacific Games ke soccer me hissa nai liis rahaa.
2007 me Men's tournament, Oceania Football Confederation's (OFC) qualification tournament for the 2010 FIFA World Cup ke khatir qualifying round rahaa hae aur ii 2008 OFC Nations Cup ke bhi qualification round rahaa hae. , Women's tournament OFC's qualification tournament for the 2008 Olympic Games ke khatir bhi qualifying round rahaa hae.

South Pacific Games Football - 1999:
11th South Pacific Games 1999 me Guam me bhais rahaa
Isme koi football tournament nai khela gais rahaa kaahe ki player registration ke baare me matbhed hoe gais rahaa. South Pacific Games 
traditional system use karat rahaa lekin nawaa OFC/FIFA regulations ke ii nai satidfy karat rahaa.
References.
https://sportbetting24.se/

Oceania Nations Cup - 1973:
Oceania Cup 1973 pahila Oceania bhar ke des ke tournament rahaa. Ii New Zealand me 17 February 1973–24 February 1973 talak khela gais rahaa. Sab game Auckland ke Newmarket Park me khela gais rahaa. Isme paanch team rahaa: New Zealand, New Caledonia, Tahiti, New Hebrides Vanuatu) aur Fiji.
Uu time pe Oceania Football Confederation ke FIFA Confederation ke puura member nai maana jaawat rahaa, aur ii kaaran se isme bina FIFA se affiliation waala team ke khele ke mauka mila rahaa.
Teams ek duusre se round-robin format me khelin, aur top dui team, (New Zealand aur Tahiti) final me khelin. New Caledonia aur New Hebrides third place ke khatir ek duusre se khelin. 
New Zealand 2-0 victory se final ke jiitis, jab ki New Caledonia, New Hebrides ke 2-1 se harae ke third place me rahaa.

Oceania Nations Cup - 1980:
Oceania Nations Cup 1980 me Nouméa, New Caledonia me khela gais rahaa. Aath khele waala team rahaa: Australia, Fiji, New Caledonia, New Hebrides, New Zealand, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, aur Tahiti. Australia ke team Tahiti ke final me 4-2 se harae ke championship title ke jiitis jon ki 16 saal talak rahaa. New Caledonia, ke third place playoff me Fiji ke 2-1 se harais.
Pool waala result rahaa:

Oceania Nations Cup - 1996:
Oceania Nations Cup, 1996 ek cohesive tournament nai rahaa, lekin iske semi-finals aur final two-legged basis me , November 1995 aur November 1996 ke biich me khela gais rahaa.
Chaar khele waala team rahaa: Australia and New Zealand who qualified as of right, Solomon Islands jon ki Melanesia Cup jiit ke qualify bhais rahaa, aur Tahiti, jon ki Polynesia Cup jiit ke qualify bhais rahaa.
Australia aur New Zealand ke biich ke semi-final 1995 Trans-Tasman Cup khatir bhi valid rahaa.
The results were:

Nadi:

Cultural Revolution:
Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution (Simplified Chinese: 无产阶级文化大革命, Traditional Chinese: 無產階級文化大革命, Pinyin: Wúchǎn Jiējí Wénhuà Dà Gémìng)), jiske Cultural Revolution ke naam se bhi jaan ajaawe hae, ek time rahaa jab ki China me bhaari cultural change bhais rahaa, jiske Mao Zedong suruu karis rahaa. Ii 1966 aur 1969 ke biich me bhais rahaa.

Meiji Restoration:
Meiji Restoration, Japan ke itihaas ke ek sabd hae. Japanese bhasa me , "Meiji-ishin" sabd Meiji Restoration ke khatir kaam me lawa jaawat rahaa.

Dhyan:
Thoughts uu message hae jiske brain ke lage bheja jaawe hae sab rakam ke janwar me. Dhyan hame duniya ko alag nazro mein deekha sakta hai.

Japanese yen:
Yen nai to en Japan ke paisa hae. Iske jaada kar ke Latinized symbol ¥ ke use kar ke likha jaawe hae, lekin Japanese bhasa me ii kanji 円 me likha jaawe hae.

Racism:
Racism ii biswas hae ki koi jaat duusra jaat se achchhaa hae.

San Marino:
San Marino dunia ke ek sab se chhota des me se ek hae. Ii southern Europe me hae, aur iske charo taraf Italy hae. Hian pe 32,000 ke kamti jan rahe hae. Iske puura area 61km2 hae.

Kalu Karan Singh:
Kalu Karan Singh, Fiji ke ek master, insurance agent, kisan ke neta aur politician rahaa. Uu Ba ke rahaa aur Ba me Arya Samaj ke achchhaa sahayog diis rahaa. Uu aapan parrhae likhae ke khatam kar ke ek master banaa aur bahut din talak DAV Primary School, Ba ke Head Master rahaa. Iske baad uu ek insurance agent banaa aur aapan office Ba town me kholis. 
December 1966 me, Ba Township Board ke pahila election me, uu Yalalevu Ward se chuna gais rahaa, lekin 1969 ke Board ke election me uu election haar gais rahaa.
1972 ke election me uske National Federation Party (NFP), North - Western Indian National seat ke khatir aapan candidate chunis. Ii election ke uu sahaj me jiit liis. Uu S. M. Koya ke katttar samarthak rahaa aur 1977 me jab NFP dui gut me bat gais tab uu Dove Faction ke member banaa aur aapan seat ke haar gais. Uu Fiji Sugar Gane Growers Council me bhi Federation of Cane Growers ke taraf se chuna gais rahaa.

Serbia:
Republic of Serbia (Serbian bhasa: Република Србија) southeastern Europe me ek des dae. Iske capital city Belgrade hae. Serbia ke south me Hungary hae, east me Bulgaria aur Romania hae, south me Macedonia aur Albania aur westme Montenegro (jon ki pahile Serbia ke ek hissa rahaa), Bosnia and Herzegovina aur Croatia hae.
Serbian bhasa ke bagal ke dher des me kaam me lawa jaawe hae.

Dogana:
Dogana, San Marino ke north-eastern cornerme ek town hae. Ii des ke sab se barraa populated jagha hae. 

Belgrade:
Belgrade, Serbia ke capital city hae. 1990s ke larrai se pahile ii Yugoslavia ke capital rahaa. Iske abaadi 1.2 million hae.

Bratislava:
Bratislava, Slovakia ke capital city hae. Hian pe lagbhag 450,000 jan rahe hae. Iske pahile Pressburg (German bhasa) nai to Pozsony (Hungarian bhasa) ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. Bratislava me seat of national government, presidency, aur parliament hae. Hian pe dher museums, galleries aur duusara educational, cultural aur economic institutions hae.
Duusra websites.
B

Ljubljana:
Ljubljana, Slovenia ke capital city hae. Ii des ke sab se barraa city bhi hae. Ii city ii ilaka ke khaas city uu time banaa jabRomans, Slovenia pe raj kart rahin. Ii time ke dher museum abhi Ljubljana me hae. 
2002 me 265,881 jan Ljubljana me rahat rahin. University of Ljubljana bhi Ljubljana me hae.

Stockholm:
Stockholm, Sweden ke sab se barraa aur [ city hae. I des ke east coast me hae. Ii city dher islands pe banaa hae aur city ke biich me open water aur canals hae. Stockholm, des ke tiisra sab se barraa city, sab se barraa lake, Mälaren, aur Baltic Sea ke biich me hae.
Tyresta National Park Stockholm ke lage hae.

Bern:
Bern, Switzerland ke capital city hae. 
Eearly 2006, me 127,000 jan ii city me rahat rahin..

Paramaribo:
Paramaribo, Suriname ke capital city hae. Lagbhag 250,000 jan ii city me rahe hae. Ii Suriname Naddi pe hae, lagbhag 15 km naddi ke Atlantic Ocean se mile se pahile. 

Doha:
Doha (Arbii bhasa: الدوحة;, Ad-Dawḥah nai to Ad-Dōḥah), Qatar ke capital city hae. Iske population 400,051 (2005) hae, aur ii Persian Gulf me 25.3° N aur 51.5333° E pe hae. Ii city me Doha International Airport, barraa oil aur fishing industry hae. 

Riyadh:
Riyadh (Arbii bhasa: الرياض‎ ar-Riyāḍ), Saudi Arabia ke capital city hae. Ii Najd region ke Ar Riyad Province me hae. Ii Arabian peninsula ke biich me ek barraa plateau pe hae. Iske population 4,260,000 jan hae, jon ki des ke 20% population hae.

Sri Jayawardenapura-Kotte:
Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte (Sinhala: ශ්‍රී ජයවර්ධනපුර කෝට්ටේ}}, Tamil bhasa: ஸ்ரீ ஜயவர்த்தனபுரம் கோட்டை}}), jiske Sri Jayawardenapura aur Kotte කෝට්ටේ ke naam se bhi jaana jaawe hae, Sri Lanka ke administrative capital hae. Ii commercial capital Colombo ke eastern suburbs me hae jiske "New Capital Territory" bola jawe hae. Parliament of Sri Lanka hian pe 29 April 1982 se hae. 

Basseterre:
Basseterre, West Indies ke Federation of Saint Kitts and Nevis ke capital hae. 2000 me iske population lagbhag 15,500 rahaa. 

Castries:
Castries, West Indies ke des Saint Lucia ke capital city hae. Iske population 10,634 hae. 

Kingstown:
Kingstown, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines ke capital city hae. 2008 me Kingston ke population 24,518 rahaa. . 

Palau:
Palau, jiske official naam Republic of Palau hae, ek bina border ke des hae. Ii Pacific Ocean me Philippines se 300 miles (500 km) east me hae. 1994 me iske ajaadi mila. 

Euro:
Euro, Eurozone des ke paisa hae. Ek Euro me 100 "cents" hae, jiske French me "centimes" aur Spanish me "céntimos", bola jaawe hae.
Iske 1999 me suruu karaa gais rahaa lekin 1 January 2002 talak iske khaali electronic transaction ke khatir kaam me lawa jaawat rahaa. 2002 me EU (The European Union) ke barah des aqapan currency ke band kae ke Euro ke kaam me laawe lagaa. 
Euro me 7 rakam ke banknotes hae jiske diferent rang hae: €5 (grey), €10 (red), €20 (blue), €50 (orange), €100 (green), €200 (yellow), €500 (purple).
Coin 8 different amounts ke hae: €0.01, €0.02, €0.05, €0.10, €0.20, €0.50, €1, €2.
Sab banknote,me ek style ke European building ke photo hae. 
Symbol.
Euro ke symbol Greek letter epsilon (E) horizontal line ke saathe hae: €.
Kuchh log iske Latin capital letter C ek equal sign (=) ke saathe mane hae.
Isk khaali "euro" bhi lika jaae sake hae, khaas kar ke uu time jab ki ii symbol banawa nai jaae sake hae.
Eurozoneke member (2015) hae:
Jab ki ii sab des EU ke member nai hae, fir bhi hian pe bhi Euro ke kaam me lawa jaawe hae.

Rajniti:
Rajniti uu chij ke bola jaawe hae jaise ssathe me rahe waala log koi samjhauta pe aawe hae. Ii samjhauta se tribes, cities, aur des ek saathe rahe sake hae. 

Khalbali:
Khalbali (English bhasa me: Anarchism) uu rakam ke rahe ke dhang hae jisme log sarkar me biswas nai kare hae. Anarchists log ii bhi biswas kare hae ke logan ke khai force kar ke kuchh nai karawa jaae. 

Upniweswaad:
Upniweswaad (English bhasa me: Colonialism) uu time hoe hae jab ki ek des, duusra des nai to region ke aapan niche kar le hae. 

Samyawaad:
Communism (English bhasa me: Communism) ek tarah ka vicharik chhalawa hai jisme samaj me sab ko barabar rakhne ki baar kahi gai hai aur sarkar sab chiz ki maalik hai

Kutniti:
Kutniti (English bhasa me diplomacy) use bola jata hai jab kuch [[desh ek dusre se samjhauta karte hai.

Sarkar:
Ek sarkar (English bhasa me: government) ek group ke log rahe hae jon ki des nai to des ke ek hissa ke kanuun ke anusaar chalawe hae.

Bichardhara:
Ek bichardhara (English bhasa me: ideology) kuchh biswas hae jisme ek group kr log biswas kare hae.

Ngerulmud:
Ngerulmud, Palau ke capital hae. Ii 7 October 2006 ke capital banaa.

Manila:
Manila, Philippines ke capital city hae. Ii Philippines ke sab se barraa city bhi hae. Ii des ke sab se barraa island Luzon me hae.

Dodoma:
Dodoma, Tanzania ke capital city hae. Ii des ke tiisra sab se barraa city hae. Iske population 324,347 jan hae. 

Lomé:
Lomé, Togo ke capital city hae. 

Rurriwaad:
Rurriwaad (English bhasa me: Conservatism) ek political idea hae. Conservatism ke follow kare waala log, jiske conservatives bola jaawe hae, sab chhij ke abhi jaise rakkhae maange hae, nai to jaise chij pahile rahaa. 

Prajatantr:
Ek Prajatantr (English bhasa: democracy, Greek bhasa, "demokratia") jiske matlab "janata ke raj" hae, ek sakam ke sarkar hae. Prajatantr me janta aapan sarkar ke apne se chune hae. 

Tanasahi:
Tanasahi (English bhasa: Dictatorship) ek rakam ke nirankusavadi (Authoritarianism) sarkar hae. Tanasahi me neta, janata se jaada important rahe hae. Ii rakam ke sarkar me ek khaas neta rahe hae jiske Tanasah (Dictator) bola jaawe hae.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2010:
2010 ke Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 22 May se lae ke 30 May talak, Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela jaai
Isme sab game 60 minute ke rahii.
Iske saathe U16 tournament bhi khela jaai.

Dushanbe:
Dushanbe (Tajik bhasa: Душанбе, Farsii bhasa: دوشنبه), Tajikistan ke capital city hae. 2000 me lagbhag 562,000 jan Dushnabe me rahat rahin.

Tunis:
Tunis (Arabii bhasa: تونس, "Tūnis"), Tunisia ke capital city hae. 2004 me 728,463 log ii city me rahat rahin. Iske metropolitan area me 1.6 million log rahe hae. 

Ankara:
Ankara, Turkey ke capital city hae. Ii anatolia ke biich me hae. Istanbul ke baad, ii Turkey ke duusra sab se barraa city hae. 2015 me iske population 5,270,575 rahaa. Ii city samundar se 950 m. (3100 ft.) uppar hae. Iske pahile "Angora" or "Engürü", aur Roman ke time Ancyra, aur classical aur Hellenistic periods ke time Άγκυρα Ánkyra ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. Ii city Ankara Province ke bhi capital hae.

Ashgabat:
Ashgabat, Turkmenistan ke sab se barraa aur capital city hae. 2012 me iske population 1,031,992 rahaa. 
Bahaari jorr.
[[vibhag:

Port of Spain:
Port of Spain, Republic of Trinidad and Tobago ke capital city aur tiisra sab se barraa city hae. 2000 me iske population 49,031 rahaa. 

Nukuʻalofa:
Nuku'alofa, Tonga ke capital city hae. Ii Tongatapu island me hae. Tonga ke 35% log Nuku'alofa me rahe hae. 1996 me iske population 22,400 rahaa.

Funafuti:
Funafuti, Tuvalu ke capital city hae. 2002 me iske population 4,492 rahaa. 

Monzón:
Monzón, Spain ke Aragon svaayatt samudaay hai. Iske population 17,176 hai (2014 census).
Iye uttar-poorv (Iye Cinca Medio district me hai, aur Cinca Medio Province of Huesca me hai) me hai aur iiye Cinca aur Sosa nadio me sameep hota hai. 

Kampala:
Kampala, Uganda ke capital city hae. 1,200,000 se jaada log hian pe rahe hae. Ii city Lake Victoria ke kinare hae.

Lusaka:
Lusaka, Zambia ke capital city hae. Ii des ke sab se barraa city bhi hae. Ii south central Zambia me ek plateau pe 1300 m (4265 ft) uunchae pe hae. Lusaka ke abaadi 1,084,703 hae.

Harare:
Harare, Zimbabwe ke capital city hae. Hian pe 1.6 million se jaada log rahe hae. 1890 me ii "Salisbury" ke naam se suruu bhaes rahaa, lekin 18 April 1982 me iske naam badal ke Harare kar dewa gais rahaa.

Kiev:
Kyiv nai to Kiev (Ukrainian bhasa me: Київ) Ukraine ke capital city hae. Hian pe 4 million se jaada log rahe hae.

Montevideo:
Montevideo, Uruguay ke sab se barraa aur capital city hae. Iske 1726 me Portuguese log suruu karin rahaa. 
Montevideo ke abaadi 1,325,968 hae. Iske khaas bhasa Spanish hae lekin English aur Italian bhi kaam me lawa jaawe hae.

Caracas:
Caracas, Venezuela ke capital city hae. Iske abaadi 6 million log hae.

Abu Dhabi:
Abu Dhabi (Arabic: أبو ظبي "ʼAbū Ẓaby"), United Arab Emirateske ek emirate hae. Iske abaadi 2.8 million hae (2015).

Tashkent:
Tashkent (Uzbek bhasa me Toshkent nai to Тошкент, Russian bhasa me Ташкент ), Uzbekistan ke capital city hae. 2006 me iske abaadi 1,967,879 rahaa.

Hanoi:
Hanoi ([Vietnamese bhasa: Quốc Ngữ Hà Nội; Chữ Nôm 河内), Vietnam ke capital city hae. Ii city me lagbhag 3,083,800 (2004) log rahe hae.

Sana‘a:
Sana'a (Arbii bhasa: صنعاء, duusra spellings Sanaa or Ṣan‘ā’), Yemen ke capital city hae. 

1881 ke census (Fiji):
1881 ke census, Fiji ke pahila census rahaa aur ii 4 April ke lewa gais rahaa.

1891 ke census (Fiji):
1891 ke census, Fiji ke pahila census rahaa aur ii 5 April ke lewa gais rahaa.

1901 ke census (Fiji):
1901 ke census, Fiji ke tiisra census rahaa aur ii 31 March ke lewa gais rahaa.

1911 ke census (Fiji):
1911 ke census, Fiji ke 4th census rahaa aur ii 2 April ke lewa gais rahaa.

1921 ke census (Fiji):
1921 ke census, Fiji ke 5th census rahaa aur ii 24 April ke lewa gais rahaa.

1936 ke census (Fiji):
1921 ke census, Fiji ke 6th census rahaa aur ii 26 April ke lewa gais rahaa.

1946 ke census (Fiji):
1946 ke census, Fiji ke 7th census rahaa aur ii 2 October ke lewa gais rahaa.

1956 ke census (Fiji):
1956 ke census, Fiji ke 8th census rahaa aur ii 26 September ke lewa gais rahaa.

1966 ke census (Fiji):
1966 ke census, Fiji ke 9th census rahaa aur ii 12 September ke lewa gais rahaa.

1976 ke census (Fiji):
1976 ke census, Fiji ke 10th census rahaa aur ii 13 September ke lewa gais rahaa.

1986 ke census (Fiji):
1986 ke census, Fiji ke 11th census rahaa aur ii 31 August ke lewa gais rahaa.

1996 ke census (Fiji):
1996 ke census, Fiji ke 12th census rahaa aur ii 25 August ke lewa gais rahaa.

2007 ke census (Fiji):
2007 ke census, Fiji ke 13th census rahaa aur ii 16 September ke lewa gais rahaa.

1944 ke election (Fiji):
1944 ke election 1943-44 ke ganna ke kisan ke harrtaal aur Kisan Sangh me fuut ke baas bhais rahaa, aur isme A. D. Patel, B. D. Lakshman, ke North Western Indian Constituency me asaani sw harae diis.
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
Ii election ke hoe talak A. D. Patel, Fiji laut aais rahaa aur Kisan Sangh ke virod me ek aur union, Maha Sangh ke suruu kar diis rahaa. Second World War ke kaaran chij ke daam bahut barr gais rahaa aur Patel ii mangis ki 1940 ke contact ke faarr ke nawaa contract banawa jaae. 1943 me ek harrtaal ke baad aur Kisan Sangh me corruption ke aarop ke kaaran Patel ii election ke easy se jiit liis. 
Election ke result rahaa:
Southern Indian Constituency.
Ii constitency se Vishnu Deo jiit gais.
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me B. M. Gyaneshwar jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, governor, K. B. Singh aur Said Hasan ke nominated member banawa gais.

B. M. Gyaneshwar:
Badri Maharaj Gyaneshwar (8 May 1910 - 31 July 1959), jiske jaada kar ke B. M. Gyaneshwar ke naam se jaana jawat rahaa , Fiji ke ek wakiil aur Legislative Council ke member aur khel kuud, samaj sewa aur dharam me yogdaan diis rahaa.
Jawani ke din.
Gyaneshwar ke janam, Wairuku, Rakiraki me bhais rahaa. Uske pitaji, Badri Maharaj, Fiji ke Legislative Council ke pahila Hindustani member rahaa. Gyaneshwar, uu larrkan me se ek rahaa jiske Arya Samaj India parrhe ke khatir bhejis rahaa. 1926 me uu Cawnpore ke DAV College me bharti bhais. 1928 me uu Dehradun DAV College me bharti bhais, jahaan pe uu, July 1934 me Allahabad University ke intermedite examination pass karis. Uu college ke cricket team ke captain rahaa aur tennis champion bhi rahaa. 
Cricket ke khilaarri.
October 1934 me uu University College of Wales me aapan wakiili ke parrhai suruu karis. Ii time uu Welsh minor county cricket Ceredingshire ke captain banaa, jahaan pe uu University team ke batsman aur bowler bhi rahaa.
1938 me jab uu England ke University of Aberystwyth me parhat rahaa tab uu achchhaa cricket ke khilaari rahaa. Uu University team ke opening batsman rahaa aur Welsh minor county cricket team Denbeighshire aur Cardiganshire me khelis rahaa. 
Legislative Council ke member.
Uu Labasa me wakiili karat rahaa aur 1944 me yahii jagha se Eastern Indian Constituency se chuna gais rahaa.
Jab uu Fiji ke Legislative Council ke member rahaa tab uu 1946 me “Deed Of Cession” debate me hissa liis rahaa aur ii batais ki Deed of Cession se Fiji ke British Raj ke dewa gais rahaa, Fiji ke local gora logan ke nai. 
Uu khel kuud me hissa lewat rahaa, jisme tennis, cricket, fishing aur bush walking rahaa. Uu dher civic organisations aur projects ke madat diis raha. Uu Labasa Township Board ke Vice Chairman bhi rahaa. Uu Labasa ke ek jaana maana citizen rahaa aur uske maut ek lamba bemaari ke kaaran 49 saal ke umar me bhais rahaa.

1947 ke election (Fiji):
1947 ke election ke time A. D. Patel aapan taagat ke choti pe rahaa aur uske virodhi, Kisan Sangh fir se ek bane k kosis karat rahaa lekin Patel ke nai harae sakis. 
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
Ii election ke bhi. A. D. Patel, aapan ganna ke kisan ke support se jiit liis, lekin uske virodi Chatttur Singh rahaa aur Patel ke majority kamti hoe gais rahaa.
Election ke result rahaa:
Southern Indian Constituency.
Ii constitency se Vishnu Deo jiit gais.
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me James Madhavan jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, governor Ami Chandra aur M. S. Buksh ke nominated member banawa gais.

1950 ke election (Fiji):
1950 ke election me A. D. Patel aapan seat haar gais rahaa.
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
Ii election se pahile A. D. Patel aur Vishnu Deo ke biich me Executive Council ke nomination ke piche madhbedh hoe gais aur jon kuch support Patel ke Deo ke jarie milat rahaa khalaas hoe gais. Ii election me Patel ke virodi, Tulsi Ram Sharma, bhi ek lawyer aur uske samaj me log janat rahin uske samaj sewa, jaise ki Football ke kaaran. Kisan Sangh, jon ki ii time talak fir se support paae laga rahaa bhi Sharma ke support karis.
Election ke result rahaa:
Southern Indian Constituency.
Ii constitency se Vishnu Deo jiit gais.
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me James Madhavan jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, governor Ben M. Jannif aur ke nominated member banawa gais.

Paisa:
Paisa uu chij hae jiske kaam me laae ke log goods aur services kharide hae.

Navua district, Fiji:
Navua, Fiji ke Southern division ke Serua Province ek district hae. 1923 talak hian pe ek chini ke mill rahaa. 1970s me hian pe Pacific Harbour ke development ke kaaran kaafi tarakki bhais rahaa.

Navua:
, Fiji ke ek town hae. Ii town Suva ke west me Queens Road pe 27 kilometer duur pe hae.

1542:
1542 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ji etwaar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa. 

1605:
1605 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ki sanichar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa. 

1556:
1556 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki budh ke roj suruu bhais rahaa. 

Santa Singh:
Dr Santa Singh, Fiji ke House of Representatives ke ek member rahaa. Uu 1977 me National Federation Party ke taraf se Savusavu/Macuata East Constituency se chuna gais rahaa

Uday Singh:
Uday Singh (maut: 7 June 2014), Fiji ke House of Representatives ke ek member rahaa. Uu 1985 me Alliance Party ke taraf se Norh Central Indian National Costituency se chuna gais rahaa
Singh, Alliance Sarkar ke supporter rahaa aur ek barraa kisan aur community worker rahaa. Uu Fiji me Arya Samaj ke supporter rahaa aur Arya Prtinidhi Sabha of Fiji ke National President bhi rahaa.
1987 talak uu Ba National Seat se Parliament me rahaa. aur 30 May 1994 me uske Senator banawa gais rahaa. Uske Order of British Empire bhi dewa gais rahaa.

Govind Swamy:
Govind Swamy (janam: 1951), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa jon ki bahut din talak teacher ke kaam kare ke baad Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gis rahaa. 
Uske janam Labasa me bhais rahaa aur uu 18 saal talak industrial arts ke teacher rahaa. 1987 ke electio me uu Vanua Levu North and West National Constituency ke khatir NFP-Labour Coalition ke taraf se kharraa bhais. Uu ii seat ke asaani se jiit liis lekin Parliament me khaali ek mahina talak rahaa jab ki military coup of 1987 uske political career ke khalaas kar diis.

M. C. Vinod:
Mahendra Chandra Vinod (25 September 1921 - 2003), Fiji ke ek Hindustani civil servant, sampaadak aur House of Representatives ke member rahaa.
Uske janam Nacokaika, Naitasiri, Fiji me bhais rahaa. Uu University of Hawaii se Bachelor of Science ke degree kare ke baad New Delhi se Diploma in Journalism karis aur iske baad Fiji civil service join karis. 1979 me uu civil service se retire hoe ke Hindi bhasa waala newspaper, "Shanti Dut" ke editor banaa. August 1981 me uske Imperial Service Order (ISO) mila.
1987 ke election ke khatir NFP-Labour Coalition uske Nausori/Levuka Indian Communal Constituency ke khatir chnis jiske uu sahaj se jiit liis lekin ek mahina baad military coup of 1987 ke baad uske political career khalaas hoe gais. 

Hyderabad:
haidarābāda (tēlugu: హైదరాబాదు,urdu: حیدر آباد) bhārata kē rājya āndhra pradēśa kī rājadhānī hai. isakā dūsarā nāma bhāgyanagara hai. āndhra pradēśa kē tēlaṅgānā kṣētra mē sthita isa mahānagara kī janasaṅkhyā lagabhaga 61 lākha hai. bhārata kē mahānagarōṁ mēṁ janasaṅkhyā kē ādhāra para yaha 5vēṁ sthāna para hai. 
haidarābāda apanē unnata itihāsa, sanskr̥ti, uttara tathā dakṣiṇa bhārata kē sthāpatya kē maulika saṅgama, tathā apanī bahubhāṣī sanskr̥ti kē liyē bhaugōlika tathā sānskr̥tika dōnōṁ rūpōṁ mēṁ jānā jātā hai. haidarābāda vaha sthāna rahā hai jahāṁ hindū aura muslima śāntipūrvaka śatābdiyōṁ sē sātha sātha raha rahē haiṁ.
yaha bhārata kē sarvādhika vikasita nagarōṁ mē sē ēka hai aura bhārata mēṁ sūcanā praudhōgikī ēvaṁ jaiva praudyaugikī kā kēndra banatā jā rahā hai . husaina sāgara sē vibhājita, haidarābāda aura sikandarābāda juṛavāṁ śahara haiṁ. husaina sāgara kā nirmāṇa sana 1562 mēṁ ibrāhīma kutuba śāha kē śāsana kāla mēṁ hu'ā thā, aura yaha ēka mānava nirmita jhīla hai. cāramīnāra, isa kṣētra mēṁ plēga mahāmārī kē anta kī yādagāra kē taura para muham'mada kulī kutuba śāha nē 1591 mēṁ, śahara kē bīcōṁ bīca banavāyā thā. 
nāmakaraṇa.
haidarabāda nāma kē pīchē ka'ī dhāraṇāyēṁ haiṁ . ēka prasid'dha dhāraṇā hai ki isa śahara kō basānē kē bāda muham'mada kulī kutuba śāha ēka sthānīya ban̄jārā laṛakī bhāgamatī sē prēma kara baiṭhā thā, laṛakī sē śādī kē bāda usanē isa śahara kā nāma bhāgyanagaram rakhā. islāma svīkāra karanē kē bāda, bhāgamatī kā nāma haidara mahala hu'ā - aura śahara kā bhī nayā nāma haidarābāda ("haidara kā basāyā gayā śahara")
itihāsa.
sultāna kulī kutuba mulka , gōlakuṇḍā saltanata kē śāsaka parivāra, "kutuba śāhī" rājavanśa kā sansthāpaka thā . 1512 mē svatantra saltanata bananē sē pahalē yaha rājavanśa bahamanī saltanata kē ādhīna thā . 1591 mēṁ isa rājavanśa kē ēka śāsaka muham'mada kulī kutuba śāha nē mūsī nadī kē taṭa para haidarābāda śahara kī sthāpanā kī , yaha sthāna parivartana, purānē mukhyālaya gōlakuṇḍā mēṁ rājavanśa kō hō rahī pānī kī kamī kē kāraṇa karanā paḍā . kahā jātā hai ki, isasē pahalē ki plēga kī mahāmārī usakī nayē basāyē śahara mēṁ faila pātī, usa para kābū pāyā jā sakā, isaliyē usanē, sarvaśaktimāna īśvara kē prati kr̥tajñatā jñāpita karatē huyē, usī sāla, cāramīnāra banavānē kā bhī ādēśa diyā .
16vīma śatābdī aura śuru'ātī 17vīṁ śatābdī mēṁ, jaisē jaisē kutuba śāhī rājavanśa kī śakti aura sattā baḍhatī gayī, haidarābāda hīrōṁ kē vyāpāra kā kēnndra banatā gayā . mahārānī ēlījābētha kē rājamukuṭa mēṁ jaṛā viśva mēṁ sarvādhika prasid'dha kōha-ē-nūra, gōlakuṇṛā kī hīrōṁ kī khānēṁ sē hī nikalā hai . kutuba śāhī rājavanśa nē haidarābāda mēṁ hindustānī-phārasī aura hindustānī-islāmī sāhitya kē vikāsa mēṁ bhī sahayōga kiyā . kucha sultāna sthānīya tēlagū sanskr̥ti kē sanrakṣaka bhī mānē jātē haiṁ . 16vīṁ śatābdī mēṁ śahara gōlkuṇḍā kī janasaṅkhyā kē basanē kē liyēbaḍhā aura falataḥ kutuba śāhī śāsakōṁ kī rājadhānī bana gayā . haidarābāda apanē bāgōṁ aura sukhada mausama kē liyē jānā jānē lagā .
1687 mēṁ, mugala śāsaka oraṅgajēba nē haidarābāda para adhikāra kara liyā . isa kama samaya kē mugala śāsana kē dorāna, haidarābāda kā sobhāgya kṣaya hōnē lagā . jalda hī, mugala śāsaka kē dvārā niyukta śahara kē sūbēdāra nē adhika svāyattā pā lī . 1724 mēṁ asafa jāha prathama , jisē mugala samrāṭa nē "nijāma-ē-mulka" kā khitāba diyā thā, nē ēka virōdhī adhikārī kō haidarābāda para adhikāra sthāpita karanē mēṁ harā diyā . isa taraha āsafa jāha rājavanśa kā prārambha hu'ā, jisanē haidarābāda para bhārata kī aṅgrējōṁ sē svatantratā kē ēka sāla bāda taka śāsana kiyā . āsafa jāha kē uttarādhikārīyōṁ nē haidarābāda para rājya kiyā, vē nijāma kahalāyē . ina sāta nijāmōṁ kē rājya mēṁ haidarābāda sānskr̥tika aura ārthika dōnōṁ bhānti 
vikasita hu'ā . haidarābāda rājya kī ādhikārika rājadhānī bana gayā aura purānī rājadhānī gōlakuṇḍā chōṇṛa dī gayī . baṛē baṛē jalāśaya jaisē ki nijāma sāgara, tuṅgabādra, ōsamāna sāgara, himāyata sāgara aura bhī ka'ī banāyē gayē . nagārjuna sāgara kē liyē sarvē bhī isī samaya śuru kiyā gayā, jisē bhārata sarakāra nē 1969 mēṁ pūrā kiyā . 
jaba 1947 mēṁ bhārata svatantra hu'ā, britiśa śāsana sē huyī śartōṁ kē tahata haidarābāda nē; jisakā pratinidhitva mukhya mantrī, mantrimaṇḍala aura nijāma kara rahē thē, svatantra hōnē kō cunā, ēka mukta śāsaka kī bhānti yā briṭiśa sāmrājya kī riyāsata kī bhānti . 
bhārata nē haidarābāda para ārthika nākābandī lagā dī | pariṇāmataḥ hairadarābāda rājya kō ēka virāma samajhŏtā karanā paḍā | bhārata kī svatantratā kē karība ēka sāla bāda, 17 sitambara 1948 kē dina nijāma nē adhimilana prapatra para hastākṣara kiyē | 1 navambara 1956 kō bhārata kā bhāṣāyī ādhāra para purnasaṅgaṭhana kiyā gayā | haidarābāda rājya kē pradēśa nayē banē āndhra pradēś, bōmbē (bāda mē mahārāṣṭra), aura karnāṭaka rājyōṁ mē tēlugubhāṣī lōgaṁ kē anusāra bāṇṭa diyē gayē | isa taraha haidarābāda nayē banē rājya āndhra pradēśa kī rājadhānī banā |
bhūgōla aura paryāvaraṇa.
haidarābāda śahara dakṣiṇa bhārata kē āndhra pradēśa rājya, tēlaṅgānā kṣētra mē sthita hai | yaha dēkkana kṣētra mē hai jō, samudra taṭa sē 541 mīṭara, 625kimī2 kṣētra ūpara sthita hai |
mūla haidarābāda śahara mūsī nadī kē kinārē sthāpita hu'ā thā. isē aba aitihāsika purānā śahara kahā jātā hai, jahāṁ cāramīnāra, makkā masjida ādi banē haiṁ, vaha nadī kē dakṣiṇī kinārē para basā hai. nagara kā kēndra nadī kē uttara mēṁ sthānāntarita hō gayā hai. yahāṁ ka'ī sarakārī imāratēṁ va mukhya sthala banē haiṁ, khāsakara husaina sāgara jhīla kē dakṣiṇa mēṁ. isa nagara kī tvarita pragati sātha juṛē sikandarābāda va an'ya paṛōsī kṣētrōṁ sahita hu'ī hai, jisasē yaha mahānagarōṁ kī śrēṇī mēṁ ā gayā hai.
yahāṁ kā mausama isa prakāra sē hai:
cikitsakīya paryaṭana.
yadi kisī kō kō'ī baṛī svāsthya samasyā hai, tō haidarābāda, ubharatā hu'ā sarvaśrēṣṭha sthānōṁ mēṁ sē ēka hai, upacāra hētu. nagara pahalē hī auṣadhi kā kēndra hai, jahāṁ auṣadhiyōṁ kā ka'ī karōṛa kā vyāpāra hai. yahāṁ ka'ī sastē va acchē aspatāla bhī haiṁ.
nāgarika praśāsana.
nagara kā praśāsana grēṭara haidarābada nagaramahāpālikā dvārā san̄cālita hai.
haidarābāda ēka sau 50 myunisipala vārḍsa mēṁ baṇṭā hu'ā hai. pratyēka vārḍa kā ēka kŏrpōrēṭara hōtā hai, jō pālikā kē cunāvōṁ mēṁ cayanita hōtā hai.
haidarābāda mēṁ ēka jilā hai, jō jilā maijisṭrēṭa kē adhīna ātā hai. inhēṁ kalēkṭara bhī kahā jātā hai. kalēkṭara sampatti āṅkaṛōṁ va rājasva saṅgrahaṇa kā prabhārī hōtā hai. yahī nagara mēṁ hōnē vālē cunāvōṁ kī prakriyā kā nirīkṣaṇa bhī karatā hai. mahānagarīya kṣētra mēṁ raṅgārēḍḍī jilā bhī ātā hai, jō pūrva haidarābāda mēṁ sē kāṭa kara banā thā.
an'ya mahānagarōṁ kī bhānti, yahāṁ bhī ēka pulisa āyukta, ā'ī pī ēsa hōtā hai. haidarābāda pulisa rājya gr̥ha mantrālaya kē adhīna ātī hai. haidarābāda mēṁ pām̐ca pulisa maṇḍala haiṁ, pratyēka kā ēka pulisa upāyukta hai. yahāṁ kī yātāyāta pulisa bhī haidarābāda pulisa kē adhīna,ardha-svāyattatā prāpta sansthā hai.
yahāṁ ēka rājya ucca n'yāyālaya hai. isakē sātha hī dō nicalē n'yāyālaya bhī haiṁ. yē haiṁ: smŏla kŏzēza kōrṭa: nāgarika (dīvānī) māmalōṁ hētu, va saiśana kōrṭa: āparādhika(phaujadārī) māmalōṁ hētu.
haidarābāda mēṁ dō lika sabhā nirvācana kṣētra haiṁ: haidarābāda ēvaṁ sikandarābāda. sātha hī śahara kē ka'ī bhāga, dō an'ya nirvācana kṣētrōṁ kē bhī bhāga haiṁ. yahāṁ tēraha vidhāna sabhā nirvācana kṣētra haiṁ.
ādhikārika rūpa sē bhārata sarakāra haidarābāda kō mahānagara mānatī hai.
artha vyavasthā.
haidarābāda āndhra pradēśa kī vittīya ēvaṁ ārthika rājadhānī bhī hai. yaha śahara rājya kē sakala gharēlū utpāda, kara ēvaṁ rājasva kā sarvādhika anśadātā hai. 1990 kē daśaka sē isa śahara kā ārthika prārūpa badala kara, ēka prāthamika sēvā nagara sē bahu-sēvā varṇakrama svarūpa hō gayā hai, jisamēṁ vyāpāra, yātāyāta, vāṇijya, bhaṇḍāraṇa, san̄cāra, ityādi sabhī sam'milita haiṁ. sēvā udyōga mukhya anśadātā hai, jisamēṁ śaharī śramaśakti kula śakti kā 90% hai.
haidarābāda kō mōtīyōṁ kā nagara bhī kahā jātā hai. aura sūcanā praudyōgikī mēṁ tō isanē baṅgalaura kō bhī pachāṛa diyā hai. mōti'ōṁ kā bājāra cāra mīnāra kē pāsa sthita hai. mōti'ōṁ sē banē ābhūṣaṇa cārakamāna bāzāra sē yā an'ya mukhya bāzārōṁ sē bhī liyē jā sakatē haiṁ. cām̐dī kē utpāda (bartana va mūrtiyāṁ, ityādi), sāṛiyāṁ, nirmāla ēvaṁ kalamakārī pēṇṭiṅgsa va kalākr̥tiyāṁ, anupama bidarī hastakalā kī vastu'ēṁ, lākha kī ratna jaṛita cūṛiyām̐, rēśamī va sūtī hathakaraghā vastra yahāṁ banatē haiṁ, va inakā vyāpāra sadiyōṁ sē calā ā rahā hai.
āndhra pradēśa kō pūrva haidarābāda rājya sē ka'ī baṛē śikṣaṇa sansthāna, anusandhāna prayōgaśālā'ēṁ, anēkōṁ nijī ēvaṁ sārvajanika sansthāna milē haiṁ. mūla śōdha hētu avasanracanā suvidhā'ēṁ yahāṁ dēśa kī sarvaśrēṣṭha haiṁ, jisakē kāraṇa hī ēka baṛī saṅkhyā mēṁ śikṣita lōga dēśa bhara sē yahāṁ ākara basē hu'ē haiṁ.
haidarābāda auṣadhīya udyōga kā bhī ēka pramukha kēndra hai, jahāṁ ḍŏ0 rēḍḍīza laiba, maiṭriksa laibōrēṭarīza, haiṭarō ḍragsa li0, ḍā'ivisa laibsa, aurōbindō phārmā li0 tathā vimatā laibsa jaisī baṛī kampaniyāṁ sthāpita haiṁ. jīnōma vailī ēvaṁ nainōṭaiknōlŏjī pārka jaisī pariyōjanā'ōṁ dvārā, jaiva praudyōgikī kī atyadhika sanracanā'ēṁ yahāṁ sthāpita hōnē kī bharapūra āśā hai.
haidarābāda mēṁ bhī, bhārata kē ka'ī an'ya śaharōṁ kī hī bhānti, bhū-sampadā vyāpāra (riyala ēsṭēṭa) bhī khūba panapā hai. isakē liyē sūcanā praudyōgikī kō dhan'yavāda hai, jisakē kāraṇa yahāṁ kī pragati kucha hī varṣōṁ mēṁ cahumukhī hō gayī hai. śahara mēṁ ka'ī baṛē śŏpiṅga mŏla bhī banē haiṁ. 
sūcanā praudyōgikī udyōga.
haidarābāda śahara, apanī sūcanā praudyōgikī ēvaṁ ā'ī ṭī ēnēbalḍa sēvā'ēṁ, auṣadhi, manōran̄jana udyōga (philma) kē liyē prasid'dha hai. ka'ī kŏla sēṇṭara, bizanēsa prōsēsa ā'uṭasōrsiṅga (bī pī ō) kampaniyāṁ, jō sūcanā praudyōgikī va an'ya takanīkī sēvā'ōṁ sē sambandhita haiṁ, yahāṁ 1990 kē daśaka mēṁ sthāpita kī gayīṁ, jinhōnnē isē bhārata kkē kŏla sēṇṭara sēṭapa śaharōṁ mēṁ sē ēka banāyā.
ēka upa-śahara bhī basāyā gayā hai- hā'īṭēka siṭī, jahāṁ ka'ī sū.prau, ēvaṁ ā'ī ṭī ī ēsa kampaniyōṁ nē apanē pracālana ārambha kiyē. sūcanā prau. kē isa tvarita vistāra kī kāraṇa kabhī-kabhī isa śahara kō sā'ibarābāda bhi kahā gayā hai. sātha hī isē baṅgalaura kē bāda dvitīya sā'ibara vailī bhī kaha jātā hai. isa śahara mēṁ ḍijiṭala mūlasanracanā mēṁ kāphī nivēśa hu'ā hai. isa nivēśa sē ka'ī baṛī kampaniyōṁ nē apanē parisara bhī basāyē haiṁ. ka'ī bahurāṣṭrīya kampaniyōṁ nē apanē kēndra śahara mēṁ khōlē haiṁ. aisē mukhya kēndra mādhāpura va gācībāvalī mēṁ adhika haiṁ.
haidarābāda viśva kī phŏrcūna 500 kampaniyōṁ kō bhī ākarṣita kara yahāṁ nivēśa karā cukā hai. iṇṭalēkṭa iṅkŏ, kī sēmi'iṇḍiyā mēṁ acchī ḍila hōnē kē bāda sē haidarābāda ēka vaiśvika śahara bana gayā hai. yahīṁ para bhārata kī prathama phaiba siṭī, jisamēṁ silikŏna cipa utpādana suvidhā hō, 3 biliyana ḍŏlara kē ē ēma ḍī-sēmī'iṇḍiyā kŏnasŏrśiyama kē nivēśa sē sthāpita hō rahī hai
bhū sampadā.
yahāṁ kē śaharīkaraṇa, va lōgōṁ kē chōṭē śaharōṁ kō vyavasāya kē liyē chōṛakara yahāṁ basanē sē, yahāṁ kī janasaṅkhyā mēṁ ēka baṛī vr̥d'dhi hu'ī hai. isī kā pariṇāma hai grēṭara haidarābāda, jisamēṁ paṛōsī gām̐va bhī śāmila haiṁ. inakē sātha hī yahāṁ ēka mudrikā mārga, bāharī mudrikā mārga, ka'ī sētu va nīḥśulka-patha bhī haiṁ. isa kāraṇa ka'ī bāharī kṣētra apanī sīmā'ēṁ khōtē jā rahē haiṁ, va bhū sampadā kē bhāva ūn̄cē uṭhatē jā rahē haiṁ. sātha hī yahāṁ anēkōṁ gagana cumbī aṭṭālikā'ēṁ uṭhatīṁ jā rahīṁ haiṁ.
āvāgamana.
saṛaka.
haidarābāda śēṣa bhārata sē rāṣṭrīya rājamārgōṁ dvārā juṛā hu'ā hai. mukhya rājamārga haiṁ:- ēna ēca 7, ēna ē 9 ēvaṁ ēna ēca 202. āndhra pradeśa saṛaka rājya parivana nigama 1932 mēṁ nizāma rājya rēla-saṛaka yātāyāta prabhāga kī ikā'ī kē rūpa mēṁ sthāpita hu'ā thā, jisamēṁ ārambhika 27 basēṁ thīṁ, jō aba baṛhakara 19,000 kā āṅkaṛā pāra kara cukī hai. yahāṁ ēśiyā kā tīsarā sabasē baṛā basōṁ kā bēṛā hai. isamēṁ 72 basa plēṭaphŏrma haiṁ, jahāṁ itanī hī basēṁ ēka hī samaya mēṁ yātriyōṁ kō caṛhā sakatīṁ haiṁ. isakā ādhikārika nāma hai mahatmā gām̐dhī basa sṭēśana, jisē sthānīya lōga imalīvana basa sṭēśana kahatē haiṁ. rājya parivahana nigama pŏ'iṇṭa sē pŏ'iṇṭa basa sēvā pradāna karatā hai, jō sabhī mukhya nagarōṁ kō jōṛatī hai. śahara mēṁ nigama kī 4000 sē adhika basēṁ dauṛatīṁ haiṁ. pīlē raṅga kā ŏṭōrikśā, jisē ŏṭō kahā jātā hai, adhikatara prayukta ṭaisī sēvā hai. hāla hī mēṁ kāra va mōṭarasā'ikila ṭaisī sēvā'ēṁ bhī ārambha hu'īṁ haiṁ. 
rēla sēvā.
yahāṁ lā'iṭa rēla yātāyāta praṇālī hai, jisē malṭī mŏḍala ṭa'ānspōrṭa sisṭama (ēma ēma ṭī ēsa) kahatē haiṁ. yaha rēla va saṛaka yātāyāta kō jōṛatā hai. dakṣiṇa paścima rēlavē kā mukhyālaya sikandarābāda mēṁ sthita hai. tīna mukhya rēlavē sṭēśana haiṁ:- sikandarābāda rēlavē sṭēśana, haidarābāda rēlavē sṭēśana (yā nāmapallī) aura kāciguḍā rēlavē sṭēśana. 
vāyu sēvā.
bēgamapēṭa havā'ī aḍḍā antardēśīya va antarrājīya vimāna sēvā dētā hai. ēka nayā vimānakṣētra śamsābāda mēṁ bana cukā hai. pahalē sabhī baṛē śaharōṁ kī bhānti yahāṁ vayu yātāyāta saṅkulana samasyā hōtī thī, parantu nayā havā'ī aḍḍā bana jānē sē vaha dūra hō cukī hai. 
yahāṁ ṭraiphika saṅkulana kī samasyā saṛakōṁ para bahuta dikhāyī dētī hai. yaha ŏṭō, kāra, ityādi kī atyadhika saṅkhyā kē kāraṇa hōtī hai. isasē nibaṭānē kē liyē anēkōṁ sētu, phlā'ī'ōvara nirmāṇa hu'ē, parantu yaha vaisī kī vaisī banī hu'ī hai. 
āndhra pradēśa sarakāra nē isasē nibaṭanē kē liyē dillī va kōlakātā kī bhānti hī yahāṁ bhī maiṭrō ṭrēna śuru karanē kī man̄jūrī dē dī hai. isakē pūrṇa hō jānē para āśā hai, ki yaha samasyā kāphī hada taka sulajha jāyē gī.
janasāṅkhyakī.
2006 mēṁ nagara kī janasaṅkhyā 36 lākha ākalita kī gayī thī jabaki br̥hattara mahānagarīya kṣētra kī janasaṅkhyā 61 lākha sē adhika ākalita kī gayī hai. dhārmika tathā sānskr̥tika rūpa sē yaha śahara hindū, muslima va īsā'iyōṁ sē juṛā hu'ā hai. yahām̐ bōlī jānē vālī mukhya bhāṣā'ēm̐ haiṁ- tēlugu, hindī, urdū va dakkanī. yahām̐ janajātīya mūla kē lōgōṁ kī bhī khāsī janasaṅkhyā hai, jō ki kāma kī talāśa mēṁ yahām̐ āvrajita hu'ē haiṁ. yahām̐ banajārē bhī milatē haiṁ, jō apanī ēka bhinna sanskr̥ti va bhāṣā vālē haiṁ. unakī bhāṣā kō Gorboli kahā jātā hai, jō yūrōpa mēṁ rōmā lōgōṁ dvārā bōlī jānē vālī rōmā bhāṣā sē nikaṭa sambandha rakhatī hai. tēlugu, hindī va dakkanī mūla janasaṅkhyā kī sthānīya bhāṣā'ēm̐ haiṁ. vyāpāra mēṁ paryāpta mātrā mēṁ aṅgrēzī bhī bōlī jātī hai. bhārata kē vibhinna bhāgōṁ kē lōgōṁ nē haidarābāda kō apanā gr̥hanagara banāyā hai.
sanskr̥ti.
haidarābāda anēka vibhinna sanskr̥tiyōṁ va paramparā'ōṁ kā milana-sthala hai. aitihāsika rūpa sē yaha vaha śahara rahā hai, jahām̐ uttara va dakṣiṇa bhārata kī bhinna
sānskr̥tika va bhāṣika paramparā'ēm̐ miśrita hōtī haiṁ. ataḥ yaha dakṣiṇa kā dvāra yā uttara kā dvāra kahā jātā hai. yahām̐ dakṣiṇa bhāratīya sanskr̥ti kē bīca haidarābāda kī muslima sanskr̥ti bhī antarviṣṭa hai.
yaha ēka anupama viśvabandhu nagara (kŏsmōpŏliṭana) hai, jahām̐ īsā'iyata, hindū dharma, islāma, jainadharma va jarathuṣṭra dharma kō mānanē vālē lōga rahatē haiṁ. haidarābādiyōṁ nē apanī khuda kī ēka bhinna sanskr̥ti vikasita kara lī hai, jisamēṁ prācīna tēlugu lōgōṁ kī hindū paramparā'ōṁ tathā sadiyōṁ purānī islāmī paramparā'ōṁ kā miśraṇa hai.
tēlugu, urdū va hindī yahām̐ kī pramukha bhāṣā'ēm̐ haiṁ (yadyapi bāda kī dō apanē mānaka svarūpa mēṁ nahīṁ pāyī jātīṁ aura dakkanī bōlī kī ōra agrasara rahatī haiṁ). yahām̐ bōlī jānē vālī tēlugu bhāṣā mēṁ anēka urdū śabda bhī mila sakatē haiṁ. tathā yahām̐ bōlī jānē vālī urdū bhī marāṭhī va tēlugu sē prabhāvita hai, jisasē ēka bōlī banī hai jisē haidarābādī urdū yā dakkanī kahā jātā hai. yahām̐ kā prasid'dha usmāniyā viśvavidyālaya bhārata kā pahalā urdū mādhyama viśvavidyālaya hai. yahām̐ kī ēka baṛī janasaṅkhyā aṅgrējī bōlanē mēṁ bhī kuśala hai.
haidarābāda kī lagabhaga sabhī sanskr̥tiyōṁ kī mahilā'ēm̐ yā tō paramparāgata bhāratīya paridhāna sāṛī pahanatī haiṁ, yā salavāra kamīza (viśēṣakara yuvatara janasaṅkhyā). muslima mahilā'ōṁ kā ēka baṛā bhāga burakā yā hijāba pahanatā hai. puruṣa prāyaḥ āja kā suvidhā kā paridhāna paiṇṭa-śarṭa pahanatē haiṁ, parantu luṅgī va śarṭa, dhōtī kurtā (dōnōṁ hindū) tathā kurtā pājāmā (prāyaḥ muslima) bhī bahuta pahanā jātā hai.
haidarābādī vyan̄jana mēṁ paramparāgata āndhra aura tēlaṅgānā vyan̄jana para vyāpaka islāmī prabhāva hai. haidarābādī vyan̄janōṁ kē yahāṁ ka'ī rēstrāṁ haiṁ. śahara kē sabhī hōṭalōṁ mēṁ ēka yā isasē jyādā rēstrāṁ haiṁ jō lōkapriya hai. bāvarcī, pārāḍā'iḍa, haidarābāda hā'usa haidarābādī vyan̄janōṁ kō upalabdha karānē vālē kucha maśahūra rēstrāṁ haiṁ.
haidarābāda kā sabasē pramukha vyan̄jana haidarābāda birayānī hai. an'ya vyan̄janōṁ mēṁ khubānī kā miṭhā, phēnī, pāyā aura halīma (ramajāna kē mahīnē kā pramukha mānsāhārī vyan̄jana). 
bhāratīya miṭhā'ī kī dukānēṁ ghī kī miṭhā'iyōṁ kē li'ē maśahūra haiṁ. pullā rēḍḍī miṭhā'iyāṁ śud'dha ghī kī miṭhā'iyōṁ kē li'ē prasid'dha hai. nāmapallī kā karācī bēkarī phala biskuṭōṁ, ōsmāniyā biskuṭa aura dilakhuśa kē li'ē maśahūra haiṁ. purānē śahara kē ajīja bāga pailēsa mēṁ rahanē vālā parivāra bādāma kī jailī banātā hai. 
The more popular Hyderabadi restaurants in the Twin Cities are the Madina, Bawarchi, Cafe Bahar and the Golden Persis at Paradise Corner in Secunderabad. Other restaurant chains in the city include The Taj Mahal, Kamat Hotel, and Hyderabad House. 
Also widely found on the corners of every street are the cafes which offer 'Irani chai' and 'Osmania biscuit' where one can see people sitting leisurely over a cup of 'chai' and talking for hours. The waiters do not write down the order but have a remarkable memory of making the exact bill even after hours.
Hyderabad is also a major centre for art, and some leading painters have been associated with Hyderabad - M. F. Husain, Vaikutam, K V Sridhar (Pops), Laxma Goud and Jagdish Mittal (renowned collector of Indian modern art).
sinēmā.
haidarābāda bhārata kē dūsarē sabasē baṛē calacitra udyōga kā gr̥ha bhī hai:- tēlugu sinēmā. yahāṁ prativarṣa saiṅkaḍa'ōṁ philmēṁ banāyīṁ jātīṁ haiṁ.

1953 ke election (Fiji):
1953 ke election me A. D. Patel fir se haar gais rahaa.
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
1943 ke harrtaal se kuch faeda nai hoe se, aur Patel ke aapan waada ke nai nibhae ke kaaran, Maha Sangh, kamjor hoe laga aur Kisan Sangh se tagat barrhe laga. Ii election me Kisan Sangh ke General Secretary, Ayodhya Prasad, jon ki 1937 se 1950 tak piche se candidate ke endorse karat rahaa, apne se election larris aur Patel ke sahaj se harae diis.
Election ke result rahaa:
Southern Indian Constituency.
Ii constitency se Vishnu Deo jiit gais.
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me James Madhavan jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, governor K. S. Reddy aur A. Samad ke nominated member banawa gais.

1956 ke election (Fiji):
1956 ke election.
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
1953 ke election haare ke baad, A .D. Patel, politics ke chhorr ke aapan wakiil ke business aur Sangam me aapan dhyan de laga. Ii election me ek record paanch candidates rahin, jisme se chaar pahle Coincil ke member rahin aur Ayodhya Prasad fir se easy se jiit gais.
Election ke result rahaa:
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me James Madhavan jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, Fiji ke governor Andrew Deoki aur A. R. Manu ke nominated member banawa gais.

1959 ke election (Fiji):
1959 ke election.
Election ke result.
North Western Indian Constituency.
1944 ke election ke baad B. D. Lakshman, labour union me aapan dhyan de lagaa. Uu Chini majduur sangh ke organise karis, Ami Chandra ke mare ke baad, Fiji me sab union ke umbrella organisation, Fiji Industrial Workers Congress, ke President banaa aur 1958 me Lautoka Town Council ke ek member banaa. Jab ki Maha Sangh ke aapan koi candidate nai rahaa aur Kisan Sangh me fir split hoe gais rahaa, tab Lakshman 19 saal baad fir se Legislative Council khatir election jiitis.
Southern Indian Constituency.
Ii election me Vishnu Deo ke Odin Ramrakha se achchaa competition mila.
Eastern Indian Constitency.
Ii election me James Madhavan jiitis
Nominated Sadasya.
Election ke baad, governor Sathi Narain aur A. H. Sahu Khan ke nominated member banawa gais.

Mechi:
Mechi Nepal ka ek anchal hai. ye anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Purvanchal vikash kshetra me padta hai. Mechi anchal Nepal ke purvi simana me avasthit hai. Ii anchal ka name Mechi nadi ke name se rakha gaya hae. Mechi anchalko 4 jilon men bibhajit kiya gaya hai.

Karnali:
Karnali Nepal ka ek anchal hai. Ye anchal ka nam Nepal ki sabse lambi nadi Karnali nadi ke name se rakha gaya hai. Karnali anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Madhya pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke pashchim me avasthit hai. Karnali anchalko 5 jilon men bibhajit kiya hua hai.

Bagmati:
Bagmati Nepal ka ek anchal hai ye anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetron me se Madhymanchal vikash kshetra me padta hai. Nepal ki prasidh nadi Bagmati nadi ke name se ies anchalka name Bagmati anchal rakha gaya hai. Nepalki rajdhani Kathmandu ishi anchal ka ek jila hai. Bagmati anchal ko 8 jilon me bibhajit kiya hua hai.

Rapti:
Rapti Nepal ka ek anchal ka name hai. Nepal pashchim ki nadi Rapti nadi ke name se is anchal ka name Rapti anchal rakha gaya hai. Rapti anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetron me se Madhy pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai. Rapti anchalko 5 jilon men bibhajan kiy gaya hai.

Bheri:
Bheri Nepal ke 14 anchalon men ek anchal hai. Bheri anchal Nepal ke Madhhy pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai. Bheri anchal ka name Bheri nadi ke name se rakha gaya hai. Bheri anchal men 5 jile hain.

Seti:
Seti Nepal ke 14 anchalon men se ek anchalka name hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetron men se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai. Pashchim Nepal ki Seti nadi ke name se iis anchal ka name Seti anchal rakha huaa hai. Seti anchal ko 5 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hai.

Mahakali:
Mahakali Nepal ka ek anchal hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke pashchim simana par avasthit hai. Nepal or Bharat ke simana par bahane wali Mahakali nadi ke name se is anchalka name Mahakali anchal rakha gaya hai. Mahakali nadi ko Kali nadi evam Sharda nadi bhi kaha jata hai. Mahakali anchal Nepal ke 5 vikash kshetron me se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai. Mahakali anchalko 4 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hai.
Mahakali anchal ke Raja. kumaon ke Raja Mahendra Chand hai. unka byah Rina ki Rani Gita Chand ke sang hua hai.

Koshi:
Koshi Nepal ka 14 anchalon men ek anchalka name hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetron men se Purvanchal vikash kshetra men padta hai.Nepal ki sabse badi nadi Koshi nadi ke name se ii anchalka name Koshi anchal rakha gaya hai. Koshi anchal ko 6 jilon me bibhajan kiya gaya hai.

Sagarmatha:
Sagarmatha Nepal ke 14 anchalon men se ek anchal ka name hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke Purvanchal vikash kshetra men padta hai. Duniya ke sab se unchi choti Mount Everest ka Nepali name Sagarmatha hai. Sagarmatha anchal ka name ii Sagarmatha himal ke name se Sagarmatha rakha gaya hai. Sagarmatha anchal ko 6 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hai.

Janakpur:
Janakpur Nepal ka ek anchal ka name hai. Ye anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Madhyamanchal vikas kshetra ke antargat padta hai. Ramayan ki patra Sita ke pita Raja Janak ki rajdhani Janakpur dham men thi. Raja Jana ke rajya ko Mithila bhi kaha jata hai. Janakpur anchal ka name ii Jankpur dham ke name se rakha gaya hai. Janakpur anchalko 6 jilon men bijit kiya gaya hai.

Narayani:
Narayani Nepal ke 14 anchalon me se ek anchal ka name hae. Ye anchal Nepal ke Madhyamanchal vikash khetra me padta hae. Nepal ki prasiddh nadi Narayni nadi ke name se ii anchal ka name Narayani anchal rakha gaya hai. Narayani anchalko 5 jilon me bibhajit kiya gaya hae.

Gandaki:
Gandaki Nepal ke 14 anchalon me se ek anchal ka naam hae. Ye anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetron men se Pashchimanchal vikas khetra men parta hae. Nepal ki prasiddh nadi Gandaki nadi ke name se ii anchal ka name Gandaki anchal rakha gaya hae. Gandaki anchal ko 6 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hae.

Dhaualagiri:
Dhaulagiri Nepal ke 14 anchalon me se ek anchal ka name hai. Ye anchal Nepal ka Pashchimanchal vikas kshetra ke antargat parta hae. Ii anchal ka name Nepal ka prasiddh himal Dhaulagiri parvat ke name se rakha gawa hae. Dhaulagiri anchal ko 4 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hae.

Fiji ke Senate:
Fiji ke Senate ke 1970 ke consttution ke niche banawa gais rahaa. Ii Senate me 22 member rahin. 1990 aur 1997 ke constitution ke niche bhi Senate rahaa. Senate ke sab member ke chaahe Council of Chiefs, nai to Prime Minister nai to Leader of the Opposition nominate karat rahaa.
Pahila Senate (1970 - 1987).
Fiji ke ajaadi ke baad, nawaa constitution ke niche ek Senate banawa gais. Ike banae me uu time ke Leader of the Opposition, S. M. Koya, ke bhaari haanth rahaa. Ii Senate me 22 member rahin, jisme se 8 ke Council of Chiefs, 7 ke Prime Minister, 6 ke Leader of the Opposition aur ek ke Council of Rotuma nominate karis rahaa.Senate ke lage kuchh khaas taagat rahaa, jisme Fiji ke constitution badle ke khatir aur jamin waala kaanun badle ke khati uske 75% member ke vote aur aath me se chhe Council of Chiefs ke nominees ke vote ke jarurat rahaa. Senator logan chhe saal talak serve karat rahin aur aadha Senate har tiin saal retire howat rahaa. Pahila Senate me Great Council of Chiefske aadha nominees, Prime Minister ke tiin nominees, Leader of the Opposition ke tiin nomines aur Rotuman Senator, khaali tiin saal khatir nominae karaa gais rahaa. Senate ek permanent body hae, jiske kabhi nai disolve karaa jaawe hae.
Senate ke pahila baithak 26 November 1970 ke 10:00 a.m. ke bhaes rahaa. Isme Senator Robert L. Munro ke pardhan aur Senator Ratu Livai Volavola ke Up-pardhan chuna gais.
Ii Senate ke Hindustani member rahin:
Tiisra Senate (1999 -2006).
1997 ke Constitution ke niche Senate me 32 members rahaa

Lumbini:
Lumbini Nepal ka ek anchal ka name hae. Ye anchal Nepal ke Pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men parata hae. Ii anchal ka name bhagwan Buddha ke janamsthan Lumbini ke nam se rakha gaya hae. Lumbini anchal ko 6 jilon men bibhajan kiya gaya hae.

Fiji ke House of Representatives ke Hindustani member:

Ganeshwar Chand:
Dr. Ganeshwar Chand, jiske jaada kar ke Ganesh Chand ke naam se jaana jaawe hae, Fiji ke ek Hindustani sikchhak aur pahile ke ek politician hae. Uske haanth University of Fiji ke suruu kare me rahaa aur abhi uu Fiji Institute of Applied Studieske trustee hae aur ke sapaadak hae(source).
1999 se 2006 talak, Fiji ke House of Representatives me Lautoka City Indian Communal Constituency ke Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke taraf se represent karis. Uu 1999 aur 2001 e lection jtis rahaa. 1999 se 2000 talak uu Mahendra Chaudhry ke sarkar me Minister for Local Government, State Planning, and Housing rahaa.
19 May 2000 me uu People's Coalition Government sarkar ke 43 member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight hostage banae diis rahaa aur 56 din ke baad 13 July 2000 ke uske chhoraa gais rahaa.
25 September 2007 ke Dr Chand ke Fiji Institute of Technology (FIT) ke director banawa gais.
1 January 2010 ke uu Fiji National University ke Vice Chancellor banaa. 

I. P. Bajpai:
Ishwari Prasad Bajpai, Fiji ke ek businessman aur politician rahaa. Uske palwaar Tavua me aapan business suru kar ke Suva talak failae liis rahaa. 1977 ke election me uu North Eastern Indian National Constituency, jon ki Rakiraki aur Tavua ke ilaka ke cover kar hae, se Alliance Party ke ticket pe chuna gais rahaa. Iske baad uske Alliance sarkar me Minister of State for Co-operatives banawa gais.

South Central Indian National Constituency (Fiji) 1972 - 1987:
South Central Indian National Constituency, Fiji ke House of Representatives ke ek National Constituency 1972 se 1987 talak rahaa. Indian national constituency me khaali Hindustani logan kharraa hoe sakat rahin lekin koi jaat le jan vote kare sakat rahaa. Ii House of Representatives ke 52 Constituency em se ek rahaa, 22 Indian Constituencies me se ek rahaa, 25 National Constituenc me se ek rahaa aur 10 Indian National Constituency me se ek rahaa. Ii constituency Suva ke west se Serua talak aur Kadavu ke cover karat rahaa. Ii ek safe Alliance seat rahaa kaahe ki hian pe jaada Kaiviti logan rahat rahin.

North Central Indian National Constituency (Fiji) 1972 - 1987:
North Central Indian National Constituency , uu 22 seat me se ek rahaa jiske 1970 ke Constitution ke niche Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke dewa gais rahaa. Ii 25 National constituency me se ek aur 10 Indian national constituency me se ek rahaa, jisme khaali Hindustani logan kharraa hoe sakat rahaa lekin sab jaati ke lok vote kare sakat rahaa. Ii constituency puura Ba district ke bhittar rahaa. Ii national constituency me aur sab constituency ke milaan me sab se jaada Hindustani logan rahin, lekin hian hian pe Indian Alliance ke (aur Kisan Sangh) ke kaafi supoprt ke kaaran ii ek maginal constituency rahaa.

Alliance Party (Fiji):
Alliance Party, Fiji ke ek political party hae jon ki Fiji me 1966 se 1987 talak raj karis hae.
Suruwaat.
Alliance Party 1966 me banaa rahaa. Iske banae me Governor, Sir Derek Jakeway ke khaas haanth rahaa.

1972 ke election (Fiji):
1972 ke election , ajaad Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir pahila elction rahaa. Ii election 15 April se lae ke 29 April talak bhais rahaa. Ii 52 member waala house me se 22 seat Hindustani logan khatir reserved rahaa. Ii election ke khaas dui political party Alliance Party aur National Federation Party rahaa.
Ii elction me Alliance Party ke 33 aur National Federation Party ke 19 seat mila. Puura vote me se Alliance ke 57.5% ke vote aur NFP ke 35.9% ke vote mila, lekin Hindustani vote me se NFP ke 74% vote mila.

March - April 1977 ke election (Fiji):
March - April 1977 ke election, Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir, 19 March se lae ke 2 April talak bhais rahaa. Ii election se pahile National Federation Party me Agricultural Lands and Tenants Ordinace ke pichchhe matbhed rahaa, lekin election ke khatir sab ek saathe hoe gais rahaa. Election ke natija rahaa:
Governor General, Alliance ke Ratu Maa ke ek minority sarkar banae ke batais aur ii sarkar 1 July ke dissolve kar dewa gais jab ii ek vote of confidence ke haar gais.

September 1977 ke election (Fiji):
September 1977 ke election , Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir 17 September se lae ke 24 September talak bhais rahaa. Iske hoe ke kaaan rahaa ki Alliance Party ke minority sarkar ek vote of confidence ke haar gais rahaa. Ii time National Federation Party (NFP), dui gut me vibhajit hoe gais rahaa, jiske Dove faction, jiske leader S. M. Koya rahaa, aur Flower faction, jiske leader Jai Ram Reddy, K. C. Ramrakha aur Irene Jai Narayan rahin. Election ke natija rahaa:
29 September ke Ratu Mara nawaa sarkar banais

Kuar Battan Singh:
Kuar Battan Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani businessman aur politician rahaa. 1972 me uske Fiji ke Senate me Leader of the Opposition, S. M. Koya nominate karis rahaa aur uu 1982 talak Senator rahaa. 1982 ke election ke time uu Alliance Party ke join kar liis rahaa.
Uu aapan jawani ke time soccer khelis rahaa aur1955 Interdistrict soccer tournament me Rewa team ke jitae ke khaas haanth diis rahaa. Uu Fiji Sikh Fotball Association ke pahila President bhi rahaa.
Uske maut ek plane ke gir jaae ke kaaran July 1999 me bhais rahaa.

National Federation Party – Dove faction (Fiji):
National Federation Party – Dove faction, National Federation Party ke uu gut ke naam rahaa jiske leader S. M. Koya rahaa, aur jon ALTO bill ke virod karis rahaa. Iske Dove faction ii kaaran se bola jaawat rahaa kaahe ki iske election ke chinh ek dove rahaa. September 1977 ke election me ii faction khaali tiin seat jiitis aur iske leader S. M. Koya aapan seat ke haar gais rahaa. Tiin jiite waala candisate ke namm rahaa:
Kuchh losing Dove candidate rahin: Sidiq Koya, Ram Jati Singh, Ujagar Singh, Surendra Prasad, Sharda Nand, C.A. Shah, Apisai Tora, C.S. Pillay, aur Edmund March.

National Federation Party – Flower faction (Fiji):
National Federation Party – Flower faction, National Federation Party ke uu gut ke naam rahaa jiske leader Jai Ram Reddy, Irene Jai Narayan aur K. C. Ramrakha rahin, aur jon ALTO bill ke suport karis rahaa. Iske Flower faction ii kaaran se bola jaawat rahaa kaahe ki iske election ke chinh ek fuul rahaa. September 1977 ke election me ii faction 12 seat jiitis aur iske baad Jai Ram Reddy ke iske leader aur Leader of the Opposition banae dewa gais rahaa. 12 jiite waala candidate ke namm hae:
Kuchh haare waala candidate rahin:
Election ke baad Ramrakha Toganivalu ke leader banae ke kosis karis lekin safal nai rahaa. Iske baad Ramrakha Flower faction se alag hoe ke ek independent member ban ke 1982 talak House of Representatives me rahaa. Taganivalu kuchh din ke baad mar gais aur uske seat ke Koresi Matatolu, Flower faction khatir jiit gais.

Paulinia:
Paulinia (Portuguese: Paulínia), Brazil ke São Paulo ke city hai.
Iske area 139 km² aur population 84.544 log hai.
Duusra websites.
[http://pt.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Paul%C3%ADnia&redirect=no](Paulinia wikipedia(in Portuguese);many images!)

Yangon:
yāṅgūna Myanmar dēśa kī purānā rājadhānī hai. isakā purānā nāma raṅgūna thā.

Subramani Basawaiya:
Subramani Basawaiya, Fiji ke Senate aur House of Representatives ke member rahaa. Uske 1980 se 1982 talak, Leader of the Opposition, Jai Ram Reddy, Senate me nominate karis rahaa. 1982 ke election me uu SavuSavu/Macuata East Indian Communal Constituency se National Federation Party ke ticket pe chuna gais rahaa. 1987 ke election me uu NFP-WUF Splinter Group ke bagal se Vanua Levu North and West Indian National Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin haar gais.

Prabhudas Kalyanji Bhindi:
Prabhudas Kalyanji Bhindi, Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member aur Assistant Minister of Finance rahaa. 1972 ke election me uu South Cental Suva West Consituency se Alliance ke icket pe chuna gais rahaa. Uu House of Representatives me 1982 talak rahaa aur 1977 talak Assistant Minister of Finance rahaa. Uu Suva City Council ke member bhi rahaa.

Pul:
Ek pul ek rakam ke structure hae jisse ek open space nai to gap ke paar karaa jaawe sake hae. Ek pul naddi, valley nai to fissur ke paar kare me achchhaa kaam me aawe hae.

Ho Chi Minh City:
Ho Chi Minh City (Vietnamese bhasa: Quốc Ngữ Thành phố Hồ Chí Minhi), Vietnam ke largest city hae. Ii city me lagbhag 7,183,800 (2009) log rahe hae.

African Union ke member ke suchi:
African Union ke member uu des ke bola jaawe hae jon ki uu 53 des me se hae jon ki Organisation of African Unity (OAU) ke member hae. OAU, 25 May 1963 me suruu bhais rahaa. Suruu me isme 36 member rahaa.
Afican Union ke puura abaadi 895,800,000 hae.

Executive Council (Fiji):
Fiji ke Ececutive Council ke 1874 me pahila Governor, Sir Hercules Robinson banais rahaa. Iske President Goveror rahaa aur chhe aur jan, jon ki sarkari dpatment ke head rahin, iske member rahin. 1912 se goraa elected member me se dui ke bhi Executie Council me chuna jaae lagaa. Pahila Kaiviti(tu Sukuna) ke 1943 me nominae karaa gais aur pahila Hindustani ke 1946 me.
Hindustai member ke suchi:

1452:
1452 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki sanichar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1519:
1519 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ki sanichar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Mohammed Azam Khalil:
Mohammed Azam Khalil, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 
1987 ke election.
1987 ke election me uu Alliance Party ke taraf se Sigatoka Indian Communal Constituency me kharraa bhais rahaa, jisme uu bahut khraab se haar gais rahaa. Election ke natija rahaa:
1994 ke election.
Uu 1994 se 1999 talak House of Representatives me National Federation Party ke taraf se Cuvu/Malomalo South/Sigatoka Urban Indian Constituency se chuna gais rahaa.
Advisory Councillor.
Uu Sigatoka District Advisory Council ke member rahaa. Uu Fiji ke ek secular state rahe ke khatir lobby karis au Rabuka ke sughao ki Fiji ke log ke Fijian bola jaae ke support karis. 
1999 ke election.
1999 ke election me uu NFP ke bagal se Nadroga Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin FLP ke Lekh Ram Vaeshnoi se haar gais 
Election ke result rahaa:
Sugar Cane Growers Council ke member.
2001 ke Sugar Cane Growers Council election me uu National Federation Party's Fiji Cane Growers Association ke bagal se Cuvu Sector ke khatir kharraa bhais lekin khaali 9 vote se haar gais.
Baad me Qarase sarkar uske Council ke 8 nominated member me se ek ke banais.
Uu Maro, Nadroga ke rahaa aur uske maut September 2006 me bhais rahaa.

Winx Club:
Winx Club (Contemporary Fantasy) ek cartoon character Italy aur Singapore mein nidarshit hua. Iginio Straffi ne is charitra banaya. Isme se Bloom, Flora, Layla (Italy mein "Aisha"), Musa, Stella aur Tecna ke charitra hai. Bure Log jaise Icy, Darcy, Stormy, Lord Darkar, Valtor, Ogron, Gantlos, Duman aur Anagan aur Specialists jaise Sky, Helia, Nabu (Angrezi aur Hindi mein "Nebyu"), Riven, Brandon aur Timmy ke charitra bhi hai.Isme se bhi ek nai pari ya ladki aai jiski shakti Jaanvar hai uska naam Roxy hai.Winx ke jadui shakti "Magic Winx", "Charmix", "Enchantix", "Fairy Dust", "Believix", "Speedix", "Zoomix", "Tracix", "Sofix" aur "Lovix" kehlata hai.Icy, Darcy aur Stormy ko "The Trix" aur Ogron, Gantlos, Duman aur Anagan ko "The Fairy Hunters" kehlata hai.
Awaaz Ke Chitrakare.
Italian.
Italy mein, Winx Club Season 4 Rai Due mein aata hai.
Rai Angrezi.
Singapore mein Winx Club Season 4 mein aata hai
Hindi(India Mein)(Season 4).
India mein, Winx Club Season 4 Cartoon Network mein aata hai.

R. S. Gounder:
Ram Sami Goundar, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa.
1972 ke election me uu National Federation Party (NFP) ke ticket se Tavua/Veileka Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais. 1977 ke pahila election uu fir se ii sea ke jiitis aur 1977 ke duusra election me uu Dove Faction ke bagal se ii seat ke jiitis. 1982 ke election me uu ke unified NFP me fir se ii seat jiitis.

The Hague:
The Hague, Amsterdam aur Rotterdam ke baad, the Netherlands ke sab se barraa city hae. Iske abaadi (population) 472,087 (1 January 2005) (700,000 in the greater metropolitan area) hae aur iske area lagbhag 100 km² hae. Ii des ke west me South Holland province me hae
Jab ke Amsterdam, Netherlands ke capital hae, des ke parliament The Hague me baithe hae. Sab des ke embassy, Supreme Court aur dher sarkari data bhi ii ciy me hae. Netherlands ke Queen Beatrix bhi hian pe rahe aur kaam kare hae.

C. S. Pillay:
C. S. Pillay, Fiji ke Legislative Council ke memebr rahaa. Uu A. D. Patel ke maut ke baad, National Federation Party ke ticket pe South-West Viti Levu Indian Communal Constituency se chuna gais rahaa.

S. N. Kanhai:
Shiu Narayan Kanhai, Fiji ke ek unionist aur politician rahaa. Uu ek teacher rahaa aur bahut din talak Fiji Teachers Union (FTU) ke aapan yogdaan diis rahaa. Uu FTU ke General Secretary aur President bhi rahaa. 1977 ke pahila election me uu National Federation Party ke ticket se South Eastern Indian National Constituency se kharra bhais aur sab ke suprise kar ke ii seat ke jiit liis. Uske ii seat jiite ke khaas kaaran ii rahaa ki Kaiviti vote ke Fijian Nationalist Party split kar diis rahaa. Vote ke result rahaa: 
1977 e duusra election me uu Dove Faction ke bagal se -Nasinu Vunidawa Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa aur iske jiit liis rahaa.
Uske 1982 ke election ke khatir NFP ke ticket mila rahaa lekin election se pahile, March be uske maut hoe gais.

S. Nand:
Sharda Nand, Fiji ke ek businessman aur politician rahaa.
Uu bahut din talak Government me kaam karis, khaas kar ke Cooporative Department me. Uske Fiji me flour mill suruu kare me khaas haanth rahaa.
Uu Kaiviti bhasa, aur Nadroga ke dialect me achchhaa se baat ka lewat rahaa. 
1982 se 1987 talak, Nand Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member rahaa, jahaan pe uu Nausori/Levuka Indian Communal Constituency ke reprsent karat rahaa.
1987 ke election me uu ek S. M. Koya ke support are waala splinter group suruu karis jon ki uu saal ke election me WUF ke saathe coalition form kar ke elction laris rahaa.
December 1994, prime-minister Rabuka raised afresh the possibility of a ‘common name’ for all citizens when he divulged his commitment to calling all people of Fiji, ‘Fijians’ with ‘Taukei’ being the name reserved for indigenous Fijians. Sharda Nand iske suport karis rahaa. 

NFP - WUF Coalition (1987):
NFP - WUF Coalition ke 1987 ke election ke larre ke khatir banawa gais rahaa. Isme jaada haanth Shardha Nand ke rahaa aur duusra NFP ke supporters jiske ii election ke khatir NFP - Labour Coalition se ticket nai mila rahaa. Ii sab log jaada kar ke S. M. Koya ke samrthak rahin. Duusra coalition partner raraa Western United Front(WUF) jon ki 1987 se NFP ke saathe Coalition me rahaa lekin jiske taagat kamtii hoe lagaa rahaa. 
NFP ke splinter froup Hindustani log ke cause ke champion karat rahaa aur ii nai maangat rahaa ki ko Kaiviti (Timoci Bavadra) Hindustani logan ke leader bane. Ii logan ek alag Ministry for Indian Affairs ke maang karin, 99-year leases Crown lands pe, aur civil service ke kaam ke jaati ke aadhar pe d ke bhi maang karin, jsime , 42 per cent each for the Fijians and the Indians and the remaining 16 per cent for general electors khatir. 

Beniram Rambissesar:
Ben Rambisheswar, Fiji ke ek businessman aur politician rahaa. Uu Alliance Party aur Ratu Mara ke supporter rahaa. Uu Nausori ke mayor rahaa. 1972 ke election me uu Nausori/Levuka Indian Communal Consituency se hara bhais rahaa lekin haar gais rahaa. 1979 me Prime Minister uske ek Senator banais rahaa. 1982 ke election me uu South Eastern Indian National Constituency ke jiit ke House of Repesentatives ke member banaa.

K. N. Rao:
Krishna Narsingha Rao, Fiji ke ek sichhak aur politician rahaa. Uu Swami Vivekananda College ke ek teacher 1950s me rahaa. Bahut din talak u school me parrhae ke baad 1977 me Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 1977 ke duusra election me uu National Federation Party ke Flower Faction ke bagal se Ba Indian Communal Constituency se jiitis rahaa.

Davendra Singh:
Davendra Singh (janam: 1950), Fiji ke ek Hindustani chhota businessman aur politician rahaa, jon ii kaaran se famous bhais ki uu Lautoka Indian Communal Constituency ke khatir, March 1985 ke by-election me official National Federation Party (NFP) ke candidate ke harae diis.
Lautoka Indian Communal Constituency uu tie khaali bhais jab April 1984 me NFP ke neta, Jai Ram Reddy, resign kar diis. Jab NFP ke nawaa neta, S. M. Koya, aapan ek supporter Ba ke, Dr Balwant Singh Rakkha ke ii seat ke by0election ke khatir nominate karis, tab Davendra Singh, jiske bahut kamti logan jaanat rahin, mauka dhek ke NFP Youth Wing, ke support le ke Rakkha ke virod me kharraa hoe gais. Singh ke khaas campaign platfoem ii rahaa ki Lautoka me huan ke ek local admii ke kharraa hoe ke chaahi. Uske purana Flower faction support karis aur Singh ii bhi batais ke Reddy uske support kare hae, lekin Reddy khule se campaign me hissa nai liis. Campaign ke time, Koya ii batais ki agar Rakkha nai jiiti tab uu leader ke position se resign hoe jaae. Election ke natija Singh ke khatir kuch vote se jiit rahaa. Singh ke 2209 vote mila aur Rakkha ke 2196, jiske matlab ii rahaa ki 12,260 register bhae voters me se khaali 4,421 vote karin rahaa. Koya vote counting ke supreme court me challenge karis lekin Court result ke confirm kar diis. Koya ii time nai resign karis. Election ke baad, Singh Lautoka ke Gujarati Samaj ke uske upport ke khatir dhanyawaad diis.
Election ke baad Koya ke virod me, NFp ke bhittar awaaj aur barrhaa aur 1987 ke election se pahile uske resign kare ke parraa. 
KUchh din talak House of Representatives me Singh as independent member ban ke rahaa. September 1985 me uu NFP Youth Wing ke nawaa Fiji Labour arty se jorre ke kosis karis lekin iske refuse kar dewa gais. July 1986 me uu FLP ke member banaa aur 1987 election me FLP ke bagal se North Western INdian National seat. 1987 ke cop ke baad uu bhi uu parliamentarins me se rahaa jiske hostage le lewa gais rahaa. 
Uu abhi Auckland, New Zealand me rahe hai.
Singh ke pitaji, Ram Charan Singh ke khaas haanth 1937 me Kisan Sangh ke suruu kare me rahaa, lekin uu baad me Sangh ke chhorr ke 1944 me A. D. Patel ke jitae me madat karis rahaa.

Sarvan Singh:
Sarvan Singh, Fiji ke ek wakiil aur politician rahaa. 1970 se 1976 talak uske Fiji ke Senate me Leader of the Opposition nominate karis rahaa.

Shiu Charan:
Shiu Charan, Fiji ke ek teacher, union ke neta aur politician rahaa. Uu bahut din talak Fiji Teachers Union ke executive me aapan yogdaan diis. 1992 se 1999 talak uu Fiji ke House of Representaties ke member rahaa jisme uu Lami/Naitasiri South/Kadavu Indian Constituency ke National Federation Party ke khatir represent karat rahaa.
You NFP ke General secretary bhi rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Magodro Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin FLP se haar gais.

Gaj Raj Singh Chaudhry:
Gaj Raj Singh Chaudhry, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Cuvu/Malomalo South/Sigatoka Urban Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu ii constituency se National Federation Party ke Mohammed Azam Khalil se haar gais rahaa.

Harnam Singh Golian:
Harnam Singh Golian, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke ticket pe Nasinu East/Rewa East Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. Uu 1999 talak House of Representatives ke member rahaa.
Harnam Singh Golian, another former NFP militant, expressed ‘gratitude’ to the GCC ‘who have been a source of vision, inspiration, and a pillar of strength in the review process, and to whom the whole nation looks…as a symbol of national unity and togetherness’
1995 me, Fiji ke Constitutional Review Committee ke submission me Singh bhi ii maang karis ki "People of Fiji ought to be declared of equal value and a government should be elected by democratic means" 
1999 ke election me uu Nasinu Rewa Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gaus rahaa.
Golian abhi New Zealand me rahe hae jahan pe uu samaj sewa me involved hae. Uu New Zealand-Fiji Community Support Services and Projects ke ek agua hae jon ki aiming to provide free funeral services for its members and their families in Auckland. 

Satish Gulabdas:
Satish Chandra Gulabdas, Fiji ke ek businessman aur politician hae. Uu bahut in talak Savusavu Town Council ke member rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke ticket pe Cakaudrove Indian Communal Constiuency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. UU 1999 talak House of Representatives ke member rahaa. He contested the Macuata East Cakaudrove Indian Communal Constituency for the National Federation Party in the 1999 and 2001 general elections but lost on each occasion by a large margin.

Ali Ayub Husain:
Ali Ayub Husain (janam: 1936), Fiji ke ek businessman aur politician rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke ticket pe Lautoka City Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. UU 1999 talak House of Representatives ke member rahaa. 
Husain uu select committee ke member bhi rahaa jon ki 1997 ke constitution ke baare me submissions liis rahaa. Uu 1999 ke baad New Zealand me rahe ke khatir chal diis. 

Tulsi Ram Khelawan:
Tulsi Ram Khelawan (1930 - 2011), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. Uu duno Fiji ke House of Representatives aur Fiji ke Senate ke member rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Ba East/Tavua Rural Indian Constituency ke jiitis rahaa. 2002 me uske Leader of the Opposition Fiji ke Senate me nominate karis rahaa.
Uu August 2006 me Fiji Labour Party ke National Council ke acting chairman rahaa jab FLP ke member jon ki cabinet me rahin (cabinet Krishna Datt and Poseci Bune, MPs Felix Anthony and Agni Deo Singh, and former senator Dr Atu Emberson-Bain) ke virod me aapan man maani kare ke khatir disciplinary action lewa gais rahaa. 

Sayed Abdul Khaiyum:
Sayed Abdul Khaiyum , Fiji ke ek wakiil aur politician rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke ticket pe Nasinu South/Colo-i-Suva Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. Uu 1999 talak House of Representatives ke member rahaa. 

1475:
1475 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki etwaar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1564:
1564 ek leap saal rahaa, jon ki sanichar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1483:
