1483 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki budh ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1520:
1520 ek leap saal rahaa, jon ki etwaar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

2011:
2011 ek sadharan saal hae jon ki sanichar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1606:
1606 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki etwaar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1669:
1669 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki mangar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1577:
1577 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki mangar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

1640:
1640 ek leap saal rahaa, jon ki etwaar ke din suruu bhais rahaa.

Dhirendra Kumar:
Dhirendra Kumar, Fiji ke ek Hindustani kisan, wakiil aur politician rahaa jon ki National Federation Party ke member rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu Ra Central Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me uu Viti Levu East Maritime Indian Communal Constituency lekin ii duuno time uu Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais rahaa.
Kumar ek wakiil hae jon ki Rakiraki se practice kare hae. 
Apart from negotiating and overseeing the implementation of rural based community projects, Kumar efforts resulted in the successful construction and opening of the Ra Special Education School in Vaileka. This was an aid-funded project by the Japanese government secured through Kumar efforts. 
Kumar ke maut achanak me Rakiraki aspatal me 1 July 2010 ke bhais rahaa. 

Vinod Chandra Deo Maharaj:
Vinod Chandra Deo Maharaj, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Lautoka South/Veiseisei/Yasawa Indian Constituency se Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election uu fir se ii constituency se jiitis. 
1999 ke election me, nawaa constitution ke niche uu Vuda Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais. 19 May 2000 uu, 43 members People's Coalition Government ke members me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske rebel RFMF soldier logan hostage banae liin rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chhorraa gais rahaa.
2001 ke election me jab uske Fiji Labour Party ke ticket nai mila tab uu New Labour Unity Party ke tarf se kharraa bhais lekin uske khaali 2.76% vote mila.

Dorsami Naidu:
Dorsami Naidu, Fiji ke ek wkiil, politician aur social worker hae. Uu Fiji Law Society ke President hae.
1983 me uu University of Canterbury se wakiili pass kar ke law practice suruu karis. 1985 me uu aapan law firm, Pillay, Naidu and Associates ke suruu karis.
1992 ke election me, uu NFP ke bagal se House of Representatives me chuna gais.November 1993 following the debate on the 1994 Budget, he called for a division or vote on the Budget. This led to the defeat of the 1994 Budget, and the fall of the Rabuka Government, resulting in snap general elections in February 1994. He was a member of the Parliamentary Justice, Law & Order Committee. 
1994 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke taraf se Nadi Urban Indian Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa.
1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me uu Nadi Urban Indian Communal Constituency se kharra bhais lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais rahaa.
On 2 July 2005, he resigned as President of he NFP after he was accused of indecently assaulting an office worker. He was subsequently acquitted of the charges against him 
February 2006 me uu University of Fiji ke Council ke member rahaa.
8 April 2007 ke, Naidu ke T.I.S.I. Sangam ke National Pesident chuna gais rahaa. 
27 September 2008 - Former National Federation Party leader Dorsami Naidu has been voted the new president of the Fiji Law Society at its annual general meeting in Sigatoka today. Naidu replaces Isireli Fa who did not attend today’s meeting 
Uu Fiji Law Society ke President hae aur uske April 2009 me Society ke member logan ke lage ek chhthi like ke khatir jisme uu ii batais ki Fiji ke President ke Fiji ke judge ke sack kare ke taagat nai hae, uske ek raat ke khatir jahel me rakkha gais rahaa. 
The president of Fiji’s Law Society says the Fiji Independent Commission Against Corruption, or FICAC, is acting outside its area of responsibility. Dorsami Naidu made the comments after FICAC charged a Fiji member of the International Commission of Jurists, Imrana Jalal, and her husband with operating a restaurant without a licence. 
September 2009 me Despite having its AGM cancelled due to the withdrawal of its permit, the members of the Fiji Law Society have reelected Mr Dorsami Naidu as President for another term via postal ballot. 

Patna:
Patna, India ke Bihar state ke capital city hae. Iske abaadi 1.7 million hae (2001 census). ii ek bahut purana city hae, jiske itihaas 2,500 saal se purana hae. Gautama Buddha jo ki Buddhismke suruu karis rahaa, bhi ii city me aais rahaa. Hia pe Hindu majoity rahe par bhi, dher Muslim hae aur dher Masjid hae. Hian ke log "Hindi", "Bhojpuri", "Magadhi" aur "Urdu" me baat kare hae. Jab Patna ke pahila dafe banawa gais rahaa, tab iske naam "Pataligrama" rahaa, aur baad me "Pataliputra" jo ki Magadha Empire ke capital rahaa.

Jalebi:
जलेबी (भोजपुरी:जीलेबी, उर्दू:جلیبی, हिन्दी:जलेबी, नेपाल:जुलेबी, ਜਲੇਬੀ, জিলাপী) ek rakam ke mithai hai jon ki Indian Continent me kaafi famous hai. Iske India, Pakistan, Nepal aur Bangladesh ke log khuub like kare hai. Ii Maida se banawal jaawe hai. Maida ka Syrup banae ke Syrup ke ek kapra me chhorr ke kapra me niche ke taraf ek chota ched karaa jae hai. Iske bad Maida ke garam garam tel me round round ghumae ke fry karaa jaae hai. Iske baad fried jalebi ke chini ke syrup me kuchh second ke khati duba diya jay hai. Iske baad jalebi khae ke khatir ready hai.

Ram:
Ram Hindu dharm ke pavitra pustak (Holybook) Ramayana ke main paatra hain. Ram Raja Dashrath Ke putra the. Ram ko pita ke aadesh par 14 varsh ke liye banwaas bheja gaya tha. Ram ji ne hi Ravan ki hatya kiye the. 14 years baad jab Ram Ayodhya laute to khushi se poore Indian Continent me ghee ke diye jalaye tab se hindu dharm me diye jalaakar Diwali manaate hain.
Ram ke do putra the "love or kush". Ram ko hindu god "vishnu" ka avtar mana jata hai.

Wadan Narsey:
Dr Wadan Lal Narsey, Fiji ke ek university professor au politician hae. Uske janam, Suva me 21 April 1950 me bhais rahaa. Uu aapan Primary aur Secondary School ke sikchha Suva ke Marist Brothers Primary aur Secondary School me paais. Uu New Zealand ke Otago University me Mathematics ke Bachelor of Science kare ke baad, 1972 me Fiji Bureau of Statistics me kaam karis. 1973 se 1976 talak uu UNiversity of the South Pacific me Mathematics ke Lecturer rahaa. Iske baad uu University of West Indies, Jamaica se MSc (Economics), aur 
DUniversity of Sussex, United Kingdom se Doctor of Philosophy parris. Fij laute ke baad uu 1978 se 1994 talak Lecturer, Senior Lecturer aur Associate Professor in Economics rahaa. 1996 se 1999 talak uu House of Representatives ke member rahaa, jisme uu Shadow Finance Minister rahaa. 1999-2002 Associate Professor, Economics Department (USP), 2003-2004 Professor (PIAS-DG)(USP), 2005-2007 Consultant economist and publisher (Vanuavou Publications). 
Narsey, University of the South Pacific me Professor of Economics hae. Wadan Narsey dher article Fiji ke politics, electoral systems, governance, coups aur economy ke baare me likhis hae. 
1996 se uu Fiji ke House of Representatives me NFP ke bagal se ek member rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Suva City (Indian Communal Constituency, Fiji) ke khatir kharraa bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se ek close election me haar gais rahaa.
2006 ke cop ke baad, Narsey, military government ke paisa waste kare ke viod me awaj uthais. 
Narsey ii bhi batais ki people's charter Fiji ke khatir acchha nai hae. 
MArch 2009 me Narsey ii chetauni diis ki FIJI National Provident Fund contributors aur pensioners ke worry are ke chaahi kaahe kii uu logan ke jamaa karaa gais paisa surakchhit naihae. 
March 2010 me Narsey ii maang karis ki Fiji ke prime minister aur military regime ke leader Bainimarama ke chaahi ki uu censorship kamtii kar d jisse ki public interest can be served through robust and critical political reporting and analysis. 

Rajeshwar Prasad:
Rajeshwar Prasad, Fiji ke ek politician hae, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 1992 ke election me uu Suva City Suburban Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa, lekin 1994 ke election me uu ii seat ke National Federation Party ke candidate se haar gais.
2005 me uske Nasinu ke mayor chuna gais rahaa. 208 me uske fir se mayor elect karaa gais rahaa. 

Sankh:
Sankh (Scientific naam: "Turbinella pyrum", English: "Conch", Kaiviti: "Davui") ek khara pani waala barrra snail ke shell hai jiske Kaiviti logan aapan ceremony me bajae hai. Iske machhri beje ke time bhi bajawa jaae hai. Hindu log iske katha me bajae hai.
Hindu dharam me Shankha ek dharmik symbol hae jiske Vishnu ke emblem maana jaawe hae.

Kapok:
Kapok (Scientific naam: "Ceiba pentandra", English: "Kapok", Kaiviti: "Kapok") ek rakam ke barraa perr hai jisme se rui nikaal ke takia aur gadda me bhara jaae hai. Ii perr 60-70 m (200-230 ft) uuncha aur iske trunk 3 m (10 ft) talak diameter me rahe hai.

Hans Christian Andersen:
Hans Christian Andersen (IPA: ˈhænˀs ˈkʰʁæsd̥jæn ˈanɔsn) nai to khaali HC Andersen (IPA:ho̞ se ˈanɔsn̩), (2 April 1805 – 4 August 1875), Denmark ke ek lekhak aur kavi rahaa, jiske uske fairy tales khatir jaana jaawat rahaa.
Bachpan ke din.
Hans Christian Andersen ke janam Odense, Denmark me mangar, 2 April 1805 ke bhais rahaa. 
Chhota me uske apne aap ke dekhe ke parrat rahaa. Chaudah saal ke umar me uu Copenhagen me acting waala kaam khoje ke khatir gais. Kahe ki uske awaaj bahut achchhaa rahaa, uske Royal Danish Theatre me gaawe ke mila, lekin kuchh din ke baad uske awaaj badal gais. Ek dost ke sifaris pe uu kavita likhe lagaa. 
Jonas Collin, jon ki Anderson ke ek chance encounter me mila, uske like karis aur uske ek grammar school me parrhe ke khatir bhejis. Andersen ii time talk aapan pahila kahani, "The Ghost at Palnatoke's Grave", likh diis rahaa. Uu 1827 talak Elsinore me school parrhis.
Kaam.
Hans Christian Andersen dher khissa likhis hae, jaise ki "Ugly Duckling" aur "The Snow Queen". 
Maut.
Uske maut khtiya se gire ke kaaran bhais rahaa. 

James Raghwan Raman:
James Raghwan Raman, Fiji ke ek union leader aur politician rahaa. Uu 1972 se lae ke 1994 talak Fiji Trades Union Congress ke General Secretary rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke taraf se Suva City Suburban Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa aur 1999 talak Oppositin Whip rahaa. 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me uu Samabula Tamavua Open Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin duuno time uu haar gais rahaa.
1987 se duusra coup ke baad uske army kuchh din talak detain karis rahaa.
2006 me uu Telecom Fiji ke chairman rahaa.

1489:
1489 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ki bif ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1588:
1588 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki suk ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Pardhuman Raniga:
Pardhuman Raniga, Fiji ke ek politician rahaa, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Nadi Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Nadi Open Constituency se House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa lekin 19 May 2000 ke uu People's Coalition Government ke 43 member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldier logan hostahe banae liin rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chhorraa gais rahaa.

Khelauna:
Ek khelauna uu chij hae jisse khela jaawe hae. Khelauna se chhota larkan, barraa admii aur janwar khele hae. 1970 se pahile, jaada khelauna, metal aur lakrrii se banaa rahat rahaa. Aajkal, ii jaada kar ke plastic ke banaa rahe hae aur dher me electronic rahe hae. Kuchh log video game ke khelauna samjhe hae. Kuchh khelauna hae ball, plastic motar, aur gudi. 

Kusti:
Kusti ek rakam ke khel hae jisme dui logan bina koi hatyaar ke larre hae. Kusti khele waala logan clinching, holding, locking, aur leverage ke kaam me laawe hae. Tiin rakam ke kusti hae jon ki Freestyle, Greco-Roman, aur Folkstyle hae.

Badminton:
Badminton ek rakam ke khel hae jisme dui nai to chaar jane khele hae. Ii rakam se chaahe ek khilaarri duusra khilaarri ke virod me khele hae nai to dui khilaarri logan, dui aur khilaari ke virod me khele hae. Khilaarri logan ek racquet ke kaam me laae ke ek shuttlecock ke net ke uppar se maare hae.
Ii game ke iea i hae ki shuttlecock ke net ke uppar se ii rakam se maaro ki duusra side waala khilaarri iskme maare nai paawe hae. Shuttlecork ke mare ke time i shyan me rakkhe ke chaahi ki ii court se baahar jaae ke nai gire hae. 

Fencing:
Fencing ek rakam ke khel hae jisme dui log talwaar ke le ke ek dusre se laree hae. Ii khel me point banawa jaawe hae. 

Backgammon:
Backgammon ek rakam ke board pe khele waala game hae jiske dui jane khele hae. 

Go (board game):
Go ek rakam ke board game hae, jiske Chinese me "Wei-chi" aur Japanese me "I-Go" bola jaawe hae. Iske dui jane board pe, dui colour ke piece use kar ke khele hae 

Patta:
Patta uu 54 card waala khel hae jisse turup, tanni, pick 2, jaise game khela jaawe hae.
Duusra websites.
Card game rules 

Shiu Sharan Sharma:
Shiu Sharan Sharma, Fiji ke ek politician rahaa jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke support karat rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Nawaka/Sabeto Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu ii constituency se fir se chuna gais rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu [Rural Indian Communal Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006|Nadi Rural Indian Communal Constituency se chuna gais rahaa aur Chaudhry Sarkar me Minister for Works and Energy rahaa. 19 May 2000 ke Sharma, uu 43 People's Coalition Government members me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight and his band of rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit hostage banae liis rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chorraa gais rahaa.

Aptar Singh:
Aptar Singh, Fiji ke ek politician rahaa jon ki National Federation Party ke supporter rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Tailevu/Ra East/Lomaiviti/Lau/Rotuma Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me u fir se i seat ke jiitis rahaa. 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me uu Tailevu Rewa Indian Communal Constituency, se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin duno time uu Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais rahaa.

Charan Jeath Singh:
Charan Jeath Singh, Fiji ke ek politician rahaa, jon ki National Federation Party ke supporter rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu Macuata West Indian Constituency (Fiji) 1992 - 1999 se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu fir se ii constituency se jiitis. 
1992 me uu Ratepayers' Association ke taaf se Labasake mayor chuna gais rahaa2 lekin 1995 ke election me uske Association, Labasa Town Council ke control Fiji Labour Party se haar gais. 
1999 ke election me uu Labasa Indian Communal Constituency se, United National Labour Party (UNLP) ke taraf se kharraa bhais lekin uske khaali 10% vote mila.
Sitting member ke maut ke baad uu December 2003 me Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency ke National Federation Party (NFP) ke bagal se contest karis lekin, jab ki uu NFP ke vote 50% se barrhais , lekin fir bhi haar gais.
[2006 ke electionb me uu Vanua Levu West Indian Communal Constituency se fNational Alliance Party (NAPF)ke taraf se kharraa bhais lekin uske khaali 14% vote mila.
2008 me uu Fiji People's Party ke Geneal Secretary rahaa.

Coronel Fabriciano:
Coronel Fabriciano (Portuguese), Brazil ke Minas Gerais ke city hai.
Iske area 456,0 km² aur population 105.037 log hai.

1805:
1805 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

United National Labour Party (Fiji):
United National Labour Party (UNLP), Fiji ke ek political party rahaa, jon ki 1999 ke election me Vanua Levu ke Indian Communal aur National Constituency me candidate kharra karis rahaa. Fiji Labour Party aur National Federation Party ke saamne iske bahut kamtii Hindustani vote milaa.
April 1999 me Fiji Labour Party ke protest ke baad, Supervisor of Elections, UNLP ke deregister kar diis lekin baad me Fiji ke High Court ii deciion pe stay kar diis jisse ki UNLP 1999 ke election me hissa le sake. 
Iske candidate rahin:

Justice and Freedom Party (Fiji):
Justice and Freedom Party (JFP), jiske AIM ke naam se bhi jaana jaawat rahaa, Fiji ke ek chhota political party rahaa jiske 2000 me Fiji ke Hindustani ke unnati ke khatir suruu karaa gais rahaa, aur jon 2001 ke election me kuchh candidate kharraa karis rahaa lekin uske 0.1 percent se kamti vote mila. Iske General Secretary , Dildar Shah rahaa.
2001 ke election me iske candidate rahin:
2006 ke election ke taiyaari me 3 April ke JFP aapan manifesto publish karis jisme uu ii waada karis ki uu Commonwealth of Nations aur United Nations ke petition kar ke ii maang kai ki United Kingdom aur Australia, Fiji me Hindustani logan ke laawe ke responsibility le. JFP, ii bhi waada karis ki Fiji ke Hindustani larrkan ke khatir ek $10 million dollar ke scholarship fund banawa jaai. Ii Party Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke khatir dual citizenship ke bhi maang karis jisme Australia aur UNited States me rahe waala Fiji ke Hindustani ke Fiji ke bhi citizenship dewa jaae aur Fiji me rahe waala Hindustani ke United Kingdom ke citizenship dewa jaae. 
7 April ke JFP National Alliance Party of Fiji se mil gais aur Shah aur uske aur kuchh member ke Party ke ticket mila

1747:

1822:
1822 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1644:
1644 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki suk ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.
Janam.
Matsuo Bashō, jon ki ek Japanese kavi rahaa, ke janam Matsuo, Kinsaku, Japan me bhias rahaa. (maut: 28 November 1694)

1694:
1694 ek sadharan saal rahaa jon ki suk ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

Tax:
Tax, uu paisa hae jon ki log sarkar ke bhare hae. Ii paisa, income tax, goods and services tax , customs duty, stamp duty jaise rakam se bharaa jaawe hae. Sarkar tax se lewa gais paisa se sarkar ke chlawe hae aur log ke social services aur surakchha de hae.

Industry:
Economics me dher rakam ke manufacturing aur services ke group me karaa jaawe hae jiske industries bola jaawe hae. Dher rakam ke industry hae, jaise kimining, farming aur logging.

Tara:
Ek tara, outer space me ek barraa waala gas ke ball hae. Ii jaada kar ke Hydrogen, thorraa Helium aur kuch aur element se banaa hae. Iske biich me gravity ke taagat etna jaada hae ki iske garmi se Hydrogen atoms duusra Hydrogen atom se mil ke Helium banae de hae. Iske nuclear fusion bolaa jaawe hae. Isme se jon energy nikle hae, uu dhire dhire nikal ke hajaro saal ke baad ghaam ke rup me dharti pe aae ke pahuche hae.

20th century:
20th century, 1 January 1901 ke suruu bhais aur 31 December 2000 ke khalaas bhais.

21st century:
21st century, 1 January 2001 ke suruu bhais aur 31 December 2100 ke khalaas hoi.

19th century:
19th century, 1 January 1801 ke suruu bhais aur 31 December 1900 ke khalaas hoi.

1960s:
1960s ke decade 1 January 1960 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1969 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 7th secade rahaa.

Entrena:
Entrena, Spain ke city hae. Iske population 1,493 hae.

1970s:
1970s ke decade 1 January 1970 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1979 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 8th decade rahaa.

1980s:
1980s ke decade 1 January 1980 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1989 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 9th decade rahaa.

1990s:
1990s ke decade 1 January 1990 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1999 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 10th decade rahaa.

2000–2009:
2000–2009 ke decade 1 January 2000 ke suuu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 2009 ke khalaas bais rahaa. 

2010s:
2010s, jiske "twenty-tens", "two thousand (and) tens", nai to khaali "the tens" pronounce karaa jaawe hae, abhi ke decade hae,jon ki 1 January 2010 ke suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 2019 ke khalaas hoi.

2020s:
2020s aae waala decae hae, jon ki 1 January 2020 suruu hoi aur 31 December 2029 ke halaas hoi. Ii 21st century ke tiisra decade rahii.

2030s:
2030s ke decade 1 January 2030 ke suruu hoi aur 31 December 2039 ke khalaas hoi. Ii 21st century ke fourth decade rahii.

2040s:
2040s ke decade 1 January 2040 ke suruu hoi aur 31 December 2049 ke halaas hoi. Ii 21st century ke 5th decade rahii. 

2012:
2012 ek leap saal rahii jon ki etwaar ke din suruu hoi.

2013:
2013 ek sadharan saal rahii jon ki mangar ke din suruu hoi.

2014:
2014, ek sadharan saal rahaa, jin ki budh ke din suruu bhais rahaa

Hardayal Singh:
Hardayal Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani poiticain raha jo ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu Ba East/Tavua Rural Indian Constituency ke Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa Uske maut 8 May 1995 ke hoe gais rahaa.

Maan Singh:
Maan Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae. Uu suru me Alliance Party ke supporter rahaa aur Suva City Council me Tamavua Ward se chuna gais rahaa aur kuch din talak Lord Mayor bhi rahaa. 1992 ke election me uu National Federation Party (NFP) ke taraf se Navosa/Serua/Namosi/Naitasiri West/Rewa West Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais. 1994 ke election me uu ii constituency se fir se jiitis. 1999 ke election me uu Viti Levu South Kadavu Indian Communal Constituency se NFP ke bagal se kharaa bhais lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais. 2001 ke election me uu Suva City Open Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin uske 10% se kamtii vote milaa.

1950s:
1950s ke decade 1 January 1950 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1959 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 6th secade rahaa.

1940s:
1940s ke decade 1 January 1940 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1949 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 5th secade rahaa.

1930s:
1930s ke decade 1 January 1930 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1939 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 4th secade rahaa.

1920s:
190s ke decade 1 January 1920 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1929 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 4th secade rahaa.

Croatian language:
Croatian language is a country in official bhasa Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro and minoriti form Europe (Austria-Burgenland, Italy-Molise, Serbia-Vojvodina, Romania-Carasova, Hungary-Baranya). Population speack Croatian language area total: 6,200,000 (1995 est) (ranked 85th)

Raman Pratap Singh:
Raman Pratap Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani wakiil aur politician hae jon ki National Federation Party (NFP) ke supporter hae. Uu bahut din se NFP ke member, Ram Jati Singh ke larrka hae. 
1987 ke election me uu ek NFP ke rebel group, jisme khaas kar ke S. M. Koya ke supporter rahin, ke bagal se Savusavu / Macuata East Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uske khaali 4.3% vote mila.
1992 ke election me uu Bua Indian Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 1994 ke election me uu ii seat se fir se jiitis. 
2001 ke election me uu Vanua Levu West Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se har gais.
On 25 October 2001, he was sworn in as a Senator. 
31 July 2005 ke uske NFP ke President chuna gais rahaa.
2006 ke elecion me uu Labasa Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uske 10% se kamti vote mila.
2014 ke election me NFP ke bagal se kharraa bhais. 

Gupt niti:

Greater Nepal:
Greater Nepal ek concept hae jo Sugauli Sandhi se pahle ke Nepal ke bhu-bhaag ko byan karta hai. Isme uu ilaka hae jiske 1814-1816 ke Anglo-Nepal larrai ke baad British India ke cede karaa gais rahaa.

Sugauli Sandhi:
Sugauli sandhi ek aisa sandhi hai jo 1814-16 me Nepal Aur East India Company ke biich bhais rahaa. Ii sandhi ke niche Nepal ke one-third territory, ke British ke niche ka dewa gais rahaa, jisme Sikkim (whose Chogyals supported Britain in the Anglo-Nepalese War); Kali Naddi ke west ke territory, jaise ki Kumaon (present Indian state of Uttarakhand), Garhwal (present Indian state of Uttarakhand); SUtlej Naddi ke west ke kuchh territory, jaise ki Kangra (present day Himachal Pradesh); aur Terai ilaka.

Mohammed Lateef Subedar:
Mohammed Lateef Subedar (1942 - 2003), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa jon ki 1999 aur 2001 ke election me Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji Labour Party ke taraf se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
19 May 2000 ke uu People's Coalition Government, jiske Mahendra Chaudhry leader rahaa, ke 43 member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight and his band of rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit hostage banae liin rahaa. Uske 13 July 2000 ke chhoraa gais rahaa.
Uu pahila dafe 1992 ke election me Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa lekin 1994 ke election me uu ii seat ke National Federation Party ke candidate se haar gais. rahaa. 
Subedar, ek civil servant rahaa, jisme se uu 1992 me resign karis. Uu 1985 se 1992 talak Sugar CAne Growers Council ke Councillor rahaa. 1996 me uske JP banawa gais rahaa. 1994 me uu National Farmers Union ke Executive member banaa. 1996 me uu Public Service Association ke Labasa Branch ke executive Officer banaa. Uu Macuata Muslim League ke Vice President, Cogeloa Muslim League ke president aur Labasa Soccer Association ke Vice President bhi rahaa.
Uske maut August 2003 me bhais rahaa.

Madhubani:
Madhubani, Bihar ke uttar disha me sthit 1 jila hai , jo ki apni painting ke liye kafi mashhur hai.
madhubani ke painting ka naam wishw bhar me hai.
or sbse achhi bat ye hai ki yahan ke log kafi achhe hai.
apne atithi ko bhagwan mante hain...
Aur dekho.
Madhubani (Fiji)

1999 ke election (Fiji):
1999 ke election, jon ki 8 May se 15 May talak bhais rahaa, pahila election rahaa jon ki 1997 ke constitution ke niche larraa gais rahaa. Ii constitution ke niche Fiji ke House of Representatives me 71 member rahaa, jisme se 25 member. Open seat (common roll) se chuna gais rahaa aur 46 mmember Communal Constiteuncy se chunak gais rahaa. Isme Kaviti logan khatir 23 seat, Hindustani ke khatir 19 seat, General elector logan ke khati 3 seat au Rotuman ke khatir 1 seat reserved rahaa.
Election ke natija.
Ii election me dui khaas coalition rahaa. Pahila goup me Prime Minister Sitiveni Rabuka ke SVT, Opposition Leader, Jai Ram Reddy ke National Federation Party (NFP) aur United General Party (UGP) rahaa. Duusra group, jiske People's Coalition ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, me Mahendra Chaudhry ke Fiji Labour Party (FLP), pahila Labour neta, Timoci Bavadra ke aurat ke party, Fijian Association Party (FAP) aur Apisai Tora ke PANU party rahaa. Election ke natija rahaa:
19 May ke Mahendra Chaudhry ke Fiji ke pahila Hindustani Prime Minister banawa gais rahaa.

2001 ke election (Fiji):
2001 ke election, jon ki 25 August se 2 September talak bhais rahaa, duusra election rahaa jon ki 1997 ke constitution ke niche larraa gais rahaa. Ii constitution ke niche Fiji ke House of Representatives me 71 member rahaa, jisme se 25 member. Open seat (common roll) se chuna gais rahaa aur 46 mmember Communal Constiteuncy se chunak gais rahaa. Isme Kaviti logan khatir 23 seat, Hindustani ke khatir 19 seat, General elector logan ke khati 3 seat au Rotuman ke khatir 1 seat reserved rahaa.
Election ke natija.
Election ke natija rahaa:

2006 ke election (Fiji):
2006 ke election, jon ki 6 May se 13 May talak bhais rahaa, tiisra election rahaa jon ki 1997 ke constitution ke niche larraa gais rahaa. Ii constitution ke niche Fiji ke House of Representatives me 71 member rahaa, jisme se 25 member. Open seat (common roll) se chuna gais rahaa aur 46 mmember Communal Constiteuncy se chunak gais rahaa. Isme Kaviti logan khatir 23 seat, Hindustani ke khatir 19 seat, General elector logan ke khati 3 seat au Rotuman ke khatir 1 seat reserved rahaa.
Election ke natija.
Election ke natija rahaa:

Nadi Urban Indian Communal Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Nadi Urban Indian Communal, Fiji ke ek electoral division hae. Ii, uu 19 communal constituencies me se ek hae jiske Fiji ke Hindustani ke khatir reserve karaa gais hae. Ii constituency Nadi town aur airport ke ilaka ke hae.

Nadi Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Nadi Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Nadi Open constituency ek marginal seat hae, jiske tiino dafe FLP jiitis hae. 2001 ke election me suruu me i seat ket vijeta ke NFP ke Prem Singh ke eclare karaa gais rahaa lekin baad me iske Supreme Court, NFP ke de diis rahaa. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke western hissa me, Nadi town aur airport ke lage hae.

George Speight:
George Speight, Fiji ke ek aadha jaat waala admii rahaa jon ki 2000 me RFMF ke kuchh rebel soldier logan ke saathe Mahendra Chaudhry ke sarkar ke paltis rahaa. Uske baad me treason ke charge karaa gais aur jahel kar dewa gais rahaa. Suruu me uske Nukulau Island me rakkha gais rahaa, lekin 2006 ke coup ke baad uske aur, jahli log ke rakam Naboro Maximum Security Prison me kar dewa gais. Abhi bhi uu jahel me hae.

People's Coalition (Fiji):
People's Coalition, uu coaltion ke naam rahaa jon ki 1999 me Fiji ke election jiitis rahaa. Isme tiin khaas party rahaa; Fiji Labour Party, Fijian Association Party aur PANU. 
Ii coalition election ke jiit liis rahaa aur FLP ke Mahendra Chaudhry, Prime Minister banaa.
Ek aur party, VLV, election ke baad ii coalition ke join karis rahaa.
2001 ke election ke baad FLP ke chhor ke coalition ke aur sab party, ekko seat nai jiitis. 

Nasinu Rewa Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Nasinu Rewa Open, , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Nasinu Rewa Open constituency ek marginal seat hae, jiske dui dafe FLP aur ek dafe SDL jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke eastern hissa me, Suva aur Nausori ke biich me hae. 

Vuda Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Vuda Open, , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Vuda Open constituency ek safe FLP seat hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke western hissa me, Lautoka aur Nadi ke biich ke ilaka hae..

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2010:
Fiji ke Inkk Mobile 2010 Battle of the Giants Soccer Tournament 15 August ke suruu bhais rahaa. Ii tournament dui weekend me khela gais rahaa. Pahila round ke match Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa. Dusra round ke match Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me 19th August ke suruu bhas rahaa aur final ke khel 2 August ke khela gais rahaa. admii loag waala tournament ke saathe, aurat log waala tournament bhi hela gais rahaa. Ba iske defending champion hae. 

Ba West Indian Communal Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Ba West Indian Communal, Fiji ke ek electoral division hae. Ii uu 19 constituency me se ek hae jiske Hindustani logan ke khatir reserve karaa gais hae. Ii electorate Ba ilaka me hae.

Laucala Indian Communal Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Laucala Indian Communal, Fiji ke ek electoral division hae. Ii uu 19 Communal Constituencies me se ek hae jiske Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke khatir reserve karaa gais hae. Ii constituency Suva City ke north me hae. 

Vaisvikaran:
Globalization dher company ke dunia ke dher des me laawe hae. 

Samrajwaad:
Imperialism ek policy hae jiske niche barraa, tagatwar des chhota aur kamtii powerful des ke uppar aapan raj barrhawe hae. 

Udarwaad:
Udarwaad (Liberalism) sarkar aur politics ke baare me ek rakam ke soche ke dhang hae. 

UNESCO:
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) United Nations ke ek agency hae.

International Court of Justice:
International Court of Justice ek international oganisation hae. 

Arthsaastr:
Economics, you chij ke parrhai hae, jisme ii dekha jaawe hae ki log kaise kamai kare hae. 

18th century:
19th century, 1 January 1701 ke suruu bhais aur 31 December 1800 ke khalaas hoi.

1910s:
1910s ke decade 1 January 1910 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1919 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke 2nd secade rahaa.

1900–1909:
1900s ke decade 1 January 1900 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1909 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 20th century ke pahila decade rahaa.

1890s:
1890s ke decade 1 January 1890 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1899 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 10th decade rahaa.

1880s:
1880s ke decade 1 January 1880 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1889 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 9th decade rahaa.

1870s:
1870s ke decade 1 January 1870 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1879 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 8th decade rahaa.

1860s:
1860s ke decade 1 January 1860 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1869 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 7th decade rahaa.

1850s:
1850s ke decade 1 January 1850 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1859 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 6th decade rahaa.

1840s:
1840s ke decade 1 January 1840 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1849 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 5th decade rahaa.

1830s:
1830s ke decade 1 January 1830 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1839 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 4th decade rahaa.

1820s:
1820s ke decade 1 January 1820 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1829 me khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 3rd decade rahaa.

1810s:
1810s ke decade 1 January 1810 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1819 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke 2nd decade rahaa.

Hikmat Singh Verma:
Hikmat Singh Verma, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke support karat rahaa.
1994 ke election me uu Nasinu South/Colo-i-Suva Indian Constituency se kharraa b hais rahaa lekin National Federation Party ke candidate se thorraa vote se haar gais rahaa.
1999 ke election me uu who won the Laucala Indian Communal Constituency ke jiitis .
19 May 2000 uu aur uske 43 saathi ke George Speight and his band of rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit. Uske 13 July 2000 ke , 56 din talak band rahe ke baad chhorraa gais rahaa.
Hikmat Singh USA me rahat raha. Fir uu Fiji chal dis hai. America me bahut dhaka khais aur Fiji bhaggaye.

Gunasagaran Gounder:
19 May 2000 ke, Goundar uu 43 People's Coalition Government ke member me se ek rahaa, jiske George Speight aur uske rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit hostage le liis rahaa. 56 din ke baad, uske 13 July 2000 ke chhorra gais rahaa.
2001 se 2006 talak uu Nadi Rural Indian Communal Constituency ke represent karis. Ii uu 19 communal seat me se ek hae jiske Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke khatir reserve karaa gais hae. 2001 ke election me uske 69% vote mila rahaa. 
2003 me Goundar ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase, Minister for Health ke position ke offer karis, lekin uu aur 13 FLP ke member ke saathe iske inkaar kar diis.
2006 ke election, me Gounder, Nadi Urban Indian Communal Constituency se kharra bhais jisme uske 76 percent vote mila. Iske baad uu. nau aur FLP Ministers ke saathe Cabinet me gais jahaan pe uske as Minister for Curative Health Services banawa gais.

Azim Hussein:
Azim Hussein, Fiji ke ek Hindustani sikchhak aur politician hae jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 2006 ke election me uu Nasinu Rewa Open Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
Hussein, pahile ek primary school ke head teacher rahaa.

Nareish Kumar:
Nareish Kumar, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 1999 ke election me uu Labasa Open Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa.
19 May 2000 ke uu 43 members of the People's Coalition Government, led by Mahendra Chaudhry, me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit haotage le liin rahaa. Uske 23 May 2000 ke chhorraa gais rahaa.

Labasa Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Labasa Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division hae Ii uu 25 open constituencies me se ek hae jisme universal suffrage (common rol) ke niche member ke choose karaa jaawe hae. Ii electorate jaada kar ke Vanua Levu ke Labasa town ke cover kare hae.
Election results.
1999.
Voters ke jaat - Kaiviti: 3,423 (21.06%), General: 327 (2.01%), Hindustani: 14,490 (75.58%), Rotuman: 12 (0.07%), Total: 16,252 

Perumal Mupnar:
Perumal Mupnar, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 2001 ke election me uu Yasawa Nawaka Open Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 2006 ke election me uu Nadi Rural Indian Communal Constituency se chuna gais rahaa. 
1999 ke election ke baad uske Senate me appoint karaa gais rahaa. 
2003 me uu 14 FLP parliamentarians me se ek rahaa jiske Laisenia Qarase cabinet position offer karis rahaa aur uske Ministry for Transport ke ofer rahaa lekin FLP iske reject kar diis. 
2006 ke election ke baad uu House of Representatives me uu Labour Party Whip banaa. 
Baad me uske aur FLP leader, Mahendra Chaudhry ke biich me fuut hoe gais aur uu Chaudhry's choice of Senators following the 2006 election ke virod me awwaj uthais.

Pyotr Ilyich Tchaekovsky:
Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky (Russian: Пётр Ильич Чайковский, "Pëtr Il’ič Čajkovskij"; ) (janam Kamsko-Votkinsk, 7 May 1840; maut St Petersburg, 6 November 1893) ek Russian composer rahaa jon ki Romantic period ke rahaa. 

Markswaad:
Marxism ek political aur economic idea ke naam hae. Ii idea ke Karl Marx aur Friedrich Engels suruu kare rahin.

Rajshahi:
Monarchy ek rakam ke sarkar rahe hae, jisme ek raja rahe hae.

Rastryawaad:
Rastryawaad (Nationalism) ek rakam ke bichar hae jisme ii soch jaawe hae ki sab log apne pe raj kare sake hae.

Ganrajya:
Ganrajya (Republic) Ek yesa desh hota hai jaha desh ka sabse ucha pad(PM) ke liye aam janta me se koi bhi baith sakta hai Is tarah ke sasan tntr ko gantantra kahte hai Locktanra ya prajatantra isase alag hota hai , locktanra waisa sanas tantr hota hai jaha wastaw me samanya janta ya uske bahumat ki icha se sasan chalta hai Aaj visva ka adhikans desh ganrajya hai aur saath me locktantric bhi

Samajwaad:
Samajwaad (Socialism) ek rakam ke economic aur political theory hae jiske niche sarkar aur public jaada means of poduction ke own kare hae.

Rajya:
Ek state uu association hae jon ki ek geographic hissa nai to jamiin ke uppar raj kare hae

Rajnetic dal:
Ek Rajnetic dal (political party) ek organized group of voters hae. Ii logan election me aapam bagal se log ke kharraa kare hae.

Parchar:
Parchar (Propaganda) samachar hae jon ki biased hae.

Atankwaad:
Atankwaad (Terrorism) ke duuno right-wing aur left-wing organisation practice kare hae. 

Gurukul Primary School:
Gurukul Primary School, Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke khatir pahila permanent school rahaa, jiske Arya Samaj, 1918 me Saweni, Lautoka district, Fiji me banais rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher Swami Ram Manoharanand Saraswati rahaa, jon ki India se Fiji aais rahaa. Ii abhi ek co-educational multi-racial school hae. 

Vunimono Arya School:
Vunimono Arya School Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1929 me Vunimono, Nausori me banais rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher Thakur Kundan Singh Kush rahaa, jon ki India se Fiji aais rahaa. 1931 ke baarr me iske pahila fuus ke building bahe gais ahaa aur abhi ke site pe school banaa. Ii school ek urban multi-racial school hae.

Arya Samaj Primary School:
Arya Samaj Primary School Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1930 me Samabula, Suva me Arya Kanya Pathshala, Samabula ke naam se, Hindustani larrki logan ke sikchha de ke khatir Pandit Ami Chandra suruu karis rahaa. 1946 me ii school, abhi ke jagha, Kula Street, Samabula me kar dewa gais rahaa. Ii ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae.
Aur dekho.
The concept of the Rishikul Primary School was formulated by the girmitayas living in the area and in the surrounding districts extending in the Suva-Nausori corridor. The head of the girmitayas at the time was a indentured laborer named Gudarie who finished his term partly in Labasa and eventually in Ba where his tenure of ten years expired. Upon the expiry of the tenure, he moved to live in the area of Nasinu now called Makoi 8 miles. 
With his family of 9 children and other retired girmitayas, they formed a satsang which later formulated the idea of building school for the now defunct girmitayas children. 
Gudarie led the team of constructions and carried building materials from SCIL, a stone and sand company still trading at 7 miles in Nasinu. During this time manual labor was the norm and painstakingly the school was completed. Initially the school was equipped with 2 water wells, a cottage for the head teacher and some other amenities. 
Today the school boasts of bigger and better rooms with council water supply and a high school situated approximately 500m away with separate internal administrative bodies.

Arya Kanya Pathshala:
Arya Kanya Pathshala (School code: 1051) Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1938 me Yalalevu, Ba district, Fiji me Hindustani larrki logan ke sikchha de ke khatir Pandit Ami Chandra suruu karis rahaa. AMi Chandra iske pahila head teacher 1946 talak rahaa. Abhi ii school ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae. 2006 me ii school me 477 larkan parrhat rahin.

Beida:
Al Bayda Arbii bhasa البيضاء, Libya ke 3 city hae .

Bhawani Dayal Arya College:
Bhawani Dayal Arya College Fiji ke school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1972 me Nakasi, Nasinu me banawa gais rahaa. Iske naam South Africa ke freedom fighter, Swami Bhawani Dayal Sanyasi se aais hae. Iske pahila Principal 
J. R. Singh. rahaa. Ii ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae jon ki forms forms 3 se 7 talak ke sikchha de hae.

Bhawani Dayal Memorial Primary School:
Bhawani Dayal Memorial Primary School Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1942 me Nakasi, Nasinu me banawa gais rahaa. Iske naam South Africa ke freedom fighter, Swami Bhawani Dayal Sanyasi se aais hae. Iske pahila Head Teacher Bal Ram rahaa. Ii ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae jon ki Fiji ke ek sab se barraa Primary School hae.
ENGLISH:
Bhawani Dayal Memorial Primary School is a renown school in Nakasi, Nasinu. The name of the school comes from a South African freedom fighter, Swami Bhawani Dayal Sanyasi. The first Principle of the school was Mr. Bal Ram. Bhawani Dayal Memorial Primary School is one of the largest primary schools in Fiji and its also a multi-racial school and a co-educational school.
-->English edition by one of the students of the proud school.

DAV College, Ba:
DAV College, Ba Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1953 me Varadoli, Ba district, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. Iske pahila Principal, Pandit Ami Chandra rahaa. Ii ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae jon ki Forms 3 se 7 talak aur vocational education bhi de hae. 
Soccer me safaltaa.
DAV college was undefeated U19 IDC champions from 2007 to 2009. They defeated Labasa Sangam 2-0 in the finals with the goals coming from Kitione tamaivalu and ravinesh karan singh. 

DAV College, Suva:
DAV College, Suva Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1952 me Samabula, Suva me banawa gais rahaa. Iske pahila Principal, Pandit Ami Chandra rahaa. Ii ek co-educational aur multi-racial school hae jon ki Forms 3 se 7 talak ke sikchhaa de hae.

Punji:
Punji (Capital) ke economics, finance aur accounting me dher matlab rahe hae.
Finance aur accounting me punji jaada kar ke paisa dualat, jiske kaam me laae ke business sruu karaa jaawe hae, ke bola jaawe hae.. 
Classical economics me punji factors of production me se ek factor hae.

Nangio:
Nangio ek rakm ke machhri hae jiske Chondrichthyes bola jaae hae,aur iske skeleton cartilage ke banaa ahe haddi ke nai. 

DAV Girls College, Suva:

ISke suruu me naam, Nadera Arya Samaj Primary School rahaa, lekin Arya Samaj, Dr. Ram Lakhan, jon ki 17 saal talak samaj ke General Secretaty rahaa, ke yaad me iske naam badal diis. Iske pahila Head teacher, Shiu Karan Mishra rahaa. Ii ek medium size multi-racial school hae.

Jokhan Memorial Primary School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 2003 me Calia, Navua me Hindustani larrki logan ke sikchha de ke khatir banais rahaa.Ii school ke naam J N Jokhan ‘Arya Ratna’ ke baad rakkha gais hae, jon ki 32 saal talak Sabha ke General Treasurer rahaa. Lautoka Arya Samaj Primary School:

Nadroga Arya College:
Nadroga Arya College Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1998 me Nadroga me banais rahaa. Iske banae me khaas haanth Late Pta. Ram Kumari Bhushan ‘Arya Ratna’ aur Mr. Moti Ram ke rahaa. Pt. Vishnu Deo Memorial College:
Pt. Vishnu Deo Memorial College Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1972 me Saweni, Lautoka me banawa gais rahaa. Ii school ke naam swargiye Hon. Pt Vishnu Deo, OBE, ‘Janaratna’, MLC ke yaad me rakkha gais hae, jon ki Fiji me Arya Samaj aur Fiji ke janta ke dher yogdaan diis hae. Iske pahila Principal, S Duggal rahaa. College me ek barraa multipurpose hall hae. 

Pt. Vishnu Deo Memorial Primary School:
Pt. Vishnu Deo Memorial Primary School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1970 me Raiwaqa, Suva me banawa gais rahaa. Ii school ke naam swargiye Hon. Pt Vishnu Deo, OBE, ‘Janaratna’, MLC ke yaad me rakkha gais hae, jon ki Fiji me Arya Samaj aur Fiji ke janta ke dher yogdaan diis hae. Iske pahila Head TEacher, S Govind rahaa. Ii ek multi-racial school hae jiske 80% student Kaiviti hae. 

Swami Shraddhanand Memorial School:
Swami Shraddhanand Memorial School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1952 me Nabua, Suva me banawa gais rahaa. Ii school ke naam Swami Shraddhanand (1866-1926) ke yaad me rakkha gais hae. Iske pahila Head Teacher, R. H. Ram Narayan rahaa. Ii ek multi-racial school hae. 

Vatukoula Arya Samaj Primary School:
Vatukoula Arya Samaj Primary School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1982 me Matanigata Hills, Tavua me banawa gais rahaa. Ii school TAvua Arya Samaj ke dekh rekh me hae. Iske pahila Head Teacher, Balram Singh rahaa. 

Vunikavikaloa Arya School:
Vunikavikaloa Arya School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1936 me Vunikavikaloa, Ra me banawa gais rahaa. 1952 me ii school Ii school Arya Pratinidhi Sabha of Fiji ke niche aais. Iske pahila Head Teacher, lshwar Lal rahaa. 
Iske suruu kare Jai Karan ke khaas haanth rahaa, jon ki school ke banae ke khatir jamin diis rahaa. Baad me uske larkaa, Shiu Kumar bhi school ke chalae ke khatir bahut daan diis rahaa. 

Ba Sangam School:
Ba Sangam School (School Code: 1080 ke 1929 me Ba town me, CSR Company ke dewa gais jamiin me, banawa gais rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher, Kunji Bihari rahaa. 1931 ke baarr me ii school bahe gais rahaa, lekin CSR ek aur uuncha jagah pe school banae ke khatir jamiin diis. 2006 me ii school me 217 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Cogeloa Sangam School:
Cogeloa Sangam School (School Code: 1659), Fiji ke ek primary school hae jiske TISI Sangam chalae hae aur jon ki 1969 me Ram Reddy ke agwai me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Ii School Labasa me hae. 2006 me ii school me 169 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Dreketi Sangam School:
Dreketi Sangam School (School Code: 1008), 1942 me banawa gais rahaa, lekin iske 1947 me register karaa gais rahaa aur iske Head Teacher, K. Kuppuswamy rahaa. 1984 se hian pe Tamil parrhawa jaawe hae. 2006 me ii school me 77 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Koronubu Sangam School:
Koronubu Sangam School (School Code: 1039), Fiji ke ek school hae jon ki Ba town se 8 km duur hae aur iske 1953 me banawa gais rahaa. 2006 me ii school me 57 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Lovu Sangam School:
Lovu Sangam School , Fiji ke ek school hae, jon ki 1 August 1933 me ek school ke rakam register bhais rahaa. 
Iske suruwaat aur pahile ke rahaa. M.N. Naidu , jon ki Lautoka me ek Naidu School kholis rahaa ke band hoe k baad huan ke sab furniture aur fittings Lovu Sangam school ke banae me lagawa gais rahaa M. N. Naidu ke, 1926 me, Lovu Sangam School ke pahile pradhan chuna gias rahaa.

Raviravi Sangam School:

Nadi Secondary College (Sangam (SKM) College)):
Nadi Secondary College (Sangam (SKM) College) , Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske 1958 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. 
1958 me jab Shri Vivekananda High School Grant-Aided aur Fiji Secondary School Entrance Examination failures ke nai le sakat rahaa, tab SVHS ke purana site pe ek nawaa school banawa gais. Nadi Education Society school ke Late Sadhu Kuppuswamy, the founder of the Sangam ke dedicate karaa gais.

Suva Sangam High School (School Code: 2338), Rakiraki, Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske 12 May 1958 ke suruu karaa gais rahaa. Iske pahila Principal, Gopalswamy Naidu rahaa. 2006 me ii school me 834 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Deenbandhu Primary School:
Deenbandhu Primary School , Suva, Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske 1946 me Indian Association of Fiji suruu karis rahaa. Iske address hae: 2 Toganivalu Rd, Suva Ph: 338 1225 
Iske headteacher Baram Datt hae aur ii school abhi Kaiviti aur Hindustani larrkan logan ke ek duusre ke bhasa sikhae ke initiative me hae. 

Khalsa Primary School:
Khalsa College , Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske 1959 me , Wailailai, Ba district, Fiji me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Ii school uu jagah pe banawa gais rahaa jahan pe phile ek Methodist Mission School rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher (1960 se) Pritam Singh rahaa.

Khalsa College:
Khalsa College, Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske 1959 me, Wailailai, Ba district, Fiji me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Ii school uu jagah pe banawa gais rahaa jahan pe pahile ek Methodist Mission School rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher (1960 se) J. S. Kanwal rahaa.

Draladamu Primary School:
Draladamu Primary School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1980 me Draladamu, Labasa me banais rahaa. 
October 2008 me ii school ke Ministry of Health band kar diis rahaa kaahe ki paani ke problem ke kaaran ii school me larrkan ke health pe kaafi khatra rahaa. 

Damodran Nair:
Damodran Nair, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki Tavua Open Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke taraf se ek by election me 16 January 2004 ke chuna gais rahaa. Ii election, pahile ke member, Pravin Singh ke maut, ek automobile accident ke baad, me karaa gais rahaa. Nair 2006 ke election me fi se chuna gais rahaa.
January 2009 me, Nair appealed for help for people from the district of Tavua affected by severe flooding. 
2014 ke election me uu FLP te taraf se candidate rahaa. 

Ganilau Park:
Ganilau Park, Savusavu, Fiji me ek ground hae. Ii park ke dekh rekh Savusavu Town Council kare hae. Isme 120 jan baithe sake hae aur hian pe kapraa badle ke subidha hae. Hian pe daaru piye ke manaa hae. Savusavu ke football team ke Super Premier Division me promote kare ke baad, Savusavu Town Council ii ground ke upgrade kare ke prathao rakkhis hae. 

Bidesi Park:
Bidesi Park, Suva, Fiji me ek ground hae. Ii park ke dekh rekh Suva City Council kare hae. Isme baithe ke koi subidha nai hae. Hian pe soccer aur rugby khela jaae hae. Iske naam Chandra P. Bidesi se aais hae jon ki, Suva City Council ke ek Councillor baht din talak rahaa.

Ra Sport Ground:
Ra Sport Ground, Vaileka, Ra me ek ground hae. Ii ground me jaada kar ke soccer aur rugby khela jaawe hae. Isme ek ground soccer aur rugby ke khatir hae aur dui court hae jisme netball au voleyball khela jaae hae. 

Korotari Arya Primary School:
Korotari Arya School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1962 me Korotari, Labasa me Hindustani larrkan ke sikchha de ke khatir banais rahaa. Ii school me abhi jaada Kaiviti log parrhe hae.

Labasa Arya Secondary School:
Labasa Arya Secondary School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Fiji ke Arya Samaj, 1973 me Labasa me Hindustani larrkan ke sikchha de ke khatir banais rahaa. Ii school Nakama Roard, Labasa, Vanua Levu me hae.

Naduna Arya School:
Naduna Arya School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1943 me Naduna, Labasa me Hindustani larrkan ke sikchha de ke khatir banais rahaa. Ii Naduna Korotari Road, Labasa, Vanua Levu me hae. 

Wainikoro Arya School:
Wainikoro Arya School Fiji ke ek school hae, jiske Arya Samaj, 1967 me Wainikoro, Labasa me Hindustani larrkan ke sikchha de ke khatir banais rahaa. Iske pahila Head Teacher, Mohammed Ibrahim rahaa. II ek bahut chhota multi-racial school hae.

Cakaudrove West Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Cakaudrove West Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Cakaudrove West Open constituency me jaada kar ke Kaiviti log rahe hae aur iske SDL ke stronghold maana jaawe hae. Ii Fiji group ke duusra sab se barraa island, Vanua Levu, ke southeastern hissa me hae.
Election ke natija.
1999.
Voters ke jaat - Kaiviti: 11,445 (73.49%), General: 1851 (11.88%), Hindustani: 2,234 (14.34%), Rotuman: 42 (0.26%), Total: 15,572 

Cunningham Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Cunningham Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Ii constituency Suva metropolitan area ke northern hissa me hae. Ii dher marginal constituency hae, kahe ke iske ek dafe Labour aur dui dafe SDL jiitis hae.
Election ke natija.
1999.
Voters ke jaat - Kaiviti: 10,098 (57.44%), General: 991 (5.63%), Hindustani: 6,178 (35.14%), Rotuman: 311 (1.76%), Total: 17,578 

Lau Taveuni Rotuma Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Lau Taveuni Rotuma Open Fiji ke ek electoral division, jon ki 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Ii Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies me se ek hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Lau Taveuni Rotuma Open me jaada kar ke Kaiviti log rahe hae aur iske SDL ke stronghold maana jaawe hae. Ii electorate Lau Islands, Taveuni aur kuchh outliers jisme Rabi Island aur Kioa hae, aur Rotuma hae.

Laucala Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Laucala Open Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Cakaudrove West Open constituency me jaada kar ke Kaiviti log rahe hae aur iske SDL ke stronghold maana jaawe hae. Ii constituency Suva ke outer metropolitan area me hae. Ii ek marginal seat hae, jiske FLP ek dafe jiitis hae aur SDL, dui dafe, khaali thoraa vote se jiitis hae.

Lautoka Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Lautoka City Open Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu ke west ke Lautoka City ke cover kare hae. Ii seat ke tiino dafe FLP, preferences ke baad, jiitis hae.

Lomaivuna Namosi Kadavu Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Lomaivuna Namosi Kadavu Open , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Lomaivuna Namosi Kadavu Open constituency me jaada kar ke Kaiviti log rahe hae aur iske SDL ke stronghold maana jaawe hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke south aur Kadavu ke cover kare hae.

Macuata East Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Macuata Open , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Macuata Open constituency me jaada kar ke Hindustni voter hae aur ii FLP ke stronghold maana jaawe hae. Ii Fiji group ke duusra sab se barraa island, Vanua Levu, ke northeastern hissa me hae.

Magodro Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Magodro Open , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Magodro Open constituency, Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke north western hissa me, Ba district ke dehati ilaka me hae. Ii ek safe FLP seat hae.

Nausori Naitasiri Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Nausori Naitasiri Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii constituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Nausori Naitasiri Open constituency ke ek marginal seat maana jaawe hae, kaahe ki iske ek dafe FLP jiitis hae aur dui dafe SDL, khaali thhoraa vote se jitis hae. Ii constituency Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke eastern hissa me, Suva ke north me hae, jisme Nausori aur Natasiri South me hae

Bobby Tikaram:
Bhawar Singh Tikaram, jiske Bobby Tikaram ke naam se jaada jaana jaawe hae, Fiji ke dher khel kuud me aapan yogdaan diis hae. Uu jaada kar ke soccer ke administrato rahaa lekin rugby, hockey, tennis, table tennis, badminton, basketball, boxing, cricket even martial arts me bhi aapan yogdaan diis hae. Bobby, Fiji ke jaana maana Tikaram palwar ke hae aur uu 11 larrkan waala palwar me se sab se chhotta hae. Uske barraa bhaiya logan me hae: Sir Moti Tikaram, Fiji ke pahila ombudsman aur supreme court ke ek judge, Lami ke pahile ke mayor, Fiji Scouts Association ke commissioner, Jerry Tikaram aur Madho Tikaram, jon ki ek politician rahaa.
Bachpan ke din.
Bobby ke janam Lami e bhais rahaa, jahan pe abhi Tikaram Park hae. Tikaram palwar pahile ek dukan kholis, lekin baad me transport business me chal diis , jisme ek bus company ((Tikaram’s bus service) aur ek taxi ke business (Golden Arrow Taxis) rahaa. Bobby, Lami me barraa bhais aur Suva Methodist Boys School me parrhis. School me uu etna achchhaa football khelis ki uske teacher uske school ke soccer team ke coach banae diis. Uu aapan High school ke parrhai MGM High School me karis jahan pe uu soccer team ke captain rahaa.
Soccer me yogdaan.
1961 me uu kuchh dost ke saathe Lami Soccer Club ke suruu karis rahaa. 1964 me uu Civil Aviation Authority of Fiji me kaam kare lagaa
. 1965 me uu Airport soccer club suruu karis aur Nadi ke khatir tiin saal talak bhi khelis. Uu Nadi me socer ke ek nawaa jiwan diis aur Nadi Football Association. ke assistant secretary, secretary, manager, technical adviser aur baad me president bhi rahaa. 1990 me uske niche, Nadi Fiji FA fundraising tournament ke jiitis. 1991 me uu Nadi Soccer Headquarters ke kholis aur Australia se ek coach ke hire karis. Uu Airport Soccer Club ke Australia aur New Zealand ke, aur Nadi ke Tahiti, New Caledonia aur New Zealand ke tour bhi organise karis rahaa. Bobby ke Oceania Championship ke Oceania executive committee me bhi chuna gais rahaa. Bobby, Fiji Football ke Secretary 1972-75 talak rahaa, jisse pahile uu dui saal talak assistant secretary bhi rahaa. Ii time pe (1972 me) uu FFA monogram ke introduce karis rahaa.
Duusra khel me yogdaan.
Bobby, Nadi Airport Rugby Club ke vice-president bhi rahaa aur airport ke ground me rugby khela karat rahaa. 
1964 me uu Tennis khele ke suruu karis aur Nadi Airport Tennis Club ke revive karis, jisme uu ek player aur manager rahaa. Ii CLub Dominion Lawn Tennis Association se affiliated rahaa, jon ki baad me Fiji Lawn Tennis Association banaa. Uu Jordon me khele waala Fiji Davis Cup ke manager rahaa, aur dher SOuth Pacific Games aur Thaianfd ke Fed Cup me bhi Fiji ke manager rahaa. 2003 me uske South Pacific Games ke tennis ke competition manage rbhi banawa gais rahaa. 2003 me retire hoe se pahile, uu Fiji Lawn Tennis Association ke vice-president bhi rahaa. 
Uu Fiji Table Tennis Association ke New Caledonia ke 3rd South Pacific Games ke selector rahaa. Uu Nadi ke table tennis me represent kais rahaa aur dher din talak district president bhi rahaa.
1960s me uu Hockey Association ke revive kais aur uske president bhi rahaa. Uu Nadi Airport Hockey team ke bhi form karis rahaa aur uske player aur President rahaa. Uske sab se important contribution rahaa, Goraa aur Hindustani waala Association ke ek kar ke Nadi Combined Hockey Association ke banae me. Uu Nadi irport ke team ke New Zealand tour e bhi manager raha. Baad me use Fiji Hockey Association ke vice-president bhi banawa gais rahaa.
Uske haanth boxing ke promote kare me bhi rahaa. Uske Nadi Airport Gym me kuch acchha boxer logan train karin rahaa.
Uske martial arts me yogdaan ke khati 1980 me Black Sash aur 1982 me Red sash dewa gais rahaa.
Bobby, Nadi Airport ke Superstars Basketball Club ke founder aur manager rahaa.
Uu Nadi Airport Cricket Club ke revivie karis aur baad me iske manage bhi karis. Uu Rakiraki ke Nanuku Cricket Club ke saathe 1980s aur 1990s me regular game bhi organise karis.
1981 me uske Fiji Sports Council Board me appoint karaa gais rahaa. Uu western division ke ii board me 1983 talak represent . 2000 me uske fir se ii board me apoint karaa gais rahaa.
Awards.
1980 me uske Most Outstanding Person of the Year award dewa gais rahaa. Bobby was awarded the 50th anniversary distinguished service award by FASANOC in 2006. For his immense contribution to sports Bobby was awarded the Member of Order of Fiji Award (MF) by the late Ratu Sir Kamisese Mara.
Uske lage chhe larrkan hae, Sanjeev, Shirley, Ranjeev, Sanjana, Alice aur Ruth, aur ii sab sports me aapan naam kamae hae. A senior citizen, he lives in Nasoso in Nadi. We can’t rate him enough but can only say Great Work, Full Marks Bobby

Douala:
Douala, Africa ke des, Cameroon, ke sab se barraa city hae. Ii Littoral Province ke capital city hae.
Ii city Wouri Naddi ke lage hae. Iske population lagbhag 2,000,000 jan hae. 
Pahila goraa logan Portugal se aae ke 1472 me ii city ke banain rahaa. Iske pahile Cameroons Town ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, lekin 1884 me Germany Cameroon ke aapan niche kar ke ii city ke naam ke badal ke Kamarunstadt ("Camaroon City") rakkhis aur iske German Kamerun ke capital banais. 1907 me iske naam ke fir se badal ke Duala kar dewa gais. 1919 me jab ii League of Nations ke mandate ke niche France ke niche aais tab ii French Cameroons ke capital banaa. From 1940 se 1946 talak ii Cameroon ke capital rahaa.

Andhra Pradesh:
Andhra Pradesh, India ke ek state hae, jon ki des ke south me hae. Iske capital Amaravati hae . Andhra me jaada kar ke Telugu me baat karaa jaawe hae. Iske aur barraa city, Visakhapatnam, Vijayawada, Guntur, Kurnool, aur Tirupati hae. Iske east me Bay of Bengal hae. Iske parrosi state hae; Telangana, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Orissa aur Tamil Nadu
Iske area 160,205 sq.km aur abaadi 49,386,799 hae, Andhra Pradesh, India ke 8th sab se barraa state hae.
Andhra Pradesh ke district.
Anantapur, Chittoor, East Godavari, Guntur, Kadapa, Kurnool, Krishna, Prakasam, Nellore, Srikakulam, Visakhapatnam, Vizianagaram, West Godavari.
Area aur Population.
Area: 61,855 sq mi or 160,205 km²
Population: 49,386,799
Density (per Sq. km): 308
Literates: 67.41%

Arunachal Pradesh:
Arunachal Pradesh India ke ek state hae. 2001 ke census ke anusaar hian ke abaadi 1,091,117 log hae. Iske ilaka 32,333 mi² (83,743 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii United Arab Emirates se barraa lekin Austria se chhota hae. Iske capital Itanagar hae.
Ii iaka ke China aapan ke aane hae aur iske kaaran India aur China ke biich me 1962 me larrai bhais rahaa. 

Assam:
Assam (Assamese : অসম), Hindustan ke north eastern ilaka me ek state hae. Iske ilaka of 30,285 mi² (78,438 km²)hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Panama se barraa, lekin Czech Republic se chhota hae. Ek barraa naddi, (Brahmaputra) ii state me se bahe hae. Ii state Himalaya pahaar ke foothilla e hae. Iske border Bhutan aur Bangladesh se hae. Assam ke capital city Dispur hae. 

Chhattisgarh:
Chhattisgarh, India ke ek praant (state) hae. Iske ilaka 52,199 mi² (135,194 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Greece se barraa, lekin Tajikistan se chhota hae.
Iske capital Raipur hae. Isme 27 district hae: Raigarh, Bilaspur, Korba, Durg, Janjgir, Raipur, Koria, Sarguja, Bastar, Dantewada, Narayanpur, Rajnandgaon, Kanker, Mahasamund, Dhamtari, Jashpur and Kawardha.
Iske khaas bhasa Hindi aur Chhattisgarhi hae aur khaas dharam, Hindu dharam hae. Iske capital city Raipur hae.

Goa:
Goa (गोवा), India ke ek state hae. Area me ii India ke sab se chhota stat hae aur abaadi me ii duusra sab se chhota state hae. Iske puura ilaka 1,430 mi² (3,702 km²) hae, jiske matlba ii hae ki ii Samoa se barraa lekin Georgian territory of South Ossetia se chhota hae. Ii India ke west coast me, uu region me hae jiske Konkan bola jaawe hae. Iske north me Maharashtra state aur east aur south me Karnataka hae. Iske west coast pe Arabian Sea hae. Panjim, ii state ke capital aur sab se barraa city hae. 

Haryana:
Haryana (Doabi:ਹਰਿਆਣਾ, ਇੰਡੀਆ), India ke ek state hae,jahan pe Hinduism suruu bhais rahaa. ii ilaka ke khass bhasa Haryanvi hae. Ii ilaka ke area 17,120 mi² (44,341 km²) hae, jiske matalab ii hae ki ii Denmark se barraa lekin Estonia se chhota hae. Haryana ke capital city Chandigarh hae. Haryana ke abaadi 25,353,081 hae.

Himachal Pradesh:
Himachal Pradesh (Hindi: हिमाचल प्रदेश) India ke ek state hae. Iske capital, Shimla hae. Iske ilaka 21,629 mi² (56,019 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Bosnia and Herzegovina se chhota lekin Croatia se barraa hae. 

Jammu and Kashmir:
Jammu and Kashmir (Hindi: जम्मू और कश्मीर; Urdu: جموں اور کشمیر ر India ke sab se north ke state hae aur ii jgha pe Pakistan bhi dawa kare hae. Ii state ke puura ilaka 39179|sqmi|km2, jaada kar ke Himalaya pahaarr me hae.
Iske capiatal city Srinagar hae.

Jharkhand:
Jharkhand, India ke ek state. Iske abaaadi lagbhag 20,000,000 log ke hae aur iske ilaka 28,833 mi² (74,677 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Sierra Leone se barraa aur Panama se chhota hae. Iske capital Ranchi hae. 

Nadroga Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Nadroga Open Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Nadroga Open constituency ek marginal seat hae, jiske tiino dafe FLP jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke southern hissa me hae. 

Ra Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Ra Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Ra Open constituency ek tiino dafe, SDL ke George Shiu Raj jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke northern hissa me hae.

Samabula Tamavua Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Samabula Tamavua Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Samabula Tamavua Open constituency ek marginal seat hae, jiske dui dafe FLP aur ek dafe SDL jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke southern hissa me, greater Suva metropolitan area me hae.

Suva City Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Suva City Open Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Nadi Open constituency ek marginal seat hae, jiske tiin dafe tiin party jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke wsouthern hissa me, Suva ke central business district me hae .

Serua Navosa Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Serua Navosa Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Serua Navosa Open constituency me jab ki kaafi Kaiviti voters hae, ii ek marginal seat hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke southern hissa me hae. 

Tavua Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Tavua Open, Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Tavua Open constituency ek marginal seat hae lekin iske FLP tiino dafe jiitis hae. Ii Fiji group ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu, ke western hissa me hae. 
Election results.
2004 by election.
This by-election was held on 16 January, following the death of sitting member, Pravin Singh
There were 36 polling stations within the constituency with 18,347 voters. Of these, 12,573 votes were cast with 887 invalid votes and 11,686 valid votes. Fifty percent plus one was required to win the seat in the first count that is, 5,844 votes. 

Tailevu North Ovalau Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006:
Tailevu North Ovalau Open , Fiji ke ek electoral division, 1999 se lae ke 2006 talak rahaa. Fiji ke House of Representatives ke 71 constituency me se 25 open constituencies hae. Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Tailevu North Ovalau Open constituency me jab ki kaafi Kaiviti voters hae, aur ii ek safe SDL seat hae. Ii constituency me Ovalau Island aur Viti Levu ke east ke province Tailevu ke north ke hissa hae.

Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. ailevu South Lomaiviti Open constituency me kaafi Kaiviti voters hae, au ii ek safe SDL seat hae. Ii consituency me Ovalau ke chhorr ke, Lomaiviti ke aur sab island hae, aur Tailevu ke south ke hissa hae.

Ii contituencies me koi bhi jaat ke jan kharraa hoe sake hae aur koi bhi vote kare sake hae. Yasawa Nawaka Open constituency ek safe FLP seat hae. Ii constituency Fiji ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu ke west me, Ba district me hae.

Ii constituency me khaali Hindustani logan kharraa hoe aur vote de sake hae. Ba East ke tiino election me FLP sahaj se jiitis rahaa. Ii constituency Fiji ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu ke west me, Lautoka (city), Fiji City ke cover kare hae.

Ii constituency me khaali Hindustani logan kharraa hoe aur vote de sake hae. Lautoka Rural ke tiino election me FLP sahaj se jiitis rahaa. Ii constituency Fiji ke sab se barraa island, Viti Levu ke west me, Lautoka ke rural area me hae. 

Brahaspati:
Brahaspati (Jupiter), Saur mandal (Solar System) ke sab se barraa grah (planet) hae. aur ii Suraj se duur 5th planet hae. Brahaspati ke ek gas giant planet bola jaawe hae, kaahe ki ii bahut barraa hae aur gas se banaa hae. Duusra giant planet hae Sanigrah (Saturn), Arungrah (Uranus) aur Varungrah (Neptune). Brahaspati ke wajan 1.8986×1027 kg hae jon ki Dunia se 317.8 dafe jaada hae. This is twice the mass of all the other planets in the Solar System put together.
Brahaspati ke purana Romans log jaanat rahin aur uu logan iske Roman god, Jupiter, (Latin: "luppiter") ke naam ke baad rakkhin rahaa. Brahaspati, raat ke aasmaan me tiisra sab se brightest object hae, Chandarma aur Venus ke baad me. Brahaspati ke lage kamti se kamti 63 chandarma hae, jisme se 55 5km diameter se chhota hae. Chaar khaar chandarma hae Io, Europa, Ganymede aur Callisto. 
Banawat.
Brahaspati, Solar System ke sab se barraa planet hae, jiske diameter 142,984 km hae. Ii dunia ke diameter se 11 dafe jaada hae. 
Waatawaran.
Brahaspati ke surface ke hawaa me 85.8 to 89.8% hydrogen, 8.2 to 12.2% helium, aur 1% duusra gas hae. Planet ke aur bhittar jaao tab bahut garam rahe hae aur pressure etna jada rahe hae ki helium ras ban jaae hae aur planet ke bhitar paani barrse hae. Brahaspati ke gas Saturn ke rakam hae lekin ii Neptune aur Uranus se different har jahaan pe aur kamti hydrogen aur helium gas hae.
Jaada garmi aur pressure ke kaaran scientist logan ii nai batae sake hae ki Brahaspati ke biich me kon chij hae, kaahe ki ii rakam ke pressure dunia me nai mile hae. Iske biich se thorra bahar jaao tab ek mota hydrogen ke ras hae. Ii pressure etna jaada hae ki hydrogen karraa hoe jaawe hae lekin fir se garmii ke kaaran ras ban jaawe hae.
Wajan.
Brahaspati solar system ke aur sab planet ke jorr ke dugna garrhuu hae. Because of all the gas near the core, it gives off more heat than it gets from the sun.
Brahaspati, Dunia se 11 dafe jaada lamba hae aur 318 dafe jaada garrhu hae. Iske volume, Dunia ke volume se 1,317 dafe jaada hae, iske matlab ii hae ki 1,317 dunia isme fit hoe jaawe sake hae. 

Commonwealth Games:
Commonwealth Games, ek games hae jisme Commonwealth of Nations ke sab se achchhaa khilaari dher rakam ke khel me har chaar saal me hissa le hae. Isme algbah 5,000 athletes hissa le hae. 
Ii rakam ke pahila game ke British Empire Games ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, aur ii pahila dafe 1930 me khela gais rahaa. 1954 me iske naam badal ke British Empire and Commonwealth Games, 1970 me British Commonwealth Games, lekin 1978 se iske Commonwealth Games ke naam se jaana jaawe hae.
Commonwealth game waala city.
Tiin des jisme games sab se jaada dafe bhais hae me hae: Australia (4), Canada (4), aur New Zealand (3). Iske aalwa, paanch dafe ii games, United Kingdom ke bhitar waala des me bhais rahaa. Dui city jise ii game dui dafe bhais hae me hae: Auckland (1950 aur 1990), and Edinburgh (1970 and 1986).
1Includes 3 team sports.
2Includes 4 team sports

2010 Commonwealth Games:
2010 Commonwealth Games, 19th Commonwealth Games hae, aur 9th game hae jiske ii naam ke niche karaa gais hae. Ii Games, New Delhi, India me 3 October se lae ke 14 October 2010 talak rahii. Ii game sab se barraa multi-sport games hae jiske abhi talak Delhi aur India me karaa gais hae. Lekin hian pe 1951 aur 1982 me Asian Games bhais rahaa. Opening ceremony, Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, Delhi me hoi. Ii pahila dafe hae ki Commonwealth Games, India me hoe hae aur duusra dafe Asia me hoe hae. 1998 me Commonwealth Games, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia me bhias rahaa.
Game ke opening se kuchh din pahile, ii kuchh ulta kaaran se news me rahaa, jaise ki kharaab mausam, kharaab se banaa building, maila chhota ghar aur games village ke khatam kare me deri. ), the withdrawal of prominent athletes, and allegations of widespread corruption. Ii kaaran se games ke oganise kae waala logan ke ninda karaa gais hae lekin abhi talak koi des ii game se nikla nai hae. 
Bidding.
2010 Commonwealth Games ke khati bid kare waala dui city rahaa: Delhi, India aur Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. Iske khatir ek election November 2003 ke Commonwealth Games Federation General Assembly, Montego Bay, Jamaica me bhais rahaa aur Delhi 46 votes to 22 se jiit gais aur India me pahila dafe ii game kare ke decide karaa gais. Ii Canada m paanchwa dafe games kare ke bid rahaa. India's bid motto was "New Frontiers and Friendships".
India ke jiite ke khaas kaaran ii rahaa ki second round ke voting ke time India sab Commonwealth ke des ke US$100,000 promise karis rahaa, air tickets, boarding, lodging aur transport ke saathe. Hydrabad me karaa gais ek successful 2003 Afro-Asian Games bhi ii safalta k ek kaaran rahaa, kaah ki ii India ke resources, infrastructure and technical know-how dekhais. Isme uske Pakistan se bhi support mila rahaa. " The Indian government stated that it would underwrite the total cost of the Games.
Kharcha.
Ii game ke host kae ke puura kharcha 1,620 crore (US$358 million) hae, ii city me non-sports-related infrastructure development jaise ki airports, roads and other structures ke nai include kare hae.. Agar ji ii sach rahaa, tab 2010 Commonwealth Games sab se jaada mahanga game rahii.

Haroon Ali Shah:
Haroon Ali Shah, jon ki Fiji ke ek wakiil aur pahile ke FLP Parliamentarian hae, jiske professional misconduct ke tiin count aur unsatisfactory professional conduct ke ek count, ke khatir ndependent Legal Services Commission (ILSC) guilty paais rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke khatir Lautoka Open Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa.

Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2010:
Fiji ke 72nd Inter-district football championship, jiske Courts Homecentres sponsor karis rahaa, 7 October - 11 October 2010 talak Suva ke TFL National Stadium me khela gais rahaa.
2009 ke jiite waala team rahaa, Super Premier division me Navua, Premier division me Dreketi, Secondary Schools division me, DAV College Ba aur Primary division me, Lautoka.
Super Premier Division.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Prince Charles Park me 7 October se 10 October talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.
Premier Division.
Pool 1.
Full Results of Day two:
Savusavu 2 Seaqaqa 0, Rakiraki 3 Taveuni 0, T/North 2 Nadogo 0, T/Naita 2 Vatukoula 0, Dreketi 0 Lami 0, Nalawa 2 Bua 0, Savusavu 0 Levuka 0.
