Party of National Unity (Fiji):
Party of National Unity , jiske jaada kar ke PANU ke naam se jaana jaawe hae, Fiji ke ek political party hae. Iske 1998 me Ratu Sairusi Nagagavoka suruu karis rahaa. Iske support Ba Province me hae. 1999 ke election me PANU, Fiji Labour Party ke saathe, People's Coalition ke banis rahaa aur ii party, Fiji ke House of Representatives me chaar seat jiitis. 2001 ke election me ii ekko seat nai jiitis, lekin iske ek member, Ponipate Lesavua ke Opposition Leader Mahendra Chaudhry Senate me nominate karis rahaa. 
2004 me PANU, ek duusra Kaiviti Party jiske support Ba Province me rahaa, BKV, se combine kar ke ek nawaa party, PNP banais. Party ke sab member isse khusi nai rahin, aur PANU nakal ke 2006 ke election alag se larris (jisme uu aapan preferences ke fir se FLP ke diis, lekin ekko seat nai jiitis. 

Christian Democratic Alliance (Fiji):
Christian Democratic Alliance, jiske iske Kaiviti naam, "Veitokani ni Lewenivanua Vakarisito (VLV)", se jaada jaana jaawe hae, Fiji ke ek political party rahaa jon ki 1990s au 2000s ke suruu me active rahaa.
Ii party uu time suruu bhais rahaa jab ki 1997 me Fijian Political Party (SVT) ke ek faction party se nikal gais aur February 1999 me ii nawaa party banais. Rev. Ratu Josaia Rayawa ii party ke president banaa. Aur jaane maane member rahin Ratu Epeli Ganilau, Fiji ke pahile ke president, Ratu Sir Penaia Ganilau ke larrka aur Ratu Sir Kamisese Mara ke damaad, Adi Koila Nailatikau, RAtu Mara ke larki, Poseci Bune, Rev. Manasa Lasaro aur and Josefa Vosanibola.
1999 ke election me, ii SVT se 19% Kaviti vote hiich liis aur ii SVT ke haar ke ek kaaran rahaa. GAnilau, apne seat nai jiitis, aur Bune ke leader banawa gais. VLV Mahendra Chaudhry ke People's Coalition government join kar lis aur Bune aur Nailatikau ke Minister banawa gais. 
2000 ke coup ke baad, VLV bhi split hoe gais. Isme se dher log, jisme Rayawa aur Vosanibola rahaa, interim Prime Minister ke Soqosoqo Duavata ni Lewenivanua (SDL) ke join kar liin. Bune, Fiji LAbour Party ke join kar liis.
Party, Taniela Tabu ke niche chlte rahaa, aur 2001 ke election me dui jane ke kharraa karis. Baad me iske bachaa log SVT, nai to New Labour Unity Party join kar ke, Filipe Bole ke niche Fiji Democratic Party banain. 2005 me ii Party, ek nawaa PArty, National Alliance Party of Fiji me saamil hoe gain, jiske leader Ratu Epeli Ganilau rahaa.

Fijian Political Party:
Fijian Political Party, jiske iske Kaiviti naam ke initials, SVT ("Soqosoqo ni Vakavulewa ni Taukei") se jaada jaana jaawe hae, Fiji ke ek political party hae. Iske 1990 me Sitiveni Rabuka suruu karis rahaa aur ii 1992 se lae ke 1999 talak sarkar chalais rahaa. 1999 ke election me ii National Federation Party ke saathe coalition banais lekin election haar gais, jab ki iske 71 me se khaali 8 seat mila. 2001 ke election me ii Filipe Bole ke niche election larris lekin ii ekko seat nai jiite paais. April 2005 me SVT ke apne dissolve kar ke iske jaada member logan National Alliance Party of Fiji ke join kar liin. Kuchh memebr logan, jisme Ema Druavesi rahii SVT ke naam se ii party ke chalate rahin aur 2006 ke election me kuchh candidate bhi kharra karin lekin ii logan ke lagbag kuch vote nai mila.

United Fiji Party:
United Fiji Party, jiske iske Kaiviti naam ke initial, SDL ("Soqosoqo Duavata ni Lewenivanua") se jaada jaana jaawe hae, [ ke ek political party hae. Iske 2001 me interim Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase suruu karis rahaa. Iske Great Council of Chiefs (Bose Levu Vakaturaga) support kare hae aur jaada support Kaiviti logan se hae.
2001 ke election me SDL 71 me se 59 seat me aapan candidate kharraa karis rahaa. Iske ii election me khaali 26% vote mila lekin aur party ke preference se (jisme NFP bhi rahaa), SDl 32 seat jiitis. SDL Conservative Alliance ke saathe coalition banae ke sakar chalais. 
2006 ke election me ii majority seat jiit ke fir se sarkar banais lekin December me Army coup ka ke ii sarkar ke hatae diis.

Suruj Mati Nand:
Suruj Mati Nand, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahii, jon ki 1999 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke khatir Laucala Open Constituency ke jiitis rahaa.
19 May 2000 me, Mati uu People's Coalition Government ke 43 members me se ek rahii jiske George Speightaur uske RFMF ke rebe soldier logan hostage le liin rahaa. Uske 21 May 2000 ke chhorra gais raha jab uu ek paper pe sign kar ke Parliament me aapan seat se resign kar diis rahaa. 
Uu 2009 me Citizen's Constitutional Forum ke Steering Committee ke ek member rahii. 

Lavenia Padarath:
Lavenia Padarath (née Lavenia Wainiqolo), Fiji ke ek politician hae, jon ki 1999 ke election me Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke khatir Nausori Naitasiri Open Constituency jiitis rahaa. Uske baad me Mahendra Chaudhry ke sarkar me Minister for Women, Culture, and Social Welfare banawa gais rahaa. 2000 me 43 Government member logan ke saathe George Speight hostage banae liis rahaa. 
2001 ke election aur 2006 ke election me uu ii Constituency s fir se khara bhais rahaa lekin jiitis nai. 2006 me uske ek Seantor banawa gais rahaa. 
2014 ke election me uu FLP ke bagal se ek candidate rahii. 

Monica Raghwan:
Monica Raghwan, Fiji ke ek politician hae, jon ki 2006 ke election me United Fiji Party (SDL) ke Tupeni Baba ke harae ke [Labour Party ke khatir Samabula Tamavua Open Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banis rahaa. Joote ke baad uu Hose ke sab se jawan member rahii.
Monica Raghwan ke janam Suva, Fiji me 22 November 1967 me bhais rahaa. Uske pitaji, Vijay Raghwan, ek builder hae aur Fiji Masters Builder Association ke President hae. Veiuto Primary School me primary ke parrhai ke baad uu aapan secondary education ke parrhai Suva Grammar School me aris. Iske baad uu University of Madras, India me Bachelor of Science karis jisme uu Botany me major karis. Uu baad me University of the South Pacific se Post Graduate Diploma in Biology (Plant Breeding) karis. Fir uske Raghwan ke palwaar ke busness me kaam me lagawa gais. 
Pichhla Suva City Council ke election me uu Labour Partyk ecandidate rahii. 
2014 ke election me uske FLP ke candidate choose karaa gais. 

George Shiu Raj:
George Shiu Raj, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, lekin uu khali kuchh Hindustani me se ek hae jon ki SDL ke support kae hae. 1999 ke election me uu Ra Open Constituency se ek independent candidate se chuna gais rahaa. 2000 ke coup ke baad, Qarase ke inteim sarkar me uske Minister for Multi-Ethnic Affairs aur Assistant Minister for Regional Development rahaa. 
2001 ke election me uu SDL ke join kar liis rahaa aur aana purana seat ke fir se aur jaada majority se jiit liis rahaa. Election ke baad uu aapan maiden seech me ii batais ki Fiji pe sab ime Kaiviti ke raj rahe ke chaahi. Uske fir se Minister for Multi-Ethnic Affairs banawa gais. 30 September 2004 ke Minister for Multi-Ethnic Affairs ke position ke khaali declare karaa gais, jab Raj ii kaaran se resign karis ki uske uppar sarkari paisa ke misuse ke aarop lagawa gais. On 13 September 2005 ke uu fir se Minister banaa jab uske Fiji ke High Court acquit kar diis..
2006 ke election uu fir se sahaj me jiit gais aur uske Minister for Women aur Minister for Social Welfare, and Poverty Alleviation banawa gais. 2006 ke coup ke baad se uu sarka se baahar hae.

Jag Narain Sharma:
Jag Narain Sharma, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa jon ki 1999 ke election me Magodro Open Constituency ke Fiji Labour Party ke khatir jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. Uu Chaudhry sarkar ke 43 members me se ek rahaa, jiske May 19, 2000 ke George Speight hostage le liis rahaa.

Attar Singh:
Attar Singh, Fiji ke ek trade unionist hae. Uu Fiji Islands Council of Trade Unions (FICTU), ke General Secretary hae.
Uske parrhai Waiqele Bhartiya Pathshala aur Sangam SKM High School me bhais
Jab ki duusra Congress, Fiji Trades Union Congress (FTUC), sarkar ke citicise nai kare hae, Singh Bainimarama ke coup ke baad se criticise karis hae. ke raat ke Suva ke Queen Elizabeth Barrackslai jawa gais jahan pe uske mara gais rahaa. 
Singh, National Federation Party ke khatis dher election me larris hae. 1999 ke election me uu Laucala Indian Communal Constituency ke khatir kharra bahis aur uske 2,510 votes, some 22.2 percent of the total milaa. 2001 ke election me uu Suva City Indian Communal Constituency me kharra bhais 1976 votes (21.8 percent) mila jon ki 1999 ke election me NFP candidate se aadha rahaa. 2006 ke election me uu Suva City Open Constituency me kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uske khaali 745 votes, (6.2 percent) vote mila.
2014 ke election me uu NFp ke bagal se kharraa bhas. 

Agni Deo Singh:
Agni Deo Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani teacher hae jon ki bahut in ke yogdaan ke baad abhi Fiji Teachers Union (FTU) ke general secretary hae. 2006 ke election me uu Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
Singh ke janam Macuata, Vanua Levu me bhais rahaa. Teacher training ke baad uu Kadavu aur Nausori me parrhais. Nausori me parhae ke time uu University of the South Pacific se Certificate in Non Formal Education ,ek external student ban ke, karis.
1980 me uu FTU ke Rewa branch ke secretary banaa aur 1984 me iske pardhaan. 1987 me uu NAtional executive ke branch rep banaa aur 1992 me, assistant general secretary. 1999 me uu general secretary of the FTU banaa.
May 2006 ke election me uske Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Macuata East Open Constituency se chuna gais rahaa lekin 5 December 2006 ke military coup ke baad uu fir se trade union me laut gais. 
14 April 2007 ke, Singh ke fir se Fiji Teachers Union ke General Secretrary chuna gais. 

Gyan Singh:
Gyan Singh, Fiji ke ek politician hae, jon ki 2001 ke election me Magodro Open Constituency ke jiitis rahaa. 

Pravin Singh:
Pravin Singh (21 August 1955 - 2 September 2003), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa jon ki 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke khatir Tavua Open Constituencyke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa.
Bachpan ke din.
Singh ke janam Tavua me bhais rahaa. Uske pitaji ke naam, Dalpat Singh, aur maiya ke naam, Kanta Ben rahaa. Uske parrhai Tavua Primary School aur Natabua High school me bhias rahaa. Iske baad uu University of Delhi me Commerce parrhis aur 1980 me graduate bhais. 
Uske saadi, 1979 me, Vandhana se, Gujarat me bhais. 1980 me uu Fiji lauta, aur Balata High School me tiin saal talak parrhais, jiske baad uu aapan palwar ke supermarket ke manage kare lagaa. 
1999 me uu politics join karis aur 1999 aur 2001 me election jiitis. Parliament me uu Public Accounts, Foreign Relations aur Economic Services committee ke member rahaa. Uu 2001 se National Farmers Union ke General treasurer rahaa.
Uske lage dui larrka rahaa jon ki 1981 aur 1985 me paida bhae rahiin. Uske maut dhkka lage ke kaaran bhais. Uu aapan pichchhe aapan aapan aurat aur larrkan ke saathe, aapan maiya aur dui bhaiya aur dui bahini ke chhhor gais hae. 
19 May 2000 ke uu, Mahendra Chaudhry ke People's Coalition Government ke 43 members me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight hostage banae diis rahaa. Uske 21 May 2000 ke chhhorra gais rahaa jab uu el kagaj me sign kar ke Parliament me se resgn kar diis raha. 
2003 me Singh ke, Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase, Minister for State Properties, 13 aur FLP parliamentarians ke saathe cabinet position ke offer karis. lekin FLP iske inkaar kar diis. 
Singh ke maut ek automobile accident me 2003 me bhais rahaa.

Prem Singh:
Prem Singh Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki National Federation Party (NFP) ke member hae. 2001 ke election me uu Fiji ke House of Representatives me Nadi Open constituency se jiit ke Paliament me NFP ke khaali ek member rahaa. Uske baad me Leader of the Opposition banawa gais rahaa. 
Singh ke aapan seat Parliament me uu time chhorre ke arraa jab Supreme Court se recount ke baad Nadi Open ke Fiji Labour Party ke Krishna Prasad ke dewa gais. 
2014 ke election khatir, uske NFP ek candidate choose karis hae. 
Uu ek Justice of the Peace aur NFP Management Board ke member hae. 

Rajesh Singh:
Rajesh Singh Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki mid-2006 me ek cabinet minister rahaa. 
2006 ke election me, Singh, khaali dui Hindustani me se ek rahaa, jon ki Soqosoqo Duavata ni Lewenivanua (SDL) ke taraf se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. Uu Cunningham Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa. Isse pahile uu 2001 ke election me National Federation Party ke taraf se Ra Open Constituency se kharra bhais rahaa lekin uske khaali 8% vote mila rahaa.
2006 ke election ke baad, Singh ke Minister of State for Youth and Sports banawa gais rahaa lekin 13 October 2006 ke uske cabinet se hatae dewa gais rahaa kaahe ki uu dusra cabinat member ke saathe kaam nai kare paais.
26 May 2007 ke, 2006 ke coup ke baad, uu ii batais ki uu SDL se resign kar diis hae aur agle election me uu fir se kharraa hoi lekin SDL khatir nai. 
Singh, pahile Naitasiri Rugbu Union ke manager rahaa.

Vijay Singh (Politician):
Vijay Singh Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki 2001 ke election me Vuda Open Constituency se Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
2003 me, Singh ke 13 aur FLP ke member ke saathe Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase cabinet post ke offer karis lekn FLP iske nai liis. 
2006 ke election me uske seat ke Senator Felix Anthony ke de dewa gais. Singh ii sochat rahaa ki ske ek Senator banaw ajaai. Lekin election k baad uske Mahendra Chaudhry Senator nai banais aur uu Chudhry ke virod me mukadma karis. 

2000 coup ke hostage ke suchi:
Fiji ke Parliament ke member jiske 19 May 2000 me hostage banawa gais rahaa:
21 May (Etwaar) ke, sabere nau hostages ke chhorr dewa gais jab uu logan ek paper e sign kar ke Parliament me aapan seat se resign kar diin. Ii nau member rahin: Suruj Nand, Lekh Ram Vayeshnoi, Krishna Chand Sharma, John Ali, Ragho Nand, Anand Babla, Ami Chand, Pravin Singh aur Gaffar Ahmed.
23 May ke dui aur hostages, Michael Columbus aur Nareish Kumar ke chhoraa gais rahaa.
25 June ke paanch female hostages, Adi Ema Tagicakibau, Lavinia Padarath, Adi Koila Nailatikau,Akanisi Koroitamana aur Marieta Rigamoto
12 July - 9 hostages, Anand Singh, Leo Smith, Bill Aull, Anup Kumar, Vinod Maharaj, Pradhuman Raniga, Shiu Sharan Sharma aur Prince Gopal Lakshman ke chhora gais rahaa
13 July - Prime Minister Chaudhry aur 18 bachaa hostages ke 56 din ke baad chhprra gais rahaa.

1987 coup ke hostage ke suchi:
14 May 1987 me 28 log ke Sitiveni Rabuka hostage banais rahaa
Dui member jiske hostage nai lewa gais rahaa, kaahe k uu logan coup ke time Parliament me nai rahin, Rishi Shankar aur Edmund March rahin. Shankar New Zealand hissa gais rahaa aur March apne se army ke surender kar diis rahaa.

Punjiwaad:
Capitalism ek rakam ke paisa banae waala system hae jisme property ke log own kare hae, sarkar nai. Isme log paisa ke khair kaam kare hae aur chij, jaise ki khana ke khaide hae. 

Mudra:
Taka - Bangladesh 
Mudra (Currency) paisa ke ek unit hae jiske ek des kaam me laawe hae. 
Jaana maana urrency:
Currency names of the world, in order of the first letter, by currency name:

Kanuun:
Kanuun uu niyam hae jiske janta nai to des enforce kare sake hae. 

Ram Lagendra:
Ram Lagendra, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki National Federation Party ke member hae. 1999 ke election me uu Ba East Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir kharraa bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais rahaa. 2001 ke election aur 2006 ke election me uu Ba Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rhaa lekin fi se uu FLP ke candidate se haaris.

Satendra Singh:
Satendra Singh, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 2001 ke election me uu Ba East Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji Labour Party ke bagal se Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. Election se pahile uu Fiji Sugar Corporation ke farm advisor rahaa. 
2003 me, Singh ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase, Minister for Environment ke cabinet post ke offer karis lekin FLP iske inkaar kar diis. 

Jain Kumar:
Jain Kumar (Janam: 1959) ke 19 January 2007 ke Fiji ke Sugar Cane Growers Council ke pardhaan chuna gais rahaa. Uske Vijendra Autar ke jagah pe chuna gais rahaa, jiske Jagannath Sami aur aath aur board members jiske deposed sarkar appoint karis rahaa, ke sathe sack kar dewa gais rahaa Kumar, isse pahile Council ke Vice Chairman aur National Farmers Union pe President rahaa. 2001 me uu Fiji Sugar Cane Growers Council me Rarawai Sector se chuna gais rahaa. 2006 ke election uu Fiji Labour Party ke ticket se Ba East Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
September 2009 me sarkar Fiji Sugar Cane Growers Council ke aapan kaam November talak band kare ke batais aur Kumar iske kaaran 
National Farmers Union aur Fiji Cane Growers Association ke batais.

Narendra Kumar Padarath:
Narendra Kumar Padarath (1958 - ), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki 2006 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Ba West Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
Uu abhi Poultry Industry Association of Fiji ke pardhaan hae. 
2014 ke election me uske FLP ke candidate choose karaa gais. 

New Labour Unity Party (Fiji):
New Labour Unity Party (NLUP) Fiji ke ek political party rahaa, jon ki May 2001me Fiji Labour Party se alag hoe ke ek nawaa aprty banais rahaa. Iske suruu kare waala Tupeni Baba rahaa, jon ke Mahendra Chaudhry ke sarkar me a Deputy Prime Minister rahaa. Baba ii sochat rahaa ki aga Chaudhry fir se jiita tab Fiji me fir se coup hoi.
2001 ke election me New Labour Unity Party, judiciary ke aur tagatwar kar ke maang karis aur Value Added Tax ke kamti kare ke aur kuchh khaas chij pe se ekdam hatae ke maang karis. NLUP ek non-racialist Fiji ke waada karis aur corruption ke khatam kare ke khatir ek parliamentary code of conduct ke bhi maang karis. Party 45 seats ke contest karis lekin iske khaali dui seat jiite paais, Baba apane haar gais. Campaign ke time ii pataa chalaa ki party ke Australian conman, Peter Foster, F$200,000 diis rahaa. Foster actually $1 million in supporting New Labour me laais rahaa aur Baba ke "Nelson Mandela of the South Pacific." batais rahaa
Election ke baad, House of Representatives me, NLUP ke dui member ek saathe nai rahin. Kenneth Zinck sarkar me ghus gais aur ek Minister ban gais, jab ke Ofa Swann Opposition ke join kar liis. Party ke jaada member, June 2002 me ii decide karin ki uu logan tiin aur party ke saathe ek nawaa party, Fiji Democratic Party, banaiye. 

Muthu Swamy:
Muthu Swamy, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Labasa Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
19 May 2000 ke Swamu uu 43 People's Coalition Government ke member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske RFMF ke rebel soldeir logan hostage le liin rahaa. Uske 13 July 2000 ke 56 din ke captivity ke baad rihaa karaa gais rahaa.
Swamy pahila dafe Fiji ke House of Representatives me 1998 me ek by-election me chuna gais rahaa. 
Uske khaas haanth 1998 aur 2001 me National Farmers Union ke Sugar Cane Growers Council elections me jiit me rahaa.
Uske maut 13 May 2001 ke Ba me Fiji Labour Party ke National Council meeting me hissa le ke baad bhais rahaa.

James Shri Krishna:
James Shri Krishna, Fiji ke ek Hindustani poitician rahaa. 2001 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke ticket pe Labasa Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
2003 me Krishna ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase Minister for Natural Disaster Management ke posttion offer kais lekin FLP iske inkaar kar diis. 

Kamlesh Reddy:
Kamlesh Reddy, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki 2006 ke election me Labour Party ke icket pe Labasa Indian Communal Constituency ke jii ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa.

Fijian Association Party:
Fijian Association Party (FAP), Fiji ke ek political party rahaa. Ii party ke khaas haanth Fiji ke politica me 1990s me rahaa lekin 2001 ke election me ii aapan sab seat haar gais rahaa. 
Ii party ke 1994 me Josefata Kamikamica, jon ki purana Alliance sarkar me Finance Minister rahaa, suruu karis rahaa. 1992 ke election ke baad Kamikamica, aur uske paanch aur saathi, Rabuka ke Fijian Political Party se nikal gain rahaa. FAP, 1994 ke election me paanch seat jiitis rahaa. 1996, me Kamikamica ke maut ke baad, Ratu Mara ke larrka, Finau Mara, iske leader banaa. 1998 me Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke 1987 ke Prime Minister Timoci Bavadra ke aurat, "Adi" Kuini Speed iske leadership liis. 
1999 ke election me FAP, Mahendra Chaudhry ke FLP ke saathe People's Coalition banais aur duusra Party ke saathe aur ii Coalition election ke jiit gais. Isme FAP 10 seat aur FLP 37 seat jiitis rahaa. Speed Prime Minister bane maangat rahii, lekin President Mara Chaudhry ke P.M. banais kaahe ki uske Party ke majority House of Representatives me rahaa. 1999 me FAP split hoe gais jab Ratu Tu'uakitau Cokanauto aur uske supporter logan Party se nikal gain. 
2001 ke election hoe talak FAP ke dher member logan Laisenia Qarase ke Soqosoqo Duavata ni Lewenivanua join kar liin rahaa. FAP khaali 15 seat contest karis aur ekko nai jiitis. 
June 2002 me FAP, aur tiin Party ke saathe, Fiji Democratic Party ke banais aur ii Party April 2005 me National Alliance Party of Fiji ke ek hissa hoe gais.

FGWC:
FGWC (Farmers and General Workers Coalition), Fiji ke ek chhota political party rahaa, jon ki 1999 ke election me Labasa ke dui Hindustani constituency me candidate kharraa karis rahaa. Iske ek candidate, Sanju Reddy ke 15% vote mila aur duusra candidate ke khaali 2%
1999 ke election me iske candidate rahaa:

National Alliance Party of Fiji:
National Alliance Party of Fiji (NAPF), Fiji ke ek political party hae. NAPF ke formally 18 January 2005 ke Ratu Epeli Ganilau register karis rahaa. Iske purana Alliance Party ke successor maana jaawe hae. Iske aur neta rahin: university lecturer Meli Waqa as party secretary, and Manu Korovulavula as treasurer. The Deputy Leader Hirdesh Sharma rahaa. NAPF ke Suva me 8 April 2005 ke launch karaa gais rahaa.
NAPF me Fiji Democratic Party saamil hoe gais aur iske pahile ke leader, Filipe Bole, ek khaas role liis. Aur khaas log rahin Bill Aull, Fereti Dewa, Joji Uluinakauvadra, aur Irene Jai Narayan.

Pradeep Singh:
Labasa's current Mayor, elected on 28 October 2005 following the municipal election to the Town Council one week earlier, is Dr Pradeep Singh (born:21 July 1957 at the Colonial War Memorial Hospital in Suva ) of the Fiji Labour Party (FLP).
Singh, a graduate from Khalsa College, Chandigarh, did his MBBS from Ranchi Medical College in Bihar and then settled in Labasa in 1986.

Fiji ke prime minister ke suchi:

Anup Kumar:
Anup Kumar, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa, jon ki 1999 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Vanua Levu West Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. Iske baad uu Mahendra Chaudhry ke Peoples Coalition Government me Minister for Commerce, Business Development & Investment banaa.
19 May 2000 me, Kumar uu People's Coalition Government ke 43 membe me se ek rahaa, jiske George Speight aur uske rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) ke soldiers ke saathi hostage le liis rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chhorra gais rahaa. 

Prince Gopal Lakshman:
Prince Gopal Lakshman, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. Uu 1999 se 2006 talak uu Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member rahaa. Uu Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke ticket pe Viti Levu South Kadavu Indian Communal Constituency se 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election se chuna gais rahaa.
19 May 2000 ke, Lakshman, Mahendra Chaudhry ke People's Coalition Government ke uu 43 member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske rebel soldier logan hostage le liin rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chhorraa gais rahaa. 
Uske bhaiya ke larka Chaitanya Lakshman uske succeed kais rahaa.
Personal life.
Lakshman, B. D. Lakshman, jon ki 1940 se 1944 aur 1959 se 1963 talak Legislative Council ke member rahaa, ke larkaa hae. Uske dui larrkan hae. 

Mohammed Tahir:
Mohammed Tahir Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae. 2006 ke election me Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke ticket pe jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 

Mohammed Rafiq:
Mohammed Rafiq, Fiji ke ek Hindustani wakiil aur politician hae. 1999 ke election me uu Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency se National Federation Party (NFP) ke ticket pe kharra bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke candidate se haar gais rahaa. 2001 ke election me uu Macuata East Open Constituency se kharra bhais rahaa lekin fir se kharrab se haar gais. 1993 me Mohammed Lateef Subedar ke maut ke baad uu by-election me Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke ticket pe kharraa hoe ke ii seat ke jiit gais. 2006 ke election me uu fir se NFP ke bagal se Labasa Rural Indian Communal Constituency se kharra bhais aur fir se haar gais.
Rafik, Fiji Cane Growers Association ke Executive Officer hae. 
2014 ke election khatir, uske NFP ek candidate choose karis hae. 

Tagitagi Sangam School:
Tagitagi Sangam School (School Code: 1040), Tavua ke ek Primary School hae jiske Sangam chalae hae. 2006 me ii school me 370 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Nanuku Sangam School:
Nanuku Sangam School( School Code: 034), Rakiraki ke ek primary school hae jiske, Sangam chalae hae. 2006 me ii school me 114 larrkan parrhat rahin.

Harilal Manilal Patel:
Harilal Manilal Patel (janam: 1941), Fiji ke ek Hindustani wakiil aur Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member rahaa. 
Usk janam Suva me bhais rahaa. 1968 me University of Auckland se wakiili parr ke K. C. Ramrakha ke saathe practice kare lagaa. 1977 me uu aapan practice suruu karis. 
Uu National Federation Party (NFP) ke Sva banch ke President rahaa aur Suva City Council ke member bhi rahaa. Uu NFP Youth ke suruu kare waala log me se ek rahaa. September 1977 ke election me uuNFP-Flower Faction ke bagal se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin jiitis nai.
1987 ke election me uu NFP-Labour Coalition ke bagal se Suva City Communal Constituency ke jiitis rahaa. , lekin Parliament ke member khaali ek mahina talak rahaa jab ki 1987 ke coup uske political caree ne chaak lagae diis. 1994 ke election me uu, Suva City Central Indian Constituency ke sahaj me jiit gais. 

Ragho Nand:
Ragho Nand ( - 26 February 2016), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa, jon ki 2006 ke election ke baad multi-party cabinet me ek minister bhi rahaa.
Fiji ke House of Representatives me uu Tailevu Rewa Indian Communal Constituency se 1999 ke election, 2001 ke election aur 2006 ke election me chuna gais rahaa. 
19 May 2000 me, Nand uu 43 People's Coalition Government ke member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldiers from the Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit hostage banae liis rahaa. Uske 21 May 2000 ke chhorra gais rahaa jab ki uu ek paper pe sign kar ke Parliament se resign kar diis rahaa.
2003 me, Nand ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase, Minister for Drainage and Flood Protection & Management ke post offer karis rahaa, lekin FLP ii offer ke nai liis.
2006 ke election jiite ke baad, uske Minister for Employment Opportunities and Productivity banawa gais rahaa. FLP ke Cabinet member logan ke leader, Mahendra Chaudhry, 2006 budget ke virod me vote kare ke batawa gais rahaa aur Nand tiin sur saaathi ke saathe budget ke virod me vote karis. Ii chaar FLP ke Cabinet member ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase resign hoe ke batais, lekin 2006 coup hoe gais iske baare me kuchh kare se pahile.
Uu pahile ek teacher rahaa.
2014 ke election me uu NFP ke bagal se kharraa hoe hae. 

International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement:
International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement ek movement hae jon ki insaan ke jindagi aur tabiyat ke bachae hae. 
Jab ki ii ek barraa sanstha hae, ii privately owned hae aur Red Cross pe koi sarkar pe control nai hae.
Ii movement me tiin chij hae:
The Red Cross, the Red Crescent and the Red Crystal,the three international symbols of the Red Cross

Chakotra:
Chakotra (Vaigyaanik naam: "Citrus maxima", English: "Pomelo, Chinese grapefruit", Kaiviti: "Molikana", Bengali - Batabi-Lebu, Chakkota in kannada, tab nebo in maithili ) ek rakam ke nabbu hai jon ki nabbu palwaar me sab se barraa hai. Iske size ek basketball ke rakam hoe sake hai aur iske vajan 1 -2 kg tak hoe sake hai. Iske rang green nai to piiyar hoe hai. jab ki ye agar paka hua rahe tab iska flesh pink se laal ho sakta hai.
Scooby ka head bhi Chakotra jaisa hai.

Sirrsa:
Sirrsa (Scientific naam: "Albizia saman", English: "Rain Tree", Kaiviti: "Vaivai") ek rakam ke barraa perr hai jiske wide canopy aur symmetrical crown hai. Ii perr 25 meters talak uuncha hoe sake hai aur iske canopy ke diameter 40 meters talak rahe sake hai. Iske patti pani aur raat ke batur jaae hai. 

Damu:
Damu (Scientific naam: "Lutjanus argentimaculatus", English: "Mangrove red snapper, Mangrove Jack", Kaiviti: "Damu") ek rakam ke machhri hai jon ki tiritiri aur naddi ke mouth pe pawa jaae hai. Isme kabhi kabhi jahar rahe hai.
Damu ke rang burnt orange, copper, to bronze aur dark reddish-brown rahe hae, aur ii rang iske umar aur environment pe depend hoe hae. Kamti umar ke machhri, jiske naddi ke muh ke lage pakrraa jaae hae, budha machhri se darker rahe hae aur ii reef pe pakrraa jaae machhri se bhi darker rahe hae. Iske side me lighter vertical bands bhi rahe hae.

Balambala:

Dakua:

Paakarr:

Kanace:
Kanace (Scientific naam: "Mugil cephalus", English: "Mullet", Kaiviti: "Kanace") ek rakam ke machhri hai jiske tiritiri aur naddi ke muh pe paawa jaae hae. Isme kabhi kabhi jahar rahe hae.

Kawango:
Kawango (Scientific naam: "Lethrinus nebulosus", English: "Sprangled emporer", Kaiviti: "Kawago") ek rakam ke machhri hai jiske Pacific aur Indian Ocean ke garam jagah pe pawa jaae hai.
Kawango invertebrates aur chhota machhri khaawe hae. Kuchh species ke lage molariform (molar-like) taanth hae jisse ii shelled invertebrates, jaise ki mollusks aur crabs khaawe hae.

Kawakawa:
Kawakawa (Scientific naam: "Epinephelus merra", English: "Rock cod", Kaiviti: "Kawakawa") ek rakam ke machhri hai jon ki samundar me rock ke biich me rahe hai.
Ii Epinephelus genus ke ek chhota machhri hae jon ki lamba se lamba 31 cm talak rahe hae. Kawakawa jaada kar ke kekrraa aur duusra machhri khaawe hae. Iske jaada kar ke Pacific Ocean ke reef ilaka me pawa jaawe hae, South Africa se lae keAustralia, aur Japan ke agal bagal ke island talak.. 
Ii ek rakam ke machhri hae jon ki aapan sex badle sake hae.

Ongo:
Ongo (Scientific naam: "Sphyraena barracuda", English: " Barracuda", Kaiviti: "Ogo") ek rakam ke machhri hai jon ki samundar me pawa jaae hai. Ii 6 feet tak lamba rahe sake hai aur iske lage bahut tagatwar jaw hai.

Tagimoucia:
Tagimoucia (pronounced:tahng-ee-mo-thee-ya), (Scientific name: "medinilla waterhousei"), Fiji ke national fuul hai, jon ki ek faile waala paudha me laal rang ke fuul, jiske biich ujjar hai, ke fuul hai. Iske chapa ke Fiji ke dher postage stamp me rakkha gais hai. Ii fuul ke khali Taveuni ke Mount Uluigalau ke uppar volcanic cratar se banaa talao ke kinare pawa jaae hai. Bahut kosis kare par bhi iske aur koi jagah nai jamawa jae sakaa hai. Kaiviti log batae hai ki ii fuul ek larrki, jon ki fuul ke vine me fas gais rahaa, ke aansu se banaa hai. Iske baare me aur khissa bhi hai lekin Kaviviti me iske naam ke matlab hai: "niind me ro"

Bulbul:
Bulbul, (Scientific name: "Pycnonotus jocosus"), ek Asia ke chirria hai jiske tropical asia ,jisme India, South-East Asia aur China hai, me pawa jaae hai. Iske New South Wales, Mauritius, Fiji aur Florida me bhi introduce karaa gais hai. Ii chirria fal ke bia ras aur kirwa khae hai. 

Bougainvillea:
Bougainvillea (scientific naam: "Bougainvillea spectabilis"), South America ke ek fuul waala perr hai. Iske perr me kanta hai aur ii ek faile waala perr hai jon ki 1-12 meters lamba rahe hai. Ii perr tropical jagah me sab time green rahe hai. Iske patti, 4-13 cm lamba aur and 2-6 cm chakla rahe hai. Iske fuul chhota rahe hai aur dher rang ke rahe sake hai. Fiji me ii fuul ke sab bagal boya jaae hai aur Ba me ek festival, Bougainvillea Carnival ii fuul ke naam se rakha gais hai.

Fiji Crested Iguana:

Naura:
Naura (scientific naam: " Helogale parvula"), ek chhota gos khaae waala janwar hai. Iske English naam, "mangoose", Marathi sabd, "mangus", se aais hai. Naura, Asia, Africa aur Southern Europe ke native hai, lekin iske Caribbean aur Fiji me introduce karaa gais hai. Naura, kirwa, kekrra, earthworm, bustuina, saamp, murgi aur chuha khaae hai. Naura ke kuchh species jaharila saamp ke bhi maare sake hai.

Maina:
Maina (scientific naam: " Acridotheres tristis"), South aur East Asia ke native hai, lekin iske North America, Australia New Zealand aur Fiji me introduce karaa gais hai. Maina, ek medium size ke chirriya hai jiske lage tagrra gor aur jon ki sidha line me urre hai. Maina kirwa aur fal khaae hai. Iske pakhna, dark rang ke rahe hai, jaada kar ke brown rang aur ii perr ke gadhaa me rahe hai.

Gadraa:
Gadraa (Scientific naam: "Chrysopogon zizanioides", English: "cuscus grass, khus-khus, vetiver grass", Kaiviti: "mulimuli") ek rakam ke grass hai jiske Fiji me soil erosion ke roke khatir kaam me lawa jaae hai. Ii garam des me hoe hai.

Ghoraiya:
Ghoraiya (Scientific naam: "Eleusine indica ", English: "Indian goosegrass, Wiregrass, Crowfootgrass", Kaiviti: "kavoronaisivi, vorovoroisivi") ek rakam ke giras hai jiske weed maana jaae hae. Ii garam des me hoe hae.

International Monetary Fund:
International Monetary Fund (IMF) ek international sanstha hae. 189 des,last desh noru hai International Monetary Fund ke member hae. Iske headquarters Washington, D.C., USA me hae. By. 2401
Kaam.
IMF ke kaam hae des ke biich me paisa ke len den me madat kare ke. 
Iske kuchh khaas kaam hae:

Universal Declaration of Human Rights:
Universal Declaration of Human Rights, United Nations General Assembly ke ek announcement hae. Isme basic human rights -- jon hak sab insaan ke hoe ke chaahi, ke baare me batae hae. Iske United Nations General Assembly December 10, 1948 ke adopt karis rahaa.

World Health Organization:
World Health Organization (WHO) United Nations (UN) ke ek hissa hae, jon ki international public health ke khatir kaam kare hae. Iske headquarters Geneva, Switzerland me hae. WHO ke UN 7 April , 1948 ke suruu karis rahaa.

World Bank Group:
World Bank Group paanch international sastha ke ek group hae. World Bank Group, member des ke advice aur finance for economic development aur poverty kamti kae ke khatir de hae. Ii ek non-profit-making international organization hae jiske member governments own kare hae. Group ke headquarters Washington, D.C. e hae. Iske office 124 member countries me hae. 
Iske 27th December 1945. ke Bretton Woods, New Hampshire me suruu karaa gais rahaa.
The group.
Ii paanch organisation World Bank Group ke member hae:

World Trade Organization:
World Trade Organization (WTO) kai desho ke ek sanstha hai. WTO 1995 me shuru kiya tha. 15 December 2005 ke 153 desh WTO ke member rahe. WTO me, desh ke biich me samjhaute hue hai. “GATT” samjhauta ke matlab hai ki desh international trade ke bariers ke hatae hae .

Civil war:
Civil war, uu larrai hae jon ki ek des me dher group ke biich me hoe hae.

Fauj:
Military uu log ke bola jaawe hae jiske des ke defend kare ke jimmewaari rahe hae. 

Santi:
Santi uu time ke bola jaawe hae jab koi larrai, nai to yudh nai howe hae. .

Yudh:
Yudh uu rakam ke larrai rahe hae jisme des nai to log barra rakam se larre hae.

Abortion:
Abortion uu time hoe hae jab ki ek janwar me preganancy ke bachcha paida hoe se pahile khatam kar dewa jaawe hae.

Capital punishment:
Death penalty uu rakam ke saja hae jisme guilty pawa gais jan ke jaan le lewa jae hae.

Fiji ke Governor ke suchi:
In 1970, Fiji gained independence from the United Kingdom. After independence, the viceroy in Fiji was the Governor-General of Fiji.

Vidhaan:
Ek des ke vidhaan ek khaas rakam ke kaanun hae jiske niche sarkar chale hae. 
Duusra websites.
The US Constitution in basic English

Insaan ke adhikaar:
Insaan ke adhikaar uu bichar hae jiske niche log ke adhikaar hae kaahe ki uu logan insaan hae. 

Gulami:
Gulami ek akam ke paisa banae waala system hae jisme log ke bina paisa aur koi adkikar ke aam karawa jaawe hae.

India ke national anthem:
India ke national anthem ke Rabindranath Tagore likhis rahaa

South Africa ke national anthem:

Anaar:
Anaar (English: pomegranate), (Scientific name: "Punica granatum"), ek rakam ke fal de waala patajhaṛī jhaarri, nai to perr, hai jon ki 5 -8 metre lamba hoe sake hai. Ii biswas karaa jaae hai ki anaar Persia aur India se suruu hoe ke Mediterranean me fael gais hai. Span me ek city ke naam (Granada), anaaar ke naam se aais hai

Akchhar:
Akchhar (alphabet) ek bhasa ke likhe ke hatir symbol ke suchi hae.

Sanskriti:
Sanskriti ek sabd hae jon ki log ke rahan sahan e baare me hae.Ye logo ke rahene ke tarike ko batata hai khaha vo rahete hai.

Art:
Art sabd ke kaam me laae ke insaan se banawa gais chij jon ki dekhe me achchha lage hae, ke describe karaa jaawe hae. 

Comics:
Comics jon ki "comic strips" ke chhota karaa gais sabd hae, jaada kar ke newspaper me pawa jaawe hae.

Painting:
Painting ek rakam ke art hae jiske rang se banawa gais hae.

Photography:
Photography ek rakam ke chhapa hae jiske ek camera se lewa gais hae. 

Sculpture:
Sculpture ek rakam ke art hae. 

Pottery:
Pottery wo chij hae jon ki matti ke banaa rahe hae. 

Dance:
Dance uu chij ke bole hae jab log musical rhythm pe move hoe hae. 

Fashion:
Fashion jaada kar ke log ke pahina gais kaprraa ke baare me rahe hae. 

Theatre:
Theatre uu jagha hae jahan pe play perform karaa jaawe hae. 

Calligraphy:
Calligraphy likhe ke art form hae. 

Victoria (Australia):
Victoria, Australia ke ek state hae. Ii Australia ke south-east corner me hae. Iske capital city aur sab se barraa city Melbourne hae. 
Victoria ke population o5,110,500 (2006) hae.
State ke emblem hae:
- Floral: Pink Heath
- Aquatic: Weedy Seadragon
- Bird: Helmeted honeyeater
- Faunal: Leadbeater's Possum
- Colour: Navy

New South Wales:
New South Wales, Australia ke ek state hae. 

Queensland:
Queensland, Australia ke ek stste hae. Agar area dekha jaae tab ii Australia ke duusra sab se barraa state hae lekin agar population deha jaae tab ii tisra sab se barra state hae. Iske opulation lagbhag 4 million hae aur iske capital city, Brisbane hae. 

Tasmania:
Tasmania, Australia ke mainland se 240 kilometres (150 mi) south me ek barraa island hae. Ii dunia ke 26th sab se barraa island hae. Iske population (June 2010 me) 507, 626 rahaa, jisme se aadha log Hobart me, nai to iske bagal me, rahe hae. Iske area 62,409 square kilometres (24,096 sq mi) hae. Ii ek state bhi hae aur iske capital city Hobart hae.

South Australia:
South Australia, Australia ke chhe stste me se ek hae. Iske capital city Adelaide hae.

Western Australia:
Western Australia, Australia ke chhe state me se ek hae. Agar jo area dekha jaae tab ii sab se barraa state hae, lekin jab population dekha jae tab ii 4th sab se barraa state hae. Iske capital city, Perth hae.

Northern Territory:
Northern Territory Australia ke el territory hae. Iske capital city Darwin hae. == Floral Emblem ==

Australian Capital Territory:
Australian Capital Territory nai to "ACT", Australia ke ek chhota teritory hae jiske Australia ke capiyal city ke banae ke khati banawa gais rahaa. Isme Australia ke capital Canberra hae.

Fiji ke political party ke suchi:

Karnataka:
Karnataka, India ke ek state hae. Iske area 74,122 mi² (191,976 km²) hae, aur ii Syria se barraa lekin Senegal se chhota hae.
Karnataka ke capital city, Bangalore hae. Aur barraa city, Mysore aur Hubli-Dharwad hae. 
Karnataka ke jaada log Kannada bhasa me baat kare hae.
Karnataka ke west me Arabian Sea, northwest me Goa, north me Maharashtra, east me Andhra Pradesh, south me Tamil Nadu aur south-west me Kerala hae.

Kerala:
Kerala (കേരളം), India ke ek state hae. Iske west me Arabian Sea aur east me Tamil Nadu aur Karnataka hae. Iske capital city, Thiruvananthapuram hae. Iske area 15,005 mi² (38,863 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Bhutan se baraa lekin Switzerland se chhota hae.

Madhya Pradesh:
Madhya Pradesh, India ke ek state hae. Ii state ke area 119016 km2 hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Italy e barraa, lekin Oman se chhota hae. Iske capital city, Bhopal lekin sab se barra city Indore hae. Madhya Pradesh ke west me Rajasthan aur Gujarat, south me Maharashtra, east me Chhatisgarh aur north me Uttar Pradesh hae.

Maharashtra:
Maharashtra, India ke ek state hae. Hian ke log jaada kar ke Marathi bhasa me baat kare hae. Agar jo area dekha jaae tab ii India ke tiisra sab se barraa state hae, lekin jab poplation dekha jaae tab ii India ke duusra sab se barraa state hae. Mumbai, Maharashtra ke sab se barraa city aur capital city hae. 
Maharashtra, India ke west me hae aur iske west me Arabian Sea hae. Saat aur state ke border ii state se mile hae. Iske area 118,530 mi² (306,993 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ye Italy se barraa aur Oman se chhota hae.

Manipur:
Manipur, India ke ek state hae. Iske area 8,628 mi² (22,347 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii State of Israel se barraa lekin Belize se chhotaa hae. Manipur, India ke northeast me hae aur iske capital city Manipur hae. Iske north me Nagaland, south me Mizoram, west me Assam aur Myanmar hae. Manipur ke capital city Imphal hae.

Meghalaya:
Meghalaya (Bangla: মেঘালায়), India ke ek state hae. Iske area 8,700 mi² (22,720 km² hae),jiske matlab ii hae ki ii State of Israelse barraa lekin Belize se chhota hae. Iske capital Shillong hae.

Mizoram:
Mizoram, India ke ek state hae, jon ki India ke east me [[Bangladesh ke uu paar hae. Iske area 8,139 mi² (21,081 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii El Salvador se barraa, lekin State of Israel se chhota hae.
Iske border Tripura, Assam, Manipur, Bangladesh aur Myanmar se hae. Iske capital city Aizawl hae.

Nagaland:
Nagaland, India ke ek state hae jon ki des ke north-east me hae. Iske area 6,401 mi² (16,579 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii East Timor se barraa lekin Swaziland se chhota hae. Iske capital city Kohima hae.

Orissa:
Orissa, India ke east coast me ek state hae. Iske area 60,162 mi² (155,820 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Nepalse barraa, lekin Tunisia se chhota hae. Iske capital city Bhubaneswar hae.

Rajasthan:
Rajasthan, India ke northwest me ek [ hae. Agar jo area dekha jaae tab ii India ke sab se baraa state hae, lekin iske population 56,473,122 (8th) hae. Iske area 132,150 mi² nai to 342,269 km² hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Republic of the Congo se barraa lekin Germany se chhota hae. Thar Desert, ii state ke jaada ilaka ke cover kare hae. Iske capital city Jaipur hae.
Rajasthan me Thar ka registan hae.

Sikkim:
, India ke ek state hae. Agar jo population (540,493) dekha jaae tab ii India ke duusra sab se chhota state hae, aur ii area (2,745 mi² (7,110 km²)) me bhi dusra sab se chhota state hae. Dunia ke ttsra sab se barraa pahaarr, Mt. Kanchendzonga (28,208 Ft asl) bhi ii state me hae. Iske capital Gangtok hai aur duusra barraa town hae Gayzing, Pelling, Yuksam aur Jorethang. 
AnguThaa aakaar ka ii state ke paschim me Nepal, uttar me Chinese Tibet sate hae aur poorv me bhutan hae.

Tripura:
Tripura, India ke ek state hae. Ii des ke east me Bangladesh ke uu par hae. Iske area 4,036 mi² or 10,453 km² hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Lebanon se barraa lekin Kosovo se chhota hae.

Uttarakhand:
Uttarakhand, jiske 2000 se 2006 tak Uttaranchal ke naam se jaana jaa rahaa tha . Bharat ke ek raajya hae. Iska jan sankhya 8,479,562 (census 2001) he. Iske area 20,682 mi² (53,566 km²) he, jiska matlab ee hae ki ee Bosnia our Herzegovina se badaa , lekin Croatia se chota he. Iska Rajadhani Dehradun he.

West Bengal:
West Bengal (Bengali: পশ্চিমবঙ্গ), India ke east me ek state hae. Iske capital city, Kolkata hai. 2001 me iske population 80,221,171 rahaa. Iske area 34,267 mi² (88,752 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii Serbia se barraa, lekin Jordan se chhota hae. 
Provincial symbols of West Bengal.
West Bengal ke kuchh khaas log

Hyderabad, India:
Hyderabad, India ke Andhra Pradesh state ke sab se barraa aur capital city hae. Its population is over 4 million. 

Girmit Heritage Party:
Girmit Heritage Party (GHP), Fiji ke ek political party rahaa, jon ki 2000 coup se displaced Hindustani logan ke khatir banawa gais rahaa.
2000 ke coup ke baad Muaniveni, Naitasiri aur Dawasamu, Tailevu ke log ke attack karaa gais aur dher log ke Kaiviti terrorist logan piitin, aurta ke rape karin au property ke damage karin. Ii logan hissa ke Lautoka (city), Fiji ke Girmit Centre me aae ke rahin. Ek admii jon ki camp pe raht rahaa, Beni Sami, aur New Zealand me rahe waala Fiji ke ek Hindustani, Anit Singh, ke GHP ke banae me haanth rahaa.
Ii refugee logan ke sarkar se koi madat nai mila rahaa, aur camp ke organise kare waala log ke Fiji Labour Party aur Fiji Human Rights Group ke saathe achchha relationship nai rahaa, kahe ki ii organisation logan camp ke orgaisers ke paise de se inkaar kar diin rahaa.
GHP ii mangat rahaa ke sarkar has ek displaced kisan ke $60,000 de.
2001 ke election me GHP Lautoka City Indian Communal Constituency aur Lautoka Rural Indian Communal Constituency ke contest karis aur iske candidate ke 0.5% se kamti vote mila.
2009 me GHP active rahaa, jab ki iske representative, Anit Singh, ek political block se GHP ke bahaar rakkhe ke virod me awaaj uthaes.

Itanagar:
Itanagar, India ke state, Arunachal Pradesh ke capital hae. 
Geography.
Itanagar is located at . It has an average elevation of 440 metres (1443 feet).

Dispur:
Dispur, India ke state, Assam ke capital hae. Ii Guwahati ke ek hissa hae. Pahile Shillong, Assam ke capital rahaa, lekin jab iske nikal ke Meghalaya me kar dewa gais tab Dispur capital banaa. 

Raipur:
Raipur, India ke state, Chhattisgarh ke capital city hae. Ii city Raipur District ke Administrative Capital bhi hae. Ii 1 November 2000 se pahile Madhya Pradesh ke ek hissa rahaa. Raipur ke opulation 605,131 hae (2001 ke sensus) 

Panaji:
Panaji, India ke state Goa ke capital hae. Iske population 65,000 hae. 

Gandhinagar:
Gandhinagar, India ke state Gujarat ke capital city hae. Ii ek nawaa banawa gais city hae. 

Chandigarh:
Chandigarh, India ke dui state, Haryana aur Punjab ke capital city hae, lekin ii koi state me nai hae aur ek Union teritory hae.
Sukhna jheel.
Sukhna jheel shehar ke utri bhaag me hae . It has The Garden of Silence within it.
Tota pakshi dhrohar.
Tota pakshi dhrohar (English:Parrot Bird Sanctuary Chandigarh) Chandigarh ke sector 21 mae raha

Chaena akchhar:
Chaena akchhar (Chinese characters) uu chinh hae jiske chaina bhasa aur Japanese bhasa ke likhe me kaam me lawa jaawe hae. 

Cyrillic akchhar:
Cyrillic akchhar (Cyrillic alphabet) (pronounced 'sih-ril-ic') Slavic log ke alphabet hae. Iske abhi Russian, Ukrainian, Belarusian, Rusyn, Bulgarian, Macedonian aur sab Serbo-Croatian bhasa me baat karaa jaawe hae. Cyrillic alchar niche hae:

Greek Akchhar:
Abhi ke Greek Akchhar (Greek alphabet) me 24 akchhar hae . Iske kaam me laae ke Greek bhasa lika jaae sahe hae.

Shimla:
Shimla, jiske pahileSimla ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa, India ke state Himachal Pradesh ke capital city hae. 1864 me Shimla ke British Raj ke caital banawa gais rahaa. 

Srinagar:
Srinagar, India ke state, Jammu and Kashmir ke capital city hae. Ii Jhelum Naddi ke kinare hae. Srinagar Jammu aor kasmir ki rajdhani he.kasmir ghati ke bechh me istith me bass parmukh paryatan ke liye famous he. Srinagar bears rup se Dal river aor anek temple ke liye Jana jata he.

Ranchi:
Ranchi, India ke state Jharkhand ke capital city hae. Iske 1,126,741 population lagbhag hae (2011 ke census).

Bengaluru:
Bangalore, India ke Karnataka state ke capital city hae. Iske population aath aur aadha million hae.
Bangalore Bharat Raj ki rajdhani kantarack me situated he.benglore city ki population 84 lakhs h and metapolitian ki population lagvag 89 lakh he. Aor yah Bharat Ka tisara sabse bara city he. Iske South me dakan Ka paleteam situated he. Yah Nagar sal Bhar suhwane mosam ke liye Jana jata he. 

Thiruvananthapuram:
Thiruvananthapuram, India ke state, Keralake capital city hae. Iske population 889,191 (2001 ke census).

Bhopal:
Bhopal, India ke state Madhya Pradesh ke capital city hae. Bhopal Nagar ka Nirman Raja Bhoj ne kiya tha. Bhopal mein Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited Naam Ka Karkhana hae Haal hi Mein Bhartiya Antriksh Anusandhan Kendra Ne apna dusra master control facility Lagai hae Bhopal mein Bhartiya Van prabhandhan Sansthan bhi hae jo Bharat Mein Ek Matra 1 prabhandhan ka Institution hai
Mousam.
Bhopal bhaarat ke madhy bhaag mein sthit hae aur isake nirdeshaank 23.27º u. evan 77.4º poo. hae. yah vindhy parvat shrrnkhala ke poorv mein hae. bhopaal ek pahaadee ilaaqe par sthit hae kintu isaka taapamaan adhikatar garm rahata hae. isaka bhoo-bhaag ooncha-neecha hae evan isake daayare mein kaee chhote pahaad hae. udaaharan ke lie shyaamala hil, eedagaah hil, arera hil, kataara hil ityaadi. yahaan garmiyaan garm aur sardiyaan saamaany thandee rahatee hae. baarish ka mausam joon se le ke sitambar-aaktobar tak rahata hae aur saamaany varsha darj kee jaatee hae. 
nagar nigam kee seema 289 varg ki. mee. hae. shaharee seema ke bheetar do maanav nirmit jheelen hae jo sanyukt roop se bhoj sthal ke naam se jaanee jaatee hae. badee jheel raaja bhoj dvaara nirmit karavaee gaee thee jisaka kul jal grahan kshetr 361 varg ki. mee. hae. chhotee jheel ka nirmaan raaja bhoj ne karavaaya.
Ii Indore ke baad Madhya Pradesh ke duusra sba se barraa city hae.bhopal me do baraa talab hae.
Paryatan.
lakshmeenaaraayan mandir,yahaan ka chhota taalaab, bada taalaab, bheem baithaka, abhayaarany, shaheed bhavan tatha bhaarat bhavan dekhane yogy hae. bhopaal ke paas sthit saanchee ka stoop bhee paryatakon ke aakarshan ka kendr hae. bhopaal se lagabhag 28 kilomeetar door sthit bhojapur mandir ek etihaasik darshaniy sthal hae. 
janapratinidhhi.

Imphal:
Imphal, India ke state Manipur ke capital city hae.

Shillong:
Shillong, India ke state Meghalaya ke capital city hae. 

Vinubhai Patel:
Vinubhai Patel, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki 1987 ke election me Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
Uu NFP-Labour Coalition ke taraf se Lautoka Indian Communal Constituency se kharrra bhais rahaa jiske uu sahaj me jiit liis rahaa. Ek mahina ke baad 1987 ke coup ke kaaran uske political carer khatam hoe gais. .

Gayatri Mantra:
Gayatri Mantra, Hindu logan ke khatir ek khaas mantar hae. Ii Rig Veda se aais hae. Gayatri Mantr hae:
English me iske malab.
O God ! Giver of life, Remover of all pain and sorrows, Bestower of happiness, the Creator of the Universe, Thou art most luminous, adorable and destroyer of sins. We meditate upon thee. May thou inspire, enlighten and guide our intellect in the right direction."

Kundan Singh Kush:
Thakur Kundan Pal Singh Kush (1881–1967) ek Arya Samaji missionary aur teacher rahaa, jon ki 1928 me Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India se Fiji aais rahaa. Uu pahile Dharamshala School, Nausori me parrhae ke suuu karis jhan pe baad me uu Vunimono Arya School suruu karis rahaa. Uu Fiji me dher Arya Samaj school me parrhais rahaa, jisme rahaa Gurukul Primary School (1939), Arya Samaj Girls' School, Saweni Lautoka (1940 - 1945), Swami Shraddanand Memorial School, Suva, Vunikavikaloa Arya School, Ra aur Veisari Primary School, Suva.
Arya Samaj Centenary Publication, me THakurji ke baare me ii likha hae:
Thakur Kundan Kush came to Fiji in 1928 as a teacher, served the Arya Samaj with distinction. He conducted debates and lectured ably. His logic and method of presentation of arguments were really very marvellous and worthy of remark.
Fiji ke sarkar uske Fiji me kaam ke baare me worry karat rahaa aur dher dafe uske teacher ke kaam kare ke unfit declare kare ke kosis karis aur uske chithi ke censor karaa gais. 
Kush ke khaas haanth Fiji me "shuddhi" aur "sangathan" me rahaa. 29 June 1930 ke Nausori me Hindu Maha Sabha ke meeeting me Kush ke pardhan banawa gais. Ii meeting me resolution pass karaa gais jisme Hindu log ke organise kare ke batawa gais rahaa aur ek newspaper, jiske Chistian Hindustani logan chaapat rain, ke boycott kare ke batawa gais rahaa.
1930s me Kush ke Samabula Indian School se nikal dewa gais aur sarkar iske apne chalawe lagaa, jab kuchh Muslim au Christian parents school committee me Arya Samaj influence ke viod karin.
Kush, Arya Samaj ke sdhant ke follow karat rahaa aur widows ke saadi ke support karat rahaa. Uu apne ek widow Shiwa Baike saathe saadi karis aur uske tiin larkan Usha, Uma aur Narendra hae. Uu aapan dharam ke kaam 1967 me maut talak karte rahaa. 

Roman akchhar:
Roman alphabet ek akchhar jisme dunia ke dher modern bhasa likha jaawe hae. Ii Greek akchhar se aais hae. Iske suruu me Latin likhe ke kaam me lawa jaawat rahaa. Iske Latin alphabet bhi bola jaawe hae.
Letters of the alphabet.
Original Latin alphabet.
The Latin alphabet used by the Romans:
Modern alphabet.
The modern version of the alphabet is used for writing many languages. European languages are mostly written with the Latin alphabet. These languages include German, English, and Spanish. Some languages, like Việtnamese, use an extended Latin alphabet, including diacritics for things such as tones. It uses the following letters:

Vyakaran:
Grammar uu niyam ke naam hae jiske follow kar ke bola aur likha jaawe hae.

Naam:
Naam (noun) ek rakam ke sabd hae jin ki jada kar ke koi jan, jagha, chij, quality nai to idea ke naam rahe hae. 

Saur mandal:
Saur mandal (Solar system) me me Suraj aur uu grah hae jon ki iske gravity se bandha hae aur iske round jaawe hae.

Aswan Dam:
Aswan Dam nai to Aswan Low Dam Nile Naddi pe ek dam hae. Agar jo ii dam nai rhata tab , Nile naddi har summer me baarr chartha. Ii dam khet ke bachae, energy banae, aur pani bachae ke khatir banawa gais rahaa. 

Burj Dubai:
Burj Khalifa nai to "Khalifa Tower", Dubai, United Arab Emirates me ek bahut uuncha building hae. 

Colosseum:
Colosseum, jisko shuruwat me Flavian Amphitheatre bola jaata tha, wah Rome me ek bada amphitheatre hai.

Great Wall of China:
Great Wall of China, China me ek bahut purana patthar ke diwaal hae, jiske Chinese empire ke uske dusman se bachae ke khatir banawa gais rahaa. II insaan ke banawa gais sab se lambaa structure hae, jon ki 6400 kilometres lamba hae aur Shanhai Pass se Lop Nur talak jaawe hae. 
Great Wall ke chaurai 5 log ke baraabar hae aur uunchai 20 log ke baraabar hae. 
Duusra websites.
Great Wall of China

Eiffel Tower:
Eiffel Tower, Paris ke ek famous landmark hae. Iske 1887 se 1889 talak banawa gais rahaaa. 

Empire State Building:
Empire State Building, New York City, United States me ek bahut uuncha building hae. Ii 381 meters (1,250 feet) uuncha hae aur ii 102 storey ke hae. Chalis saal talak ii dunia ke sab se uuncha building rahaa. Iske naam New York ke nuckname, The Empire State se aais hae. Iske 1931 me banae ke khalaas karaa gais rahaa.

Hagia Sophia:
Hagia Sophia, ek purana Christian church rahaa aur baad me Eastern Orthodox church. 1453 me iske Turks log ek masjid banae iin rahaa. aur 1935 me ek museum banaa. Ii Istanbul, Turkey me hae. 

Parthenon:
Parthenon, Acropolis in Athens, Greece (Europe) ke biich me ek mandir hae. Ii 2000 saal talak Athena ke mandir rahaa. 

Pyramids of Giza:
Giza pyramid complex, jiske Giza Necropolis bhi bola jaawe hae, Cairo, Egypt ke lage, Giza Plateau me pyramid hae. 

St. Peter's Basilica:
St. Peter's Basilica, Vatican City me ek barraa church hae. 
Treasures.
St. Peter's Basilica has many treasures. These include Christian relics, the tombs of popes and many other important people, famous artworks which are mostly sculpture and other interesting things.

Statue of Liberty:
Statue of Liberty, ek monument hae jon ki United States ke symbolise kare hae. 

Music:
Music ek rakam ke art art hae jisme awaj ke uu rakam rakkha jaae hae ki log iske interesting paae hae. Jaada music me log gaana gaae hae aur musical instrument jaise ki hamunia, dholak, aur sanhai bajae hae.

Gaana:
Gaana ek rakam ke music hae jisme sabd ke kaam me lawa jaawe hae. 

Blues:
Blues ek rakam ke music hae jiske United States me 20th century ke stat me suuu karaa gais rahaa. Iske pahile ke Afican gulam logan suruu kare rahin. It was started by former African slaves from spirituals, praise songs, and chants. The first blues songs were called Delta blues. These songs came from the area near the mouth of the Mississippi River.

Classical music:
Classical music ek term hae jon ki goraa log waala des ke music ke describe kare hae. 
References.
The New Grove Dictionary of Music & Musicians, ed. Stanley Sadie; 1980; ISBN1-56159-174-2

Opera:
Opera ek rakam ke play hae jisme baat kare ke bajae khaali gawa jaae hae. 

Symphony:
Symphony uu music hae jiske orchestra ke khatir likha jaawe hae.

Electronic music:
Electronic music uu music hae jiske electronic equipment jaise ki synthesizers nai to computers se banawa gais hae.

Folk music:
Folk music uu music hae jiske sadharan log bajae hae, professional log nai. Ii ek rakam ke taditional music hae jiske log dusre ke sun ke sikhe hae aur ii likha nai rahe hae. 

Jazz:
Jazz ek rakam ke music hae jiske United States me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Jazz music me duuno African-American music aur European music hae. Kuchh jazz waala insrument hae saxophone, trumpet, piano, double bass, aur drum.

Pop music:
Pop music commercially recorded music hae jiske youth market ke khatir banawa gais hae. Ii jaada kar ke hhota, sahaj pyar waala gaana hae jiske record kare me nawaa technology ke kaam me lawa gais hae. 

Reggae:
Reggae ek rakam ke music hae jon ki Jamaica se aawe hae.

Rhythm and blues:
Rhythm and blues (jiske R&B nai to RnB bhi bola jaae hae) popular music genre hae jon ki jazz, gospel, aur blues ke combine kare hae. 

Rock and roll:
Rock and roll ek rakam ke rock music hae jon ki 1950s aur 1960s me develp bhais rahaa. Rock music United States ke dher rakam ke music, jaise ki country music, folk music, gospel music, work songs, blues aur jazz ke combine kare hae. 

Hard rock:
Hard rock ek rakam ke rock music hae jiske suruwaat 1960s me garage rock aur psychedelic rock se suruu bhais rahaa.

New Age music:
New Age music ek rakam ke music hae jon ki New Age belief se relaed hae. 

Aizawl:
Aizawl (population 228,280), India ke state, Mizoram ke capital hae. Mizoam ke 26% population ii city me rahe hae. 

Osasco:
Osasco Brazil ke São Paulo ke city hae. 

Dhol:
Drum ek musical instrument hae jiske hanths nai to drum stick se bajawa jaae hae.

Bansuri:
Bansuri (flute) ek rakam ke woodwind instrument hae. Iske fuuk ke bajawa jaawe hae.

Guitar:
Guitar ek string instrument hae jiske string ke pluck kar ke bajawa jaawe hae. 

Piano:
Piano ek musical instrument hae jisme keyboard rahje hae.

Trumpet:
Trumpet ek brass instrument hae jiske classical music aur jazz music ke bajae ke khatir kaam me lawa jaae hae.

Violin:
Violin ek string instrument hae jiske ek bow se bajawa jaae hae. 

Judo:
Judo, jiske matlab "Gentle Way" hae Japan ke purana Samurai art "Jiujitsu" se aae hae.

Karate:
Karate ek rakam ke lare ke tarika hae, jiske martial art bola jaae hae, aur jon ki Okinawa me suruu bhais rahaa. 

American football:
American Football ek team sport hae, jiske jaada kar ke USA me khela jaae hae aur ek side me 11 khilaarri rahe hae. Iske ek ball se khel jaawe hae. Point uu time mile hae jab baall ke duusra team ke goal line se pichhe lae jawa jaae hae.

Auto racing:
Auto racing ek rakam ke khel hae jisme motar se race karaa jaawe hae. Sab se pahila race, motar ke bane ke kucch din baad 1887 me Paris me bhais rahaa.

Baseball:
Baseball ek rakam ke game hae jisme nau khilaarri ke dui team hissa le hae.

Basketball:
Basketball ek bahut popular khel hae jiske ek gola, orange ball se khela jaae hae.

Cricket:
Cricket ek rakam ke game hae jiske gyrah khilaari ke dui team ke beach me khela jaawe hae. Ii khel duniya mae 120 million khilaari khelat rahiis hae, jis waja se ii khel duniya mai dui sab se prasidh khel baan gaya rahiis hae. Cricket Australia, Indian subcontinent, England, West Indies kay desho mae aur Southern Africa kay desho mae bohot pasand kiya jata hae.

Golf:
Golf ek rakm ke game hae jisme khilaarri log ek chhota ball ke golf club se maar ke ek chhed me girae ke kosis kare hae.

Horse racing:
Horse racing ek rakam ke khel hae jisme ghorra ke biich me race karaa jaawe hae. 

Ice hockey:
Ice hockey ek rakam ke hockey ke game hae jiske ice pe khela jaawe hae. 

Tennis:
Tennis ek rakam ke game hae jisme dui nai to chaar player ek ball ke racket se maar ke cout ke duusra bagal kare ke kosis kare hae. 

Rugby union:
Rugby union ball se khele waala ek khel hae. Isme dui 15-player ke team rahe hae. 

Athletics:
Athletics, jiske United States me track and field nai to track and field athletics bola jaawe hae, ek khel hae jisme jaada kar ke akele hissa lewa jaawe hae aur jisme daurraa, kuuda aur bigaa jaawe hae.

Elements ke suchi:
</includeonly></onlyinclude>

Rasayan vigyan:
Chemistry, chemical elements aur 
compounds ke science hae.

Biochemistry:
Biochemistry, Chemistry ke uu branch hae jisme jina chij ke study karaa jaawe hae.

Chemical compound:
Chemical compound ek chemical hae jiske duusra rakam ke atoms ke jorr ke banawa gais hae. 

Tejaab:
Acid uu chij hae jiske pH 7.0 se kamti rahe hae
Kuchh acid jon ki nature me hae:
Acid ke property hae:

Base (chemistry):
Chemistry me base uu chij hae jiske pH 8 se 14 talak hae .

Nimak:
Chemistry, me nimak koi rakam ke natural compound hae jon ki neutrl hae aur positive aur negative ion se banaa rahe hae. Ek khaas rakam ke nimak sodium chloride hae jiske khana me chhora jaawe hae.

Rasaenik element:
Chemical element uu chij hae jiske aur Hindi nai karaa jaae sake hae. 

Periodic table:

Aluminium:
Aluminium ek chemical element hae. Iske symbol Al hae, auratomic number 13 hae. 

Arthropod:
Arthropods (phylum Arthropoda) uu janwar ke bola jawe hae jisme backbone nai rahe hae. Kuch athropod hae; Kirwa, makrraa, kekrra, jhinga, gojar, aur centipedes. 

Makrraa:
Arachnid ek rakam ke aath gorr waala arthropod hae. Ii group me makrraa, kutki aur mites hae. 

Chordate:
Chordata uu janwar ke bola jaae hae jisme notochord hae. Ii group me jaada machhri hae. 

Amphibian:
Amphibians uu chaar gorr waala janwa ke bola jaawe hae jon ki duuno ppani aur jamiin pe rahe sake hae.

Chirriya:
Chirriya ek rakam ke vertebrate hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki iske lage backbones hae. 
Chiroya warm-blooded hae au anda de hae. Iske dehin pakhna se covered rahe hae. Iske haddi hollow rahe hae. 

Machhri:
Machhri ek rakam ke vertebrate hae jon ki paani me rahe hae. Iske body chuinta ke coveed raha hae aur iske lage dui fin rahe hae. Jaada kae ke machhri cold-blooded rahe hae.

Mammal:
Mammals ek rakam ke vertebrate janwar hae. Mammal bachchaa paida kae hae aur warm-blooded rahe hae. 

Bandar:
Ape uu rakam ke hominoid ke bola jaae hae jon ki insaan nai ha. Isme jaada kar ke bandar, ape aur gorilla hae. 

Paani:
Paani dunia ke sab e jaada common liquid hae. Ii dunia ke 70% surface ke cover kare hae. Janwar aur perr bina paani ke jinda nai rahe sake hae. Safaa paani ke koi mahak nai hae, koi sawaad nai hae aur koi rang nai hae. Talaab, samundar, au naddi, paani se banaa rahe hae. Barsaat paani hae jon ki aasmaan me badal se gire hae. Jab paani dher thanda hoe jaae hae tab ii ice ban jaae hae. Jab paani bahut garam hoe jaae hae tab ii boil hoe ke bhaap ban jaae hae. 

Beer:
Beer ek nasaa kare waala drink hae. Iske paani, hops, barley aur yeast se banawa jaae hae. 

Wine:
Wine ek nasaa kare waala drink hae. WIne jaada kar ke anguur se bane hae lekin kabhi abhi plums aur balckberies se banaa dring ke bhi wine bola jaawe hae. 
Niche ke suchi me uu des hae jahan pe sab se jaada wine piwa jaae hae.:
Luxembourg, France, Italy, Portugal, Croatia, Switzerland, Spain, Argentina, Uruguay, and Slovenia.
Des jahan pe sab se jaada Wine banawa jaae hae: 
France, Italy, Spain, USA, Argentina, Germany, Australia, South Africa, Portugal, and Chile.

Deity:
Kuchh log ii biswas kare hae ki deities tagatwat spirit hae jon ki nature ke control kare hae. 
Deities ke bhagwaan (gods) bhi bola jaae hae. 
Female bhagwaan ke goddess bola jaawe hae.

God:
Kuchh dharam ii batawe hae ki ek supernatural being hae jiske Bhagwaan bolaa jaawe hae. 

Buddhism:
Buddhism log ke sikhawe hae ki kaise suffering ke kamtii karaa jaae sake hae aur apne ke au achchhaa insaan banawa jaae sake hae. 

Roman Catholic Church:
Roman Catholic Church sab se barraa Christian church hae, jiske 1 billion se jaada member hae. 

Kelvin:
Kelvin, garmii ke unit of measurement hae. Ii saat base units me International System of Units (SI) se ek hae au iske symbol K hae.

Second:
Second (SI symbol: s), jske kabhi abhi sec. se abbreviate karaa jaawe hae, International System of Units (SI) base unit ke time ke measuement hae. 

Watt:
Watt ({pronounced:ˈwɒt , symbol: W) International System of Units (SI) me power ke khatir derived unit unit hae, jiske Scottish engineer James Watt (1736–1819) ke naam se rakkha gais hae. 

Volt:
Volt (symbol: V) electromotive force, jiske jaada kar ke "voltage" bola jaawe hae, ke SI derived unit hae. 

Mathematics:
Mathematics (jiske chhota kar ke "maths" nai to "math" bola jaae hae), number, shape aur pattern ke study hae.

Algebra:
Algebra, mathematics (math) ke ek hissa hae jisme equations aur inequalities ke solve karaa jaawe hae.

Arithmetic:
Arithmetic, mathematics ke ek hissa hae jisme number se kaa me lawa jaae hae. Isme chaar basic arithmetic operations hae: addition, subtraction, multiplication, aur division. 

Syntax:
Syntax sentence ke banae ke kanuun ke study hae. 

Verb:
Verb ek part of speech hae jon ki kuchh kare ke baare me batae hae. Har ek sentence me verb rahe hae. 

Linguistics:
Linguistics uu science hae jisme that language ke study karaa jaae hae. Jon log bhasa ke study kare hae ke linguists bola jaae hae.
Linguistics log bhasa ke study kar ke tie bhasa ke sounds (phonetics), structure (morphology), matlab (lexicology), aur (grammar) ke study kare hae. 

SI:
International System of Units abhi ke metric system ke standard hae. SI, French bhasa me "Système International d'unités" ke chhota ruup hae.
Metric system, length ke khatir metre , wajan ke khatir aur time ke khatir second ke use kae hae.

Newton:
Newton (symbol: N), force ke SI unit hae. Iske Sir Isaac Newton ke baad naam dewa gais hae. 

Metre:
Metre (US spelling, "meter") SI measurement system me lambai ke basic unit hae. Iske abbreviation m hae. 
Units based on the meter.
"*Note: units in bold are the most commonly used."

Confucianism:
Confucianism ek philosophy hae jon ki Confucius (511 BC - 479 BC), jon ki ek Chinese philosopher rahaa, ke teachings pe aadharit hae.

Hinduism:
Hinduism (सनातन धर्म; "Sanātana Dharma", jiske matlab Endless Religion hae) dunia ke sab se purana dharam hae.
References.
http://site.patricklevy.free.fr/

Jainism:
Jainism, India ke ek bahut purana dharam hae, jiske teaching me jinda chij ke khatir ahimsa teach kare hae. 

Phoneme:
Phoneme, sound (speech) ke ek unit hae jon ki dui sabd ke ek duusre se alag kare hae. Jaada English accent me khaali 24 consonantal phonemes aur 20 vowel phonemes haee, lekin khaali 26 letters.

Syllable:
Syllable, pronunciation ke ek unit hae jiske bina ruke bola jaawe hae, ek awaj ke rakam. Sab sabd me kamti se kamti ek syllable rahe hae.

Weak interaction:
Weak interaction, jiske weak force nai to weak nuclear force bhi bola jaawe hae, universe ke chaar fundamental forces me se ek hae . Sab fundamental forces ke rakam, iske particle jiske boson bola jaawe hae, cary kare hae. Ii kamjor nuclear force ke kaaran beta decay aur radioactivity hoe hae. 

Strong interaction:
Strong interaction, jon ki chaar basic force me se ek hae, uu force hae jon ki atom ke nucleus me particles ke biich me rahe hae.

Pahaarr:
Pahaarr, Dunia ke surface me ek rise hae jisme ek chti rahe hae. 

Yellow River:
Yellow Naddi nai to Huáng Hé (kabhi kabhi Chaina bhasa me iske khaali Naddi bola jaawe hae), China ke duusra sab se lamba naddi hae (Yangtze River ke baad me) aur ii dunia ke 6th sab se lamba naddi hae. Ii naddi 5464 km lamba hae aur ii Bohai Sea me jaae ke khalaas hoe hae. 

Numerical analysis:
Numerical analysis, algorithms ke parrhai hae, jisme numerical approximation (symbolic manipulations ke jagha) ke kaam me laae ke mathematical analysis ke problem ke solve kara jaawe hae.

Software and Code
Online Texts
Online Course Material

System of linear equations:
Mathematics me, ek system of linear equations (nai to linear system) ek linear equation equation ke collection hae, jisme same set of variables rahe hae. Jaise ki,

Differential equation:
Differential equation ek mathematical equation hae jisme x or y ke rakam variables rahe hae.

Number theory:
Number theory, mathematics ke ek hissa hae.
Number theory ke khaas hissa hae: 
Number theory ke khaas theorem hae: 

Dubai:
Dubai nai to Dubayy (Arabic: دبيّ) in English dui me se ek jagaha hoe sake hae:

Machine:
Sab din ke jindagi me machine uu chij hae jiske log banan hae kaam ke aur sahaj kare ke khatir. 

Robot:
Robot ek machine nai to computer program hae jon ki aise janae hae ki uske apne ke jindagi hae. 

Architecture:
Architecture ek sabd hae jiske matlab hae koi structure jaise ki ghar, office nai to mandir etc ke design karo. 
Architectur matalab ek Aarthpurna rachna...kuchh matalab se banai gayi hae.

Arch:
Arch koi building ke duwaari hae jiske upar waala hissa curved rahe hae.

Canal:
Canal ek waterway hae jiske insaan logan banain hae. 

Dam:
Dam ek barraa diwaal hae jisse paani ke bahe se roka jaawe hae, aur isse ek reservoir nai to lake bane hae. 

Dome:
Dome ek architecture ke feature hae jiske dekhe me aise lage hae ki building ke upar ek ball ke adha hissa hae.

Pyramid:
Pyramid ek rakam ke shape hae. Iske side triangular rahe hae aur ii chotii pe ek point pe aawe hae.

Sakis:
Sakis ek rakam ke communication hae jisme moving chhapa aur awaj ke kaam me laae ke khissa batawa jaawe hae nai to log ke dewa jaae hae. 

Animation:
Animation ek tarika hae jisse sakis banawa jaae sake hae. 

Radio:
Radio ek tarika hae jisse electromagnetic signal ke duur dur bheja jaae sake hae. Uu machune jisse ii signal bheja jaae hae ke transmitter bola jaaae hae aur jon machine se signal ke pick karaa jaae hae ke receiver bola jaae hae. 

Television:
Television (jiske TV, telly nai to tube bhi bola jaae hae) ek machine hae jisme ek screen rahe hae. Televisions broadcast signals ke le ke iske chhapa aur awaj me badle hae. "Television" sabd "tele" (Greek jiske matlab "far away" hae) aur "vision" ("seeing") se aae hae. Yahii kaaran hae ki Hindi me television ke Duurdarshan bola jaae hae.

Literacy:
Literacy ke maane hae ki koi jan parrhe aur likhe sake hae ki nai.

Literature:
Literature, art ke kaam ke group hae jiske sabd se likha jaawe hae. 

National Football League (Fiji) 2011:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 35th National Football League (NSL), jiske Fiji Sun aur Weet-Bix sponsor karis rahaa, me 10 team hae. Sab team duusra nau team se ek dafe khelis rahaa. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila. Pichhle saal ke promotion/relegation matches ke baad Savusavu, Nasinu ke jagha Super Premier League me khelii.

Fiji ke Arya Samaji log ke suchi:
Ii suchi me uu Arya Samaji log ke naam hae jon ki Arya Samaj ke khaas yogdaan diin rahaa nai to Fiji me famous hae (nai to rahin).

Prose:
Prose, likha gais (nai to kahaa gais) bhasa ke sadharan fom hae. Isme poetry , aur koi special format, jaise ki lists nai to tables nai rahe hae. LIke ke time iske bina rhythm ke likha jaawe hae, aur har din ke baat chit ke rakam rahe hae. 
Prose sabd, Latin "prosa" se aais hae, jisme iske matlab straightforward hae.

Fiction:
Fiction koi rakam ke likha gais chij hae jon ki pura sach nai hae. Iske likhe waala banae ke likhis hae. Iske opposite non-fiction hae, jiske matlab hae likhe waala chij jon ki asli chij ke baare me hae. Library me book ke fiction aur non-fiction me separate karaa jaawe hae. 
"Fiction" sabd Latin sabd "fictum" se aawe hae, jiske matlab "banawa gais" hae. 

Novel:
Novels prose fiction rahe hae. Ii chhota kahani se lamba rahe hae. Novels in English are usually 50,000 words or more, and have 100 pages or more.

The Book of One Thousand and One Nights:
The Book of One Thousand and One Nights , Arabia aur Persia se kahani hae. Isme tiin layer hae:

Poetry:
Poetry ek rakam ke kalaa aur ek likhe ke style hae. 

Epic of Gilgamesh:
Epic of Gilgamesh ek epic poem prachin Mesopotamia se aais hae. 

Iliad:
Iliad Greek literature ke sab se purana jinda art work hae. Bahut din talak oral epic poem rahe ke baad, iske 8th century BC me likha gais rahaa. 

1987 ke election (Fiji):
1987 ke election , ajaad Fiji ke House of Representatives ke khatir 5th election rahaa. Ii election 4 April se lae ke 11 April talak bhais rahaa. Ii 52 member waala house me se 22 seat Hindustani logan khatir reserved rahaa. Ii election ke khaas dui political party Alliance Party aur NFP - Labour Coalition rahaa.
Ii election me NFP - Labour Coalition ke 28 aur Alliance Party ke 24 seat mila. Election ke baad Coalition ke leader Timoci Bavadra, Prime Minister banaa. Lekin ek mahina baad Sitiveni Rabuka. coup kar ke, ii sarkar ke hatae dis.

Chakorr:
Senna obtusifolia (Chinese Senna nai to Sicklepod) ek rakam ke bean hae. Ii North, Central, aur South America, Asia, Africa, aur Oceania ke jangle me hoe hae, au iske dher jagha pe weed maana jaawe hae. Its leaves, seeds, and root are used in folk medicine, primarily in Asia. It is believed to possess a laxative effect, as well as to be beneficial for the eyes. As a folk remedy, the seeds are often roasted, then boiled in water to produce a tea. The plant's seeds are a commercial source of cassia gum, a food additive usually used as a thickener and named for the Chinese Senna's former placement in the genus "Cassia". Roasted and ground, the seeds have also been used as a substitute for coffee. In traditional Korean medicine, they are called "gyeolmyeongja" (결명자) and usually prepared as tea. They are also used in Kampō (traditional Japanese medicine) where they are called "ketsumei-shi" (ケツメイシ, 決明子) or by their Chinese name "jué míng zǐ" (traditional: 決明子, simplified: 决明子). 

Bariara:
Sida cordifolia (bala, country mallow, heart-leaf sida nai to flannel weed) ek, dher saal talak jinda rahe waala, perr hae jon ki India se aais hae. Iske dunia bhar me pawa jaawe hae aur Africa, Australia, southern United States, Hawaiian Islands, New Guinea, aur French Polynesia me weed maana jaawe hae. The specific name, "cordifolia", refers to the heart-shaped leaf.

Kohima:
Kohima, India ke eastern state, Nagaland ke capital hae.

Bhubaneswar:
Bhubaneswar, India ke eastern state, Orissa, ke capital city hae.

Jaipur:
Jaipur (Hindi:जयपुर) (Urdu:جے پور), jiske "Pink City" bhi bola jaawe hae, India ke state, Rajasthan, ke sab se barraa, aur capital city hae. 

Gangtok:
Gangtok (pronounced:ˈɡæŋtɒk); Tibetan: སྒང་ཐོག་; Nepali aur Hindi: गान्तोक), Indian state, Sikkim ke sab se barraa aur capital city hae. Ii eastern [ ke Shivalik Hills me hae, jiske uunchai 1437 metres hae. Ii town ke abaadi 30,000 hae au hian pe Nepalis, Lepchas au Bhutia log rahe hae. 

Agartala:
Agartala (Bengali: আগরতলা "Agortôla", Kokborok bhasa: আগরতলা) Indian state, Tripura ke capital hae. Ii Haora Naddi, Bangladesh se khaaali 2 km duuri pe hae. Isme dher mandir aur mahal hae. 2004 me iske population 367,822 rahaa. (189,327 in the 2001 census).

Lucknow:
Lucknow (, , "IAST: Lakhnaū"), India ke state, Uttar Pradesh ke capital city hae. Lucknow, Lucknow District aur Lucknow Division ke administrative capital hae. 

Pronunciation:
Pronunciation, ke matlab bhasa ke ek sabd ke kon rakam se bola jaae hae.==References==

Sabd:
Ek sabd koi chij hae jiske muh se bola jaae hae. Ii kuchh alchar ke collection hae. 

Writing:
Writing me bhasa ke visual symbol ke kaam me laae ke ecord karaa jaae hae. 

Tower:
Ek tower ek uuncha building hae. Dher castle me tower rahe hae. Aajkal, towers bahut uuncha rahe hae aur iske kaam me lae radio signals ke duur duur bheja jaawe hae.

Game:
Ek game koi chij hae jiske log fun ke khatir kare hae. Ii kaam nai hae.== References ==

Gambling:
Gambling me ek khilaarri ek event ke naija ke upar bet kare hae. Ii bet jaada kar ke paisa rahe hae. 

Martial arts:
martial art koi rakam ke mukabla hae, jisme ek rakam se lara jaawe hae.

Olympic Games:
Olympic Games ek khel kuud waala event hae jiske har chaar saal, duusra duusra city me, karaa jaawe hae. 

Fiji me diplomatic mission ke suchi:
Ii Fiji me diplomatic mission . Capital, Suva me 19 embassies hae.

Fiji ke diplomatic mission ke suchi:
Ii dusra des me Fiji ke diplomatic mission ke suchi hae. Fiji ke lage khaali thora diplomatic missions hae. Fiji ke koi diplomatic mission aas paas ke Island des me nai hae. 

Sport:
Ek sport ek khel hae jisme physical activity ke kaam me lawa jaawe hae aur jisme competition rahe hae, jaise ki baseball, soccer, bowling, aur basketball.

Gyanendra Prasad:
Giyannedra Prasad (?-2020), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 1999 ke election me uu Macuata East Cakaudrove Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
Election ke baad uske House of Representatives ke Deputy Speaker banawa gais rahaa.
19 May 2000 ke Prasad, uu People's Coalition Government ke 43 members me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske band of rebel Republic of Fiji Military Forces (RFMF) soldier logan Counter Revolutionary Warfare Unit se, hostahe le liis rahaa. Uske 13 July 2000 ke, 56 din ke captivity ke baad, chhorra gais rahaa.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2010:
2011 ke Pillay Garments Champions League Ba, Lautoka, Navua aur Rewa ke biich me khela gais rahaa. Ii pahila dafe rahaa jab ki chaar team isme qualify bhais rahaa.

Sachin Tendulkar:
Sachin Ramesh Tendulkar (janam April 24, 1973 Mumbai me) ek Indian cricketer hae.

Geneva:
Geneva, Switzerland ke duusra sab se barraa city hae, lekin ii des ke French bhasa waala jagha ke sab se baraa city hae. == References ==

1824:
1840 ek leap saal rahaa jon ki bif ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

1547:
