Gyani Nand:
Gyani Nand (1943 - 23 July 2007) Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter rahaa. Uske janam Tavua me bhaes rahaa aur uu politics me join hoe se pahile ek primary aur high school teacher, hansard reporter aur Australia aur England me diplomat rahaa.
2001 ke election me uu Suva City Indian Communal Constituency, see 75% vot lae ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
2006 ke election me uu ii seat ke fir se 77% vote se jiitis. Iske baad uu Qarase ke multi-party cabinet me Minister for Agriculture banaa.
FLP ke member logan ke uske leader, Mahendra Chaudhry batais rahaa ki uu log 2007 budget ke virod me vote kare lekin vote kae ke time, Nand absent rahaa. Chaudhry , uu sab FLP member jon ki budget ke virod me nai vote karin hae, ke against disciplinary action threaten karis , lekin kuchh kare se pahile coup hoe gais.
Nand ke maut Suva Private hospital me 23 July 2007 ke sabere, ek chhots bemaari ke baaad, bhias rahaa.

Udit Narayan:
Udit Narayan (janam: 1960), Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae. 
2001 ke election me uu Lautoka Rural Indian Communal Constituency se 71% vote le ke, Fiji ke House of Representatives. 2003 me Narayan ke, 13 aur FLP politician ke saathe, Laisenia Qarase cabinet position offer karis lekin FLP ii offer ke nai liis.
2006 ke election me uu wahii seat ke 77 percent vote se jiitis rahaa. Following this victory, he was appointed Minister for Primary and Preventive Health Services, one of nine FLP Ministers in the multi-party Cabinet that was formed. Narayan, together with three other FLP cabinet members, voted against the 2007 budget and was asked to resign by the then Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase. 
Narayan is a former Fiji Sugar Corporation traffic supervisor.
Narayan ek Kisan, Trade Unionist aur community worker hae. Uu Lautoka City ke Councillor rahaa aur National Farmers Union ke Lautoka branch ke Secretary hae. 2014 ke election me uu FLP ke ek candidate hae.

Chaitanya Lakshman:
Chaitanya Lakshman (janam: 1968), Fiji ke ek wakiil, social worker aur politician jon ki Fiji Labour Party ke supporter hae, lekin Qarase ke sarkar ke multi-party cabinet me Minister for Local Government rahaa.
2006 ke election me Lakshman, Viti Levu South Kadavu Indian Communal Constituency se chuna gais. Isse pahile ii seat usky uncle, Prince Gopal Lakshman hold karis rahaa.
Jab Fiji Labour Party multi-party cabinet me hissa le decide karis, tab, Lakshman, uu nau FLP members me se ek rahaa jiske FLP leader, Mahendra Chaudhry nominate karis rahaa. Uske Minister for Local Government & Urban Development ke ortfolio dewa gais rahaa. Lakshman, aur tiin FLP cabinet members ke saathe 2007 budget ke virod me vote karis aur Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase uske resign kare ke batais. 
Politics me jaae se pahile Lakshman, Complaints Division of the Fiji Human Rights Commission ke manager rahaa aur University of the South Pacific ke Institute of Applied Legal Studies (IJALS) me ek barrister and solicitor rahaa.
Parliament me, Lakshman pahila Hindustani rahaa jon ki Parliament me tiin generation ke represent karis rahaa. Uske aaja, B. D. Lakshman aur uncle, Prince Gopal Lakshman bhi Parliament rahin. 
Abhi Lakshman Nausori ke Resident Magistrate hae.

Mythology:
Mythology, ek sankriti me kuchh myth ke collection hae. Ek myth ek kahaani hae jon ki dunia me jon kuchh hoe hae ke explain kare ke kosis kare hae. 

Atheism:
Atheism ke matlab hae bhagwan me biswas nai kare ke.

Fundamentalism:
Fundamentalism ke dher matlab hoe sake hae. Iske 20th century ke suruu me United States ke Protestant log ke bola jaawat rahaa. Ii logan ke kuchh well defined values rahaa jon ki modern value se different rahaa. Ii logan ke khatir faith (the Bible) khaas chij rahaa.

Yahudi:
15 million Yahudi dunia mein.

Budhgrah:
Budhgrah (Mercury) uu planet hae jon ki Suraj ke sab se nachdik hae aur Saur mandal (Solar system) me sab se chhota hae. Ii planet jab dunia se dekha jaae hae tab ii bahut bright dekhae hae, lekin jaada kar ke ii suraj ke bahut nachdik rahe hae aur dekhae nai hae. 

Varungrah:
Varungrah (Neptune) Solar System me Suraj se duur aathwa planet hae. Ii ek gas giant hae.

Sanigrah:
Sanigrah (Saturn) Solar System ke (Suraj se duur sixth planet hae.

Materialism:
Ek materialist uu hae jon ki ii biswas kare hae ki dunia material chij se khaali banaa hae. 

Monotheism:
Monotheism me khaali ek bhagwaan me biswas karaa jaawe hae.

Polytheism:
Polytheism me dher bhagwaan me biswas karaa jaawe hae. Ek jan, jon polytheism me biswas kare hae ke polytheist bolaa jaawe hae. Ek dharam jisme polytheism me biswas karaa jaawe hae ke polytheistic dharam bolaa jaawe hae. 
Jaada kae ke, polytheistic dharam me dher rakam ke bhagwan kebaar me khissa rahe hae. Ii rakam ke sab se jaana maana polytheistic dharam Greek mythology me paawa jaawe hae.
Duusra log jon ki polytheists rahin me Celts aur Norse rahin.
Kuchh log, galtii se ii soche hae ki Hindi dharam ek polytheistic dharam hae. 

Atma:
Dher philosophies aur dharam ii batae hae ki atma jinda log ke uu hissa hae jon ki maut ke baad bhi jinda rahe hae. 

Dharam:
Ek dharam ek set of dharmic biswas hae jiske ek gut ke log biswas kare hae.

OFC Champions League - 2010-11:
2010–11 OFC Champions League, jiske 2011 O-League ke naam se bhi jaana jaawe hae, me saat des ke aath team khele hae. Ii aath team ke dui pool me baata gais hae aur iske jiite waala team O-League Champion khatir kheli aur Oceania Football Confederation ke 2010 FIFA Club World Cup me hissa lii.

Final.
The two group winners will play-off over two legs to determine the 2009–10 OFC Champion. The order that the legs will be played is yet to be determined.
The OFC Champions League winner also advances to the qualifying round of the 2010 FIFA Club World Cup.

Shinto:

Beauty:
Sundarta (Beauty) ek sabd hae jiske kaam me laae ke koi chij ke describe karaa jawe hae. Ek chij ke sundar bola jaawe hae jab ki uu dekhe me achchhaa lage hae. 

Dialectic:
Philosophy me dialectic, dui different group ke log ke biich me matbhed hae. 

Ethics:
Ethics, philosophy ke ek hissa hae, jisme achchhai aur kharaab ke baare me baat karaa jaawe hae.

Cancer:
Cancer ek rakam ke bemari hae. Ii bemari me body cell ke control nai kare paawe hae.
Duusra websites.
New Global Cancer Facts

Cholera:
Cholera ek rakam ke bemaari hae jon ki duusra jan ke haali se pakarr le hae. Ii ek bacteria, "Vibrio cholerae" se pakrre hae. 

Andaman and Nicobar Islands:
Andaman and Nicobar Islands, India ke ek union territory hae. Iske jaada kar ke A & N Islands na to ANI bola jaae hae. Ii Indian Ocean me, Bay of Bengal ke ekdam south me hae. Ii dui Island ke group - the Andaman Islands and the Nicobar Islands - separating the Andaman Sea to the east, from the Indian Ocean. These two groups are separated by the 10° N parallel, the Andamans lying to the north of this latitude, and the Nicobars to the south. The capital of this territory is the Andamanese town of Port Blair.
The territory's abaadi in the last (2001) Census of India was 356,152. Added together, the total land area of the territory is around 6,496 km² or 2,508 sq mi, it is larger than the Palestinian territories but smaller than Georgia territory of Abkhazia.

Khana:
Khana uu chij hae jon ki janwar nai to perr se aawe hae, aur jiske taagat aur nutrition ke khatir khaawa jaawe hae.

Aapul:
Aapul ( scientific naam: Malus domestica) ek rakam ke fal hae jiske perr dunia ke dher des me, tropical des ke chhorr ke, hoe hae. 
Iske perr Western Asia me suruu bhaes rahaa aur iske 7,500 varieties hae.

Epistemology:
Epistemology gyan ke khoj ke bola jaawe hae. Ii philosophy ke uu hissa hae jon ki gyan ke baare me parrhe hae. ii uu chij jaane maange hae ki "Gyan kon chij hae?" aur "Gyan ke kaise pawa jaawe hae?"

Feminism:
Feminism ek social aur political movement hae. Feminism me admi aur aurat ke janta kon rakam se dekhe hae ke badle ke kosis karaa jaawe hae. Feminism ii bole hae ki pahile aurat logan ke achchhaa se nai dekha jaawat rahaa aur ispe rok lagae ke chaahi. Jon koi feminism me biswas rakhe hae ke feminist bola jawe hae.

Coffee:
Coffee ek rakam ke perr hae aur ek drink, jon ki ii per se banaa hae, ke naam hae. 

DNA:
DNA, jiske puura naam deoxyribonucleic acid hae, ek molecule hae jisme jinda janwar au perr ke genetic code hae. 

Enzyme:
Enzymes, cells ke protein molecules hae jon ki catalyst ke kaam kare hae. Enzymes, chemical reaction ke aur jor kar de hae lekin apne se react nai hoe hae. 

Jiu vigyan:
Jiu vigyan (Biology) jinda chij, jaise ki perr, janwar, fungi (such as mushrooms), and bacteria ke vigyan hae. 

Protein:
Proteins barraa molecule hae jon ki chhota chhota molecule, jiske amino acid bola jaawe hae, se banaa rahe hae.

Botany:
Botany vigyan ke ek hissa hae jisme perr ke baare me parrha jaawe hae. 

Maut:
Maut ek jinda chij ke jindagi ke ant hae. 

Ecology:
Ecology uu vigyan hae jisme biota aur environment, aur ii duno ke biich ke link ke parrha jaawe hae. 

Domestication:
Domestication u badlao ke naam hae jab ki perr nai to janwar ke insaan log aapan control me rakhe hae. 

Zindagi:
Zindagi ek jiu vigyan ke idea hae jiske koi sahaj definition nai hae. Zindagi kr parrhai ke jiu vigyan bola jaawe hae. 

Anatomy:
Anatomy jidda chij, jaise ki admii, janwar aur perr ke study hae.

Cell:
Jiu vigyan me '"cell" ek organism ke basic structure hae. == References ==

Circulatory system:
Circulatory system dehin ke uu hissa hae jon ki khuun ke dehin ke dusra dusra jagha le ke jaawe hae. Dil aur sab blood vessel ke milae ke circulatory system banawa jaawe hae.

Scandinavia:
Scandinavia, Europe ke north me ek jagha hae jisme Norway, Sweden aur Denmark hae. 

Free will:
Free will ii idea hae ki koi jan kon chij kare maange hae apne se decide kare sake hae. 

Transport:
Transport, nai to transportation, me log ke ek jagha se duusra jagha lae jawa jaae hae. 

Logic:
Logic, ke vigyan hae. 

Archaea:
Archaea (nai to "Archea") ek cell waala organism hae. 

Bacteria:
Bacteria ek chhota organism hae. Ee aadmi logan ko bahut pareshan, bimar aur pidit kar sakti hai. Baktiria se ladhne hetu scientist logan anti-biotic ka aavishkar kare hae. Parantu virus ke saath ladhne hetu kouno cheez nahi hae. Ee paristhiti ko filhaal badlawa jae hai scientist logan dvara.eske aaviskarak ल्यूवेनहाक hai

Dentistry:
Dentistry ek specialised dotor hae jon ki taanth ke ilaaj kare hae. 

Taoism:
Taoism nai to Daoism ek rakam ke biswas hae.
Ii kamti se kamti 2,500 saal purana hae aur China se aawe hae. Taoism ke chahe dharam nai to philosophy bola jaawe sake hae.

Voodoo:
Voodoo, jiske "Vodun, Vodou, Voudou, Vudu, Vodoun" bhi liha jaawe hae, West Africa ke ek dharam ke naam hae.

Tibet:
Tibet, jiske The Tibet Autonomous Region (TAR) aur Xizang Autonomous Region ((Tibetan: བོད་ ; Wylie: Bod-rang-skyong-ljongs; Simplified Chinese: 西藏自治区; Traditional Chinese: 西藏自治區; Pinyin: Xīzàng Zìzhìqū, bola jaawe hae, People's Republic of China (PRC) ke ek province-level autonomous region hae. Iske capital Lhasa hae.

Atma Maharaj:
Atma Maharaj, Fiji ke ek sports administrator hae jiske 2010 me Fiji Association of Sports and national olympics ke hall of fame me jorra gais rahaa.
“THE FIJI OLYMPIC ORDER” from FASANOC for his immense commitment to sport in Fiji. 

Zoroastrianism:
Zoroastrianism ek dharam hae. Iske suruu kare waala Zoroaster rahaa, jon ki Iran me lagbhag 1000 BC me rahat rahaa.

Devanagari:
Devanagri ek script hae. Hindi aur Nepali bhasa isi se likhi jaae hae.

Jankari:
Jankari ke matlab uu chij hae jon ki achchhaa hae.

Man:
Man ek jan ke uu hissa hae isme uske bichaar, feeling rahe hae. 

Morality:
Morality right chij kare ke baare me hae.

Dil:

Endocrine system:
Endocrine system me dehin ke uu part hae jon ki hormone banae hae.

Gastrointestinal tract:
Gastrointestinal system dehin ke uu hissa hae jahaan pe khaana ke digest karaa jaae hae. 

Chhota tara:
Ek Chhota tara ek grah ke rakam k chij hae lekin aur chhota hae.

Mahaa dhamaka:
Big Bang vigyan ke ek theory hae jisme ii batawa jaae hae ki sansaar uu time suruu bhais jab ki. 

Karia kund:
General theory of relativity ke niche, ek black hole uu jagha hae jahan se koi cij nai escapa e kare sake hae. 

Asian Games:
Asian Games, ek khel kuud waala event hae jiske har chaar saal, duusra-duusra city me, karaa jaawe hae. Jisme Asia ke desh bhaag le hae. Isme algbah 10,000 athletes hissa le hae.
Ii rakam ke pahila game Delhi mae rahaa, aur ii pahila dafe 1951 me khela gais rahaa.

Ethanol:
Ethanol, jiske ethyl alcohol aur grain alcohol ke naam se bhi jaana jaawe hae,jon ki ek flammable, colorless chemical compound hae. Ii uu daaru hae jiske jaada alcoholic drinks me pawa jaawe hae. Iske chemical formula C2H5OH hae, aaur iske C2H6O bhi lkha jaawe hae. 

Helium:
Helium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol He aur atomic number 2 hae. 
Ii bina rang ke ek gas hae, jon ki dusra element re react nai hoe hae. Iske halluk hoe ke kaaran, iske baloon me kaam e lawa jaawe hae.

Hydrogen:
Hydrogen ek chemical element hae, jiske atomic number 1 aur symbol H hae. Ii pura universe me sab se simple element hae. 
Hydrogen bina rang ke ek gas hae.

Lithium:
Lithium (symbol Li) periodic table. ke tiisra chemical element hae. Iske matlab ii hae ki iske lage 3 protons aur 3 electron hae. Iske atomic number 3 hae aur mass number 6.94 hae. Iske dui isotpe, 6Li aur 7Li hae. 
Lithium ek silver rang ke naram metal hae jiske chhurri se kaata jaae sake hae. Ii ek bahut reactive metal hae aur ii kaaran se iske mineral oil me rakkha jaawe hae.

Beryllium:
Beryllium ek alkaline earth metal hae. Iske rang gray hae. Iske atomic number of 4 aur chemical symbol Be hae. Ii ek toxic element hae. 
Beryllium me 4 electrons, 4 protons, aur 5 neutrons hae.
Ii Carbon ke rakam karia rang ke ek metalloid hae.

Atomic number:
Rasayan vigyan aur bhautik vigyan me ek parmaanu ke atomic number uske proton ke ginti hae. periodic table me chemical elementatomic number ke order me likha jaawe hae.

Chemical symbol:
chemical symbol ek element ke likhe ke chhota rakam hae. Ii jaada kar ke dui , lekin kabhi kabhi tiin letter se banaa rahe hae. Sab element ke chemical symbols ke periodic table me dewa jaae hae. 

Proton:
Ek proton, parmaanu ke ek hissa hae, jiske parmaanu ke nucleus me neutron ke saathe pawa jaawe hae. Periodic table me parmaanu proton ke adhar pe list karaa jaawe hae. 

Electron:
electron ek bahu chhota matter aur energy ke hissa hae. Iske symbol e− hae. 

Mass number:
Atom ke wajan jaada kar ke proton aur neutron se banaa rahe hae. 

Neutron:
Neutron, proton aur electron ke saathe, tiin chij hae jisse atom banaa rahe hae. Neutrons ke atom ke nucleus me pawa jaawe hae. 

Boron:
Boron ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol B, aur atomic number 5 hae. 

Spirituality:
Spirituality ek naam hae jiske spirit ke baare me baat kare ke time dewa jaae hae. Kuch kuch log ii sabd ke dharam ke jagha pe kaam me laae hae. 

Gyan vidhya:
Philosophy dunia, universe aur dharam ke baare me soche ke ek dhang hae. 
Philosopher logan aisan sawaal kare hae:

Koila:
Carbon ek khaas chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol C hae. Dunia ke sab jew ii element se banaa hae. Carbon ke atomic mass 12 aur atomic number 6 hae. 

Atomic mass:
Atomic mass (jiske atomic weight bhi bola jaawe hae) ek term hae jon ki ek chemical element ke ek atom ke wajan hae Isme tiin subatomic particle hae: protons, electrons, and neutrons. Jab ki electrom ekam halka rahe hae, atomic mass proton aur neutron ke kl jorr hae.

Nitrogen:
Nitrogen ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol N aur atomic number 7 hae. Iske nucleons me 7 protons aur 7 neutrons hae aur bahaar ke cell me 5 electrons hae. 

Sona:
Sona ek naram piyar metal hae jon ki hajaaro saal se jewelry, aur paisa ke khatir kaam me lawa jaae hae. Sona ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 79, atomic weight 199.96 a.m.u. aur symbol Au hae, jon ki Latin sabd "aurum" se aais hae.

Tin:
Tin ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 50 hae aur chemical symbol Sn hae. 

Neon:
Neon ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 10 aur symbol Ne hae. 

Oxygen:
Oxygen ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol O, atomic number 8 aur atomic mass 32 hae. Ii nature me bina rang aur mahak ke hae. Janwar iske bina jiye nai sake hae. 

Fluorine:
Fluorine (symbol F) ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 9, aur atomic mass 19 hae. Ii periodic table ke Group 7 (halogens) me hae.

Sodium:
Sodium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Na hae (jon ki Latin naam "natrium" se aais hae), jiske atomic number 11 hae. 

Magnesium:
Magnesium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol "Mg", aur atomic number 12 hae. 

Silicon:
Silicon ek element hae jiske atomic number 14 hae. 

Phosphorus:
Phosphorus ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol P, atomic number 15 au mass number 30.97 hae. 

Sulfur:
Sulfur (nai to sulphur) ek chemical element hae jiske symbol S aur atomic number 16 hae. Iske rang piyar hae.

Chlorine:
Chlorine ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Cl, atomic number 17, aur atomic mass is 35.45. Ii periodic table ke 7th column (halogens) me haw. 
Itihaas.
Iske 1774 me Carl Wilhelm Scheele paais rahaa, jon ki ii sochis ki ii Oxygen hae. Chlorine ke naam 1810 me Humphry Davy diis rahaa, jon ki ii jid karis ki ii ek element hae. United States me 1918 se sab piye waala paani me Chlorine choraa jaawe hae.

Argon:
Argon ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Ar aur atomic number 18 hae. 

Potassium:
Potassium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol K, atomic number 19 aur atomic mass 39.098 hae. 
Potassium ke Sir Humphrey Davy, 1807 me, England me discover karis rahaa. Iske naam, English sabd "potash" (pot ashes) aur Arbii sabd "qali" meaning alkali se ais hae. Iske symbol, Latin sabs "kalium" se aais hae.

Calcium:
Calcium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Ca, atomic number 20 aur mass number 40.08 hae.

Scandium:
Scandium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Sc aur atomic number 21 hae. 

Titanium:
Titanium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol "Ti", aur atomic nmber 22 hae. 

Vanadium:
Vanadium ek chemical element hae jiske chinh V aur atomic number 23 hae. 

Chromium:
Chromium ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Cr, atomic number 24 aur mass number 54 hae. 

Manganese:
Manganese ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Mn, atomic number 25 aur mass number 54.94 hae.

Loha:
Loha ek element hae, jiske symbol Fe, atomic number 26, aur mass number 55.85 hae. 

Tamba:
Copper ek chemical element hain jiske symbol "Cu", atomic number 29 aur mass number 63.55 hain

Silver:
Silver (symbol Ag) ek chemical element hae jiske [number 47, aur atomic weight 107.86 a.m.u. hae. Iske symbol Ag, Latin me silver ke sabd , "argentum" se aais hae. Ii ek transition metal hae. 
Properties.
Physical properties.
Silver ek naram metal hae. Jab iske paisa nai to gahana me kaam me lawa jaae hae ab iske sona nai to aur koi metal ke saathe milawa jaawe hae jisse ki aur karraa hoe jaawe. Iske rang bluish-white hae, ii light ke achchhaa se reflect kare hae aur electricity ke achchhaa se conduct kare hae. Iske ek precious metal maana jaawe hae. Iske wire me banawa jaae sake hae aur ek sheet me hammer karaa jaawe sake hae. Dunis bhar me Silver ke paisa ke kharida aur beja jaae sake hae. 
Chemical properties.
Silver bahut eactive nai hae. Ii Nitric Acid ke chhorr ke aur acid me dissolve nai hoe hae. Lekin ii tagrraa oxidizing agent, jaise ki potassium dichromate nai to potassium permanganate se ract hoe hae. Iske bahut muskil se murcha pakrre hae. Ii khaali uu time murrchae hae jab ki ii hydrogen sulfide se hawaa me mile hae, jab ki ii ek karia coating fom kare hae. 
Silver +1 oxidation state me ion ke ruup me rahe hae, compounds me jaise kisilver(I) oxide. Kuchh compound +2 oxidation state me rahe hae aur ii bahut tagrraa oxidizing agent rahe hae. Silver ke compound gray, black, brown, nai to ujjar rahe sake hae. Silver ke compund ke disinfectant ke rakam me kaam me lwa jaae sake hae.

Zinc:
Zinc, jiske kabhi kabhi spelter bola jaawe hae, ek chemical element hae. Ii ek transition metal hae. Iske Symbol "Zn", atomic number of 30 aur mass number 65.38 hae. 

Karamua:
Karamua (Scientific naam: "Ipomoea aquatica ", English: "water spinach, swamp cabbage, water convolvulus, water morning-glory", Kaiviti: "luve ni tombithi, ndrinikava, ota karisa, ota karisi, wa kumala") ek rakam ke faile waala bhaji hai jiske khawa jaae hai. Ii garam des me hoe hai.

Avalanche:
Ek avalanche ek nature ke phenomenon hae jon ki barf se jurraa hae. Jab ek paharr pe dher barf hoe jaae hae tab ii khisak ke niche aae jaae hae au iske avalanche bola jaae hae.

ENSO:
El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO chhota rakam se) ek term hae jisse Pacific Ocean me hoe waala ek natural event ke bola jaae hae. Iske El Niño aur La Niña bhi bola jaae hae. "El Nino" au "La Nina" English ke sabd hae jon ki Spanish waala sabd "El Niño" aur "La Niña" se aais hae. Spanish me iske matlab "chhota larka" aur "chhoti larrki" hae. El Niño ke Spanish bhasa me Jesus Christ, jab uu chhota rahaa, ke bhi bola jaae hae. 

Plate tectonics:
Plate tectonics geology ke baare me ek theory hae jisme dunia ke uppar waala layer ke baare me samjhawa jaawe hae.

Cobalt:
Cobalt (chemical symbol Co) ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 27 aur atomic mass 59 hae. Ii ek dhaatu (metal) hae.
Properties.
Cobalt ek transition metal hae. Ii chamke hae aur electricity conduct kare hae. Ii ek magnetic, hard metal hae. Isse jaada reactive Iron hae, aur copper kamti reactive hae. 

Nickel:
Nickel (chemical symbol Ni) ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 28 aur atomic mass 59 hae. Ii ek transition metal hae. 

Fungus:
Ek fungus (plural: fungi) ek rakam ke jinda chij hae. Kuchh rakm ke fungus hae yeast, mould aur mushroom. 
Fungi, jinda chij me se janwar aur perr se different hae. 
Fungi me cells hae, jiske nuclei bola jaae hae. II cell ke diwaal me chitin rahe hae, jab ki perr ke cell ke diwaal me cellulose rahe hae. Ii aur dusra antar ii dekhae hae ki fungi kuch organisms ke ek group hae, jiske Eumycota nai to Eumycetes bola jaae hae. 
Fungi aapan bagal ke chij ke khaae ke jiie hae. 

Protist:
Protist ek jinda chij hae jiske khaali ek cell hae. 

Dhaatu:
"Dhaatu" element ke uu group hae jiske ii property rahe hae. 
Jaada metal, room ke temperature me solid ahe hae lekin Mercury ek liquid hae. Alloy uu rakam ke mixture hae jisme kamti se kamti ek element meal hae. Kuchh khaas metal hae; aluminium, copper, iron, tin, gold, lead, silver, titanium, uranium, and zinc. Kuchh khaas ally hae bronze aur steel. 

Alloy:
Ek alloy dui nai to jaada chemical element ke mixture hae, jisme se ek metal hae. 
Kuchh khaas alloy hae: 

Bhautik vigyan:
Bhautik vigyan (Physics) ek vigyan hae jisme matter aur matther kaise interact kare hae, ke baare me parrha jaawe hae.

Acceleration:
Acceleration me ii naapa jaae hae ki rftar kaise badle hae.

Gallium:
Gallium (chemical symbol: Ga) ek chemical element hae jiske atomic number 31 aur atomic mass 70 hae. 

Germanium:
Germanium ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol "Ge", atomic number 32 aur atomic mass 73 hae. 
Germanium ke 1886 me Clemens Winkler paais rahaa

Sikhism:
Sikhism ek dharam hae jiske maane waala log ke "Sikh" aur uu logan ke holy book ke Guru Granth Sahib bola jaae hae. Lagbhag 20 million log Sikh dharam ke maane hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii dunia ke 5th sab se barraa dharam hae. 

Arsenic:
Arsenic ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol As, atomic number is 33 aur atomic mass 74.02 hae. 

Alkali dhaatu:
Alkali metals, periodic table me kuchh element ke ek group hae. Ii group ke sab element ke silver rang rhae hae, ii naram hae aur iske sab se bahaar waala cell me khaali ek electron hae. Ii group ke element, reactions me ii ek electron ke de de hae aur +1 ke charge hoe jaawe hae. Nature me ii group ke metal kabhi pure form me nai mile hae kaahe ki ii bahut reactive hae. II noble gas ke chhorr ke aur sab element se react kare hae. Hawaa me ii karia hoe jawe hae. 
Alkali metals hae: Lithium (Li), Sodium (Na), Potassium (K), Rubidium (Rb), Cesium (Cs), aur Francium (Fr). Lithium sab se kamti reactive, aur francium sab se jaada reactive, hae.
Sodium ek khaas alkali metal hae jisse sodium chloride (NaCl) (khaae waala nimak) aue sodium hydroxide (NaOH), ('caustic soda') bane sake hae jon ki ek bahut tagrraa base hae.

Khaara matti dhaatu:
Khaara matti dhaatu , periodic table me ek element ke jhund hae. Ii sab Alkali dhaatu ke rakam hae lekin otna jaada reactive nai hae. 
Khaara matti dhaatu hae: beryllium, magnesium, calcium, strontium, barium, aur radium. Radium radioactive hae.

Selenium:
Selenium ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol Se, atomic number 34 aur mass number 78.96 hae. 

Rubidium:
Rubidium ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Rb, atomic number 37 aur atomic mass 85.47 hae. 

Caesium:
Caesium (nai to Cesium) ek chemical element hae, jiske atomic number 55 , symbol Cs aur atomic mass 132.91 hae. Dui German chemists, Robert Bunsen aur Gustav Kirchhoff, Caesium ke 1860 me flame spectroscopy se paawe rahin.

Francium:
Francium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Fr, atomic number 87 hae. 

Strontium:
Strontium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Sr, atomic number 38 aur atomic mass hae. 

Barium:
Barium ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Ba, atomic number 56 aur mass nuber 137.3 hae. 

Radium:
Radium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Ra, atomic number 88 aur mass number 226 hae. 

Yttrium:
Yttrium ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Y aur atomic number 39 hae.

Zirconium:
Zirconium ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol is Zr, aur atomic number 40 hae. 

Niobium:
Niobium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Nb aur atomic number 41 hae. 

Molybdenum:
Molybdenum ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Mo aur atomic number 42 hae. 

Technetium:
Technetium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Tc aur atomic number 43 hae. 

Vigyan:
Vigyan (Science) ek sabd hai jo ki 3 chij ke baare me hai:
Science hamare life ki liye bahut hi jaroori hai

Taara vigyan:
Astronomy outer space aur usme jon kuchh hae ke parrhai hae. Isme tara, grah aur galaxy hae.

Jhaarru (Taara):
Ek Jhaarru , ice ke ek ball hae jon ki outer space me ghume hae. 

Tara ke samundar:
Tara ke samudar dher tara ke ek jhund hae. 

Milky Way:
Milky Way ek tara ke samundar hae jisme dunia bhi hae. Isme 200 billion se jaada tara hae. including our Earth and Sun. 
Milky Way ke diameter 100,000 light year hae. == References ==

Prakash saal:
Ek prakash saal utna diastance hae jiske light ek saal me travel kae sake hae. 

Ruthenium:
Ruthenium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Ru, atomic number 44 aur atomic mass 101.07 hae. 

Rhodium:
Rhodium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Rh, atomic number 45 aur atomic mass 102.91 hae. 

Palladium:
Palladium ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol Pd, atomic number 46 aur atomic mass 106.42 hae. 

Cadmium:
Cadmium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol "Cd", atomic number 48 aur atomic mass 112.4 hae. 

Concepción:
Concepción, Dakcchin-Purab Chile. Concepción ke abaadi 216,061 hae (2002 census) aur Greater Concepción urban area ke abaadi 889,168 hae (2002 census). Area ar 221.6 square kilometers. 36° 46' 22" S 73° 03' 47" W

Chandarma:
Chandarma uu chij hae jon ki dunia ke round jaawe hae. 

Grah:
Ek grah ek barraa chij hae, jaise ki Dunia nai to Jupiter jon ki ek tara ke round kare hae. Ii ek tara se chhota rahe hae aur light nai de hae. 

Arungrah:
Arungrah (Uranus), Solar System me suraj se duur 7th planet hae. 

Sukhrgrah:
Sukhrgrah, Saur Mandal (Solar System) me suraj se duur duusra planet hae. 

Suraj:
Suraj ek tara hae aur solar system me sab se baraa chij hae. Isme solar system ke 99.86% wajan hae. Sab se barraa grah, Jupiter, Suaraj ke saamne bahut chhota hae. Solar system ke grah Suraj ke round chakkar maare hae. Ham og ke Suraj din bhar aasmaan me dekhae hae. Ii ek barraa piyar ba e rakam dekhe me age hae. Suraj asliyat me ek barraa ball hae jisme plasma sab time bubble kare hae. Ii explosion se etna energy nikle hae ki Suraj ke 1 second ke power United States ke 9 million saa talak power kare sake hae. Jab ke Suraj, dunia se 93 million miles (150 million km) duur hae, iske taagat ke ham log feel karta hae.

Sansaar:
Sansaar me uu sab chij hae jon ki hae. Isme ab rakam ke physical chij aur energy, grah, tara, galaxies aur space ke sab chij hae.

Badalte dhaatu:
Badalte dhaatu (transition metals) uu sab dhaatu hae jiske periodic table ke biich me pawa jaawe hae. Ii sab ke gun ek rakam rahe hae.

Fiji me chini ke mill:
Fiji me chini ke mill pahila dafe 1874 se banawa jaae lagaa rahaa. Suru me dher chhota chhota mill rahaa, lekin bad me aur barraa mill banaa lekin 1926 talak jab CSR sab mil ke chalae lagaa tab bachaa paanch mill bahut barraa mill rahaa. Fiji ke kuchh khaas mill ke suchi hae:

Indium:
Indium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol In, atomic number 49 aur atomic mass 114.82 hae. 

Thallium:
Thallium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Tl, atomic number 81 aur atomic mass 204.4 hae. 

Raanga:
Raanga (Lead), ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Pb, atomic number 82 aur atomic mass 207.2 hae.

Bismuth:
Bismuth ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol is "Bi", atomic number 83 aur atomic mass 209 hae. 

Selia Levu (Taveuni) Mill:
Selia Levu Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1875 me Taveuni, Fiji ke Selia Levu Estate ke khatir banawa gai srahaa.
Itihaas.
Ii mill Taveuni ke south-east me rahaa aur 29 September 1875 me chini pere ke suruu karis. Selia Levu Estate me 1873 se ganna bowe ke suruu karaa gais. 1874 me Maitland Brothers (jon ki Vuna ke sab sab se barraa kisan rahaa, aur pahile rui ke kheti karat rahaa) , Sydney se ek mill laais jisse har din tiin ton chini banawa jaae sakat rahaa. Ganna ke pahila katai me 350 ton ganna ke bael aur ghorraa se khiich ke mill talak lae jawa gis lekin jaada paani barrse ke kaaran ii kaam sahaj nai rahaa. 1876 me 2.4 kilometre ke pakki line bichhawa gais aur ganna ke gaarri ke ghorra aur bael ke khiicha gais rahaa. April 1878 me Walter Hunter, jon ki ek ek parrosi kisan rahaa, ii mill ke lae lis aur isme sudhaar karis. 1890 me, paisa ke taklifi ke kaaran ii mill ke band kar dewa gais. Abhi ke rastaa jon ki Vuna Point jaawe hae, ii mill ke pakki waala rasta se jaawe hae.

Dawai:
Dawai (Medicine) uu vigyan hae jisse admii aur janwar ke bemari se bachawa jaawe hae. 
Aur dekho.
Health

Insaan:
Ek insaan ek admi, aura, larrka nai to larki hae. English me iske scientific naam "Homo sapiens" hae.

Parmaanu:
Ek parmaanu uu chhota chij hae jisse sab chij bane hae. 

Hafnium:
Hafnium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Hf, atomic number 72 aur atomic mass 178.49 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Tantalum:
Tantalum ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Ta, atomic number 73 aur atomic mass 180.95 hae. 

Tungsten:
Tungsten ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol W, atomic number 74 aur atomic mass 183.84 hae. 

Rhenium:
Rhenium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Re, atomic number 75 aur aomic mass 186.21 hae. 

Osmium:
Osmium ek chemical element hae jiske symbol "Os", atomic number 76 aur mass number 190.23 hae. 
Duniya me bahut kamti Osmium hae, aur ii kaaran se ii bahut mahangaa hae.
Osmium ek metal, lekin ii kamti react kare aur ii kaaran se iske "noble metal" bola jaawe hae.
Iske 1804 me Smithson Tennant London, England me paais rahaa. Osmium ke Iridium aur Platinum ke saathe paawa jjawe hae.

Iridium:
Iridium ek element hae, jiske symbol Ir, atomic number 77 aur atomic mass 192.22 hae. 

Platinum:
Platinum ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Pt, atomic number 78 aur atomic mass 195 a.m.u. hae. 

Waiwai (Vanua Levu) Mill:
Waiwai Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske Vanua Levu, Fiji ke south me 1878 me banawa gais rahaa.
Itihaas.
Waiwai Mill Chippendall aur Thompson 1878 me banae rahin. Ii mill paani se chalat rahaa aur har roj ek ton ganna peraa jaawat rahaa. Ii mill ke khatir pakki line se ganaa ke ghora se khiich ke lawa jaawat rahaa. Ii mill ke 1882 me band kar dwa gais rahaa.

Holmhurst (Taveuni) Mill:
Holmhurst Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa jiske Taveuni, Fiji ke Vuna Point ke lage 1883 me banwa gais rahaa.
Itihaas.
Fiji me Taveuni Island ke Vuna Point ke lage 1873 me Sydney ke ek wakiil, W. W. Billyard, 960 bigha ke ek jaiin kharidis rahaa, jisme kapaas bowaa jaawat rahaa. 1881 me ganaa bowe aur pere ke khatir ek company, W. W. Billyyard and Company ke register karaa gais rahaa aur 500 bigha me ganna boe ke suruu kara gais. April 1882 me mill banae ke suruu karaa gais jon ki 15 March 1883 me pere se suruu karis. Ii property me dher pakki line bichawa gais rahaa aur ingin se ganna waala gaarri ke khicha jaawat rahaa. Ii estae ke aur barrhawa gais aur dher sudhar karaa gais rahaa
8 May 1884 ke mill ke saathe puura estate ke beche ke kosis karaa gais lekin ek partner ke caveat lagae ke kaaran ii nai bikaa. 1885 me ii mill ke administration ke fir se badla gais aur iske Taveuni Sugar Company aur Holmhurst Sugar Estate ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. 1890 me J. M. Borron ( jon ki Mago Island Company me pahile rahaa)ii mill ke manager rahaa aur iske aur barrhaes rahaa.
1896 me ii mill ke finance kare waala, Bank of New Zealand, kuchh taakliif me parra aur ii mill ke beche k kosis karis lekin koi kharide waala nai milaa. January 1897 ii mill ke band kar dwa gais. II time ii 1200 ton chini banwat rahaa. II estate ke ek parrosi, J. V. Tarte ke, December 1897 me, bech dewa gias jon ki isman nariyal boe lagaa. 1907 me Tart ke estae me pakki line rahaa jon ki saait Holmhurst estae se aais rahaa.

Geology:
Bhumigyan (Geology) dunia jon sab nonliving chij se banaa hae ke baare me parrhae hae.

Axiom:
Ek Axiom uu chij ke baare me ek bayaan hae jiske sachchaa maana jaawe hae.

Narend Naidu:
Narend Naidu, Fiji ke ek politician aur social worker hae. 2001 ke election me uu Labasa Open Constituency (Fiji) 1999 - 2006 se National Federation Party ke bagal se kharra bhaes rahaa lekin uske khaali 15% vote mila rahaa. Uu Sangam me bhi achchhaa yogdaan diis hae.

Nadroga:

Tavua:

Rakiraki:

Suva Mill:
Suva Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1872 me Suva, Fiji me Brewer aur Joske banae rahin.
Itihaas.
1872 me Fiji ke dui goraa settler logan, William H. O'Halloran Brewer aur Paul Joske ek chini ke mill banain. Ii logan suruu me thora matra me chini banain jiske uu logan 5 peny pound kar ke bechin. Baad me chini ke production ke aur barhawa gais aur April 1874 me 10 ton chini Australia bheja gais. Suva ke matti chini khatir achhhaa nai rahaa aur 1875 me ii mill ke band kare ke paraa. Ii mill me £30,000 lagawa gais rahaa aur mill ke band hor ke baad Brewer faansi laae liis aur Joske duusra business kare lagaa. Ii logan ii time aapan paisa bhi chhaape rahin. 

Mago (Lau) Mill:
Mago Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1884 me Lau ke Mago Island me Mago Island Company Limited suruu karis rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Ii mill Lau Group ke north me Mago Island me 3 May 1884 ke chini pere ke suruu karis. Mago Island ke kuchh planter logan saathe hoe ke 1881 me Mago Island Company Limited ke suuu karin aur ek chini ke mill banae ke decide karin. 1883 talak 20 inch ke pakki line ke bichhae dewa gais rahaa jisse garvity se ganna ke mill talak lawa jaae sakat rahaa. 1884 me hian pe 150 bigha jamiin me ganna boa gais rahaa aur 5 mile ke pakki me ghorra se ghiich ke ganna ke mill talak lawa jaawat rahaa. 1885 me 90 ganna ke gaari rahaa. 1887 me pakki ke dui aur mile se barrhawa gais.
1889 me mill financial muskil me parr gais aur iske 1895 talak Fraser and Company, Mago Island Estates Propriety ke naam pe chalais. Mill band hoe ke baad iske boiler ke Penang (Rakiraki) Mill me baithawa gais.

Elbe Naddi:
Elbe Naddi (Czech bhasa "Labe", Sorbian bhasa "Łobjo", Polish bhasa "Łaba", German: "Elbe") central Europe ke ek khaas paani ke rasta hae. Ii North West Czechia se suruu hoe ke Germany me se jaae North Sea me nikle hae.

Brahmaputra Naddi:
TBrahmaputra, Asia ke ek khaas naddi hae jon ki Tibet, India aur Bangladesh me se jaawe hae. Ii lamba hae.
Ii Ganga se mil ke Sunderban delta banae hae jon ki dinia ke sab se baraa delta hae. 

Vijay Singh:

M. T. Khan (politician):

Bromine:
Bromine ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Br, atomic number 35, aur atomic weight 80 hae. 

Iodine:
Iodine ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol I, atomic number 53, aur atomic mass 127 hae. 

Astatine:
Astatine ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol At, atomic number 85, aur atomic weight 210 hae. 

Uuntth:
Uunth ek rakam ke janwar hae jon ki Camelidae family ke hae. 

Johannes Heesters:
Johannes Heesters (janam: 5 December 1903) ek Dutch abhineta, gawaiya, aur entertainer hae. 
Uu 91 saal se jaada time se German bhasa waala jagha me kaam kare hae. April 2011 me, Heesters dunia bhar me entertainment industry me kaam kae waala log me se sab se budha banaa. Kuch log ii baad se khusi nai hae ki uu ek dafe Adolf Hitler ke khati bhi gaais rahaa.
Heesters ke dui dafe saadi bhaes: 1930 se 1985 talak uu Belgian actress, Louise Ghijs (1906) aur 1991-se abhi talak Simone Rethel se saadi karis rahaa. Heesters ke lage dui larrki hae, uske pahila saadi se, aur paanch naati potaa aur 11 parotaa aur 5 par parpota hae aur ek par par parpota hae.

Shakti:
Shakti (Energy) ek sabd hae jiske ek se jaada matlab hae.

Sharpe, Fletcher &amp; Company (Navua) Mill:
Sharpe, Fletcher & Company (Navua) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1884 me Fiji ke Navua Naddi ke east me naddi ke muh se dui mile uppar banawa gais rahaa. Ii jagha jon ki Navua Town aur samundar ke biich me rahaa ke Vuni Noko Noko ke naam se jaana jaawe hae. 
Itihaas.
Sharpe, Fletcher & Company ek 1400 bigha ke jamiin ke Vuninokonoko me Navua delta me kharidis aur ganna boe ke suruu karis. April 1883 me ek mill ke banae ke suruu karaa gais. Chaar aur adha mile ke ek, dui-foot gauge waala pakki ke bichhawa gais. Ganna ke khiiche ke khatir ek ingin ke kharida gais aur naddi ke uu paar se ganna ke laae ke khatir ek wharf banawa gais. 
19 December 1884 ke ii ganna ke pere ke suruu karis. Suruu se ii mill bawaal me rahaaa. Mill ke khule ke kuchh din baad bagal ke ek parrosi planter mil ke deri me ganna le ke khatir mukadma karis. Union Bank of Australia, karjaa nai bhare kaaran, Company ke pakrre ke kosis karis. Mill, estate aur sab pkki ke 1984 me bech dewa gais.. Ingin ke baad me Labasa mill me kaam me lawa gais.

Fiji Hindi transliteration aur IPA:

Fiji Hindi phonology:
Phonology, ek bhasa me awaaj kaise bola jaae hae, ke parhai hae. Fiji Hindi ke phonology, Purbia Hindi, khaas kar ke Bhojpuri ke rakam hae. Niche ke suchi me Sudh Hindi aur Fiji Hindi ke antar hae:

Fiji Hindi me Awadhi sabd:

Deuba Sugar Estate Company (Navua) Mill:
Deuba Sugar Estate Company (Navua) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1884 me Fiji ke Taunovo Naddi ke east me Debua No. 1 Estate me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Deuba No. 1 Estate ke Wison Brothers, jon ki Suva anu Levuka, me builder aur timber merchant rahin, kharid ke Deuba Sugar Estate Company suruu kare rahin. Solomon Island se majuur ke laae ke jamiin ke safaa kara gais aur samundar ke bagal waala jamiin ke daldal jamiin ke drain karaa gais. Mill ke khatir machine aur pakki June 1883 me aais. Taunovo Nadi ke muh me ek achchhaa wharf banawa gais rahaa. Wharf se mill talak, jon ki ek aur aadha mile uppar naddi ke est me rahaa, talak pakki bichhawa gais rahaa. Estate me dui aur tukka mile lamba pakki bhi bichhawa gais. Mill khule talak 30 bigha jamiin me ganna taiyar rahaa.
Mill 29 February 1884 ke ganna pere ke suruu karis. 188 ke biich talak Company bankrupt hoe gais. 1889 me estate ke Frase and Company, jon ki u time Fiji me chaar aur mill chalawat ahin, ke bech dewa gais. Chini ke kamti daam ke kaaran 1893 me mill ke band kar dewa gais. Mill ke boile ke wahii laage Penang Mill lae jaawa gais au 1899 talak baaki macine ke bhi Penang bhej dewa gais. Mill ke ek ingin aur sab pakki ke Navua ke Tamanoa Estate ke bech dewa gais.

Ellington (Rakiraki) Mill:
Ellington (Rakiraki) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1885 me Volivoli, Rakiraki, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Viti Levu ke North me Rakiaki ke lage Volivoli me R. B. Leefe ek 5000 bigha ke jamiin kharidis rahaa. 1883 me samundar ke nangich me ganna bowa gis aur England se ek tiin-tin ke mill ke orde karaa gais. 18884 me mill aais aur iske Ellington Wharf se ek mile duur pe baithawa gais. 26 March 1885 ke ii mill ganna pere ke suruu karis aur Mau talak 60 ton chini export ke khatir taiyar rahaa. Mill se quarter mile duur ek pathhar ke pier se chini ke ship karaa gais rahaa. 
Mill ke khule ke kuchh din baad ii Mortgae and Agency Company of Australasia ke niche aais jon ki ek au aadha mile ke pakki bichaos aur 3 gaaarri kharidis. Chini ke production ke 00 ton talak barhawa gais. 1891 me mill ke beche ke kosis karaa gais aur chini ke production ke mkamti karaa gais aur 1893 me mill ke band kar dewa gais. 1896 me estate ke bech dewa gais aur hian pe chaua paala jae lagaa.

Krypton:
Krypton ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Kr, atomic number 36, aur atomic mass 83.8 hae. 

Xenon:
Xenon ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Xe, atomic number 54, aur atomic mass 131.3 hae. 

Radon:
Radon ek chemical element hae jiske symbol Rn, atomic number 86, aur atomic mass 222 hae. 

Koroqaqa (Nausori) Pioneer Mill:
Koroqaqa (Nausori) Pioneer Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1874 me Koroqaqa, Nausori, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
1873 talak, Rewa ilaka me dher planter logan ganna boe ke suru kar diin rahaa. II logan ke ganna ke pere ke khatir J. C. Smith and Company ek mill jon ki ek aur aadha on chini ha oj banae sakat rahaa, Koroqaqa me Waterston ke estate me baithais. Ii mill 27 July 1874 ke ganna pere ke suruu karis, aur har hafta chaar ton chini banawat rahaa. Iske Pioneer Mill ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa.
1876 me J. C. Smith and Company aur Waterston ke bich me matbhed ke kaaran ii mill ke band kar ke Tol plantation (aadha mile duur) me banawa gais .

Naitasiri Bhartiya School:
Naitasiri Bhartiya School, Nausori ke Baulevu Road me ek Primary School hae. 2006 me ii school me 96 larkan parrhat rahin.
School ke bagal me ek koro hae jisme se Kaiviti logan ii school ke lae le mane hae. 

Jhaarru:

Rewa Planation Co Ltd (Nausori) Mill:
Rewa Planation Co Ltd (Nausori) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1875 me Uli Calia (Koroqaqa), Nausori, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Rewa Plantation Company Limited, jon ki ek Melbourne ke Company rahaa, New South Wales se ek mill ke laae ke Rewa Naddi ke north coast me (jahan pe abhi Baulevu Road jaawe hae) baithais rahaa. Iske banae ke kaaran ii rahaa ki chhota Pioneer Mill uu jagha ke sab ganna k nai pere paawat rahaa.Ii mill June 1875 me pere ke suruu karis aur har din dui, nai to tiin, ton chini banawat rahaa. 
1876 me ii mill 362 ton chini banais rahaa, jisk ii 17 barraa planter logan se ganna kharid ke banais rahaa. Ganna ke barraa punts, jon ki 20-30 ton ganna dhoe sakat rahaa, me laad ke Rewa Naddi se mill ke lage lawa jaawat rahaa. Naddi ke kinare se ganna e gaarri me laad ke pakki ke jariy, aur ghoraa se khiich ke, ganna ke mill, jon ki 10 yard duur rahaa talak lae jawa jaawat rahaa. Hian k barraa 5-ton ke weighbridge bhi rahaa.
1882 me ii mill, Planter logan se matbhed ke kaaran ek saal talak band rahaa. 1884 me ii Compnay Koronivia me ek duusra mill banais aur ii mill 1885 me band kar dewa gais jab Koronivia waala mill ganna pere ke suruu karis aur Uli Calia ke ganna Koronivia pere ke khati lae jaawa gais.

Tole (Nausori) Pioneer Mill:
Tole (Nausori) Pioneer Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1876 me Tole, Nausori, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Koroqaqa me Waterston ke estate me 1874 se 1876 talak ek chini ke mill rahaa. Lekin Waterston aur jon comapny mill ke chalawat rahaa (J. C. Smith and Company) ke biich me pataa nai aur ii mill ke ukhaar ke Tole me kar dewa gais. November 1876 me ii mill puura chale lagaa.
IIi mill 1884 talak chalaa, lekin CSR se competition ke kaaran band kare ke parraa

Waterston (Nausori) Mill:
Waterston (Nausori) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1879 me Koroqaqa, Nausori, Fiji me me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Koroqaqa me Waterston ke estate me pahile ek mill rahaa, lekin Waterston aur mill ke chalae waala (J. C. Smith and Company) ke biich me matbhed ke kaaran ii mill ke band ka ke duusra jagha baithawawa gais. 1878 me Waterson aapan mill , aapan estae me banae ke suruu karis. 1879 me ii mill khula aur chaar ton chini har din banawat rahaa.
Nausori me CSR Company ke mill ke bane ke baad ii mill khaali aapan estate ke ganna ke perat rahaa aur iske mid 1882 me estate ke saathe bech dewa gais.

Stanlake Lee (Nausori) Mill:
Stanlake Lee (Nausori) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1881 me Nadali, Nausori, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Stanlake Lee and Company, Bristol ke ek Company rahaa, jon ki 1880 me banawa gais rahaa. Iske sarkar Na Dali (jon ki Nausori Airport ke jagha hae) me 500 bigha jamiin diis rahaa. October 1881 me ii estate me ek mill, jon ki 10 ton chini har din banae sakat rahaa, ganna pere ke suruu karis. 
Yahii time CSR Company aapan Nausori Mill be banae ke suruu karis aur ii compnay competition nai sahe sakis. 17 November 1881 me ek aagi ke kaaran mill dher din talak ganna nai paris aur mid 1882 me iske CSR Company ke bech dewa gais.

Rewa Plantation Co Ltd (Koronivia) Mill:
Rewa Planation Co Ltd (Koronivia) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1875 me Koroqaqa, Nausori, Fiji me me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Rewa Plantation Company Limited pahile Ului Cala me ek mill chalawat rahaa. 1882 me jab CSR Company aapan Nausori ke mill suruu karis tab ii mill poblem me hoe gais. Planter logan se matbhed ke kaaran ii mill ek saal talak nai chalaa. 1884 me Rewa Plantation Company Limited ke fir se re-constitute kaaa gais. Koronivia me sarkar se 3000 bigha ke jamiin ke lease kaara gais. Dui aur quarter mile ke 2 feet gauge ke pakki bichhawa gais. 30-40 gaarri ke kaam me lawa gais lekin hian pe koi ingin nai rahaa.
CSR se competition aur kamti chini ke daam ke kaarn ii mill ke 1897 me band kar dewa gais lekin ganna ke bote jaawa gais aur iske Nausori mill pere ke khatir bheja gais.

CSR (Nausori) Mill:
CSR (Nausori) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1882 me CSR Company, Nausori, Fiji me banais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
1880 me sarkar aur baraa local planter logan ke support ke kaaran, CSR Nausori me ek mill banae ke decide karis. June 1881 me mill bane ke suruu bhais aur 18 August 1882 ke ii mill ke officialy open karaa gais.
Nausori me mill ke lage aur Baulevu me J. C. Smith aur J. C. Sahl ke estate me 2 feet gauge ke pakki bichhawa gais rahaa. Baulevu me pakki Rewa Naddi ke kinare khalaas howat rahaa aur hian se ganna ke punt se mill talak lawa jaawat rahaa. 1884 me mill kae barrfhawa gais jisse ki ii 20 ton chini har din banae sake. Baulevu me ek engine ke bhi kaam me lawa jaawat rahaa. 1914 talak ii mill 104 ton chini banae sake rahaa.
Girmit ke jamaana me, Nausori bahut jaana maana raha, kahe ki Rewa ilaka mein sabse dher ganna ke plantation raha. Yahan ke jon sab ganna kata gain raha, Nausori Mill rail pe le jawa gais raha. Ii railway abhi ke Wainibokasi Hospital aur Nakelo ilaka se Lakena aur Verata tak jaawat raha. Mill ke band howe ke baad, rail ke sab ukhad dewa gais, lekin uske nisaan abhi tak hai. Aaj ke Nausori town ke uttar mein, jahan pehle mill raha, ek bada khali jamiin hai, jahan railway siding raha, aur Google Maps pe dikhaai jahan pakki ke embankment raha Manoca aur Lakena ke ilaka mein.
Vuci Irrigation Road pehle ke pakki raha, jon Waituri Road se Waidamu tak, aur Naduru Road Kuku ilaka tak purana rail raha. Nausori Airport ke nawa extension Wainibokasi branch ke uppar se bane hai, aur Visama aur Nakelo aur Ratu Kadavulevu Road, Visama junction se pehle rail line raha. 
1959 me ii mill ke, ganna me kamtii chini ke kaaran aur bahut dher paani ke barse ke kaaran ganna kharaab howat raha, band kar dewa gais.
Mill ke band howe ke baad, puraa Nausori ke maane ke jhaga me ganna ke kheti howe khatam hoe gais. Kuch saal ke liye, Nausori me dhaan ke kheti suru bhais raha, aur purana mill rice mill ban ge raha, lekin kuch anjaan kaaran se dhaan be khatam hoe gais. Ab Raralevu, Korociriciri, Vuci, Lakena jaisan ilaka me urbanization ke kaaran se, kheti bahut thoda dikhai, lekin Muaniweni, Baulevu, Sawani jaisan ilaka me ab tarkari bhaji ke kheti hoe.

CSR (Viria) Mill:
CSR (Viria) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1886 me CSR Company, Viria, Nausori, Fiji me banais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
1884 me jhuura ke kaaran, Baulevu se uppar ke jagha se ganna ke mill laae me taklifi bhasis. CSR Company, purana Stanlake Lee ke mill ke lae jaae ke Viria me baithais. 1886 me ii mill ganna pere ke suruu karis. dui aur quarter mile ke ek pakki ke bhi hian pe bichhawa gais aur ek ingin bhi hian pe kaam karat rahaa. 1889 me Windina Naddi ke lage jamiin ke lease kar ke ganna bowa gais aur pakki ke dui mile se barrhawa gais, jisme ek tunnel aur dui barraa pul bhi rahaa. 
1892 aur 1895 me baraa baarr ke karan ii mil ke 1896 me band kar dewa gais, aur hian ke Railway ke Nausoi aur building ke Labasa bhaeja gais.

Kaiviti bhasa me Fiji Hindi sabd:
Fiji Hindi me se dher sabd Kaiviti logan bhi kaam me laawe hae. Ii sabd jaada kar ke Hindustani khaana, India se lawa gais perr aur sugar industry me kaam me lawa jaae waala sabd hae. Kuch sabd hae:

Fiji Hindi me janwar ke suchi:
Ii suchi me uu janwar hae jiske Fiji ke Hindustani logan jaane hae. Mota akchhar me likha gais naam ke bole me Fiji Hindi aur sudh Hindi ke biich me antar hae.

Computer:
Ek computer ek machine hae jon ki acchi taraha se paribhasita niyama ka palana karem kar ke information banae hae. Aaj kal iska use har field mae kiya jae hae chahe voh education (siksha) ho, chahe wo military ya phir hospitals aur bahut saare. Is machine ko sabse pehle banane wale aadmi ka naam hae Charles Babbage. Computer k saath ek CPU, Keyboard aur ek Mouse bhi hota hae. 
Computer ki aaj tak paanch generation aaye hae. 
Uses.
Computer ka use har field mae ho rha hae. Is machine mae data ko sambhaal k rakha jae hae. Schoolon, daftron, hospitlon, military aur har jagah pe iska use kiya jae hae. 

Motorhead:
Motörhead. Uu logan London, England ke rahin. Ii band ke member rahin Lemmy Kilmister (bass guitar, vox), Phil Campbell (guitar) aur Mikkey Dee (drums) rahaa.
Duusra websites.
Motörhead homepage

Fiji Hindi me fuul, fal aur perr ke suchi:

Rarawai (Ba) Mill:
Rarawai (Ba) Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1886 me Rarawai, Ba, Fiji me me banawa gais rahaa. Ii mill Ba Naddi ke east bank me samunar se saat mile uppar hae.
Itihaas.
Rarawai mill ke kuchh company saathe hoe ke banae rahin, jisme rahin New Zealand Sugar Company (jiske CSR own kara rahaa), Victoria Sugar Company aur kuchh New Zealand ke Company, lekin ii sab 1888 me CSR Comapany se amalgamate hoe gain rahaa. CSR 1884 me Fiji ke newspaper ke batais ki Company, Nausori Mill ke rakam, Wharf aur floating carriers banai. 1885 me mill khatir saaman aawe lagaa. Pahila ingin 1885 me aais aur iske naam, General Gordon, dewa gais aur construction ke kaam me lagawa gais. January 1886 talak 13 mile ke pakka line baithae dewa gais rahaa.
Mill 12 July 1886 ke ganna pere ke suruu karis. Pahila katai khatir 700-800 bigha kanna taiyaar rahaa. Iske jaada kar ke Varoko aur Yalalevu se punt me laad ke mill talak lawa gais rahaa. Naddi ke jariye ganna laae ke musibat se bache ke khatir ek pakki line Varoko se Yalalevu talak bichawa gais aur Yalalevu (jon ki mill ke opposite me hae) se pontoon se ganna ke mill talak pahunchawa gais. Mill me banaa chini ke ek paddle steamer, Rarawai, se jahaaj, jon ki samundar me anchotr rahat rahaa, talak lae ke jaawat rahis. Naddi ke muh ke lage mangrove ke daldal ke drain kar ke aur jamiin ganna ke khatir khola gais
1902 me pontoon ke jagha Ba Naddi ke uppar se ek, 550 foot ke, pul banawa gais. Mill ke thorra naddi ke aur uppar hatawa gais aur barra gkaraa gais. 1904 me Ba Naddi ke uppar ek aur pul Cameron ke estate me Nabutolu me banawa gais. 1906 me Ba aur Lautoka ke pakki ke jorr dewa gais rahaa. 1907 talak pakki line ke Tavua talak barrhawa gais.

Fiji Hindi me chini industry pe khaas sabd:
Ii suchi me Fiji ke chini udhyog me kaam me lawa jaae waala sabd hae. Jaada sabd Hindi se banawa gais hae lekin kuchh sabd English se bhi aais hae.

Sikh Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
2011 ke Sikh Inder-District Championship ke Govind Park, Ba me Easter weekend (22 April - 25 April) me khela gais rahaa.

Muslim Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
66th Muslim Interdistrict championship, Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa.

Gujarati Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
2011 ke 56th Gujerati Inter-District Championship Easter weeken (22 - 24 April) me, Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa.
Final.
Suva goal scorer - Kavin Kumar Patel

Sangam Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
2011 Sangam Inter-District , Nadi ke Prince Charles Park me khela gais rahaa.

Sanatan Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
2011 Sanatan Inter-District Championship, Nasinu ke Rishikul High school me khela gais rahaa.

Antimony:
File:Arsen 1a.jpg|thumb|Gray arsenic]]
Antimony ek chemical element hae, jiske symbol Sb, atomic number is 51 aur atomic mass 121.8 hae. 

Tellurium:
Tellurium ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol Te, atomic number 52 aur mass number 127.6 hae. 

Polonium:
Polonium ek chemical element hae jiske chemical symbol Po, atomic number 84 aur mass number 102.9 hae. 

Mercury (element):
Mercury ek chemical element hae jiske symbol "Hg", atomic number 80 aur atomic mass 200.6 hae. 

Fiji Hindi me gahana aur dhaatu ke suchi:

Fiji Hindi me adjectives ke suchi:
Ii suchi me mota akchhar me likha gias sabd, Sudh Hindi se different hae.

Fiji Hindi me pronoun ke suchi:

Lanthanum:
Lanthanum ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol La, atomic number 57 aur atomic mass 138.9 hae. Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Lanthanides bolaa jaae hae. 

Cerium:
Cerium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Ce, atomic number 58 aur atomic mass 140.12 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Lanthanide:
Lanthanoid (IUPAC terminology ke niche) (jiske pahie lanthanide bola jaawat rahaa) series me 15 elements hae, jiske atomic number 57 se 71, lanthanum se lutetium talak hae. Sab lanthanoids f-block elements hae
Lanthanoids dhaatu hae.

Praseodymium:
Praseodymium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Pr, atomic number 59 aur atomic mass 140.91 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Neodymium:
Praseodymium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Nd, atomic number 60 aur atomic mass 144.24 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Promethium:
Promethium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Pm, atomic number 61 aur atomic mass 145 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Samarium:
Promethium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Sm, atomic number 62 aur atomic mass 150.36 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Europium:
Promethium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Eu, atomic number 63 aur atomic mass 151.96 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Gadolinium:
Gadolinium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Gd, atomic number 64 aur atomic mass 157.25 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Terbium:
Gadolinium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Tb, atomic number 65 aur atomic mass 158.93 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Dysprosium:
Dysprosium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Dy, atomic number 66 aur atomic mass 162.50 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Holmium:
Holmium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Ho, atomic number 67 aur atomic mass 164.93 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Erbium:
Erbium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Er, atomic number 68 aur atomic mass 167.26 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Thulium:
Thulium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Tm, atomic number 69 aur atomic mass 168.93 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Ytterbium:
Ytterbium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Yb, atomic number 70 aur atomic mass 173.05 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Lutetium:
Lutetium ek chemical element hae, jiske Chemical symbol Lu, atomic number 71 aur atomic mass 174.97 hae. Ii Lanthanide group ke ek member hae.

Fiji Hindi me jorre waala sabd:

1800s:
1900s ke decade 1 January 1800 se suruu bhais rahaa aur 31 December 1809 ke khalaas bhais rahaa. Ii 19th century ke pahila decade rahaa.

Dwarf planet:
Dwarf planet ke International Astronomical Union (IAU) uu grah ke naam dewa jaae hae jon ki Suraj ke chaaro taraf ghume hae, ek ball ke rakam shape rahe hae lekin jon ki dusra chij ke aapan rastaa se nai hatae sake hae. 
Suraj se duur paanch dwarf planet hae: 

Actinium:
Actinium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Ac, atomic number 89 aur aomic mass 227 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Actinoid:
Actinide series me uu 15 chemical elements hae jon ki periodic table me actinium aur lawrencium ke biich me hae. Iske atomic numbers 89 - 103 hae. Actinide series ke naam actinium se aais hae. Ii sab element radioactive hae.

Thorium:
Thorium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Th, atomic number 90 aur aomic mass 232 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Protactinium:
Protactinium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Pa, atomic number 91 aur aomic mass 231.04 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Uranium:
Uranium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol U, atomic number 92 aur aomic mass 238.03 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Neptunium:
Neptunium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Np, atomic number 93 aur aomic mass 237 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Plutonium:
Plutonium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Pu, atomic number 94 aur aomic mass 244 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Americium:
Americium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Am, atomic number 95 aur aomic mass 243 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Curium:
Curium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Cm, atomic number 96 aur aomic mass 247 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Berkelium:
Berkelium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Bk, atomic number 97 aur aomic mass 247 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Californium:
Californium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Cf, atomic number 98 aur aomic mass 251 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Einsteinium:
Einsteinium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Es, atomic number 99 aur aomic mass 252 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Fermium:
Fermium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Fm, atomic number 100 aur aomic mass 257 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Mendelevium:
Mendelevium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Md, atomic number 101 aur aomic mass 257 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Nobelium:
Nobelium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol No, atomic number 102 aur aomic mass 259 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Lawrencium:
Lawrencium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Lr, atomic number 103 aur aomic mass 262 hae . Periodic table me ii uu chemical elements ke group me hae jiske Actinoids bolaa jaae hae. 

Fiji Hindi me dher chij (plural):
Fiji Hindi me duuno ek aur dher chij ke khatir ekke sabd kaam me awa jaae hae, jaise ki ek kuttaa, dui kuttaa. Isme kuchh exception hae. Sab se pahile, ek sabd "log" (jon ki Magahi me kaam me lawa jaae hae), aur jiske maane "people" hae, ke kaam me laae ke insaan ke baare me sabd ke plural banawa jaae hae, jaise ki ham log (we), uu log, ii log (they), police log, kisan log. "Log" ke jagha "logan" ke bhi kaam me lawa jaae hae, jaise ki admii logan
Ek aur sabd, "sab" (all) ke kaam me laae ke plural banawa jaae hae, jaise ki ii sab (these), uu sab (those). 
Ek exception hae larrkan (children)

Rutherfordium:
Rutherfordium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Rf, atomic number 104 aur atomic mass 261.11 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Dubnium:
Dubnium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Db, atomic number 105 aur atomic mass 268 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Seaborgium:
Seaborgium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Sq, atomic number 106 aur atomic mass 271 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Bohrium:
Bohrium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Bh, atomic number 107 aur atomic mass 270 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 
Ii ek banawa gais element hae, jon ki radioactive hae aur iske sabse jaada stable isotope, 270Bh, ke half-life 61 seconds hae.

Hassium:
Hassium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Hs, atomic number 108 aur atomic mass 269 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Meitnerium:
Meitnerium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Mt, atomic number 109 aur atomic mass 278 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Darmstadtium:
Darmstadtium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Ds, atomic number 110 aur atomic mass 281 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Roentgenium:
Roentgenium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Rg, atomic number 111 aur atomic mass 281 hae. Ii ek badalte dhaatu (Transition metal) hae. Iske 1994 me pawa gais rahaa aur iske naam [ ke Physicist, Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen, ke honour me rakkhaa gais hae.

Copernicium:
Copernicium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Cn, atomic number 112 aur atomic mass 285 hae. II ek badalte dhaatu hae. 

Lautoka Mill:
Lautoka Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1903 me Lautoka, Fiji me me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
1890s ke end talak CSR Western division me ek aur mill banae ke nirnae karis. Suruu me Nadi Naddi ke kinare mill banae ke socha gais lekin baad me iske Lauoka me banawa gais kaahe ki hian pe jahaaj ke mil ke edam kinare lawa jaae sakat rahaa aur ii jagha Rarawai Mill ke bu nigiche rahaa. 
1900 me Lautoka me ganna boe ke suruu karaa gais aur 1902 talak Drasa ke lae ke Nadi ke ekaun aside talak , 10,000 bigha ganaa boe dewa gais rahaa. 1901 me Lautoka Point me ek wharf banawa gais. Ii saal me pakkai ke bichae ke kaam bhi suruu karaa gais aur Teidamu se lae ke Nadi talak 22 mile lamba paki bichawa gais. 1901 me mill ke banae ke bhi suruu karaa gais aur ii 9 June 1903 ke khula.
Pahila saal ii mill 134,246 tonne ganna peris aur 14,500 tonne chini banais. Ii Fiji ke pura Chini production ke 35% rahaa. 190 me Lautoka aur Rarawai ke pakki line ke jorre ke sicha gais ( jisse ki Rarawail Mill ke chini Lautoka Waharf pe laada jaae sake. October 1907 me ii link oura karaa gais.

Labasa Mill:
Labasa Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1894 me Labasa, Fiji me me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
1890s ke suruu me CSR Company ke Labasa me ek mill banae ke ijajat milaa. 1892 me i mill ke Qawa Naddi ke kinare banae ke suruu karaa gais. Jab ke Nausori Mill aur Ba Mill ke nadii se ganna laae ke khatir plan karaa gais rahaa, Labasa Mill ke suruu se khaali pakki se ganna ke laae ke khatir banawa gais rahaa. 1893 me pakki ke bichaae ke suruu karaa gais rahaa aur ii mill 1894 ke biich me khula. Hian se chini ke Malau Waraf lae jaae ke export karaa jaae hae. 1896 me jab Viria Mill band bhais tab huan se dher buildig ke Labasa lawa gais. 1897 me hian pe 14 mile ke pakki line rahaa.
1894 me 30,000 ton ganna pera gais rahaa aur 1982 tala ii barr ke 1,140,552 tonne rahaa, jisme se 55% train se lawa gais rahaa.

Penang (Rakiraki) Mill:
Penang Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1881 me Rakiraki, Fiji me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Nathaniel aur Charles Chalmers (duuni bhaiya logan) Rakiraki me 1870s me jamiin khariid ke ganna boe ke suruu karin. Ii estate ke Penang naam dewa gais kaaahe ki Dr Charles Chalmers Malaysia ke Penang Island me (jab uu Indian Army me rahaa) me pahile rahat rahaa. Ii estate bahut achchaa matti me rahaa aur hian pe achchhaa ganna howat rahaa.
7 May 1881 me Chalmers bhaiya logan hian pe ek ganna ke mill suruu karin jon ki har in 5 ton ganna banae sakat rahaa. 1883 talak ii estate me dui feet chhe inch gauge ke pakki bichhawa gais. Suruu me ghorraa se ganna ke gaari ke khichaa jaawat rahaa. Ii time me chini ke mill se jahaaj talak, jon ki samundar me langarr girae rahaa, ke Penang Naddi se punt se lae jawa jaawat rahaa.
1889 me, Dr Charles Chalmers ke maut ke baad, ii mill Melbourne ke Fraser and Company (jon ki estate ke trustee rahaa) ke lage chal diis. Ii logan ii mill aur estate ke beche ke kosis karin lekin koi kharide waala nai milaa. 1897 me Fraser and Company liquidation me chal diis aur liquidator logan Melboune Trust Company Limited banae ke Penang Sugar Estate ke chalae lagin. 
1898 se 1906 talak mill ke barhawa gais aur Deuba aur Mago ke band karaa gais mill se equipment ke laae ke. 1899 me mill Penang 3 Star Brand ke chini ke Fiji me bechat rahaa. Ii time me mill se khaali 1 mile duur talak gana bowa jjawat rahaa. 1910 se mill ke aur barrhawa gais, pakki line ke 2feet gauge pe standadise karaa gais, Penang Naddi pe ek nawaa pul banawa gais, pakki ke Wailevu aur Wairuku Creek ke uppar se lae jawa gais aur ek inign ke kharida gais.
1916 me pakki ke purana Ellington Sugar Estate ke Nasogoi point talak barrhawa gais jisse ki chini ke hian se jahaaj pe laada jaae sake. Pakki ke west ke bagal bhi Vitawa talak barrhawa gais aur k aur ingin kharida gais.
1920 me jab Girmit khalaas bhais, aur dunia me cini ke daam giraa tab 1921 me ganna ke bowai ke band kar dewa gais. May 1922 me mill ke band kare ke faesla karaa gais, lekin June 1923 me iske fir se khole ke faesla karaa gais. Navua ke band karaa gais Tamanua Mill se majuur ke estate me kaam me lagawa gais. 1925 me ganna pere ke fir se suruu karaa gais. 1926 me ii mill ke CSR Company ke bech dewa gais.
2016 mein, jab TC Winston Rakiraki me ekdam naas kar diis, toh Penang Mill ke bhi dher haani pahucha, aur bahut soche ke baad, Fiji ke sarkar aur FSC saal ke anth me mill ke band kar diis. Ab, Dobuilevu se Nanuku tak jon jon ganna pehle Penang le jaat raha, ab Rarawai Mill apan ganna bheje lorry mein.

Tamanua (Navua) Mill:
Tamanua Mill ek ganna ke pere waala mill rahaa, jiske 1884 me Navua Naddi, Fiji ke west me banawa gais rahaa. 
Itihaas.
Stanlake Lee and Company ke lage Nausori me ek mili rahaa. Jab CSR Company, Nausori me mill banae ke faeslaa karis tab ii Company aapan Nausori ke mill ke beech ke Navua Naddi ke lage 700 bigha jamiin kharidis. 1883 me Stanlake Lee and Company ke ek aur shareholder ke saathe fir se banwa gais aur October 1884 me ii Tamanua me ek mill kholis jon ki 25 ton chini har din banae sakat rahaa.
3 September 1884 ke Company ke naam ke badal ke Fiji Sugar Company Limited kar dewa gais rahaa. Jab bagal ke Sharp, Fletcher and Company ke mill, 1885 me band bhais tab huan se equipment laae ke mill ke barra karaa gais. Naddi ke uu paar me Calia estate jiske Sharp, Fletcher and Company pahile chalawat rahaa ke bhi lae ke usme fir se ganna bowa gais. Punt se bhi ganna ke mill talak lawa jaawat rahaa. 1893 me jab Deuba Sugar Estate ke mill band bhais tab huan se bhi equipment lae ke mill me baithawa gais.
1894 khula Hindustani lgan ke chhota chhota plot me basawa gais raha. 1897 me hian pe 2496 tonn chini banawa gais aur ii tiino CSR Mill se bahut kamtii rahaa. Mill ke aur barrhawa gauis aur 21 August 1905 ke iske Columbia Sugar Refining Company ke beech dewa gais aur iske Vancouver-Fiji Sugar Company Limited ke naam se jaana laae lagaa.
16 January 1907 me Naua Naddi ke uppar se ek pul banawa gais. Pakki ke system ke aur barrhawa gais
1910, ke hurricane aur 1912, 1916 aur 1919 ke ke baar bahut bhaari barbaadi karis. Girmit ke khalaas hoe, aur Hindustani kisan ke aur jaada daam maage ke kaaran, aur 1920 ke harrtall se Company ke bahut naas bhais. 1922 ke katai ke baad sab pakki ke ukhaar dewa gais aur mill ke band kar dewa gais. Mill aur jamiin Fij Pastoral Company ke bech dewa gais. Navua pul ke sarkar ke ek shillling me becha gais.

Ununtrium:
Ununtrium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Uut, atomic number 113 aur atomic mass 286 hae. 

Flerovium:
Flerovium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Fl, atomic number 114 aur atomic mass 289 hae. 

Ununpentium:
Ununpentium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Uup, atomic number 115 aur atomic mass 289 hae. 

Livermorium:
Livermorium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Lv, atomic number 116 aur atomic mass 293 hae. 

Ununseptium:
Ununseptium ek chemical element hae, jiske chemical symbol Uus, atomic number 117 aur atomic mass 294 hae. 

Ununoctium:
! colspan="2" | Atomic Structure
! colspan="2" | Periodic Table
! colspan="2" | Uuo
Ununoctium is a chemical element, which chemical symbol is Uuo, atomic number is 118 and atomic mass is 294. 

Conservation of energy:
Physics, me conservation of energy ke matlab ii hae ki ek system me puura jorr ke energy kabhi nai badle hae, lekin kon rakam ke energy ii hae badal jjae sake hae jaise ki friction, kinetic energy me badal ke thermal energy de hae. 
Duusra websites.
MISN-0-158 "The First Law of Thermodynamics" (PDF file) by Jerzy Borysowicz for Project PHYSNET.

Electromagnetic radiation:
Electromagnetic waves uu wave hai jon ki light ke raftaar se chale hae. 

Krishna Prasad:
Krishna Prasad (maut: 2010),Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa, jon ki Fiji ke House of Representatives me 2001 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke taraf se Nadi Open Constituency se chuna gais rahaa. Pahila ginti me returning officer ii seat ke National Federation Party ke Prem Singh ke 82 votes se diis rahaa, lekin 8 February 2002, Judge Anthony Gates ii faesla diis ki ek hajaar se jaada vote ke galti se gina gais rahaa, aur prased ke vijeta declare karis.
Prasad, politics se 2006 me retire hoe gais aur uske maut, heart attack se 27 April 2010 ke bhais.

Sanjeet Chand Maharaj:
Sanjeet Chand Maharaj, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae. Fiji ke House of Representatives me uu Viti Levu East Maritime Indian Communanal Constituency, jon ki uu 19 cinstituency me se ek hae jiske Hindusani logan ke khati reserve kaa gais hae, ke represent kare hae. 2001 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party (FLP) ke bagal se ii seat ke 66 percent se jaada bahumati se jiitis rahaa aur 2006 ke election me 78 se jaada vote se.
Isse pahile 1999 ke election, Maharaj Parliament me Ra Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uu indepedent candidate, George Shiu Raj se haar gais rahaa.
199 ke election ke baad, Maharaj ke, Prime Minister Mahendra Chaudhry Fiji ke Senate me nominate karis rahaa.
Maharaj ek kisan aur social worker hae.
October 2010 me Maharaj ke, FLP ke leader, Mahendra Chaudhry aur chaar aur logan ke saathe, ek illegal meeting kare ke aarop me arest karaa gais rahaa. 
Maharaj, Fiji ke National Farmers Union ke executive e bhi rahaa.
Uske maut 29 August 2012 me Ellington, Ra me bhais. 

Infrared:
(IR) radiation ek rakam ke electromagnetic radiation (a wave with electricity) hae. Ii wave light se lamba hae, jiske insaan dekhe sake hae, lekin microwave se chhotaa hae. Iske naam ke matlab "below red" hae. 

Visual spectrum:
Visible spectrum (jiske kabhi abhi optical spectrum bhi bolaa jaawe hae) electromagnetic spectrum ke uu hissa hae jiske admii logan ke aankhi dekhe sake hae.

Ultraviolet:
Ultraviolet, light ke uu rang hae jiske insaan nai dekhe sake hae, lekin jiske kuch janwar, jaise ki kirrwa, crocodile, aur chhota chirriya hae.

Narendra Reddy:
Narendra Reddy, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician aur kisan ke neta hae. Uu National Federation Party aur Fiji Sugar Cane Growers Council ke member hae. 1999 ke election me uu Tavua Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin Fiji Labour Party ke candidate se haar gais. 2001 ke election, 2004 ke by-election aur 2006 ke election me uu Tavua Open Constituency se kharaa bhais lekin tiino dafe haar gais.
Uu People's Charter for Change, Peace and Prosperity ke member bhi hae.
Uu Balata, Tavua me rahe hae. 
2006 me uu Tavua Advisory Council ke Chairman aur Fiji National Counciol for Disabled Persions ke Tavua Disstrict ke District Committee ke member rahaa. 
UU TISI Sangam Fiji ke life member hae. 

Swani Maharaj:
Swani Kumar Maharaj, Fiji ke ek politician, businessman aur dharmik neta hae. 1999 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke taraf se Vuda Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin aapan Fiji Labour Party ke opponent se haar gais rahaa. 2001 ke election me uu Vuda Open Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin uske fir se safaltaa nai milaa.
Uu Fiji Chamber of Commerce ke President hae. 
Uu Shri Sanatan Dharam Sabha of Fiji ke Vice President hae. 
Uu Global Organisation of People of Indian Origin ke member bhi hae. 

Alabama:
Alabama, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Montgomery hae aur sab se barraa city Birmingham hae. Ii 1819 me ek state banaa. Alabama ke jagha 52,423 square miles (135,775 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 30th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 4,779,736 hae.

Alaska:
Alaska, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Juneau hae aur sab se barraa city Anchorage hae. Ii 1959 me ek state banaa. Alaska ke jagha 663,267 sq mi
(1,717,854 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 670,035 hae.

Arizona, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Phoenix hae aur sab se barraa city Phoenix hae. Ii 1912 me ek state banaa. Arizona ke jagha 113,998 sq mi
(295,254 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 6th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 6,392,017 hae.

(137,732 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 29th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 2,915,918 hae.

(269,837 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 8th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 5,029,196 hae. Unakka persu kondi

(14,371 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 48th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 3,574,097 hae.

(6,452 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 49th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 897,934 hae.

Aadat:
Fiji Hindi.
Etymology.
Ii sabd Urdu bhasa se aais hae, jisme iske matlab, "addiction", hae. Urdu me ii Arbii bhasa se aais rahaa.

Calculus:
Calculus, mathematics ke ek hissa hae, jisme time ke adhaar pe badlao ke dekha jaawe hae. Calculus ke dher rakam ke parhai me kaam me lawa jaawe hae, jaise ki physics, astronomy, biology, engineering, economics, medicine aur sociology.
Calculus sabd Latin bhasa se aais hae jise iske matlab "chhota patthar" hae.

Geometry:
Geometry, Mathematics ke ek hissa hae, jisme chij ke size, shape aur position ke parrha jaawe hae.

Circle:
Circle , ek golaa, two-dimensional shape hae. Iske biich me centre rahe hae. 

State:
State, des ke e hissa hae, jime des ke raaj kare ke khatir baata jaawe hae.

Maine:
Maine, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Augusta hae aur sab se barraa city Portland hae. Ii 1820 me ek state banaa. Maine ke jagha 33,414 sq mi (86,542 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 39th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 1,274,923 hae.
