Vinod Maharaj:
Vinod Chandra Deo Maharaj, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician rahaa. 1999 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke taraf se Vuda Indian Communal Constituency ke jitis. 
19 May 2000 me, uu 43 People's Coalition Government ke member me se ek rahaa, jiske George Speight aur uske rebel soldier logan hosage le liin rahaa. Uske 12 July 2000 ke chhorraa gais rahaa.
2001 ke election ke khatir jab uske Fiji Labour Party ke ticket nai milaa tab uu New Labour Unity Party ke bagal se kharraa bhais lekin uske khaali 2.76% vote milaa.

Vyas Deo Sharma:
Vyas Deo Sharma, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki Fiji ke House of Representatives me Vuda Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe chuna gais rahaa. 
2001 ke election me uu incumbent Vinod Chandra Deo Maharaj jon ki 1999 ke election FLP ticket pe jiitis rahaa aur 2001 me ticket nai mile ke kaaran New Labour Unity Party join kar liis rhaa, ke 80% se jaada vote se harais.
2003 me, Sharma ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase 13 aur FLP parliamentarians ke saathe portfolio of Minister for Veterans Affairs offer karis lekin iske nai lewa gais.
2014 ke election uu FLP ke ek candidate rahaa.

Surendra Lal:
Surendra Lal, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae jon ki 2001 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Vanua Levu West Indian Communal Constituency se Fiji ke House of Representatives me chuna gais rahaa. 
2003 me Lal ke Prime Minister, Laisenia Qarase Minister for National Parks & Recreational Areas ke portfolio offer karis rahaa lekin 13 aur FLP parliamentarians ke saathe uu ii offer ke refuse kar diis. 
2006 ke election me uu wahii seat se aur jaada bahumati se jiitaa. 
Lal, National Farmers Union ke President hae. 
Uu Sugar Cane Growers Council ke member aur Vanua Levu Cane Farmers Milling Transport Union ke Secretary bhi rahaa. 2014 ke election me uske FLP ke candidate choose karaa gais. 

Noble gas:
Noble gases, gas ke ek roup hae. Ii sab element periodic table ke group 18 me hae. Ii sab gas duusra element se jaada kar ke react nai hoe hae kaahe ki iske bahaar waala cell electron se bharaa rahe hae. Chhe noble gas hae:
Ii sab gae hawaa me mile hae aur puura hawaa ke 0.96% hae. 

New Hampshire:
New Hampshire, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Concord hae aur sab se barraa city Manchester hae. Ii 1788 me ek state banaa. New Hampshire ke jagha 9,359 sq mi(24,239 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 46th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 1,235,786 hae.

New Jersey:
New Jersey, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Trenton hae aur sab se barraa city Newark hae. Ii 1787 me ek state banaa. New Jersey ke jagha 8,729 sq mi (22,608 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 46th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 8,414,350 hae.

New Mexico:
New Mexico, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Santa Fe hae aur sab se barraa city Albuquerque hae. Ii 1912 me ek state banaa. New Mexico ke jagha 121,665 sq mi (315,194 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 5th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 1,928,384 hae.

Deo Narain:
Deo Narain, Fiji ke ek Hindustani politician hae, jon ki 1999 ke election me Fiji Labour Party ke ticket pe Suva City Indian Communal Constituency ke jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
19 May 2000 ke Narain uu 43 People's Coalition Government ke member me se ek rahaa jiske George Speight aur uske rebel soldier logan hostage le liin rahaa. 56 din ke baad uske 13 July 2000 ke chhorraa gais.

Pratap Chand:
Pratap Chand, Fiji ke ek politician, Teacher aur Trade Unionist hae. 1999 ke election me uu Fiji Labour Party ke taraf se Nasinu Indian Communal Constituency se jiit ke Fiji ke House of Representatives ke member banaa. 
Pratap Chand, Fiji me sikchha me achchhaa yogdaan diis hae. Uu bahut din talak ek primary au secondary school teacher aur secondary school Principal bhi rahaa. Uu Fiji Teachers Union me bhi seve karis aur isme dher position hold karis jisme uu General Secretary 1980 se 1999 talak rahaa. Uu Fiji Trades Union Congress ke Assistant National Secretary bhi rahaa 
1999 ke election ke baad uske Minister of Education banawa gais. 200 ke coup ke time uu bach gais kaahe ki uu Australia me rahaa. 
2003 me, Chand ke Minister of National Reconciliation and Unity ke cabinet post offer karaa gais lekin uu aur 13 FLP parliamentarians who ke saathe ii offer ke inkar kar diis. 
Uu 200 ke election me hissa nai liis.
Uske University of Fiji ke council me bhi appoint karaa gais rahaa.

Vijendra Prakash:
Vijendra Prakash Fiji ke ek politician, teacher, local government administrator aur dharmik sanstha ke administrator hae. 1999 ke election aur 2001 ke election me uu National Federation Party ke taraf se Nasini Indian Communal Consituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lwkin aapan Fiji Labour Party ke oponent se bahut kharaab se haaris rahaa. 
2006 ke coup ke uu support karis aur uske 2009 me Bainimarama, Suva aur Lami ke special administrator banais.,lekin 2009 ke end me uske corption ke aarop m dismiss kar dewa gais. 
Uu Sanatan Dharam Shabha of Fiji ke Vice-President bhi hae. 

Rang:
Rang (Colour) , light aur seen ke ek property hae. Ujjar light me saat rang rahe hae. 
Kuchh khaas rang hae: 

Laal:
Laal uu rang ke bola jaawe hae jon ki insaan ke aankhi se dekha jaae sake light ke sab se lamba wavelength ke hae. Iske wavelengh 630–740 nm hae. Isse lamba wavelength ke infrared ("below red") balaa jaae hae aur aankhi se nai dekhae hae. Laal ke primary rang hae. 

Gamma ray:
Gamma rays (γ-rays) sab se chhotaa wavelength waala electromagnetic waves hae. Iske 1900 me Paul Villard paais rahaa, aur 1903 me Ernest Rutherford naam diis rahaa.
Kuchh rakam ke radioactive atom gamma ray bige hae. Gamma ray, x-rays ke rakam rahe jon ki jaada energy waala photons hae. Gamma rays ek rakam ke radiation hae jon ki motaa chij ke bhitar se paar kare sake hae. 
Cobalt-60 aur potassium-40 dui isotopes hae jon ki gamma rays bige hae. 
Gamma rays ke doctor logan cancer ke cell ke maare ke kamm me laawe hae. 

Ser:
Ser ("Panthera leo"), genus "Panthera" ke chaar barraa pusi me se ek hae aur Felidae palwar ke sadasya hae. Mard ser ke wajan 250 kg (550 lb) se jaada rahe hae, , jiske matlab ii hae ki ii tiger ke baad duusra sab se barraa pusi hae. Jangli ser abhi Sub-Saharan Africa aur India ke Gir Forest National Park me pawa jaawe hae.
Jangal me ser 10 se 14 saal talak jiiye hae lekin zoo e ii 20 saal talak jinda rahe sake hae. TSer jaada kar ke grassland me rahe hae, lekin kabhi kabhi ii scrub aur jangal me bhi rahe hae. Ser, jaada kar ke geng me rahe hae jisme kuchh male lekin jaada female ser rahe hae. 

New York:
New York , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Albany hae aur sab se barraa city New York City hae. Ii 1788 me ek state banaa. New York ke jagha 54,520 sq mi (141,205 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 27th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 18,976,457 hae.

North Carolina:
North Carolina , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Raleigh hae aur sab se barraa city Charlotte hae. Ii 1789 me ek state banaa. North Carolina ke jagha 53,865 sq mi (139,509 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 28th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 8,049,313 hae.

North Dakota:
North Dakota , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Bismarck hae aur sab se barraa city Fargo hae. Ii 1889 me ek state banaa. North Dakota ke jagha 70,762 sq mi (183,272 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 19th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 642,200 hae.

Ohio:
Ohio , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Columbus hae aur sab se barraa city Columbus hae. Ii 1803 me ek state banaa. Ohio ke jagha 44,825 sq mi (116,096 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 34th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 11,353,140 hae.

Oklahoma:
Oklahoma , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Oklahoma City hae aur sab se barraa city Oklahoma City hae. Ii 1907 me ek state banaa. Oklahoma ke jagha 69,899 sq mi (181,038 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 20th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 3,751,351 hae.

Oregon:
Oregon, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Salem hae aur sab se barraa city Portland hae. Ii 1859 me ek state banaa. Oregon ke jagha 98,466 sq mi (255,026 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 9th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 3,421,399 hae.

Pennsylvania:
Pennsylvania, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Harrisburg hae aur sab se barraa city Philadelphia hae. Ii 1859 me ek state banaa. Pennsylvania ke jagha 46,055 sq mi (119,283 km²) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 33rd sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 12,702,379 hae.

Wu Chinese:
Wu Chinese (, ), China ke ek khaas bhasa hae. Iske Zhejiang province, Shanghae, southern Jiangsu province, aur Anhui, Jiangxi, aur Fujian provinces ke kuchh hissa me baat karaa jaawe hae.
Bahaari jorr.
Resources on Wu dialects.
A BBS set up in 2004, in which topics such as phonology, grammar, orthography and romanization of Wu Chinese are widely talked about. The cultural and linguistic diversity within China is also a significant concerning of this forum.
A website aimed at modernization of Wu Chinese, including basics of Wu, Wu romanization scheme, pronunciation dictionaries of different dialects, Wu input method development, Wu research literatures, written Wu experiment, Wu orthography, a discussion forum etc.
Excellent reference on Wu Chinese, including tones of the sub-dialects.

Korean bhasa:
Korean bhasa ek bhasa hae jon ki duuno North Korea aur South Korea ke official bhasa hae. Ii People's Republic of China ke Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture ke official bhasa bhi hae. Dunia bhar me 78 million log Korean bhasa me baaat kare hae.

Javanese bhasa:
Javanese bhasa (Javanese: "basa Jawa", Indonesian: "bahasa Jawa") ,Javanese log ke bhasa hae jisme Indonesia ke Java island ke central aur eastern part ke log baat kare hae. Lagbhag 75,500,000 log ii bhasa me baat kare hae.

Yue Chinese:
Yue Chinese ek bhasa hae, jiske jaada kar ke Cantonese ke naam se jaana jaawe hae uar jisme China ke Guangzhou (Canton) Province aur, Hong Kong aur Macau me baat karaa jaawe hae.

Vietnamese bhasa:
Vietnamese bhasa ek bhasa hae jon ki Vietnam ke national aur official bhasa hae. Vietnamm ke 86% log ii bhasa me baat kare hae.
Bahaari jorr.

Ukrainian bhasa:
Ukrainian bhasa (Ukrainian: українська (мова), transliteration: ukrajins'ka mova) ek Eastern slavic bhasa hae. Ii bhasa Indo-European ke family ke hae.
Ukrainian duusra sab se jaada kaam me laae waala Slavic bhasa hae. Ii Ukraine ke official bhasa hae, jahaan pe 35 million log ii bhasa me baat kare hae. speakers in Ukraine. Dunia bhar me 50 million se jaada log ii bhasa me baat kare hae.
Ukrainian bhasa ke Cyrillic alphabet me likha jaae hae.

Gan Chinese:
Gan Chinese ek bhasa hae. Ii bhasa me China ke Jiangxi province ke lagbhag 50 million log baat kare hae. Bagal ke Hunan, Hubei, Anhui aur Fujian ke log bhi ii bhasa me baat kare hae. Gan ek Sinitic bhasa hae jon ki Sino-Tibetan bhasa ke palwaar ke hae, jaise ki Hakka.

Filipino bhasa:

Ii bhasa ke Tagalog bhasa bhi bola jaawe hae, aur ii des ke national bhasa hae aur English bhasa ke saathe ek official bhasa hae.

Maninka bhasa:
Maninka bhasa ek bhasa hae.
Maninka nai to Eastern Maninka southeastern Manding subgroup of the Mande branch of the Niger–Congo languages. It is the mother tongue of the Malinké people and is spoken by 3,300,000 speakers in Guinea and Mali, where the closely related Bambara is a national language, and also in Liberia, Senegal, Sierra Leone and Côte d'Ivoire, where it has no official status. The Ethnologue lists the following varieties, but notes that the distinctions between them are largely uncertain:

Abkhaz bhasa:

Iske uu Abkhazi log bhi baat kare jon kki Turkey, Georgia's autonomous republic of Adjara, Syria, Jordan, aur kuchh Western des. Russia me 9447 log ii bhasa me baat kare hae.

Ter Sami:
Ter Sami Sami languages ke sab se east ke bhasa hae. Isme pahile Kola Peninsula me baat karaa jaawat rahaa lekin abhi ii bhasa mare lagaa hae. 2004 me khaali das logan ii bhasa me baat karat rahin. 2010 talak khaalu dui jan bachin rahaa.

Utah:
Utah, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Salt Lake City hae aur sab se barraa city Salt Lake City hae. Ii 1845 me ek state banaa. Utah ke jagha 84,899 sq mi (219,887 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 13th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 2,763,885 hae.

Vermont:
Vermont, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Montpelier hae aur sab se barraa city Burlington hae. Ii 1845 me ek state banaa. Vermont ke jagha 9,620 sq mi (24,923 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 45th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 625,741 hae.

Taagat:
Physics me taagat (force) uu chij hae jon ki ek kharaa nai to ghasate rahe chij ke raftaar badle hae. 
Newton ke second law of motion ke anusaar :
jahaan pe F taagat hae, 
m chij ke wajan hae, 
aur a chij ke raftaar ke badlao hae.
Jab a standard gravity "g", rahe tab duusra formula bane hae:
jisme W chij ke wajan pe force, 
m chij ke wajan, 
aur g gravity ke acceleration jon ki lagbhag 9.8m/s^2 hae.
kabata el kelte ul tuerte hsto gerta koitzík

Electromagnetism:
Electromagnetism, electromagnetic field ke parrhai hae. Electromagnetic field uu chij ke chaahe shakele nai to khiche hae, jske lage electric charge hae. Gadha madar

Gravitation:
Gravitation uu chij ke bola jaae jab ki dui chij jiske koi wajan hae ek duse ke bagal khichaawe hae. 

Nuclear force:
Nuclear force, nucleon ke bitch ke force haz. Ii uu force hae jon ki proton aur neutron ke atom me khiche haz.

Virginia:
Virginia, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Richmond hae aur sab se barraa city Virginia Beach hae. Ii 1788 me ek state banaa. Virginia ke jagha 42,774.2 sq mi(110,785.67 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 35th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 8,001,024 hae.

Washington (U.S. State):
Washington , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Olympia hae aur sab se barraa city Seattle hae. Ii 1889 me ek state banaa. Washington ke jagha 71,300 sq mi (184,827 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 18th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 6,724,540 hae.

West Virginia:
West Virginia , United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Charleston hae aur sab se barraa city Charleston hae. Ii 1863 me ek state banaa. West Virginia ke jagha 24,230 sq mi(62,755 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 41s sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 1,859,815 hae.

Wisconsin:
Wisconsin, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Madison hae aur sab se barraa city Milwaukee hae. Ii 1848 me ek state banaa. Wisconsin ke jagha 65,497.82 sq mi(169,639 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 23rd sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 5,686,986 hae.

Wyoming:
Wyoming, United States ke ek state hae. Iske capital city Cheyenne hae aur sab se barraa city Cheyenne hae. Ii 1890 me ek state banaa. Wyoming ke jagha 97,814 sq mi(253,348 km2) hae, jiske matlab ii hae ki ii America ke 10th sab se barraa state hae. Iske abaadi 563,626 hae.

Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 2011:
2011 ke Fiji Football Association Cup Tournament 9 June se lae ke 13 June talak, Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa.
Isme 10 team hissa liin rahaa.
Ii tournament ke saathe ek under 18 tounament bhi khela gis rahaa

Language family:
Ek bhasa ke palwaar , uu Burma ke palwaar hae jon ki ekke bhasa se banaa hae.

Caucasus nai to Caucas, Europe aur Asia ke biich me ek jagha hae. 

Union of South American Nations:
Union of South American Nations (UNASUR) ek customs union hae jiske member South America ke des Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Argentina, Brazil, Paraguay, Uruguay, Chile, Guyana, Suriname aur Venezuela hae.

Malgrat de Mar, Spain ke city hai. Iske population 18,596 hai (2010 census).

Bariarpur:
BARIARPUR is a small town of Munger district in Bihar. The distance to the District headquarters is 17Km. BARIARPUR is a major block of Munger District. In the east there is the Mansi block of khagaria District.
Bariarpur population is 209359. Literacy ratio in Bariarpur block is 73%.
The main language here is Hindi, Angika and Maithali.
Hence the river Musi, Mani and Ganga flow.In which the expansion of river Ganges is mainly in Bariarpur. 
Bariarpur is located on the national highway 80, which is connected to other cities of the country including Munger, Bhagalpur, Patna. National highway 333 starts from Bariarpur.
Which leads to jamui Via Haveli kharagpu Bariarpur, the main railway station of Bariarpur is connected to the major cities of the country kolkata, Delhi, Bhagalpur, Surat, Gaya, lucknow, Patna. The tourist destination here is Rishi kund. It is very crowded in the cold days. There is a MELMAS fair every three years . At the time there is a lot of crowd here. People visit the MELMAS mela to take both from the surrounding districts. This tourist spot is about 8Km from Bariarpur. Each year Anga Natya yaha is performed in Bariarpur Philip school in the first week of February from 2000AD. At the present, participants from every single states of the country come.
It talking about major school,colleges here, then Philip High school, Girls High school, Baal vidya Niketan, CBLK college. 
The main temple of Bariarpur is Shree Shree 108 Badi Durga Maharani Bariarpur market, shree shree 108 sarv kalyan Durga mandir bus stand, Gaytri mandir and kali temple in KaliSthan Bariarpur.
Kali temple,which is located in Kalisthan is very crowded in the occasion of Diwali. It is near to NH-80.
BARIARPUR. MUNGER. BIHAR. 811211

Danai:

Dangra:
Village :- DANGRA, 
Its a small village with diverse religion and culture but very much famous for various reasons i.e for education.. for tilkut(a sweet )...for beautiful and massive mosque... and so on...
HISTORY :- 
earlier name of this village was HARIYARGANJ. Later on it has been changed to DANGRA. Earlier block was located here itself.
GEOGRAPHICAL CONDITION :-
North :- MUSHARSHABDA
South :- LODIYA
East :- BAGULA
West :- JORIBIGHA
This village is just 5 km north of NH 2 .It is connected to NH 2 by pakka sadak.Just at distance of few metres a beautiful and large forest is located.
AT PRESENT :-
At present the growth rate has been slowed down.young generation of this village has a lot of potential, by using this they can do miracle in any walks of life.
EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS :-
Students of various distant villages come here to acquire knowledge from these renowned institutions.

Darar:

Darbhanga:

Darha:
History:
Darha is a word that originated from a small ethnic group call Annang in Nigeria. The word Darha was initially Pronounced as Dara in the late 1800 and it means praise. However by 1900 the word evolve to Darha due to the advent of colonialism.
Another meaning:
Darha is also a clothing brand in Australia. The owner of the clothing brand got inspired with the origin of the word and the meaning of the word and decided to build his Brand around it. He wanted to make an outfit that will make people admire, complement and praise who ever wears it

Gobardhanpur Kanap:
References.
Gobardhanpur Kanap is a small Village/hamlet in Daudnagar Block in Aurangabad District of Bihar State, India. It comes under Gobardhanpur kanap Panchayath. It belongs to Magadh Division . It is located 36 KM towards North from District head quarters Aurangabad. 114 KM from State capital Patna 
Gobardhanpur Kanap Pin code is 824120 and postal head office is Haspura . 
Gobardhanpur Kanap is surrounded by Nasriganj Block towards west , Kaler Block towards North , Haspura Block towards East , Obra Block towards South . 
Daudnagar , Dehri-on-Sone , Bikramganj , Nokha are the nearby Cities to Gobardhanpur Kanap.
This Place is in the border of the Aurangabad District and Rohtas District. Rohtas District Nasriganj is west towards this place . Also it is in the Border of other district Bhojpur .
Demographics of Gobardhanpur KanapMaithili is the Local Language here. Total population of Gobardhanpur Kanap is 8062 .Males are 4153 and Females are 3,909 living in 1217 Houses. Total area of Gobardhanpur Kanap is 777 hectares. 
HOW TO REACH Gobardhanpur Kanap
By RoadDaudnagar is the Nearest Town to Gobardhanpur Kanap. Road connectivity is there from Daudnagar to Gobardhanpur Kanap.
By Rail
There is no railway station near to Gobardhanpur Kanap in less than 10 km. How ever Gaya Jn Rail Way Station is major railway station 73 KM near to Gobardhanpur Kanap 
Colleges near Gobardhanpur Kanap
D N College DaudnagarAddress : Daudnagar
S>D>S> COLLAGE<KALER>
ADRESS -KALER
It is really nice place ...www.facebook.com/g.kanap

Gordiha:
Village Gordiha
Block Daudnagar
District Aurangabad
State Bihar
Country India
Continent Asia
Time Zone IST ( UTC + 05:30)
Currency Indian Rupee ( INR )
Dialing Code +91
Date format dd/mm/yyyy
Driving side left
Internet cTLD in
Language Hindi,Urdu
Time difference -8 minutes
Latitude 25.0363604
Longitude 84.4828838
Gordiha is a village panchayat located in the Aurangabad district of Bihar state,India. The latitude 25.0363604 and longitude 84.4828838 are the geocoordinate of the Gordiha. Patna is the state capital for Gordiha village. It is located around 91.9 kilometer away from Gordiha.. The other nearest state capital from Gordiha is Lucknow and its distance is 223.1 KM. The other surrouning state capitals are Ranchi 205.2 KM., Lucknow 424.5 KM., Kolkata 480.4 KM.,
The surrounding nearby villages and its distance from Gordiha are Sinduar 2.4 KM , Sansa 2.9 KM , Mahawar 4.6 KM , Akorha 4.8 KM , Manar 5.1 KM , Arai 5.4 KM , Kanap 5.4 KM , Shamshernagar 5.6 KM , Tarar 6.9 KM , Daudnagar 8.4 KM , Tarari 8.5 KM , Anchha 9.2 KM , Belwan 11.5 KM , Karma , .
The official language of Gordiha
The native language of Gordiha is Hindi,Urdu and most of the village people speak Hindi,Urdu. Gordiha people use Hindi,Urdu language for communication.
Gordiha Sun rise time
Gordiha village is located in the UTC 5.30 time zone and it follows indian standard time(IST). Gordiha sun rise time varies -8 minutes from IST. The vehicle driving side in Gordiha is left, all vehicles should take left side during driving. Gordiha people are using its national currency which is Indian Rupee and its internationl currency code is INR. Gordiha phones and mobiles can be accesed by adding the indian country dialing code +91 from abroad. Gordiha people are following the dd/mm/yyyy date format in day-to-day life. Gordiha domain name extension( cTLD) is .in .
The nearest railway station in and around Gordiha
The nearest railway station to Gordiha is Jakhim which is located in and around 23.4 kilometer distance. The following table shows other railway stations and its distance from Mamakudi.
Jakhim railway station 23.4 KM.
Bikramganj railway station 29.2 KM.
Piro railway station 32.4 KM.
Dehri On Sone railway station 32.9 KM.
Ismailpur railway station 34.6 KM.
Nearest airport to Gordiha
Gordiha‘s nearest airport is Gaya International Airport situated at 56.6 KM distance. Few more airports around Gordiha are as follows.
Gaya International Airport 56.6 KM.
Lok Nayak Jayaprakash Airport 91.2 KM.
Ghazipur Airport 112.6 KM.
Nearest districts to Gordiha
Gordiha is located around 33.8 kilometer away from its district head quarter aurangabad. The other nearest district head quarters is arwal situated at 29.5 KM distance from Gordiha . 
Surrounding districts from Gordiha are as follows.
Arwal ( arwal ) district 29.5 KM.
Bhojpur ( arrah ) district 37.5 KM.
Saran ( chhapra ) district 48.2 KM.
Rohtas ( sasaram ) district 48.4 KM.
Nearest town/city to Gordiha
Gordiha‘s nearest town/city/important place is Daudnagar located at the distance of 7.6 kilometer. Surrounding town/city/TP/CT from Gordiha are as follows.
Daudnagar 7.6 KM.
Saharsa 24.2 KM.
Jamhaur 25.9 KM.
Maharajganj 28.9 KM.
Rafiganj 28.9 KM.

Gordiha nearest schools has been listed as follows.

Beaches in and around Gordiha
Gordiha‘s nearest beach is Ennore Beach located at the distance of 1383.5 kilometers. Surrounding beaches from Gordiha are as follows.
Ennore Beach 1383.5 KM.

Marina Beach 1403.7 KM.

Phesar:
Phesar is a Village in Aurangabad Block in Aurangabad District of Bihar State, India. It belongs to Magadh Division . It is located 12 KM towards North from District head quarters Aurangabad. 6 KM from Aurangabad. 131 KM from State capital Patna Phesar Pin code is 824121 and postal head office is Jamhor,phesar is also "Railway station" and "police station" phesae is beautiful samll market every item of need is available here there is also a hospital
Phesar is surrounded by Obra Block towards North , Barun Block towards west ,Rafiganj Block towards East , Daudnagar Block towards North Aurangabad , Daudnagar,Rafiganj ,Dehri-on-Sone are the near by Cities to Phesar

Benelux:
Benelux, Western Europe ke ek economic union hae jiske member bagal ke des Belgium, the Netherlands, aur Luxembourg hae. 

Aruba:
Aruba, Venezuela se 27 km north me, southern Caribbean Sea ke Lesser Antilles ke ek island hae. Ii Netherlands ke ek colony hae. 

Curaçao:
Curaçao, Venezuelan ke coast se thoraa duur, southern Caribbean Sea me ek island hae.

Naskh (script):
Naskh (نسخ, jiske Naskhi ke naam se, nai iske Turkish naam Nesih se jaana jaawe hae, Arabii نسخ) se, ek khaas Islamic calligraphy ke likhe ke style hae jisme Arabic alphabet likha jaawe hae. 

Sant Lal:
Sant Lal 1918 mein Vitogo, Lautoka, Fiji mein paida bhais. Uske pita ke naam Ram Autar (Girmitya) raha aur mata ke naam Ram Raji raha. Ram Autar India ke UP State aur Gonda goan ke raha. Uske paas dho bhaiya aur ek bhaini raha. Bhaini ke naam Vishun Dei aur bhaiya ke Nand Lal aur Bhairo Lal raha.Sant Lal ganna ke sirdar raha aur uske loog Sirdar bhi boolat rahin. Bahut garibi se pala lekin mehenat karke bahut bada kisan aur bulldozing business shuru karis. Fiji Kisan Sangh ke purana member,Lautoka Lions Club ke shuruwati member aur Arya Partinidhi Sabha ke member bhi raha. Qalitu Primary School mein bahut din Manager raha. Uske bhaiya Nand Lal choota mei kujar gais aur bhaini jon Fiji mein teacher rahi Auckland mein gujaris. Ek bhaiya Bhairo Lal jhon Fiji mein teacher phir visiting teacher rha Auckland mein gujaris. Sant Lal ke paas 5 ladka (1 - Sydney; 1 - Toronto 1 - Fiji) aur 6 ladki (1 - Brisbane; 3 - Vancouver) raha. Uske patni Indrani Lal Fiji mein rahe. Sant Lal ke mirtui 1980 ke tractor accident mien Qalitu mein hua.

Fiji Hindi me Urdu sabd:
Fiji Hindi me kaafi Urdu sabd hae. Isk kaaran ii hoe sake hae ki Fiji Hindi "Bajaar Hindustani" se banaa hae. Bajaar Hindustani me East India Company ke Calcutta ke civil servants huan ke log se baat karat rain, aur ii bhasa Mughal Raj ke Urdu bhasa se aais rahaa. Iske bajaar ii kaaran se bola jaawat rahaa ki ii bhasa town me rahe waala aur trade kare waala log ke lingua franca rahaa. Niche ke suchi me 329 sabd hae, lekin Fiji ke Muslim samaj aur jaada Urdu sab ke istemal kare hae. 

Fiji Hindi sabd jiske matlab Hindi-Urdu se badal gais:
Dher Hindi/Urdu/Hindustani sabd ke matlab Fiji Hindi me badal gais hae. Iske kaaran Fiji me iske matlab badle se nai to India me iske matlab badal gais jab ki Fiji me purana matlab chale hae.. Kuchh sabd hae:
References

Quang Binh:
Quang Binh Vietnam ke ek district aur ek province hae, jon ki North Central Coats Region me hae. Lomiviti me 7 main taapu hae. Lomaiviti ke taapu log puura 8411 square kilometers me failaa hei. Lomiviti ke aabadi, 1996 census ke anusaar, 816,214 hei. Lomivit me ek hi town, Dong Hoi, hei jisme 103,745 log rahe hei. 

Dong Hoi:
Dong Hoi (Vietnamese bhasa: Quốc Ngữ Đồng Hới), Vietnam Quang Binh ke largest city hae. Ii city me lagbhag 103,988 (2009) log rahe hae.

Falkland Islands:
Falkland Islands (nai to Spanish bhasa me Islas Malvinas ) South Atlantic ocean me, South America se kuchh duur ek island ke jhund hae. Ii islands United Kingdom ke colony hae, lekin 1833 se Argentina iske uppar dawa kare hae. Ii island ke khatir ek larrai United Kingdom aur Argentina ke biich me larraa gais rahaa. Isme dher island hae lekin dui sab se barraa island hae East Falkland aur West Falkland. Isme lagbhag 3,000 log rahe hae, jon ki Britain se aain hae aur English me baat kare hae. Hian ke aamdani jaada kar ke machhri mare se aur bhrraa paale se hae.
Falkland Islands, Argentina se lagbhag 300 miles (480 km) east me hae. Argentina aur UK, 1982 me ek chhota larrai me ek duusre ke mukabla kare rahin. Ii larrai 6 hataa talak chalaa aur isme 1,000 soldier logan ke maut bhais rahaa. Ii larrai me UK, Argentina ke harae diis aur ii duui des ke biich me baat chit nai howat rahaa. In 1990 they began to have talks again. Oil and gas has been found below the sea around the islands. Argentina and the UK have agreed to share the oil and gas. There is also oil and gas outside the sea area that belongs to the UK. This is owned by Argentina.
1982 talak ke itihaas.
Ii baat pe ki kon goraa pahile Falkland Islands ke paais rahaa me abi talak Europe ke log raaji nai hoe hae, kaahe ki Portuguese, Spanish aur British log ii claim kare hae ki uu logan 16th Century me ii jagha ke paain rahaa. Jab ki hoe sake hae ki Patagonian Indians sab se pahile ii des kwe discover kare rahin, jab goraa loggan hian pe aain tab hian pe koi nahii rahat rahaa. Saait sab se pahila dafe ii island ke dekhe waala ek Dutch explorer Sebald de Weert rahaa, jon ki 1600, me ii island ke Sebald Islands, ke naam diis rahaa.

Francesco Totti:
Francesco Totti (janam: Rome, 27 September 1976) ek Italian ke football player.

Prakaas:
Prakaas (Light) ek rakam ke energy hae. Ii ek rakam ke electromagnetic radiation hae, jon ki uu wavelength me hae jiske insaan ke aankhi se deka jaae sake hae. Physics me, "light" sabd ke matlab, koi bhi wavelength ke electromagnetic radiation hae, chaahe iii dekhae nai to, nai dekhae. Light, chhota chhota packets, jiske photons bola jaawe hae, me rahe hae. Iske properties duuno wave aur particles ke rakam rahe hae. Light ke parhai ke optics bola jaawe hae. 

Czechia:
Czechia (Czech: "Česko") ke official naam Czech Republic (Czech: "Česká republika"), central Europe ke ek des hae. Iske capital aur sab se barraa city Prague hae. Czechia ke abaadi lagbhag 10.4 million hae. 
Czech Republic, purana Czechoslovakia ke ek hissa 1918 se 1992 talak rahaa. Czechoslovakia 1993 me, binaa koi larrai ke dui des (Czechia aur Slovakia) me 1993 me batgais.
Czechia, 1 May 2004 ke European Union ke member aur 12 March 1999 se NATO ke member banaa.
Czechia ke parrosi des hae Germany, Austria, Slovakia aur Poland.

Battle of the Giants (Fiji) 2011:
Fiji ke 2010 Battle of the Giants Soccer Tournament 7 August ke suruu bhais rahaa. Ii tournament dui weekend me khela gais rahaa. Pahila round ke match Suva ke National Stadium me khela gais rahaa. Dusra round ke match Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me 11th August ke suruu bhas rahaa aur final ke khel 14 August ke khela gais rahaa. Ii tournament me super premier division ke das team hissa liin rahaa.

Suicide:
Suicide uske bola jaawe hae jab koi jan aapan jaan apne le hae.

Endangered species:
Ek endangered species uu janwar nai to perr ke bola jaawe hae jon ki sab din talak khalaas hoe waala hae. 

Scientific classification:
Biological classification uu chij hae jisme biologists logan janwar aur perr ke griuo kare hae.

Species:
Taxonomy me ek species ek rakam ke janwar nai to perr hae. \

Metabolism:
Metabolism uu chemical activities hae jisse jianda chij ke taagat, khaana se mile hae.

Digestion:
Digestion ii chij hae jon rakam se organism, substance ke nutrients me badle hae. .

Vatulaulau Sanatan Dharam Primary School:
Vatulaulau Sanatan Dharam Primary School Fiji ke Hindustani logan ke school hae, jiske 1911 me Vatulaulau, Ba district, Fiji me Hindustani larrki logan ke sikchha de ke khatirsuruu karaa gais rahaa. 
Abhi iske Head Teacher Ajay Sharma hae aur isme lagbhag 100 larrkan parrhe hae.

A. D. Patel College:
A. D. Patel College (School Code: 9027), Fiji ke ek school hae. 2006 me ii school me 686 larrkan parrhat rahin. Ii school ke A. D. Patel ke yaad me banawa gais rahaa, jon ki 1928 se lae ke 1969 talak, Fiji ke Hindustani log ke yogdaan diis rahaa.

Rarawai Muslim School:
Itihaas.
Rarawai Muslim School 1962 mein pahila dafe khula. Is se pahile Rarawai ke Muslim larrkan Vaqia Indian School me parrhat rahin. Ii school me koi ajiib kaaran se Hindi aur Urdu parrhae ke manaa rahaa, Education Department ke hukum se. Muslim larrkan ke maai-baap log tab ek duusra school banain. Suruu me hian pe lagbhag 100 larrkan parrhat rahin, jisme kuchh Hindu larrkan bhi rahin. 
Iske phila Head Master, Mohammed Ali rahaa. Ii school ke dekh bhaal mein wakiil M. T. Khan ke haanth rahaa. Pahila committee ke pardhaan Nazir Mohammed aur Mantri (Secretary) Mohammed Afzal rahaa.

"Efforts were made to extend our (Anglican Church of Fiji) work of education, and in 1934 a school was established at Vunimoli and at Wailevu in 1937. But the management of these was given up at the end of 1947 owing to the fact that we could not secure enough Christian teachers to staff them".

Bhookhi Peedhi ( Hungryalism ):
Bhookhi Peedhi ( Hungryalism ) ek Bengali ( India ) literary movement rahaa. !961 me usko start kihis rahaa Malay Roychoudhury. Usme join karis rahaa aur 30 poet. Duniya me Bhookhi Peedhi ka khabar charo taraf spread karis raha. Uu logan poetry, novel, story, drama likhis rahaa.

Steel:
Steel kuchh dhaatu ke mixture hae. Ii loha se je jaada karraa aur jabardast hae. Steel me 0.02% se 1.7% percent carbon by weight rahe hae.

Zhengzhou:
Zhengzhou (Chinese: 郑州 /Zhèngzhōu/), People's Republic of China ke capital city hae.

Malay Roychoudhury:
Malay Roychoudhury India ke Bengali bhasha ke ek jaana maana kavi rahaa. Uu kavita, novel, drama, essay likhis rahaa. Bhookhi Peedhi ( Hungryalism ) literature movement ka ( 1961-1965 ) leader rahaa. 70 kitab likhis rahaa ab talak.

Chemistry me ek alcohol uu ek organic compound hae jisme ek hydroxyl functional group (-OH) ek carbon atom se juraa rahe hae. 

Carbohydrate:
Ek carbohydrate () ek organic compound hae jiske empirical formula hae (jisme "m", "n" se different rahe sake hae); iske matlab ii hae ki isme khaali carbon, hydrogen, aur oxygen rahe hae, aur hydrogen:oxygen atom ke ratio 2:1 (paani ke rakam rahe hae). 

Hormone:
Ek hormone (Greek se "" "impetus") ek chemical hae jiske dehin release kare hae. 

Classical mechanics:
Physics, me classical mechanics me se mechanics ke dui hissa mwe se ek hae. Ii physical laws join ki motion of bodies under the action of a system of forces ke baare me hae. Ii study bahut purana hae jiske kaaran classical mechanics science, engineering aur technology ke sab se purana topic hae. 

Chumbak loha:
Ek magnet (Greek "", "Magnesian stone" se) ek material nai to object hae jon ki magnetic field produce kare hae. Ii magnetic field dekhae nai hae lekin ek magnet ke khaas property ke kaaran hae : ek force jin ki ferromagnetic materials, jaise kiiron ke attract kare hae, aur duusra magane ke repel kare hae. 

Mass:
Ek chij ke mass, uu chij me ketna matter hae ke naap hae.

Nuclear fission:
Nuclear fission uu time hoe hae jab ki ek atom tuut ke aur chhota atom ban jaawe hae. Jab ii chij hoe hae tab bahut dher energy nikle hae, jiske kaam me llae ke nuclear weapons aur nuclear reactors banawa jaae hae. 

States of matter:
Chaar khaas states or phases of matter ii Duniya me hae: solid, liquid, gas, aur plasma. 

Quantum mechanics:
Quantum mechanics ("QM") physics ke ek hissa hae, jisme matter aur energy ke parrhai karaa jaawe hae. 

Radioactive decay:
Radioactive decay uu process hae jisse ek atom ke nucleus badal ke duusra rakam ke nucleus ban jaawe hae aur iske saathe ek particle be produce kare hae.

General relativity:
General relativity ek theory hae space aur time ke baare me jiske Albert Einstein banais rahaa aur 1915 me publish karis rahaa. 

Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2011:
Fiji ke 73rd Inter-district football championship, jiske Courts Homecentres sponsor karis rahaa, 6 October - 10 October 2011 talak Suva ke TFL National Stadium me khela gais rahaa.
2010 ke jiite waala team rahaa, Super Premier division me Rewa, Premier division me Tailevu Naitasiri, Secondary Schools division me, Labasa Sangam College aur Primary division me, Lautoka.
Jaada paani aur ground ke kharaab haalat ke kaaran, sab semi-final, final aur Super Premier division ke kuchh game ke ek hafta baad, 15 aur 16 October ke khelaa gais rahaa.
Super Premier Division.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 10 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game National Stadium me 6 October se 11 October talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.

Respiration (physiology):
SAb jinda chij respire kare hae. Duuno perr aur janwar ke cell respiration ke kaam me laae ke glucose se taagat nikale hae.
Respiration ke time oxygen aur glucose ke milae ke carbon dioxide aur paani bane hae. 
Glucose + Oxygen --> Carbon dioxide + Water (with the release of energy)

Evolution:
Evolution ek scientific theory hae, jiske biologists kaam me laae hae. Ii uu chij samjhae hae ki janwar aur perr , jaise time biita waise badal gain hae. 

Fiji Hindi kahaawat:
Fiji Hndi kahaawat (Fiji Hindi proverbs)

Duudh:
Duudh ek ujjar liquid jiske janwar, jaise ki gaiya, kutta aur insaan banae hae.

Yalava Indian School:
Aur dekho.
Am an ex Yalava Indian School pupil - from 1962 to 1968. Head teachers included Mr Ram Prasad, Mr Franklin and Mr Raghua Nand.
Was a very well kept and great school then, been to see the school two years ago, felt it lost the shine and pride of yester years.

1727:
1727 ek sadharan saal rahaa, jon ki mangar ke roj suruu bhais rahaa.

17th century:
17th century, 1 January 1601 ke suruu bhais aur 31 December 1700 me khalaas bhais.

Pan American Games:
Pan American Games ek khel kuud waala event hae jiske har chaar saal, duusra duusra city me, karaa jaawe hae. Ine chhota roop mae Pan Am Games bhi bola jaae hae. In games mae North America aur South America continents ke desho ke khilaari dher rakam ke khel me har chaar saal me hissa le hae.

Tulsi:
Tulsi (Scientific naam: Ocimum basilicum , English: basil, common basil, mint, sweet basil, Kaiviti: tomole, Hindi:) ek rakam ke herb hai jiske Hundu log puja me kaam me laae hai. Ii garam des me hoe hai.
Tulsi ke dharmik aur medicinal properties ke khaatir boya jaawe hai. Ii herb south asia mein achchhaa jaana jaawe hai aur Ayurveda mein commonly use hoe hai.

Magnetic field:

Red Sea:
Red Sea (jiske Arabian Gulf ke naam se bhi jaana jaae hae, or Gulf of Arabia) Indian Ocean ke ek seawater inlet hae jon ki Africa aur Asia ke biich me hae. Iske southe me Gulf of Aden aur north me Sinai Peninsula, Gulf of Aqaba aur Gulf of Suez hae, jisse Suez Canal jaawa jaae hae. 
Iske kinaare ke des.
Iske ninaare che des hae
Towns and cities.
Iske kinaare ke kuchh khaas town aur city hae::

Djibouti (city):
City of Djibouti (Arbii bhasa: جيبوتي, FRench bhasa: Ville de Djibouti) Horn of Africa Republic of Djibouti ke sab se baraa aur capital hae. ==References==

Tokelau:
Tokelau, Pacific Ocean me ek island ke jhund hae. Ii New Zealand ke territory hae. Tokelau ke koi capital city nai hae. Tokelau me English aur Tokelauan me baat karaa jaawe hae. Hian pe lagbhag 1,405 log rahe hae. 

International Date Line:
International Date Line (IDL), jiske Date Line ke naam se bhi jaan ajaawe hae, Dunia ke surface pe ek imaginary line hae jon ki Pacific Ocean ke north se south jaawe hae. 

University of Fiji:
University of Fiji, Saweni, Lautoka, Fiji me ek university hae. Iske December 2004 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. 
University of Fiji Council.
University of Fiji ke ek ajaad council chalaawe hae. Iske abhi ke member hae:

University of the South Pacific:
University of the South Pacific (USP) ek public university jon ki Oceania bhar ke dher des me hae, jisme hae Cook Islands, Fiji, Kiribati, Marshall Islands, Nauru, Niue, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tokelau, Tonga, Tuvalu and Vanuatu.

Champion versus Champion (Fiji) 2011:
2012 ke Pillay Garments Champions League Ba, Labasa, Rewa aur Suva ke biich me, Nausori ke Ratu Cakobau Park me khela gais rahaa. Ii duusra dafe rahaa jab ki chaar team isme qualify bhais rahaa. Ba isme National League ke jiit ke qualify bhais, Labasa Inter-district jiit ke qualify bhais aur Rewa Fiji FACT aur Battle of the Giants ke jiitis rahaa. Chautha team, Battle of Giants ke runner-up, Suva ke ii league me khele ke mauka milaa. Ii lrague ke single round-robin ke format me khela gais rahaa.

Lipid:
Lipid ek rakam ke molecule hae, jiske biology me jaada kar ke kaam me laawa jae hae. Ii tel ke rakam hae. Charbi ke lipid molecules se banawa jaae hae. Lipid ke algae, seeds, meat, cheese, butter aur machhri me paawa jaae hae. Lipids are long chains of carbon and hydrogen molecules. Lipids are classified as simple and complex. Examples of complex molecules could be steroids or phospholipids.The function of the lipids is to serve as an energetic reserve.

Biological reproduction:
Biological reproduction se janwar aur perr reproduce kare hae. 

Addiction:
Addiction uu chij ke bolaa jaawe hae jab dehin aur man koi chij ekdam kharaab se mmange hae. 

Alcoholism:
Alcoholism ek medical condition hae jiske kaaran koi bahut dher daaru piye hae. 

Drug addiction:
Addiction ek rakam ke craving hae jiske roka nai jaae sake hae. 

Alzheimer's disease:
Alzheimer's Disease ek bemari hae jon ki rk jan ke [[yaad dhire dhire kharaab kar de hae

Sardi:
Sardi (jiske English me cold bola jaawe hae) ek viral infectious bemaari hae. 

Bidsar:
kuch khas log and number

Rajesh Poonia 9828896363
Devesh Poonia 9660713021
Shivchand Garhwal 01573285285
Madhan Sewada 01573285*****
Sultan Singh Garhwal JEN 9414870011
Dikshant Garhwal 9414585960
Itihaas.
Pre-Indian Independence
Yah ganv Aazadi se pahle se hi Garhwal Jats dvara parbhutav sthapit hai. Yesa maana jata hai ki Bidsar ko Bida naamak vayakti ne basaya tha.
Ganv Ki Sarkar.
Bidsar,Beedasar Panchayat ke antargat aata hai. Neta ka sirshak Sarpanch hai aur Ganv me 16 ward sadsya chune jate hain.
Sikshya.
Ganv halanki sanpuran sakshar hone ka dava karta hai, lekin abhi bhi kuch mahilayen anpadh hain. Yadhapi saksharta dar me sudhar ho raha hai. Ganv ke bhutse vidyarathi parmukh Engineering institutes aur medical colleges me 
Samaj aur Sanskrti.
Ganv me Hindu riti rivazo se samaj chalta hai.Halanki nai pidhi pachimi sanskrti se parbhavit hai.Aurte Parde ka paryog karti hain,Jo chehra chupane ke liye upyog me aata hai.
Khel Kud.
Ganv ke bacche adhiktar Cricket khelte hai,lekin volleyball aur football bhi khelte dekhe ja sakte hain. Garamin ganv ke chaupal me taas khelte bhi dekhe ja sakte hai.
Utashav aur Tyohar.
Garamin parmukh Hindu utsav aur tyoharon ko manate hain.Kuch mukhye tyohar is parkar hain- Holi, Deepawali, Makar Sankranti, Raksha Bandhan, Sawan, Teej, Gauga Peer aur Gangaur.
तीज त्योंहरा बावड़ी हाड़ो ले डूबी गंगोर (tyohar Teej ke sath suru hote hain aur Gangor ke sath khatam ho jate hainfestivals begin with Teej and end with Gangor) sabhi utsavon aur tyoharon ka apne samya aur tithi ke anusar mahtav hota hai.
Ganv Ki Stiti.
Bidsar Laxmangarh se Nawalgarh vai Balaran Road pe Stith hai.Road ke dahini tarf Savragye Shri Ramu Ram Garhwal davara ek Bargad ka ped lagaya gaya hai.

Babel ke tower:

Monmouth Cricket Club:
Monmouth Cricket Club ek cricket club hae jo United Kingdom ke Wales des ke Monmouth city me hae. ii 1838 ke aas pass bna rha, matlb ii team 175 saal se chale hay. Ii team ke home ground hay Chippenham Sports Ground, jha ye home game khele rahe.
Club me kai rakam ki team hae, ii mae char junior teams U15s, U13s, U11s and U9s bhi hae. Ii team ke subse bada achievement raha jab ii 2010 me Worcestershire County League me rhte hue Division 1 me khelne ke karib aa gay. 2011 me Monmouth ke Kings Head Hotel inhe sponsor kare. Pub ki divar pe team ki shirt frame mae lagi hai, aur club yha meeting bhi kare rhe.

National Football League (Fiji) 2012:
Fiji me football (soccer) ke 37th National Football League (NSL) (iske Fiji Sun GP National Football League Super Premier ke naam se bhi jaana jaae hae), jiske Fiji Sun aur GP Batteries sponsor karis rahaa, me 10 team hae. Sab team duusra nau team se ek dafe khelis rahaa. Jiite waala team ke tiin point, draw khatir 1 point aur haar khatir 0 point, team ke mila. 

Indian Standard Time:
Indian Standard Time (IST) ek time hae jiske India aur Sri Lanka me kaam me lawajaae hae, aur jon ki baad hae.

Bermuda:
Bermuda (/bɜrˈmjuːdə/ "Ber-myu-dah"; official naam, the Bermudas nai to Somers Islands) ek British overseas territory, North Atlantic Ocean me hae. Ii des jaada kar ke ek barraa island aur 180chhotachhota island hae.

Logarithm:
Logarithms nai to logs, mathematics ke ek hissa hae. Ii exponential functions ke rakam hae, aur iske barraa barraa number ke multiply aur divide kare me kaam me laawa jaae hae. 

Paani (barse):
Paani barse hae jab paani ke chhota chhota droplets aasaam me baadal me se gire hae.

Liquid:
Ek liquid ek rakam ke matter hae. Ii solid aur gas ke biich me hae. Liquid ke koi fixed volume aur shape nai rahe hae.

Plasma:
Plasma, matter ke ek ruup hae. Tiin aur rakam ke states of matter solid, liquid aur gas hae, aur ii kaaran se plasma ke kabhi kabhi fourth state of matter bola jaawe hae. 

Solid:
Solid, chaar states of matter me se ek hae. 

Nicotine:
Nicotine ek drug hai jo cigarette, cigar, pipe tobacco, aur chabaane waale tobacco mein paaya jata hai. 
Cigarette.
Normally, one cigarette contains 0.7mg of nicotine.

Bhaat:
Bhaat ek rakam ke khaana hae. Iske jaada kar ke garam des me bowa jaawe hae, jaise ki Asia, Africa, northern Italy, aur North America ke west coast.

Bared:
Bared ek rakam ke baked khaana hae. Iske aata water jisse dough bamawa jaae hae. Dher dafe isme, salt auryeast bhi jorraa jaawe hae. Bread ke oven me bake karaa jaawe hae.

Semiconductor:
Ek semiconductor ek solid hae jiske electrical conductivity conductors aur insulatorske biich me hae aur iske electrical conductivity ke maila chhorr ke control karaa jaae sake hae. 

Thermodynamics:
Thermodynamics, Bhautic vigyan (Physics) ke ek hissa hae, jisme garmi kon rakam se ek chij me se duusra chij me jaae hae, ke study karaa jaae hae.

Screw:
Ek screw ek chok metal hae, niila ke rakam, lekin isme thread rahe hae. 

Pahiya:
Ek pahiya (wheel) ek golaa mechanical device hae jon ki "roll" hoe ke aage barrhe hae. Ii bahut purana chij hai.

Monmouth Golf Club:
Monmouth Golf Club ek golf club hae jo United Kingdom ke Wales des ke Monmouth city ke border ke pass Dixton gaon me hae. ii golf ke course mae 18 ched hae. Golf course uchi jameen pe city ke north mae hae. Course se Welsh hills, Dean ke jungle aur Wye Valley bhi dikhne hae. Club apne ko saare Wales ke sabse achchha golf courses mae ek mane hae. Iha aur facilities mae clubhouse, bar aur shop bhi hae.
Itihaas.
Monmouth Golf Club 25 June 1896 ke din Monmouth ke Kings Head Hotel mae hui ek meeting bana rahaa. ii apni present jagha se phle kai grounds pe pe shift hota rahaa. Phle-phle club ke members bus 30 se 40 bane rhe, jo bahut kam rhe. Kam membership ka kaaran rahaa garmi ke time ground ki lambi grass. ii lambi grass ka kaaran ground ka maalik ke jyada paisa banane ke chalte rahaa. ii vivaad High Court tak mae chala gya aur 1910 mae Court ne club members ke favour mae phesla sunaye rhe. Par ii vivaad khatam nahi hua aur 1912 mae club band karna pada. Club ko suru karne ke kai koshis kiye gye par 1920 tak sab bekar rhe. 1920 mae club Dixton mae phir se banaya gya, jha uski present jagha hae.

Rehmat Aziz Chitrali:
Rehmat Aziz Chitrali (25 April 1954), Pakistan ke suba Khyber Pakhtun khwa key zilley Chitral sey taluq rakhney waley ek adeeb, shair, muhaqiq, mutrajjum, mahir-e-iqbaliat aur chitrali TV programme Chetraro Hawaz(Chitral ki awaaz) key mezbaan hain. Aap ki kai kitabain shaya ho chuki hain, jin mian Guldan-e-Rahmat, Guldasta-e-Rahmat, Gul Afshaniat-e-Iqbal, Sada-e-Chitral aur Pakistan aur Dr.Abdul Qadeer Khan sar fihrest hain. 
Gold Medals.
‎1.Dr.A.Q.Khan Gold Medal
‎2.Pride of the Nation Gold Medal
Awards.
‎1. Shandoor Award
‎2.Chitral Human Development Award
‎3.Tamgha-e-Pakistan
‎3.Pakistan Youth Icon Award
‎4.Yasirullah Shaheed Award
‎5.International Innovation Award(Germany)
‎6.Innovative Initiative Award(Pak)
