Drasa:
Drasa Lautoka city se kuchh duur ek gaon hae.
Hian ke school hae:

Bulileka Sanatan College:
Bulileka Sanatan College, Labasa ke ek school hae jiske 1968 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Iske pahile Bulileka Junior Secondary School ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa. Ii Collegeme 500 larrkan parrhe hae, jisme se 400 Hindustani aur baaki Kaiviti hae. In addition to that there are 34 teachers, a burser, typist, a librarian, a machinist, a culture teacher, gardener and watchman.
Furthermore, there are two steams of form 1 and 2. There are four streams of form 3 and three streams of form 4, form 5 and form 6. There are two streams of form 7.

Judy Garland:
Judy Garland (10 June, 1922 – 22 June, 1969), America ke ek abhinetri (actress), gawaiya, aur entertainer rahii.
1999 me uske American film insitute sab time ke eighth greatest film star declare karaa gais.

Queens Road (Fiji):
Queens Road, Fiji ke u rasta ke naam hae jon ki Suva se Lautoka talak, Viti Levu ke South me hae.

Udaipur:
Udaipur, also known as the City of Lakes, is a city, a Municipal Corporation and the administrative headquarters of the Udaipur district in the state of Rajasthan in western India. It is located 403 kilometres (250 mi) southwest of the state capital, Jaipur, 248 km (154 mi) west of Kota, and 250 km (155 mi) northeast from Ahmedabad. Udaipur is the historic capital of the kingdom of Mewar in the former Rajputana Agency. The Guhils (Sisodia) clan ruled the Mewar and its capital was shifted from Chittorgarh to Udaipur after founding city of Udaipur by Maharana Uday Singh. The Mewar province became part of Rajasthan after India became independent
Apart from its history, culture, and scenic locations, it is also known for its Rajput-era palaces. The Lake Palace, for instance, covers an entire island in the Pichola Lake. Many of the palaces have been converted into luxury hotels. It is often called the "Venice of the East", and is also nicknamed the "Lake City". Lake Pichola, Fateh Sagar Lake, Udai Sagar and Swaroop Sagar in this city are considered some of the most beautiful lakes in the state.

Tin Sahasi Mahilaye:
Tree Strong Women (French: Trois Femmes puissantes) Phransi lekhak Marie Ndiaye dvara 2009 ki upanyas hai. Yah Prix Goncourt dvara sammanit hai. John Fletcher dvara angreji anuvad MacLehose Press dvara briten meh April 2012 meh prakasit ki gayi aur sanyukt rajya amerika meh Knopf dvara August 2012 meh.
"The Guardian" meh Maya Jaggi dvara vivaran ke anusar: "France aura Senegal ke bich mukhy rup se chal raha hai, is upanyas meh astitv, virasat aur itihas ki punaravrtti asanka jatai gai hai – Parivar ke bhitar, loggo ke bic ke rup meh. Ismeh tin nayikao ke svayam ke layak ki eka abhedy bhavan dikhai hai, jabaki unak manovaijnanik larai lagabhag ek mythic pratidhvani hai."
Sanksep.
Bhag I.
Norah namak ek mahila France se Senegal yatra karti hai apne paray pita ko milne. Vah yah jankar heran thi ki jis adami ko vah jaanti thi vah amir aur vyarth upasthiti meh tha ab vah vajandar aur ajib ho gaya hai.
Apane bate Sony ko sath lekar Nora ke pita Nora, Nora ki maa aur badi bahan ko tanavapurn riste ke vaje se chor kar cale gae the. Kuj sallo baad unke pita ne apni do batiyo apne bhai Sony anumati di aur apne bate ko dekhne ke liye apani purv patni ko inkar kar diya, Senegal mah milane par Sony ki gardan katane ki dhamaki di. Nora ki maa ko annt mah unake purv pati se sapane bate Sony se milane ki anumati milli jaba vaha kisor ki umra ka tha aura us mulakata ke baad unone apane bate ki mulakat ka jikr kabhi nahi kiya. Sony ke pita ne Sony ko acchi siksha prapt karavai par vah apane pita ki adhik dolat se bigaad gaya aur siksa katam hone ke baad aura koi nokari bhi nai dhundi.
Nora ko pata chala ki usake pita ne usase Senegal vapas ane ko pucha ha kyoki Sony Reubeuss namak Dakar jail meh kaid kar diya gaya hai aur vah cahate hai ki is case par Nora kaam kare joki ek vakila hai. Purane akhabaro ko dekhate huye Nova ko pats chala ki usake bhai Sony ka apane pita ki nayi aur yuva patni ke sath cakkar tha vaah is riste ko khatam karana cahati thi isaliye usaki hatya kar di gayi. Sony ne apani bahan ko bataya ki vastav meh vaah katil nahi he, katal unake pita ne kiya he jab une pata calla ki unaki nayi patni ko jurava larkiya he joki usake bete Sony ki he.
Bhag II.
Dusari katha Rudy Descas ke bare mah, Ek madhyam varg ayu ke phransi adami apani Senegalese patni Fanta aur apane javan bete Djibril ke sath haal hi meh vapas apane desh France meh Senegal se akar base. Senegal ke sammanit Madhyakalin Sahity Rudy kam tanakhva ki nokari hai isaliye vah France mah anukulit rasoi ko Manille bacana cahate the, unaka manana ​​tha ki ek adami unki patni ke sath cakkar chala raha hai.
Apane din ke dauran, Rudy un ghatanao ko darsate huye apne pita pr dosh dekta hai jo unke France anne ka karan banne. Jab vah bahut chota tha tab unake pita ne apane vyapar sahayogi ki hatya unke sar ke upar se gari nikal kr kardi aur vah Reubeuss me kaid rahe. Sal bad, jab Rudy ek siksak tha,ek chatr ne usse katil ka beta bulaya is ghatana se Rudy ne gusse meh us par hamala kiya, baad meh dava kiya ki kayi chatro ne pahale us par hamala kiya tha, vah es ek tippani bolne ke baad dubara doharane se inakar kar diya tha. Siks mantralay ne vidyalay se nikalane ka nirnay laete huye kaha ki unone apsabdaro ka ismal kiya hai.
Rudy bhi apane javan bete ke sath tanavapurn sambandh rakhne laga yah dekhane ke baad jis tarah se usaki maa usse vyavahar karati hai, pr akir mah vaah asani se apne bete ke sath jurne meh saksham ho jata hai.
Bhag III.
Aant meh kahani Khady Demba par ati hai, Fanta ka ek dur ka cacera bhayi jo bhaga I meh sankdep meh dikhayi diya aur Nora ke pita ke ek karmacari ke rup meh.
Khady ke pita ki acanak mrityu hojane ke baad, usaka jivan girna suru ho gaya. Kuch sambandho ke vajhe se vaah apane pati ke parivar ke sath rahne ko majabur thi, unake pati ke ikalaute bete ke sath ek varis ka utpadan karne ko kaha gaya es baat ka bura mante huye usne yah kabhi na karne ko kaha. Phir pura parivar uski upasthiti ko najarandaj karne laga aur aant meh use Europe uske cacere bhayi ke pas bhejane ka phaisala kiya, vapas akar usane yah bataya ki agar vah agge se rasta bhul jane par bhi unake ghar kabhi nahi jayegi.
Khady ek naav meh le jayi gai jisme usse Europe ke liye taskari karna tha pr vah antim saarn meh naav chor deti hai. Usse Lamine naam ke ek yuvak ka samana karana para jo usse Europe bhejna cahata tha. Usaki tulana meh choti hone ke bavajud Lamine apane sath le jata hai aur usake liye ek nakali passport ka prarambh karta hai jo donno ko samundr se na leja kar jamin se Europe paar karrga.
Europe ko paar karne ki yatra meh unke pas rishvat ke liye paise na hone ki vajhe se un donno ko sema ke paas ke sahar meh choor diya gaya. Khady paise prapt karane ke liye ek vesya ke rup meh kaam karane ke liye majabur kiya jata hai aura baad meh Lamine dvara loot liya jata hai. Kahni ke annt tak vaah bach kr nikal jati hai.

Ravindra Prabhat:
Ravindra Prabhat (Devanagari:रवीन्द्र प्रभात;5 Aprail 1969), India ke ek Lekhak, Kavi,kahanikar, Upanyaskar haen.
Jiwan.
Prabhat ke janam India ke Bihar state me bhais rahaa.Uunkar mool naam Ravindra Kumar Chaubey hae.Uu patrakarita aur jan sanchaar men snatkottar tak ke parhai parrhis. Iske baad uu patrakar banaa. aaj uu Lucknow men Parikalpna Samay(manthly Patrika) ke Sampadak haen. 
Granth.
Documentaries

Johannesburg:
Johannesburg, South Africa ke ek city hae, jon ki Gauteng Province ke capital hae . Iske4 October 1886 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Hian pe JSE Securities Exchange hae, jon ki Africa ke sab se barraa stock exchange hae.
Johannesburg me Africa ke sab se uuncha office block, the Carlton Centre (50 stories) aur Hillbrow Tower (270 metres, or 90 stories) hae. The city is nicknamed Egoli, which means ""place of gold"". Forty percent of the world's gold has been found here.
The Johannesburg Zoo was established in 1904, and historically, it has been owned and run by the city of Johannesburg. It houses the only two polar bears in Africa.
Johannesburg is not seen as a tourist centre in South Africa, but rather as a commercial centre.
Nelson Mandela died here on 5 December 2013, aged 95.
He was also given the "Freedom of the City" award.

Willis Tower:
Willis Tower, Chicago, United States me ek bahut uuncha building hae. Ii 527 meters (1,730 feet) uuncha hae aur ii 108 storey ke hae. Chalis saal talak ii dunia ke sab se uuncha building rahaa. Iske 1970 me banae ke khalaas karaa gais rahaa.

Chicago:
Chicago, United States ke sab se barraa city hae. Ii Illinois, jon ki des ke midwest me hae, me hae.

Kishori Mohan Bandyopadhyay:
Kishori Mohan Bandyopadhyay ( 1877 - 1929 ) ek Indian scientist rahaa. Uu Sir Ronald Ross ka research assistant raha jo malaria rog ka kaaran khojis rahaa. Ronald Ross ko Nobel Prize milat rahha aur Kishori Mohan Bandyopadhyay ko King Edward VII ka Gold Medal milat raha.

Kosovo:
Kosovo (Albanian: "Kosovë" nai to "Kosova"; Serbian Cyrillic: "Косово"; Serbian Latin: "Kosovo"), Balkans ke ek des hae.
Pahile je jamana me ii Dardani ke ek hissa rahaa, aur Roman, Byzantine, Bulgarian, Serbian and Ottoman Empires, tab Kingdom of Serbia, Italian Empire aaur Yugoslavia ke niche rahaa. 1999 me NATO ke bombing ke baad ii territory United Nations (UNMIK) ke administration ke niche aais. 
The Assembly of Kosovo declared indepedence in February 2008. This is disputed by Serbia, and most other states. Serbia still sees the territory as Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija (). 
To the north and east of Kosovo is the rest of Serbia. To the south of Kosovo is the Republic of Macedonia. To the west of Kosovo are the Albania and Montenegro. The capital is Prishtina. Prishtina is also Kosovo's largest city. About two million people live in Kosovo. A majority of them are of Albanian origin, but there are also Serbs living in the most northern part of Kosovo.

Bemari:
Bemari uu chij ke bola jaae hae jab ki dehin me kuch piraawe hae. 

Kaan:
Kaan , dehin ke uu hissa hae jisse janwar aur sune sake hae. Janwar ke dui kaan rahe 
The ear works by directing sound to the inner ear. These vibrations are sent to the brain by a network of nerves.
The part of the ear that sticks out and can be seen is called the "pinna".
Ears are also used in other ways. Elephants use their large ears to cool themselves when it is very hot.

Gandaki anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Pashchimanchal vikas khetra ke antargat padta hai.

Kapilvastu Nepal ka Lumbini anchal ke ek jila hai. Lumbini anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Pashchimanchal vikas khetra ke antargat padta hai.

Rupandehi:
Rupandehi Nepal ka Lumbini anchal ke ek jila hai. Lumbini anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Pashchimanchal vikas khetra ke antargat padta hai.

Dolpa:

Achham Jila:
Achham, Nepalka Seti prantmain rahewala ek pahadi jila hai. 1,680 km2 tak phaila huwa Achham, Nepalke durgam jilaonme ek hai. Filhal sewase bahar rahawala Saphebagar air port jila mukhyalay Mangalsainse 8 ghanteka paidal duri par hai.
jilaka namankan.
Achham jilaka nam "Achham" kaise raha ie bare kuch aadhar is prakar hain. 
Pahala 
Achham nam rahaneke sambandhme Achhami rajaka prarambhik rajdhani "Sera budhi dharpu"ko liya jata hai. Sera budhi dharpu se kuch niche Pastoli gadse girnewale tin jharnao (falls)me ek thoda bada or dar lagnewala hai. Yeh tino jharnay banneke ley upar jis mulse pani aata hai usko prachin kalme Asmambu kaha jata tha. Ukt sthanme abhi bhi har sal makar sakrantiko mela lagta hai sohi asmamambu sabdaka apbhrans hokar Asmamb -Achhamb or Achham huwa. 
Doti jilake brahman khandanke Gopal Khatiwdake chhar (4) putra the. In charome se sabse chote bhai Prabhashka beta Devendra ke sath Jumli raja Ashok Mallaki putri Harmataka prem vivaha karke woha kuch din Jumlame rahe. Badmen Naukhuwame hi shasan karne lage unse paida hue putra raja hona aur shaha padbi pana sabko aascharj (acbambha) huwa kyuki raj khandanme prem vivaha se paida hue santanko najayj mana jata tha. Ies hi achambha sabda badme apbhransit hokar Achham nam raha.
para purv kalme tatkalin raja mugal samrajyka daman sahan na kar paneke karan kuchh Bharatiy Hinduonko Nepalme jana pada ghumte phirte Bhartiy Hindu Nepalke Naukhuwa (Achhamka pura nam Naukhuwa tha) pahuche un dinome ies kshetrame bahut sare mithe aam (mango) milte the jo abhi bhi milte hai. Anukul mausam ke karan Bhartiy Hindu Naukhuwame hi rahane lage Hindime mithe aamko "achchha aam" kaha jata hai wohi achchha aam apbhans hokar abka Achham bana.

Bajura jila:
Bajura Nepal ka Seti anchal ke ek jila hai. Seti anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai.

Bajhang Nepal ka Seti anchal ke ek jila hai. Seti anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai.

Doti Nepal ka Seti anchal ke ek jila hai. Seti anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai.

Kailali Jila:
Kailali Nepal ka Seti anchal ke ek jila hai. Seti anchal Nepal ke 5 Vikas kshetron me se Sudur pashchimanchal vikas kshetra men padta hai.

Bhojpur jila:
Bhojpur Nepal ka Koshi anchal ke ek jila hai. Koshi anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Purvanchal vikash kshetra ke antargat padta hai.

Dhankuta:
Dhankuta Nepal ka Koshi anchal ke ek jila hai. Koshi anchal Nepal ke 5 vikas kshetro men se Purvanchal vikash kshetra ke antargat padta hai.

Kanpur:
Kanpur (, ) India ke state, Uttar Pradesh ke ek city hae. Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh ke industrial city hae.

83rd Academy Awards:

Lau:
Lau, Fiji ke ek province hae.

Narendra Modi:
Narendra Modi (janam: 17 September 1950) India ke Pradhan Mantri hae. Woh 16th Lok Sabha aur 17th Lok Sabha me bhi chunaav mey bhaari shakti se jeet haasl kra. Modi Bharatiya Janata Party ke sadasya hae aur Gujarat state ke 2001 se 2014 tak chief minister rahe chuke hai.

John Key:
John Phillip Key (Auckland, 9 August 1961 - ) sala maichod hai, New Zealand ke sab asset longon manta raha beche bas maori long iske butraaki karin bas sala gaandu dar gis. Eek chutiya admi aur admi ke saadi legal kardis. Janai mangeh gaar meh halai.

Abbot Oliba:
Abbot Oliba (uˈɫiβə) (c. 971–1046) Berga (998–1003) ,Ripoll ke, aur baad me Vic ke count (1018–1046) rahaa. Oliba ke janam Catalonia, Spain me bhais rahaa. Uske Catalonia ke spiritual founder bola jaawe hai. 

Robert de Nola:
Robert de Nola Catalonia ke chef tha jo "Llibre del Coch" likha. Ii book Catlan bhasha ki pahila cook book rhaa. Uu ko Mestre Robert ke naam se bhi jana jaye hae.

Enric Prat de la Riba:
Enric Prat de la Riba i Sarrà (29 November 1870 – 1 August 1917) Spanish Catalan wakiil, lekhak aur politician rahaa. 
Prat de la Riba ke janam Castellterçol, Catalonia, me bhais rahaa. Uu aapan law ke parrhai University of Barcelona khalaas kare ke baad, Central University of Madrid jaaae ke parrhis. Uu Regionalist League (Catalan: "Lliga Regionalista") party ke bhi aapan sahayog diis. 6 April 1914 ko Prat de la Riba Commonwealth of Catalonia ke phalia president chuna gais rahaa.

Caterina Albert:
Caterina Albert i Paradís (11 September 1869 – 27 January 1966) Spanish Catalan lekhika thi. Ii Modernism movement me bhaag li rahi. 1898 me ii ne Jocs Florals prize jeeta. Ii ne likhne waaste Víctor Català naam use kari. Ii naam Albert aapn ki ek novel se li rhi. 27 January 1966 ko ii ki maut ke baad ii ko "Cementiri Vell de l’Escala" naam ke kabraston me dafnaya gais.

Ausiàs March:
Ausiàs March (Valencian pronunciation: ˈmaɾk) (1400 – 3 March 1459) Middle Ages ke time ka Valencian knight, lekhak aur kavi rahaa, jiske uske "Golden Century" me kiye kaam ke khatir jaana jaawat rahaa. March ka Spain ke saahitya pe bada effect rahaa. Barre ghar me janam liye March ne 15th century ke ant me Renaissance me barra yogdan diya gais rahaa.

Federica Montseny:
Frederica Montseny i Mañé (12 February 1905 – 14 January 1994) Spanish Catalan araajak aur intellectual thi. Ii Spain ki social revolution ke time des ki Minister of Health aur Social Policy bhi rahi. Spain ke civil war ke baad Montseny ko 1939 me des se bhar nikaal diya gais rahaa.

Carcassonne ki Ermesinde:
Carcassonne ki Ermesinde South France ki ek nobel aurat thi. Ii Barcelona, Girona aur Osona ke count ki biwi thi. Ermesinde ki Roger Carcassonne I ke saath saadi 993 me hui.

Pope Callixtus III:
Pope Callixtus III (31 December 1378 – 6 August 1458) 8 April 1455 se 1458 me apni maut talak pope raha. Ii 'Callixtus' naam wala aakhri pope raha.

Francesca Bonnemaison i Farriols:
Francesca Bonnemaison i Farriols (12 April 1872 – 1949) Spanish Catalan educator thi aur ii aurat ki parrhai likhai ke lie bahut kaam karis. 1909 me Barcelona me Bonnemaison ne Europe ki pahili library bnais jon only aurat ke lie thi. 

Wilfred the Hairy:
Wilfred ya Wifred, jon ko the Hairy bhi kha jaae hae (Catalan: "Guifré el Pilós"; 840  – 897) Urgell (870 se), Cerdanya (870 se), Barcelona (878 se), Girona (878 se, Wilfred II ke naam se), Besalú (878 se) aur Ausona (886 se) ke Count rahaa. Ii ki maut ke baad ii ka larka Wilfred Borrell ii sab county heritage me lia.

Ildefons Cerdà:
Ildefons Cerdà i Sunyer (Catalan pronunciation: sərˈða) (Centelles, 23 December 1815  – Caldas de Besaya, 21 August 1876) progressive Catalan Spanish city planner rahaa jon 19th-centuary me Catalonia ka sabse barra city Barcelona ka naya district Eixample bnae rahis.

Jacint Verdaguer:
Jacint Verdaguer i Santaló (Catalan pronunciation: bərðəˈɣe) (17 May 1845 – 10 June 1902) Spanish Catalan kavi rahaa. Verdaguer ko Catalan literature ka sabse barra kavi mana jae hae. Catalan nationalism ke barre figure bishop Josep Torras i Bages ii ko "Prince of Catalan poets" kahaa.

Aragon ka James pahila:
Aragon ka James pahila, ya James I the Conqueror, (English: James I of Aragon, Catalan: Jaume el Conqueridor, Aragonese: Chaime lo Conqueridor, Spanish: Jaime el Conquistador, Occitan: Jacme lo Conquistaire; 2 February 1208 – 27 July 1276) Barcelona ka Count, Aragon ka Raja, Valencia ka Raja, Majorca ka Raja aur Montpellier ka Lord 1213 se 1276 talak rahaa. Ii ke raaj me House of Barcelona aur barra hua.

Joan Alcover:
Joan Alcover i Maspons (Catalan pronunciation: əɫkoˈve) (3 May 1854 – 25 February 1926) Spanish Balearic lekhak, kavi, essay lekhak aur politician rahaa.

Joan Fuster:
Joan Fuster i Ortells (Catalan pronunciation:ʒuˈam fusˈteɾ j oɾˈteʎs) (Sueca, 23 November 1922 – Sueca, 21 June 1992) Spanish lekhak rahaa jon aapn jada kaam Catalan bhasha me karra. Ii ko sabse jada essay likhai kaaran jana jae hae. Ii ke sabse famous book "Nosaltres els valencians" hae.

Juan Luis Vives:
Juan Luis Vives ("Ioannes Lodovicus Vives" Latin bhasa me), aur Joan Lluís Vives i March (Valencian pronunciation: ʎuˈiz ˈvivez i ˈmaɾk) ya Jan Ludovicus Vives (Dutch pronunciation: lydoːvikys vivɛs) (6 March 1493 – 6 May 1540) Valencian scholar aur humanist rahaa jon aapan jawani ka jada time Southern Netherlands me bitae rahaa.

Joan Miró:
Joan Miró i Ferrà (Catalan pronunciation: miˈɾo; 20 April 1893 – 25 December 1983) Spanish Catalan painter, sculptor aur ceramicist rahaa. Ii ka janam Spain ke sabse barra city me se ek Barcelona me hua rahis. 1975 me Miró ke naam pe ii ke native city Barcelna me Fundació Joan Miró museum khola gais aur 1981 me Palma de Mallorca city me ek aur museum Fundació Pilar i Joan Miró ii ke naam pe khola gais.

Juan Prim, los Castillejos ka pahila Marquis:
Don Juan Prim y Prats (Spanish pronunciation: ˈpɾin i ˈpɾats, Catalan: Joan Prim i Prats ˈpɾim i ˈpɾats. 12 December 1814 ko Reus, Spain – 30 December 1870 ko Madrid me) Spanish general aur statesman rahaa. Prim Los Castillejos ka pahila Marquis, Spain ka Grandee, Reus ka Count aur El Bruch ka Viscount bhi rahaa.

Joanot Martorell:
Joanot Martorell (Valencian pronunciation: maɾtoˈɾeʎ) (Gandia, Valencia ke south, 1413 – 1468) Valencian knight aur "Tirant lo Blanch" novel ka lekhak rahaa. Ii novel Valencian me likhis hae. Pahile 1490 me publish hui ii novel ko kuch Europe ke pahili modern novel mane hae.

Josep Bonaplata i Corriol:
Josep Bonaplata i Corriol (Barcelona, 1795 – Bunyol, 2 June 1843) Spanish Catalan industrial entrepreneur rahaa jon aapan des Spain aur Catalonia me steam engine lae ke aais rahaa. Bonaplata ka baap Ramon Bonaplata aur mae Teresa Corriol textile manufacturer rahaa. Ii ke teen bhaai hae: Salvador, Ramon aur Narcís.

Josep Maria Ventura i Casas:
José María Ventura Casas (Alcalá la Real, 2 February 1817 – Figueres, 24 March 1875), jon jada Pep Ventura ke naam se jana jae hae, Spanish musician aur composer rahaa.

Joseph Oller:
Josep Oller i Roca (Terrassa, Catalonia, Spain, 10 February 1839 – Paris, France, 19 April 1922) Spanish
entrepreneur rahaa jon aapan life ka jada time Frnace ki rajdhani Paris me bitais rahaa. Oller ne parimutuel betting ke khoj karis.

The Doors:
The Doors, 1960s,1970s ke ek famous rock aur blues band rahin. Uu logan Los Angeles, California, United States ke rahin. Ii band ke member rahin Jim Morrison (vocal), Ray Manzarek (keyboards,vocals), Robby Krieger (lead guitar,vocals) aur John Densmore(drums, percussion) rahaa.

Josep Pla:
Josep Pla i Casadevall (Catalan pronunciation: ˈpɫa) (8 March 1897, Palafrugell, Girona - 23 April 1981, Llofriu, Girona) Spanish Catalan journalist aur popular lekhak rahaa. Journalist ke taue pe France, Italy, England, Germany and Russia deso me kaam karra.

Lola Anglada:
Lola Anglada i Sarriera (Catalan pronunciation: əŋˈɡɫaðə; 1893 Barcelona - 1984 Tiana, Province of Barcelona) Spanish Catalan lekhika aur illustrator rahii.

Lluís Companys:
Lluís Companys i Jover (Catalan pronunciation: kumˈpaɲs) (21 June 1882 – 15 October 1940) Catalonia ka 123rd president 1934 se Spanish Civil War tak rahaa. Ii Republican Left of Catalonia party ka leader aur ek waqil bhis rahaa. 

Mercè Rodoreda:
Mercè Rodoreda i Gurguí (Catalan pronunciation: ruðuˈɾɛðə) (10 October 1908 – 13 April 1983) Spanish Catalan novel lekhika rahii jon Catalan bhasa me kaam karis. 
Rodoreda ko kai Catalan bhasa ki sabse barri novel lekhika me se ek mane hae. Ii ki novel "La plaça del diamant" bahut popular rahis.

Miquel Crusafont i Pairó:
Miquel Crusafont i Pairó (janam: Sabadell, Catalonia; 3 October 1910 – 15 August 1983) Spanish Catalan
palaeontologist rahaa jon ke khaasiat mammal bones rahii. Crusafont aapan pharmacy me degree University of Barcelona se 1933 me lia rahaa aur uu ke baad University of Madrid se natural sciences me degree 1950 me lia rahaa. Ii ko University of Oviedo me palaeontology ka pahila professor chuna gais rahaa. Pre-historic mammal "Crusafontia" ka naam Miquel Crusafont ke naam pe hi parra hae.

Narcís Monturiol i Estarriol:
Narcís Monturiol i Estarriol (Catalan pronunciation: muntuɾiˈɔɫ i əstəriˈɔɫ, Spanish: Narciso Monturiol y Estarriol; 28 September 1819 – 6 September 1885) Spanish Catalan intellectual, artist, politician aur engineer rahaa. Ii binaa hawa ke chala combustion engine driven submarine bnae.

Pablo Casals:
Pau Casals i Defilló (Catalan pronunciation: kəˈzaɫz i dəfiˈʎo; 29 December 1876 – 22 October 1973), jon ko Pablo Casals naam se jada jana jae hae, Spanish Catalan cellist aur conductor rahaa. Casals ko duniya ke sabse barre cellist me se ek mana jae hae. Ii ne aapan career ke time me barri rakam ke recording karis.

Pau Claris i Casademunt:
Pau Claris i Casademunt (Catalan pronunciation: ˈkɫaɾis; 1 January 1586 – 27 February 1641) Spanish Catalan waqil, clergyman aur Catalan revolt ke time Catalonia ka 94th president rahaa. 16 January 1641 ke din ii Catalan Republic France ke bachao me proclaim karra.

Rafael Casanova:
Rafael Casanova i Comes (Catalan pronunciation: ˌkazəˈnɔβə) (Moià, 1660 – Sant Boi de Llobregat, 2 May 1743) Spanish Catalan jurist aur Holy Roman Emperor Charles VI ka saathi rahaa. Barcelona ke siege ke time ii city ka mayor aur Catalonia ka commander bna. Casanova "Record de l'Aliança feta a Jordi Augusto de la Gran Bretanya" naam ke book bhi likha rahaa. Ii Austriacist party ka member bhi rahaa.

Ramon Llull:
Ramon Llull (Catalan pronunciation: ˈʎuʎ; c. 1232 – c. 1315) (Anglicised kia jae hae: "Raymond Lully", "Raymond Lull"; Latin me "Raimundus" ya "Raymundus Lullus" ya "Lullius") Majorcan lekhak aur philosopher, logician aur Franciscan tertiary rahaa. Llull ko Catalan bhasa ke literature ka sabse pahila barra kaam likahi ka crdit dia jae hae.

Pope Alexander VI:
Pope Alexander VI, janam ka naam: Roderic Llançol i de Borja (Catalan pronunciation: ʎanˈsɔɫ i ðe ˈβɔɾdʒa, Spanish: Rodrigo Lanzol y de Borja lanˈθol i ðe ˈβorxa; 1 January 1431 – 18 August 1503) 11 August 1492 se 18 August 1503 me aapan ki maut talak pope rahaa. Ii Renaissance time ke sabse controversial pope me se ek rahaa. Pope Alexander VI ko ek jada barra diplomat, politician, and civil administrator mana jae hae na ki barra pastor.

Rosa Sensat:
Rosa Sensat i Vilà (17 June 1873 – 1 October 1961) Spanish Catalan teacher rahii. Sensat 20th century me Catalonia ke public school ke development me barra kaam karra bhais rahii.

Teresa Claramunt Creus:
Teresa Claramunt i Creus (4 June 1862 – 11 April 1931) Spanish Catalan anarcho-syndicalist rahii jon anarchism ko promote karis.

Sashi Rawal:
Sashi Rawal ek nepali pop singer hai.

Vincent Ferrer:
Vincent Ferrer, Preachers ka Order, (Valencian: Sant Vicent Ferrer, Valencian pronunciation: viˈsɛm feˈreɾ) (23 January 1350 – 5 April 1419) Valencian Dominican friar rahaa jon ek barra missionary aur logician bana. Ii ko Roman Cathlic Church me sain mana gais.

Hungary ki Violant:
Violant of Hungary (c. 1215–1251) Aragon ki raani aur Aragon ke James Pahila ke patni rahii. Ii ko Hungarian bhasa me Jolánta, Catalan bhasa me Iolanda ya Violant d'Hongria, Spanish me Yolanda ya Violante de Hungría kaha jais hae.

Corbin Bleu:
Corbin Bleu (21 February 1989 ) ek American actor rahaa.

France:
France (French: "France"), jiske official naam French Republic (French: "République française") hae, Europe ke ek des hae. Iske capital city Paris hae. France, European Union ke member hae. France ke iske monuments aur structures khatir jaise ki, Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, Giverny, Versailles, aur Notre Dame hae. France ek des hae jiske "régions" aur "départements" me baata gais hae.
France, 17th century se one of the world's biggest powers hae. 18th aur 19th centuries me France, ek barraa colonial empire ke banais jon ki West Africa aur Southeast Asia me rahaa. France me sab se jaada tourist logan jaae hae aur hian pe har saal 82 million tourists jaawe hae. France, European Union ke suruu kare waala pahila des me se ek rahaa aur iske land area European Union me sab se jaada hae. France, United Nations ke bhi founding member hae aur ii G8 aur NATO ke bhi member hae. Ii United Nations Security Council ke paanch permanent members me se ek hae. France, ek nuclear power hae aur iske lake active warheads aur nuclear power plants hae.
France ke kuch baraa city hae: Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Lille, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Nice, Strasbourg, Nantes aur Rennes.
Geography.
France, Western Europe me hae. France ke merr (border) Belgium, Luxembourg, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, Monaco, Andorra, aur Spain se hae. France me dui pahaarr hae jiske naam hae the Alps aur Pyrenees. France me dher naddi hae, jaise ki Seine aur Loire. France ke north aur west me chota pahaarr aur naddi ke valley hae. France me dher rakam ke mausam rahe hae. Atlantic north and west ke mausam ke bahut affect kare hae. Iske matlab ii hae ki temperature sab time lg hag ek rakam rahe hae. East me winter bahut thanda rhae hae. Summer me bahut garam rahe aur tuufan bhi aae hae. South me summer me garam aur jhuura rahe hae aur winter me thanda aur bhiija rahe hae. 
History.
"France" ke naam Latin "Francia" se aais hae, jiske matlab hae "land of the Franks" nai to "Frankland".
France ke abhi ke border purana Gaul ke border ke rakam hae. Purana Gaul me Celtic "Gauls" log rahat rahin. Gaul ke 1st century BC me Rome, jiske leader Julius Caesar rahaa, capture kar liis rahaa. Dhire dhire, Eventually, Gauls log Roman bhasa (Latin, jisme se French bhasa aais hae) aur Roman ke rahan. Christianity 2nd aur 3rd century me France me faila aur fourth aur fifth century me ekdam tagrraa hoe gais.
4th century AD, me Germanic tribes, jisme jaada kar ke Franks rahin Gaul ke invade kar diin aur ii rakam se france ke naam milaa. Abhi ke “France” ke naam Capetian France ke Raja logan jon ki Paris ke rahin, se aais hae. Roman Empire ke gire ke baad, Franks logan Europe ke pahila tribe rahin jon ki Catholic Christianity banin. French logan apne aap ke “the Most Christian Kingdom of France” bole hae.
Treaty of Verdun (843), Charlemagne ke Empire ke tiin bhaag me baat diis. Isme se sab se baraa Western Francia rahaa jisme se modern France aais hae.
"Carolingian" dynasty 987 France me raj karis, jab Hugh Capet, France ke Raja banaa. Uske descendants, logan Capetian dynasty, House of Valois aur House of Bourbon, bahut din ke larrai ke baad des ke unite kar diis. 17th century aur Louis XIV of France ke raj me ii log bahut tagatwar rahin. Uu time France me Europe ke sab se jaada abaadi rahaa. Ii des European politics, economy, aur culture ke bahut influence karis. French diplomacy ke khaas bhasa banaa. Enlightenment bhi jaada kar ke France me bhaes. 18th century me France ke scientist logan bhi bahut kuch discover karin. France, Americas, Africa aur Asia me dher colony bhi establish karis.
1789 talak, jab French Revolution bhaes, France ek monarchy rahaa. King Louis XVI aur uske aurat, Marie Antoinette, ke 1793 me maardewa gais. 1799 me Napoleon Bonaparte Republic ke take over karis. Baad me uu apne aap ke Emperor of the First Empire (1804–1814) banais. Uske army jaada continental Europe ke conquer kar liis rahaa.
1815 me Battle of Waterloo me Napoleon ke aakhri haar ke baad French monarchy ke fir se suruu karaa gais. Baad me, 1852 me, Louis-Napoléon Bonaparte Second Empire banais. 1870 me Franco-Prussian war ke baand me Louis-Napoléon ke hatae dewa gais aur Third Republic suruu karaa gais.
18th and 19th centuries me France ek barraa colonial empire banais. Ii empire me West Africa aur Southeast Asia ke bhaag rahaa. Ii sab jagah ke culture and politics France se influence bhaes hae. Dher phile ke ex-colonies abhi French language ke kaam me laawe hae.
Administrative divisions.
France ke (administrative) regions me baata gais hae jisme se 22 Metropolitan France me hae:
France ke 4 overseas regions hae:
France ke 100 departments me baata gais hae. Ii departments ke 342 arrondissements me baata gais hae. "arrondissements" ke fir se 4,032 cantons me baata gais hae. Sab se chhota subdivision commune hae. 1 January 2008, me INSEE 36,781 communes ke gini jisme se 36,569 metropolitan France aur 212 overseas France me hae . This is more than in any other European country.
Sarkar.
France ke sarkar semi-presidential system hae jaise ki French fifth Republic ke Constitution ke likha hae. Ii des apne ke "an indivisible, secular, democratic, aur social Republic" bole hae. 
Military.
France ke armed forces ke chaar branches me baata gais hae:
France me 359,000 military personnel hae.. France, aapan GDP ke 2.6% defence pe kharchaa kare hae. Ii European Union me sab se jaada hae. France aur UK, EU 40% defence budget spend kare hae. France's ke defence budget ke 10% nuclear weapons me kharchaa karaa jaae hae.

Sung Jae-ki:
Sung Jae-ki (11 September 1967 – 26 July 2013) ek South Korean Insaan ke adhikaar activist aur thinker, philosopher rahaa. Uu founder ke Association of Korean male rahaa.

Arara:
Arara (Portuguese), Brazil ke Paraíba ke city hai.
Iske area 99 km² aur population 13.157 log hai.

Subhash Kak:
Subhash Kak (1947 - ) ek Indian-American computer scientist aur poet hae. Uu ek philosopher aur Vedic scholar bhi have.
Uu janma Srinagar, Kashmir hae.

Italian Sign bhasa:
Italian Sign bhasa ek haath ke bhasa hae.

Rachel Carson:
Rachel Louise Carson (janam: May 27, 1907 – maut: April 14, 1964) ek American marine biologist aur nature writer rahii. Carson 15 saal talak U.S. Bureau of Fisheries aur fir United States Fish and Wildlife Services me biologist aur scientist ke kaam karis . Uske book ke khaas haanth environmental movement ke suruu kare me rahaa.

DAV College:
DAV College, Fiji ke ek secondary school hae jiske 1952 me suruu karaa gais rahaa. Ii school ke Arya Pratinidhi Sabha of Fiji chalawe hae aur ii Suva se 3 mile duuri pe hae.

Ronald Reagan:
Ronald Wilson Reagan (6 February 1911 - 5 June 2004) Caliornia state ke governor aur America ke 40nd President rahaa.
Reagan 1980 ke election me President Jimmy Carter ke harae ke President banaa. Hoover, Cold War ke kaaran bahut unpopular rahaa. 

Davendra Naidu:
Davendra Naidu, National Federation Party (NFP) ke supporter hae, jon ki 2006 ke election me Magodro Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa. Uu NFP ke Ba branch ke president bhi rahaa. 1994 se 2002 talak Naidu NFP Youth Movement ke treasurer rahaa. 2002 se 2012 talak uu Ba District Advisory Council ke chairman rahaa.
September 2014 election ke khatir uske NFP ke candidate chuna gais hae. 

Pramod Rae:
Pramod Rae, National Federation party ke ek purana member hae, jiske Fiji ke 2014 election ke khatir ek candidate chuna gais hae. 
Rae, USP Students Association ke president, Suva City Council ke member aur Bank Employees Union ke Secrertary bhi rahaa hae. 
Uu pahile tiin dafe House of Representatives ke khatir kharra bhais rahaa
1999 ke election me uu Suva Open Constituency se kharrra bhais rahaa
2001 ke election me uu Laucala Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa
2006 ke election me uu Samabula Tamavua Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa
Tiino dafe uske 10% se kamtii vote milaaa.

Tupou Draunidalo:
Tupou Draunidalo, Fiji ke National Federation Party ke President hae. Uu Timoci Bavadra ke aurat, Adi Kuini Speed ke larrki hae. Uske admi, Laisenia Qarase ke Sarkar me ek Minister rahaa. 
2001 ke election me Draunidalo, Fijian Association Party (FAP) ke taraf se Laucala Open Constituency me kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uske khaali 248 vote milaa.
Uu ek wakiil hae aur Fiji Law Society ke Vice President bhi rahis hae. 
2014 ke election khatir, uske NFP ek candidate choose karis hae. 

Viktor Yanukovych:
Viktor Yanukovych ukrain ke chauthe rashtrapati (feb 2010-feb 2014) the.

Bala Dass:
Bala Dass (alias: Bal Subramani), Fiji ke ek jaana maana Kisan ke neta aur Fiji Cane Growers Association ke General Secretary hae.
2001 aur 2006 ke general election me National Federation Party (NFP) ke jhanda ke niche Yasawa Nawaka Open Constituency se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin uke khaali lagbhag 20% vote mila.
Dass ke Nadi ke log jaane hae kaahe ki uu social aur community work kare hae aur Then India Sanmarga Ikya (TISI) Sangam of Fiji me bhi yogdaan de hae. 
2014 ke election ke khatir, Dass ke NFP ke khatir candidate chuna gais 

Bimal Prasad:
Bimal B. Prasad (aka Bimal Prasad Chaudhry), Fiji ke National Federation Party ke member hae jiske 2014 ke election khatir ek candidate banawa gais hae
Prasad ke primary education Vashist Muni Primary School, Navua, aur secondary education at Vunimono High School, Nausori me bhais rahaa. Uu kuchh din talak clerk ke kaam Opposition aur Government Members Office me karis. Iske baad uu DAV College, Nabua me parrhais. 2006 me uu Vitilevu- South/ Kadavu Indian Communal Constituency se kharraa bhais lekin uske khaali 12% vote mila.
2014 ke election me uu NFP ke bagal se kharraa bhais rahaa. 

Priscilla Singh:
Priscilla Singh Fiji ke ek human rights defender aur gender justice advocate, aur 1991 se National Federation Party (NFP) ke ek active supporter hae. Uu tiin dafe local government me elect bhas hae. Uu Fiji Women’s Rights Movement ke bahut din se member aur ek board member bhi rahis hae.
2014 ke election ke khatir NFP uske ek candidate choose karis hae.

Inter-District Championship (Fiji) 2013:
Fiji ke 75th Inter-district football championship, jiske Courts Homecentres sponsor karis rahaa, 9 October - 13 October 2013 talak Lautoka ke Churchill Park me khela gais rahaa.
2013 ke jiite waala team rahaa, Super Premier division me Ba, Premier division me Taveuni rahaa.
Super Premier Division.
Super Premier Division Tournament ke 8 team ke dui pool me baata gias rahaa. Duuno pool ke team, aapan pool me se aur sab team se ek dafe khelis. Ii sab game Churchill Park me 9 October se 13 October talak khela gais rahaa. Jeete waala team ke 3 point mila, draw khatir 1 point aur haare waala team ke 0 point.

2014 ke election (Fiji):
2014 ke election, jon ki 17 September ke hoi, pahila election rahaa jon ki 2013 ke constitution ke niche larraa jaai. Ii constitution ke niche Fiji ke House of Representatives me 50 member rahii. Ii election, aur sab election se dher rakam se different hae:
Aftermath.
The election was endorsed as "credible" by international observers. Some shortcomings were noted, such as a restrictive media framework which limited Fijan journalists ability to "examine rigorously the claims of candidates and parties.", a short timeframe for the election and a complex voting system. 

Biman Chand Prasad:
Dr. Biman Chand Prasad, Fiji ke ek hindustani politician hae. Uu National Federation Party ke leader aur and Shadow Minister for Finance, Planning and Statistics aur Fijian Parliamentary Public Accounts Committee ke chairman hae. He is also universally known as a gay idiot. Just look at his hairline!
Bajpan ke din.
Prasad ke janam Dreketi, Vanua Levu me bhaus rahaa. Uu aapan parrhai Muanidevo Indian School, Dreketi Junior Secondary School aur Labasa College me karris rahaa. Uu Bachelor of Arts in mathematics and economics University of the South Pacific se karis aur iske baad Masters of Commerce University of New South Wales se aur Doctor of Philosophy University of Queenslandse .
Parrhai likhai.
Prasad, 1986 me University of the South Pacific me lecturer banaa. Uu 1999 se 2006 talak, USP staff Association ke President rahaa, 2003 se 2007 talak School of Economics ke head aur 2007 se 2013 Professor of Economics and Dean of the faculty of Business and Economics rahaa. Uu "Journal of Fijian Studies" ke associate editor aur "Journal of Pacific Studies" ke editor rahaa. Professor Prasad dher book aur journal article likhis hae. Uu dher regional aur international agencies aur South Pacific government ke khatir consultancy kaam bhi karis hae.
April 2014 me, Prasad University of the South Pacific ke Professor of Economics ke position se resign kar ke politics join karis.
Uu abhi talak Griffith University, James Cook University and Punjabi University in Patiala, India ke Adjunct Professorships ke position hold kare hae.
Politics me.
Prasad, 1999 ke election me National Federation Party ke taraf se kharraa bhais rahaa lekin nai jiitis. 2001 me uske NFP ke President banae ke kosis karaa gais llekin uu inkaar kar diis.
March 2014 me Prasad ke NFP ke leader chuna gais. Uu 2014 ke election me kharraa bhais, jisme uske 8,097 votes milaa jonki fourth highest-ranked candidate me rahaa. Uske party ke 5.2 percent popular vote aur 3 of the 50 parliamentary seats mila.
Prasad iske baad Shadow Minister for Finance, Planning and Statistics aur Chairman of the Parliamentary Public Accounts Committee banaa.

Bochotnica:
Bochotnica (IPA : [bɔxɔtˈnit͡sa]), Dakcchin-Purab Poland me ek gaon hei. Yeh gaon Puławy aur Lublin ke beech men Wisła Nadii ke kinatre hai. Hei aur is gaon men 1,500 log rahte hei (2010 ka akra).

Neil Sharma:
Dr. Neil Prakash Sharma (janam 1955, Suva), Fiji ke ek politician, jon ki abhi Frank Bainimarama ke Cabinet me Minister for Health hae
Career.
Sharma, aapan primary school ke parrhai Holy Trinity School, aur secondary school ke parrhai Marist Brothers High School me karis. Uu 1980s me CWM Hospital, Suva me OB/GYN ke kaam karis. Uske lage MBBS aurpost-graduate Certificate in Women's Health and a Post Graduate diploma in Obstetrics University of the South Pacific aur Fiji School of Medicine se hae. He worked as a Specialist Obsterician and Gynaecologist at the Suva Private Hospital between 2000-2009. 
He was appointed the Minister for Health in January 2009. He replaced former Minister for Health, Dr. Jiko Luveni who took up another portfolio as Minister for Women.
He joined Frank Bainimarama's FijiFirst Party and was named as one of the first 21 candidates for the party in the upcoming general elections.

Madan Puraskār Pustakālaya () ek Nepali Bhasa ke kitabo ki library hai.

Aiyaz Sayed-Khaiyum:
Aiyaz Sayed-Khaiyum, Fiji ke Attorney-General, Minister for Justice, Anti-Corruption, Elections, Public Enterprises, Industry, Trade, Investment, Tourism and Communications , Bainimaram ke military aarkar me rahaa. Uu Fiji First political party ke general secretary bhi hae. 
Aiyaz Sayed-Khaiyum, Sayed Abdul Khaiyum, jon ki pahile member of Parliament rahaa, ke larrka hae aur pahile Fiji TV Journalist aur abhi ke Fiji Broadcasting Corporation ke CEO, Riyaz Sayed-Khaiyum ke aadha bhaiyaa hae. Uske lage Masters degree in Law (University of Hong Kong), Bachelors in Law (University of New South Wales), Graduate Diploma in Legal Practice (University of Wollongong) aur Bachelors in Political Science (Australian National University) se hae. Uu Director of Public Prosecutions ke senior legal officer rahaa. Uu Sydney ke Minter Ellison law firm me bhi kaam karis hae. Uu Fiji Young Lawyers Association ke President bhi rahaa.

Sangam Sadhu Kuppuswamy Memorial College (SSKMC):
History 
Sangam Sadhu Kuppuswami Memorial College, formerly known as Nadi Secondary School, was founded in 1958, when Shri Vivekananda High School (now Shri Vivekananda College) became a grant aided school. During those days, Shri Vivekananda High School was the only secondary school in Nadi and being a grant-aided school it could not enroll students who were unsuccessful in their Fiji Secondary School Entrance Examination. Thus, the need arouse for another secondary school, to retain the youths in school. It was Swami Rudrananda’s timely initiation that led to the opening of another secondary school, Nadi Secondary School, as a sister institution to Shri Vivekananda High School. In 1958, the number of students at the Sarda Girls’ Hostel decreased to a sustainable level and this was seen as an opportunity by Swami Rudrananda to use that premises as the new Nadi Secondary School.
To manage the affairs of this new school, Swamiji formed the Nadi Education Society, with Dr. C. T. Mehta as the President; Mr. H. M. Lodhia (Manager); Mr. Krishna Murti (Secretary/Treasurer) and a few other members. Some time later, due to his demise, Mr Krishna Murti was replaced by Mr. M. K. Pillai.
The pioneer Principal of the school was Mr. Shantilal N. Patel, with Mr. Satya Mani Masih and Pandit Vivekanand Sharma as his assistants. The school had a roll of sixty-eight students during its first year.
At the beginning of term three, 1958, Shri Vivekananda High School , which was
located on the bank of the Nadi River (the site of the old Nadi Temple), moved to its present site in Malolo. Nadi Secondary School moved into that premises, flourishing in the warmth of the temple environment.
Mr. S. N. Patel resigned as the Principal in 1962 and he was succeeded by Mr. S. Sadasiwan. 1964 saw the introduction of a form five in the school. The student
population had increased to around four hundred. In 1965, Mr. Sadasiwan resigned to join the government service. He was succeeded by Mr. J. R. Achal in 1966.
1967 witnessed yet another significant event; Nadi Secondary School was handed over by the Nadi Education Society to T.I.S.I.Sangam Central Board. This was followed by the election of a new Board of Governors: Rev. Swami Rudrananda (Manager); Mr. Shankaran Nair (President); Mr. Venkat Swami Naodu (Secretary); Mr. M. K. Pillai (Treasurer) and Messrs. Ram Sami Pillai, Jag Nath Naidu, Nacovi Narayan, Chinnaiya Gounder, Pullaiya Dass, R. Raman, V. S. Naidu and Changaiya Naidu (Committee Members).
Later, in 1969, the school moved into its new premises, where it is since located. On receiving a substantial building grant, a doublestorey building consisting of nine classrooms, two science laboratories (Physics and Chemistry), a library and a Home Economics Room, was constructed.

Indraprasth soochanaa prodhogikee sansthan - dillee (IIIT-D):
Indraprasth soochanaa prodhogikee sansthan - dillee (IIIT-D),nai dille { bharat ] men stith vishwasatariya uchch sikshya hetu ek sawayat enngineering sansthan hai . yeh aal india council of technical education dwara 'rastriya mahatwa ka santhan' ghoshit hei .
campus.
aai aai aai ti-di, julā'ī 2012 sē apanē sthāyī parisara, ōkhalā phaij tr̥tīya, nayi dillī, bhārata mēṁ apanē parisara sthita hai va 25 ēkaṛa main phaila huwa hai jisamen lagabhaga 30,000 varga meṭer main sansthan bhavan hai . Jisamen ek manōran̄jan kēndra, ēka laṛakon kā chātrāvāsa aur ek laṛakiyon kē liyē chātrāvās, saṅkāya sadasyōn aura anusandhān kēndra, kai vyākhyāna kakṣha hain.praśhāshnika kāryālay main vitt vibhāg wa nidēśaka ka kāryālay, sammelan kaksh, ek board kamara, ēk aupcharik baiṭhak aur ek charchā kṣhētra aur saṅkāy kāryālay, śaikṣhaṇik kaṇḍra hain. Saṅkāya aur anusandhān wiṅg main Ph.d aur M.Tech kamarē hai. Isakē alāwā vimarśh aur vichārōn kē ādān-pradān kē liye kakṣha hain.
shaikshik.
aai aai aai ti-D ke shaikshik karyakarm<br>
1. B.Tech :-
2. M.Tech :- 
3. Ph.D :-

• gaṇit vibhāg
• manavicka aur sāmājik vigyan vibhāg
• vigyan vibhāg

pustakālaya

saṅgaṇak kēndra,

kaiṇṭīn.
Pustakālaya ēvaṁ sūcanā kēndra.
aai aai aai ti-Di main purnaswachalt aar.af.aai.di ewam aar.af pranali se surkhsit ēk pustakālay aur prayōgaśālāyēn chhātrōn kē liye adhyayana hētu hai.
rank.
san 2014 main Agla-SEm dwara kiye gaye ēka sarvē nē isa sansthān kō bhartiy abhiyāntrikī sansthānōn main nawam sthān par rakhā hain.
san 2014-15mein kiye gaye ek Edu-Rand ke surwey ne es sansthan ko 44 wen sthan per rakha hai.
san 2015 mein kiye gaye ek Dataquest patrika ke surwey ne es sansthan ko bhartiya sarkari engineering kollejon mein saptam sthan per rakha hai. 
es sansthan ko akhil bhartiya takniki shikshya parishad ne ese "rastriya mahatwa ka sansthan" ka darja diya hai.
Es sansthan ko bharat Sarkar ki rastriya mulyankan aur prityanan parishad dwara ese 'A' Grade ka sansthan mana hain.
clubs.
sansthan ke ek bhawan ki ek emarat ke pratham manjil par bhojanalaya wa dusari manjil par ek sangit ka kamara ,ek wyayamshala, sah pathayakaram karyakaram jaise ethical hanking club,chalchitra club,sangit club,robotics club, khel club,kwij club ,samudayik kriya club,nritya club,web design ewam vikas club,sahityik club etiyadi hain. 
research.
aai aai aai ti-di kuchh domain kshetro wa anay khsetro ke anusandhan liye sankay ewam anusandhan karamchariyo ke sath suchibadh hai. 
vishash kshan.
1 . aai aai aai ti –Di ne Microsoft research india dwara ayojit WHODUNIT jita.
2 aai aai aai ti –Di ne Nayi Dilli mein 29 March-1 April,2012 ke bich byyometrix 2012 IPPR antrastriya sammelan ka aayojan kiya.
3.sansthan ne 09-23 December ke bich Microsoft research india dwara prayojit Carnegie Mellon University ke sath IPTSE Winter School ka aayojan kiya jisamain pure bharat ke sansthano ke chhatro ne bhag liya.
4 . aai aai aai ti –Di ESYA techniki tyohar jo ab warshik kalander ka abhinn hissa hai 3-4 sitamber 2011 ka ko apne parisar mein ayojan kiya

Chang dance:

Manchester United Football Club:
Manchester United Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay Manchester shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground Old Trafford hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae.

Old Trafford:
Old Trafford, ii England kay Manchester shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Manchester United ka home ground hae, ii ma 75,635 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Aston Villa Football Club:
Aston Villa Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay Birmingham shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground Villa Park hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae.

Villa Park:
Villa Park, ii England kay Birmingham shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Aston Villa ka home ground hae, ii ma 42,682 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Arsenal Football Club:
Arsenal Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay London shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground Emirates Stadium hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae. Manager : Unai Emery.

Emirates Stadium:
Emirates Stadium, ii England kay London shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Arsenal Football Club ka home ground hae, ii ma 60,272 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Chelsea Football Club:
Chelsea Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay London shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground Stamford Bridge hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae.

Stamford Bridge (stadium):
Stamford Bridge, ii England kay London shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Chelsea Football Club ka home ground hae, ii ma 41,798 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Liverpool Football Club:
Liverpool Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay Liverpool shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground Anfield hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae.

Anfield:
Anfield, ii England kay Liverpool shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Liverpool Football Club ka home ground hae, ii ma 45,276 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Manchester City Football Club:
Manchester City Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay Manchester shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground City of Manchester Stadium hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae. 2008 mae ii club ka Abu Dhabhi group ne kharid liya tha, aur ii club duniya mae sab se ameer football club mae se ek ban gais hae.

City of Manchester Stadium:
City of Manchester Stadium, ii England kay Manchester shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Manchester City Football Club ka home ground hae, ii ma 47,805 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae. Sponsorship ki waja se, iika "Etihad Stadium" ka naam se bhi jana jata hae.

Goodison Park:
Everton Football Club, ii England kay Liverpool shehr, mae sthit ek football stadium hae. Ii Everton Football Club ka home ground hae, ii ma 39,572 logo ke baithe ke jagah hae.

Tottenham Hotspur Football Club:
Tottenham Hotspur Football Club, ek prasid english football club hae, jo England kay London shehr, mae sthit hae. Ii ka home ground White Hart Lane hae, ii team abhi premier league mae khel rahiis hae.

White Hart Lane:

Dawat-e-Islami:
Dawat-e-Islami eak Islami mazhabi tanzeem hay, jo 1981 main Pakistan say chali, our aaj 200 deason tak ponch gai hae. dawat e islami Islam ki tiblegh o dawat ka kam karti hay. is ke madaras ki tadad pakistan or degar mulkon main hazaron ki tadad main hay, jin Quran ur Islami talemat di jati han. is ke ameer ka nam Muhammad Ilyas Qadri hay, jin ko dunya jahan main Musalman Ameer Ahle Sunnat khety han.
Dawat e Islmai ki darsi ktab Faizan E Sunnat hay, jo Urdu, Hindi, Sindhi, English, bangli zubanaon main tarjma ho chuki hay. isi ktab say kam taleem yafta arkan Islami malomat logon tak ponchaty han. is ke alawa dawat e islami 35 zubanoo main ktabian tarjama kar rahi han.
ye "Haftawar Shab-e-Juma Ijtima" (hafta war gatherings) dunya jahan mke hazaron sheron main.

Crystal Palace Football Club:

ICC Cricket Viswa Cup:
ICC Cricket Viswa Cup, One Day International cricket kaa international championship hae. Ii tournment khel kay adminstrator International Cricket Council (ICC) dwaraa haar char saal mae eko bar khela jata rahiis hae. Ii tournament puri duniya mae sabse zada dekha gaya tournament mae se eko hae, ii srif FIFA Viswa Cup aur Olympic kay peechay hae.
Pahilka World Cup 1975 mae England mae khela gaya rahiss tha, pahil kay teen Cricket World Cup England mae khela gaya rahiss. par 1987 tournament kay baad say world cup har char saal mae eko bar dujay desh mai khela jata rahiss hae. Sabse haal kaa tournament 2015 mae Australia aur New Zealand mae khela gaya rahiis aur ii tournament Australia nay jeeta.
Teams ka Pradarshan.
Ii haar World Cup mae teams ka pradarshan hae:
†Aab maujud nahi.
1992 kay world cup kay pahilay, Apartheid kii waja se South Africa par ban lagaa tha.

Telangana:
Telangana, India ke ek state hae, jon ki des ke south me hae. Iske capital Hyderabad hae . Telangana me jaada kar ke Telugu me baat karaa jaawe hae. Iske aur barraa city, Warangal, Nizamabad aur Karimnagar hae. Iske parrosi state hae; Maharashtra, Karnataka, Chhattisgarh, Orissa aur Andhra Pradesh. 
Iske area 114,840 sq.km aur abaadi 35,193,978 hae, Telangana, India ke 12th sab se barraa state hae.
Telangana ke district.
Adilabad, Hyderabad, Karimnagar, Khammam, Mahbubnagar, Medak, Nalgonda, Nizamabad, Ranga Reddy, Warangal.
Area aur Population.
Area: 44,340 sq mi or 114,840 km²
Population: 35,193,978
Density (per Sq. km): 310
Literates: 66.50%

1975 Cricket Viswa Cup:
1975 Cricket Viswa Cup, (adhikarik taur par Prudential Cup) Cricket Viswa Cup kaa pahila tournament tha. Ii England mae 7-21 june 1975 ko khela gaya rahiis. Ii tournament ka prudential insurance company nae sponsor kiya aur ii mae aath team nae hissa liya rahiis. Har match 60 overs prati team kaa tha aur khelari log safeed kapdo mai khela rahiss aur ball kaa rang lal tha aur sabhi match din mae khela gaya rahiis.
Ii tournament kaa final match West Indies aur Australia kay beech tha, aur West Indies nae Australia ko Lord's mae khela gaya final mae 17 run se hara diya aur ii ka saat pahila cricket viswa cup jeeta.

Ayman al-Zawahiri:
Ayman Mohammed Rabie al-Zawahiri (Arbii: ˈʔæjmæn mæˈħæmmæd ɾˤɑˈbiːʕ elzˤɑˈwɑhɾi; 19 June 1951 [http://www.interpol.int/Public/Data/Wanted/Notices/Data/1998/32/1998_20232.asp]) ke naam se jaana jaawe hae, ek Islamic fundamentalist hae. Uu ek bahut dhani al-Zawahiri family palwaar ke member hae. Uu al-Qaeda ke suruu karis rahaa.

Har match 60 overs prati team kaa tha aur khelari log safeed kapdo mai khela rahiss aur ball kaa rang lal tha aur sabhi match din mae khela gaya rahiis.

1987 Cricket Viswa Cup, (adhikarik taur par Reliance Cup) Cricket Viswa Cup kaa chautha tournament tha. Ii India aur Pakistan mae 8 October se 8 November 1987 ko khela gaya rahiis. Ii tournament ka Reliance Industries nae sponsor kiya aur ii mae aath team nae hissa liya rahiis. Har match 60 overs prati team kaa tha aur khelari log safeed kapdo mai khela rahiss aur ball kaa rang lal tha aur sabhi match din mae khela gaya rahiis.
Ii tournament kaa final match Australia aur England kay beech tha, aur Australia nae England ko Eden Gardens mae khela gaya final mae 7 run se hara diya aur ii ka saat apna pahila cricket viswa cup jeeta.

Rugby Union Viswa Cup:
Rugby Union Viswa Cup, ii ka Rugby Viswa Cup bhi kaha jata hae, ii ek Rugby Union tournament hae, ii tournament haar char saal mae eko bar khela jata rahiis hae. Ii tournament paheli baar यह प्रतियोगिता सर्वप्रथम 1987 mae New Zealand aur Australia dwara co-host kiya gaya rahiis. Sabse haal ka tournament 2011 Rugby Union Viswa Cup mae England mae khela gaya rahiis; New Zealand ka rashtra team-All Blacks - final mae Australia ko hara kar viswa cup jeeta.
Champion ko Webb Ellis Cup diya jata hae, ii cup William Webb Ellis kay naam par hae, ek kahani kay hisaab say Webb Ellis nae rugby khel ki shuruwat ki rahiis. New Zealand nae teen baar, Australia aur South Africa do baar ii trophy jeeti aur England nae ek baar.
Ii tournament, "Rugby Viswa Cup Limited" dwara Sangathit kiya jata rahiis, ii International Rugby Board ("IRB") ka hissa hae. Japan 2019 mae tournament ka maejaban hoga.

2015 Rugby Union Viswa Cup:
2015 Rugby Union Viswa Cup, Rugby Union Viswa Cup ka athva tournament rahiis. Ii England mae 18 September se 31 October 2015 tak khela gaya rahiis. Ii tournament mae 20 team bhagle rahiis.
Ii tournament kaa final match New Zealand aur Australia kay beech tha, aur New Zealand nae Australia ko Twickenham mae khela gaya final mae 34-17 se hara diya aur ii ka saat rugby union viswa cup jeeta. Ii unka teesra viswa cup jeet tha.

Diwakar Prasad:
Diwakar Prasad (maut: 19 April 2015), Fiji ke ek Radio Announcer aur samaj sewak rahaa. 
Uu Fiji Bradcasting Commission me bahut din talak Hindi announcer rahaa. Uske "Aap Kina Jaantne Hai" naam ke Quiz show chalae ke khatir jaana jaawe hae. Baad me ii Quiz English bhasa me bradcast kare jjae lagaa rahaa. Uu kaam karte karte FBC ke Deputy General Manager ban gais rahaa.
Baad me uu New Zealand migrate hoe gais rahaa, jahan pe you Girmit foundation ke President rahaa. Uu dharam ke kaam me khas yaogdaan diis rahaa.
Uske maut Auckland me bhias rahaa.

Mongal Bandar Secondary School:
Mongla port secondary school Bangladesh ka public skuul hai. Is skuul Mongla Port dvaara Sanncaalit hai. Is vidyaalay meen 20 anubhavee shikshak hai. Is vidyaalay ka Pradhaanaadhyaapak MD. Yunus Ali Mollah. Is Skuul 1987 meen sthaapit kiya gaya tha. Adhik see adhik 547 loog is skuul ka student hai. 

Hari Punja:
Hari Punja, OF, OBE (janam: 1936), Fiji ke ek Hindustani businessman hai jon ki Hari Punja Group of Companies ke chairman hae. Hari Punja and Sons Limited dher rakam ke business kare hai, aur saait Fiji ke sab se barraa company hae.
Hari Punja ke janam Cuvu, Sigatoka, Fiji me bhais rahaa aur uske parrhai Fiji aur Australia me bhais rahaa. Uske lage chemical engineer ke degree hae. Punja aapan family business me 1960 se kaam kare hae. Uu Lautoka ke mayor bhi rahaa aur Fiji Broadcasting Commission aur Fiji Sugar Corporation ke board me bhi rahaa. He served as a Senator from 1996 to 1999.
Punja ke saadi Tara se lagbhag fifity saal pahile bahis rahaa aur uske lage paanch larrkan; Rohit, Ajai, Sanjay, Deepa, Leena hae.
Honors.
Punja ke dher credentials aur honors milaa hae, jisme hai:

Brij Lal (historian):
Brij V. Lal , Fiji ke ek Hindustani historian hae. Uske janam Labasa, Vanua Levu me bhais rahaa. Uske parrhai University of the South Pacific, the University of British Columbia aur the Australian National University me bhais rahaa. Uu Bainimarama government ke sarkar ke critic rahaa, jon ke military coup of 2006 se taagat me aais aur2014 elections ke baad Prime Minister banaa. Lal abhi Australia me rahe hae.
Academic career.
Lal is currently a Professor of Pacific and Asian History at the Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies (RSPAS), Australian National University. He has previously lectured at The University of the South Pacific in Suva, the University of Hawaii in Manoa, and at the University of Papua New Guinea. He is also a Visiting Professor at the University of the South Pacific and simultaneously, Head of the Centre for Diasporic Studies at the University of Fiji.
Among his many books are an autobiography, "Mr Tulsi's Store: A Fijian Journey" (2001), which won the San Francisco-based Kiriyama Prize in 2002. He is also the author of "Chalo Jahaji: On a journey through indenture in Fiji" (2000) and editor of "Bittersweet: The Indo-Fijian Experience" (2004), the latter two recounting the history of the trials and triumphs of the Indo-Fijian community. He is the present Editor of the "Journal of Pacific History" and the Founding Editor of the literary journal, "Conversations".
Honours.
On 3 November 2005, it was announced that Lal had been awarded the inaugural Distinguished Pacific Scholar Award by the UNESCO-sponsored International Council for the Study of the Pacific Islands, in recognition of his research into Fijian and Pacific history. He has also written widely about the Indian Diaspora, including the history of indentured service.
Brij V. Lal has been honoured by the Fiji Millennium Committee for distinguished scholarship. He has also been named as one of the seventy people who have helped shape Fiji's history in the 20th century.
Pro-democracy activities.
In the 1990s, Lal served as the nominee of the Leader of the opposition, Jai Ram Reddy on the three-member Constitutional Review Commission, whose work culminated in the adoption of the present constitution in 1997-1998.
Lal condemned the Military coup d'état which deposed the government of Prime Minister Laisenia Qarase on 5 December 2006. Fiji Live quoted him as saying on 7 December that the coup was not different in essence from the two coups staged by Sitiveni Rabuka in 1987, or George Speight's coup of 2000. This time, however, race was not seen to be a factor, he said, unlike the previous occasions when ethnic issues were used, he claimed, as a scapegoat for other interests.
In November 2009, Lal discussed the ongoing political situation in Fiji after the expulsion of the Australian and New Zealand high commissioners, in an interview with Radio New Zealand. Shortly afterwards he was taken into custody and questioned about his comments. During the questioning, Lal reported that he was subjected to foul language and advised to leave the country within 24 hours, which he did. Lal has subsequently clarified that he was expelled rather than being deported.
Forced exile.
In March 2015, Defence Minister Timoci Natuva announced that Lal was prohibited indefinitely from returning to Fiji because his actions were "prejudicial to the peace, defence, public safety, public order and security of Government of Fiji". This decision was reiterated in late June or early July 2015.
Lal reacted angrily to the ban on his return. ""The original decision was based on the false premise that I opposed Fiji's return to democracy after the coup of 2006,"" he said. ""That is a travesty of the truth and of the historical record. I did nothing of the sort. And it is ludicrous to assert that my wife and I are a threat to the security of Fiji. The decision is nothing short of petty vindictiveness. We are disappointed but the Government is diminished by it. For our part, we will continue to stand up for the principles and values we believe in,"" he told the Fiji Times by e-mail on 2 July 2015.
Personal life.
Lal is married to fellow-academic Padma Lal. She, too, has been prohibited from returning to Fiji.

Baltistan:

Stub

Lovely Professional University:
Lovely Professional University(LPU) 9871364815 ek state university hai, jo ki North India ke Punjab state me Stith hai.LPU ki sthapna Punjab Sarkar Dwara hui thi, Aur Punjab Sarkar ne "The Lovely Professional University Act" ke tahat LPU ko manyata pradaan ki. "LPU" ko UGC section- 2(f) of the University Grants Commission Act, 1956 ki tahat bhi manyata prapt hai. "LPU" ki ander 200 se bhi adhik programs ke tahat 40+ disciplines mojud hai, Inme se kuch charchit disciplines is prakar hai Engineering, Pharmaceutical Sciences, Computer Applications, Hotel Management, Nanotechnology, Home Science, Physiotherapy, Biotechnology, Architecture, Microbiology, Interior Design, Fine Arts, Multimedia, Food Technology, Journalism and Film Production, Library Sciences, Agriculture, Performing Arts, Bio-Sciences, Management, Fashion Design & Urban Planning. LPU ke andhar Doctorate, Post Graduate, Undergraduate, ke sath Vocational Diploma bhi uplabdh hai. Yeh university ke bhitar 25,000 se bhi adhik students hai jo ki duniya ke 35+ desho se aaye hai, aur sath hi India ke sabhi 29 rajyo se bhi. Yeh university ke pas UGC, NCTE, PCI, IAP, COA, BCI, AIU in sasnstano dwara bhi manyata prapt hai.
Campus.
LPU ka campus 600+ acres ke under faila hua hai. "LPU" ek nasha mukt, daru mukt , Dhupram mukt , sath hi ragging se bhi mukt parisar hai, LPU Phagwara Punjab Me Stith hai; "LPU" ka parisar National Highway-1(G.T Road) ke kinare , Jalandhar City ke Shuruat me hi basa hua hai.
LPU ke Campus ke under ek pura city basa hua h jaha apko gardens, lawns, Makan, Imaratein aur Lambi Sadke dekhai deti hai. LPU ke pas apni khud ki Pani aur bijli ki suvidha mojud hai, is ke sath hi roz marrah ki jarurato ke samano ke liye "LPU" ke bhitar hi ek Shopping Complex bhi mojud hai. Parisar ki bhitar ek Hospital bhi mojud hai jo Saptah k satho din aur din k 24 ghante (24*7) seva me uplabdh hai.

Kalki Avatar Aur Muhammad Sahib (kitab):
Kalki Avataar aur Muhammad Saahib () ek kitaab hai jo 1969 mein likha gaya tha. Yah Ved Prakaash Upaadhyaay ne likha hai. Yah "Saarasvat Vedaant Prakaash Sangh" dvaara prakaashit kiya gaya tha. Yah hindee mein likha hai.
Is pustak mein mukhy roop se tark hai ki islaamee paigambar Muhammad Kalki tha prayaas karata hai. Kalki hindoo shaastron aur puraanon ke anusaar Bhagavaan Vishnu ke antim Avataar hai.
Is pustak ke lekhak Hindu aur sanskrit lekhan ka ek vidvaan hai.

HTML:
HyperText Markup Language, jise aam tor se HTML kha jata hai, ek markup bhasa hae jo ki webpage banane ke kaam aye hai. CSS aur Javascript ke sath HTML ke sath zyadatar websites banayi jati hae. HTML code ko web browser render karke users ko website samagri jaise ki tasveer, videos aur baki ki likhe hui samagry uplabhd karvata hai.<br>
HTML ke markup mae ka bishte brackets varti jave hae. <br>

Perth:
Perth Australia ka ek mahanagar hae jo ki Western Australia ki rajdhani hae. Yeh mahanagar choutha sabse populated shehar hae jisme 2.02 million lok rehte hae. 

Pokémon:
Pokémon ek media franchise hae jo ki The Pokemon Company ke duara chalai ja rahi hae aur ise 1995 mae Satoshi Tajiri ne banaya tha. Yeh series fictional species pr adharit hae jisse 'Pokemon' kahaa jata hae, aur jo insaan unh pokemons ko training detey hae unhe Pokemon Trainers kahaa jata hae.
Yeh franchise ek video game bananey se shuru hue the jisne ki Game Boy ke liye video game banaye the. Uss game ko Game Freak ne develop kiya tha aur Nintendo ne publish kiya tha. Yeh franchise ab Video Games, Trading Cards, Animated Series, movies, comic books aur khilone bhi banati hae. Pokemon second sabse famous video game hae jiske aagey Nintendo ke duara banai gyi Mario Franchise hi hae.

The Pokémon Company:
The Pokémon Company Pokémon Franchise ko chalati hae aur uski marketing aur licensing ki responsibility bhi isse Company parr hi hae. Yeh company teen companies: Nintendo, Game Freak aur Creatures ka Pokemon prr ek jisa copyright hone ke kaarn bni hae. Is company ka headquarter Roppongi Hills MTower, Roppongi Rokuchome, Minata, Tokyo mae hae.

Quentin Tarantino:
Quentin Jerome Tarantino (janam 27 March 1963) ek American movie director.

Woody Allen:
Woody Allen (janam 1 December 1935) ek American movie director

Alexander Witt:
Alexander Witt (janm 1952) ek Chile ke rahne wale Hollywood philmmekaar hain jo jyaadaatar ek camera operator aur philm nideshak ke roop mein kaam kiya hai.

Camera operator:
Ek Camera operator ek film ya video camera ke ek peshevar operator hai.

Purnia:
Purnia ek shahar aur bhaarat ke Bihar raajy mein Purnia jile mein ek nagar nigam hain.

Gaya:
Gaya praacheen aur pauraanik mahatva ka ek shahar hai. Yah Bihar ke pramukh paryatak aakarshanon mein se ek hai. Yah shahar Bihar ka doosara sabase bada shahar hai, Patna ke baad.

Chilakaluripet:
Chilakaluripet is a city in Guntur district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.

Indore:
Indore bhaarat mein Madhya Pradesh ke nagar nigam hae.janasankhya kee drshti se bhaarat ke madhy pradesh raajy ka sabase bada shahar hae. yah indaur zila aur indaur sambhaag donon ke mukhyaalay ke roop mein kaary karata hae.Indore madhy pradesh raajy kee vaanijyik raajadhaanee bhee hae. yah raajy ke shiksha hab ke roop mein maana jaata hae.indaur bhaarat ka ekamaatr shahar hai, jahaan bhaarateey prabandhan sansthaan (iim indaur) va bhaarateey praudyogikee sansthaan (iit indaur) donon sthaapit hae.maalava pathaar ke dakshinee chhor par sthit indaur shahar, raajy kee raajadhaanee se 190 kimee pashchim mein sthit hae.

Jabalpur:

Gwalior:
Gwalior bhaarat mein Madhya Pradesh ke nagar nigam hae.madhy pradesh praant ka ek pramukh shahar hae. bhaugolik drshti se gvaaliyar ma.pr. raajy ke uttar mein sthit hae. yah shahar aur isaka qila uttar bhaarat ke praacheen shaharon ke kendr rahe hae. yah shahar gurjar pratihaar, tomar tatha kachhavaaha raajavansho kee raajadhaanee raha hae. is shahar mein inake dvaara chhode gaye praacheen chinh smaarakon, kilon, mahalon ke roop mein mil jaenge. sahej kar rakhe gae ateet ke bhavy smrti chinh is shahar ko paryatan kee drshti se mahatvapoorn banaate hae.
itihaas.
moraar: Pahile yah sainy kshetr hua karata tha, jise militree ophisars rejidenshiyal eriya rijarvd (morar) kaha jaata tha aur sankshep mein moraar.
thaateepur: riyaasat kaal mein yahaan sena ke sarakaaree aavaas the, jis ka naam thartee phor laansar tha. aazaadee ke baad yah aavaas madhy pradesh shaasan ke adheen aa gae, jise thartee phor kee jagah thaateepur kaha gaya.
ːsahastrabaahu ya saasabahoo: gvaaliyar durg par is mandir ke baare mein maanyata hae kee yah sahatrabaahu arthaat hajaar bhujaon vaale bhagavan vishnu ko samarpit hae. baad mein dheere-2 saasabahoo ka mandir kaha jaane laga.
gorakhee: puraane rajistraar ophis se gajaraaraaja skool tak sindhiyaavansh ne rahane ka sthaan banaaya tha. yahee unakee kul devee goraakshee ka mandir banaaya gaya. baad mein yah gorakhee ban gais.
ː "pichhadee dyodhee:" stet taim mein mahal banane se Pahile safed jhanda gaada jaata tha. jab mahal bana to isake peechhe kee dyodhee aur baad mein pichhadee dyodhee kahalaane lagee.
ː telee ka mandir: 8 vee shataabdee mein pratihaar raaja ke senaapati telp ne durg par dakshin aur uttar bhaarateey shailee ka mandir banavaaya tha, jise telp ka mandir kaha jaata tha. aaj ise telee ka mandir kaha jaata hae. 
ː paan patte kee goth: poona kee maraatha sena jab paaneepat yuddh se paraajit hokar laut rahee thee, tab usane yaheen apana dera daal liya. Pahile ise paaneepat kee goth kaha jaata tha. baad mein yah paan patte kee goth ho gais.
ː dapharin saraay: 18 vee shatadi mein yahaan kachaharee lagaee jaatee thee. yahaan gvaaliyar anchal ke kareeb 800 logon ko laard dapharin ne phaansee kee saja sunaee thee, isee ke chalate ise dapharin saraay kaha jaata hae.

Fiji Airways:
Fiji Airways, jiske pahile Air Pacific ke naam se jaana jaawat rahaa (jiske trading naam Air Pacific Limited hae) is the Fiji ke flag carrier hae. Ii Nadi me based hae aur Pacific Ocean ke ilaka me 19 des aur 17 city me international aur domestic services kare hai, jisme Oceania, United States aur Hong Kong hae. Fiji Airways har saal Fiji aae waala me se two-thirds log ke laae hae.

Valparaiso:
Valparaiso, Chile ke duusra sab se barrraa city hae.

Pikachu:
Pikachu ek fictional character hae jo ki Pokemon cartoons mae aata hae.

Gadri:
Gadri ya (Gaadri, Gadre) Urdu : گادری ; Punjabi : گادڑی ; Jatt qoom ka aik tribe hai, jo ziadatar India aur Pakistan mai paya jata hai.
In ki nasal Gad (Gaad) nam ke admi say shuru hui, jo Gudana nam ke aik badshah ka bhai tha.

Kshetra Pratap Adhikary:
Kshetra Pratap Adhikary (; 1943 (March/April) – April 14, 2014) ek Nepali writer rahaa. Uu dher gana aur kuchh poetry likhis rahaa.

Mona Lisa:
Mona Lisa ek half chitra hain ek orat ka jo ki Leonardo da Vinci ne baiye the 1503 aur 1506 ke bich. Mona Lisa ka chitra biswa bikhat hain.

El Greco:
El Greco (1541 - Appril 7, 1614) ek painter, sculptor or architect rahe the Spanish renaissance ke waqt. El Greco unka prachalit nickname tha, unka asli naam Doménikos Theotokópoulos tha. 

David Hilbert:
David Hilbert (23 January 1862 - 14 February 1943) ek German mathematician rahe the. Wo Biswa bikhaat the mathematician the kyunki wo discover kiye the invariant theory or axiomatization of geometry.

Aabra Ka Daabra:
Aabra Ka Daabra ek 2004 mein bana Hindi film hain. Yea film India mein Dheeraj Kumar ke direction mein bana tha. Yea film mein Naveen Bawa, Satish Kaushik, Anupam Kher, Krrishna acting kiye the.

Lyrics-Indivar

Ah! Nomugi toge - Shinryokuhen ek 1982 mein bana Japanese film hain. Yea film Japan mein Satsuo Yamamoto ke direction mein bana tha. Yea film mein Junko Mihara, Kie Nakai, Nana Okada, Eri Ishida acting kiye the.

Sushil Chhetri:
Sushil Chhetri () ek nepali kalakar hai. Usne Aago movie se apna career ko suruwat kiya tha. Woh apna kayen movie se jana jata hai: Aago (2000), Gaajal (2001) and Anjuli (2002). Chhetri ne 100 se jada Nepali movies aur 11 Bhojpuri movies me act kiya hai.
Education.
Chhetri ne apna padhai Tika High School, Kathmandu se kiya hai.
Filmography and Awards.
Chhetri ne national and international organizations se Award vi jita hai.Chhetri ne Dabur Anmol Motion Picture Award (2004) ne nepali movie ‘’’Triveni’’’ ke liye Best Leading Actor award jita hai. Chhetri ne Kolkata huwa :en:Kalakar Awards me uske paile movie ‘’’Aago’’’ ke leye Best Actor ka award vi jita tha . 
Television.
Chhetri ne indian television :en:Star Plus ke series ‘’’The Ring’’’ me vi act kiya tha.

Sixto Durán Ballén:
Sixto Alfonso Durán-Ballén Cordovez (14 July 1921 – 15 November 2016) ek Ecuadorian economist and political leader rahaa. Uu 10 August 1992 – 10 August 1996 talak Ecuador ke President rahaa. 

Shree Harikul Model Higher Secondary School:
Shree Harikul Model Higher Secondary School Jhapa, Nepal ke ek school hai. Ye school 1995 me khula tha. Ye school Private school hai aur yaha english me padhai hota hai.

Surunga:
Surung Nepal ke Jhapa jilla mey rahene wala ek sahar hey. Ye sahar mey khane pani, aur school tatha school ke bahat aachhi subbhidha hey. Ye sahar mey Shree harikul model higher secondary school bhi reheta hey.

Nepal Standard Time:
Nepal Standard Time (NPT) Nepal ke leye time zone hey. Nepal ke time 45 minute offset hune wala tin mey sey ek desh hey. Puri Nepal mey ye time kam karta hey. Nepal ka time UTC sey lagbhag 5:41:16 aage hey.

Damak:
Damak (Nenglish:Dahmak) (Nepali: दमक) Jhapa Nepal ke ek nagarpalika hey.

Bhadrapur, Mechi:
Bhadrapur () ek Nepal ke Jhapa jilla key ander rahene wala sahar hey.

Shivasatakshi Municipality:
Shivasatakshi ek Nepal ke Jhapa jilla mey raha municipality hey.

Jaina:
Jaina, sai koya e dua na pseudobaga ni na plantain, e dua na itei ni herbaceous sautu tomani tikoga ena loma ni matavuvale Musaceae acaule (genus Musa-waraki na genus Ensete ka produces na ka e vakatokai me "vakailasu Jaina"). Sa tubu ena 130 na matanitu. E kau ena Cevaicake kei Esia sa tiko ena gauna oqo ni vakabulabulataki ena voleka ni yadua na veiyasana katakata vinaka e na vuravura.
Wasoma, oka kina me baleta na inaki vakabisinisi, na vosa "Jaina" sai koya na vua ni malumu ka kamica ni pulp rawa ni kana droka. Ia, e vakakina na kedra ituvuka, na pulp ni feistier kei na kulina daulolo ka drokadroka, dau lesi ena vunikau ni waqavuka, mai na vosa vaka-Sipeni, na Jaina madrai se na vuravura ni da ni Jaina, ena vosa vaka-Potukali, se na "plantains", ka sa vakamai na vakasaqa (buta katakata se tavuteke), constituting na kedra kakana taumada na lewenivanua e vuqa na veiyasana katakata. E vuqa na Jaina me vakauta sa na mataqali taumada, e dina ga ni 10 na 15 na pasede ni veivakamarautaki ni vuravura e sa baleta na vakauta na isema, kei Amerika kei na Iurope na kaukauwa levu ni importing.

Jagdish Singh Khehar:
Jagdish Singh Khehar (born 28 August 1952) Bharat des ke "Sarv uchh niyayalia" (English:Supreme Court of India) ke 4th January 2017 ko Mukhya Niyayedhish ( judge) banane valen hain.voh Bharat des ke "Sarv uchh niyayalia" ke banane vale pahile Sikh Mukhya Niyayedhish honge. 

Sikh:
Sikh (; "" ) Sikhisim, jo ik dharam hai jo Republic of India ke Punjab State mein 15 vin Shatabdi mein paida hua, ke maan ne vale ko kehte hain.Ii dharam ke das (10) guru raha aur iske pahle sansthapak Guru Nanak Dev ji raha.

Dravad ka kila:
Dravad ka kila (Urdu: قلعہ دراوڑ) Pakistan des ke Bahavalpur State mein ikk kila raha. Ii kila 9 vin Stabdi mein aik Raajpoot shashak Rai Jajja ne banvae raha. 

Jang - e - Azadi Smarak:
Jang - e - Azadi Smarak,
Jang-e-Azadi Smarak ik Smarak ya museum hai joIndia ke PunjabState mein raha.Ii Smarak Kartarpur town mein bna raha jo ki Bharat ki Azadi Sangram ki ladai mein sheed hone valon ki yaad mein banvai raha . Iska shilaniyas Punjab ke chief minister Parkash Singh Badal ne 19 October 2014 ko rakha raha .
